40001001	Yesu Kristo, Devid na Abraham nana wre, u sele leele nↄↄ hlɛ yi kre.
40001002	Abraham wra Isaki se, a Isaki na Jekↄb se, a Jekↄb na Juda na u chinlɛ se.
40001003	Juda na Tamar wru a pra Perez na Zera se, a Perez na Hezrↄn se, a Hezrↄn na Ram se,
40001004	a Ram na Aminadab se, a Aminadab na Nahshↄn se, a Nahshↄn na Salmↄn se.
40001005	Salmↄn chↄ na wi Rahab, a pre na Boaz se, a Boaz na u chↄ Ruth na Obɛd se, a Obɛd na Jɛsi se.
40001006	A Jɛsi na ŋunu Devid se. A ŋunu Devid na Sↄlↄmↄn se Uria lekuchↄ wre na.
40001007	A Sↄlↄmↄn na Rehoboam se, a Rehoboam na Abija se, a Abija na Asa se.
40001008	A Asa na Jehoshafat se, a Jehoshafat na Joram se, a Joram na Uzia se.
40001009	A Uzia na Joram se, a Joram na Ahaz se, a Ahaz na Hiskia se.
40001010	A Hiskia na Manasɛ se, a Manasɛ na Amↄs se, a Amↄs na Josia se.
40001011	A Josia na Jekonia na u chinlɛ se, nyjila ŋga nu pra Israel leele yii mna sɛ Babilↄn na kre.
40001012	Ŋga pra pe yii mna sɛ Babilↄn na kre kↄkro kre, Jekonia na Shealtiel se, a Shealtiel na Zerubabel se.
40001013	A Zerubabel na Abihud se, a Abihud na Eliakim se, a Eliakim na Azor se.
40001014	A Azor na Zadok se, a Zadok na Achim se, A Achim na Elihud se,
40001015	A Elihud na Eliasar se. A Eliasar na Matan se, a Matan na Jekↄb se,
40001016	a Jekↄb na Josɛf se, Josɛf chↄ na wi Maria, la, Maria pↄ na wi Yesu ŋmba pe yeeri Kristo wre.
40001017	Kena mu yire Abraham na mu pan mu su Devid na kre, pe sele nↄɛ yire kro pe sele kɛmbↄjijirɛ, a mu yire Devid na mu hɛ su nyjila ŋga nu pra Israel leele yii mu sɛ Babilↄn na kre, pree sele kɛmbↄjijirɛ, a mu yire ŋga praa wa mu tni Babilↄn na mu pan ma su Kristo ŋmba Nyiɛkpↄↄ na wↄ kre na kre, pree sele kɛmbↄjijirɛ na.
40001018	Imi na Yesu Kristo sem na nyi i kre. Pra u lo Maria wru mna Josɛf ŋga mbe u u leŋge. Ŋga pe n na ta mu fni kre, pra nya na Maria siire ta, mu yire Kpra Ŋumu wre na.
40001019	A u plↄ Josɛf, ŋmba pra u wru mu ŋga mbe u u leŋge kre, na pe lewo ŋmba u fraka, a u nsraa chaa mbe nyifɛɛrɛ Maria gbo lenɛɛrɛ yiɛ na. Ki tia wra u jawala pe na we u je brɛm.
40001020	Ŋga kre kee ŋga na pan Josɛf ndra na kre, ki ble ka to, a nyjeeri bituŋu wa na uyɛ wↄ mu Josɛf nyina ŋunɛ nu, mna yo u pan mbo, "Josɛf, Devid nana, maa fiɛ na mu Maria leŋge, ti mbe u pe mu chↄ. Ŋgi na, siire ŋga u ta kre, Kpra Ŋumu wre na u yire mu ki ta.
40001021	A we biblↄ se, mbe mu u mɛɛ tɛɛ Yesu. Ki nyina na, wre we u waŋgra leele shↄ mbe yili pe sisam nu."
40001022	A yire kee nyjɛ krɛrɛ yie pe mbe ti o Tafun kee nyjɛ u yire u kee nyanyofun na mu yo kre, mbe yi pe kpra.
40001023	Mbo, "E le, chlↄ ŋmba u n blↄ chin kre we siire ta, mbe biblↄ se, mbe pe u yeeri 'Emmanuel', ki nyina na, 'Wre na Nyiɛkpↄↄ oo wa titɛɛ.' "
40001024	Ŋga Josɛf na nyi kre, u nsra kee nyjɛ o Tafun bituŋu wre yo u pan kre je, wra Maria wru mu leŋge.
40001025	La, u nsra Maria chin chlↄ mna hɛ su ŋga wra biblↄ wre se. A Josɛf na pↄ wre mɛɛ tɛɛ Yesu.
40002001	Pra Yesu se Bɛtlɛhɛm ŋga kii wa Judea tra nu kre na, kre nyjila kre na Hɛrodi wi ŋunu kre tra kre nu. Ŋga pra Yesu se kre, kachimblɛ plɛ na yiri yilafinhaa mna pan Jerusalɛm na,
40002002	mna pan na wie mbo, "Sena Judae ŋunu ŋmba pe se kre nyi hin? O u wↄlↄ nya yilafinhaa na paan mbe u sumi."
40002003	Ŋga ŋunu Hɛrodi na kre kee ŋga loo kre, gbun na yↄ u na, a kra wre na Jerusalɛm leele kro hau.
40002004	A wra Judae sↄfue loplombo na nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre kro ble mna pe wie mbo, "Chia ŋgi na pra yo na pie Kristo wre se kre hin?"
40002005	A pra kna mbo, "Bɛtlɛhɛm ŋga kii wa Judea tra na kre na. Pan Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun wre na ki nyunↄ mu tɛɛ, mbo,
40002006	'Ŋu Bɛtlɛhɛm ŋga muu wa Juda tra nu, mu ŋunumulie n pe fiɛn Judae ŋulo nu. Ŋgi na, ŋu sele nu ŋunu we yiri mbe paan ni leele Israel le.' "
40002007	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, Hɛrodi na kachimblɛ pre yeeri brɛm mna pe wie nyjila ŋga nu wↄlↄ kre na yili.
40002008	A wra yo pe pan mbo, "E sɛ pↄ wre haa cha chiriri. Na e waa u nya kre, e ndru e pan e yo ni pan, mbe ni sɛ u sumi ka na."
40002009	Ŋga pra ŋunu wre kee kre loo mu kↄ kre, a pra to kolo. Ŋga praa shie kre to, wↄlↄ ŋga pra nya yilafinhaa kre, na yiɛ klu pe pan mna sɛ yire katoo ŋga nu pↄ wre na nyi kre ndra na. A pe yiɛ na shↄ mu tro.
40002011	A pra sɛ le katoo wa mna pↄ wre na u lo Maria nya, a pra kosie kan u yiɛ, mna pe tuuro zaanri mna u kɛ swa nyiɛ, na tlade, na kroboo ndiom taan.
40002012	Ŋga praa wa wa kre, ki ble ka blee Nyiɛkpↄↄ na pe jaari ŋunɛ nu na pia shia ndru mbe sɛ tro Hɛrodi lawee na. A kra tia pra tro kolo fↄŋgↄ na mna sɛ pe chia.
40002013	Ŋga kachimblɛ pre na yili wa mna sɛ kre, nyjeeri bituŋu wa na uyɛ wↄ mna Josɛf nyina ŋunɛ nu mbo, "Yiri mu pↄ wre na u lo wru mu fɛ mu sɛ Egypt na. E sɛ tni wa e sɛ su nyjila ŋga nu mbe yo e pan na, e ndru e pan. Ŋgi na, Hɛrodi pↄ wre chaa mbe gbo."
40002014	A Josɛf na yiri blee kre mna pↄ wre na u lo bali mna yili chia kre na mna sɛ Egypt na.
40002015	Ba pra tni mna sɛ su nyjila ŋga nu Hɛrodi na ku. Kre kee ŋga na pe mna tia Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee ŋga wra yire u kee nyanyofun na mna yo kre na pe kpra na. "Ni ni pↄ yeeri mu yili Egypt na."
40002016	Nyjila ŋga Hɛrodi na nya na kachimblɛ pre u fana kre, u krↄ na kun kpↄↄ. A wra leele tun na pe sɛ bibilɛ mblɛ pee wa Bɛtlɛhɛm na, na ki mbɛɛlɛ chiɛ yire na kro gbo, pe mblɛ pe li yɛlɛ shiin, na mblɛ pe n ta mu da tun kre kro, mu yire ŋga ble wra kee kre loo kachimblɛ pre pan kre na.
40002017	A kee nyjɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun Jeremia na yo kre na pan mna mbo,
40002018	"Mana kpↄↄ ka yilii Rama na, nyɛnɛɛ na fooro kpↄↄ kee ni, Rahɛl u biile nyɛni, a pia jaa u bre. Ŋgi na, u biile pre n wa na."
40002019	Hɛrodi kum kↄkro kre, Nyiɛkpↄↄ bituŋu na uyɛ wↄ mna Josɛf nyina ŋunɛ nu Egypt na wa mbo,
40002020	"Yiri mu pↄ wre na u lo wru mu ndru mu sɛ Israel tra nu. Mblɛ pe pↄ wre chaa mbe gbo kre pe ku."
40002021	A Josɛf na yiri mu pↄ wre na u lo wru mna sɛ Israel tra nu.
40002022	A ŋga Josɛf na loo na Arkelao sɛ u lɛ Hɛrodi krↄ li mu ŋunumu li Judea na kre, kra tia fiɛrɛ na Josɛf yii, a wraa fiɛ na we sɛ wa. Ŋga kra pan ma kre, Nyiɛkpↄↄ na Josɛf jaari ŋunɛ nu a wra sɛ Galilii tra nu.
40002023	mna sɛ tni Nazrɛt chia kre na. Kre kee ŋga na pe, mna tia kee ŋga Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ pre na yo mu tɛɛ kre na pe kpra mbo, "Pie u yeeri Nazrɛt wo."
40003001	Kre nyjila kre nu Jↄn, ndrajefun wre, na yiri na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee yuu fimi lawee waa kre nu, Judea tra nu.
40003002	Mbo, "E e jawala chinɛ, Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre mbra mna."
40003003	Wre Jↄn ŋmba kee Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun Yisaia na nya mu yo kre, mbo, "Ndro waa wa na gble leni fimi lawee yire nu, mbo, 'E o Tafun kolo kre gbeele! E u trohaa kre fraka!' "
40003004	Nyuuma yooro yoŋgo Jↄn naa toni. A yurↄ hlɛ na yi u greree, a u sroe na yii lɛ kpatↄ na srɛ.
40003005	A Jerusalɛm leele na Judea leele na Jↄↄdan lↄↄ kre mbɛɛ tnifɛɛnlɛ kro na yili mna sɛ u pan wa,
40003006	mna sɛ pe sisam yo, a wra pe ndrɛ je Jↄↄdan lↄↄ kre nu.
40003007	Ŋga Jↄn na Farisiie na Sadukie pre tataara nya na pe paan mbe u pe ndrɛ je kre, a wra kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Leesaala biile, ŋmbi u e nyina na e fɛ mbe yili krↄ kↄↄn ŋga ki paan kre nu hin?
40003008	Kena e na kee nyjɛ yi nyina na e laa e sisam kro kre pini.
40003009	Mbe yaa kro mbra eyɛ fana mbra yuu na, 'O lɛ wi Abraham.'
40003010	Pe gbana tɛɛ tinyi yire didinyi na, tiŋge ŋga ki n na sɛŋgɛ chichie sɛni kre, pie ki kun mbe sɛ ki wa kanhun."
40003011	"Mi rɛ, nyumu ni ni e ndrɛ jee, mbe ki nyina na e laa e sisam kro, la, ŋmba uu wa ni kro na paan kre rɛ, Kpra Ŋumu wre na kanhun ni we e ndrɛ je. U jaŋga wɛ ni na. Mi kuraa n fna mbe u kpawrɛ yii. Wre we paan e ndrɛ je Kpra Ŋumu wre na kanhun ni.
40003012	U kↄↄŋgↄↄ ŋga ni u yirɛ foo wa u kɛɛ, ŋga ni we yirɛ fue yire fↄ mbe yili yi bie nu, mbe sɛ yi bie yire tɛɛ lawee chichie nu, mbe sɛ yi fue yire le kanhun ŋga kraa fii nu."
40003013	A Yesu na yiri Galilii na mna sɛ Jↄↄdan lↄↄ kre mbɛɛ na Jↄn pan, na Jↄn u u ndra je.
40003014	A Jↄn na kna mbo, "Mi ŋmba ki fna mbe mu ni ndra je kre, a ŋu pan na yuu na ni mu ndra je."
40003015	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Fuŋgaami ŋga, pan ki fna mbe pan. Ŋgi na? Kre kolo na oo yire mbe chiin ŋga Nyiɛkpↄↄ chaa pe." Ŋga wra yo ma kre, kra tia Jↄn na u ndra je.
40003016	Ŋga Jↄn na u ndra je mu kↄ, a wra yili lↄↄ kre nu to, a nyjeeri na nyaa, a Yesu na nya na Nyiɛkpↄↄ Ŋumu wre tii mu pan u na, na katoo kotro wi.
40003017	To, a mana kpↄↄ ka na yili nyjeeri mbo, "Ŋmba wi ni Pↄ ŋmba ni kori, a ni yiɛ shↄ u na titi!"
40004001	Titɛɛ kre nu a Nyiɛkpↄↄ Ŋumu wre na Yesu bali mna sɛ fimi lawee kre nu, mbe Sutna sɛ u nyu cha.
40004002	A Yesu na ble fun ble nununu fuloe shiin, lafo na ble. Kre kↄkro kre, klo na u ta.
40004003	A Sutna wre na pan u jaara mna yo u pan mbo, "Na ŋu wi Nyiɛkpↄↄ Pↄ wre titi kre, paara mbe dnɛ nyjɛ kaari paanu."
40004004	A Yesu na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Pra ki nyunↄ mu tɛɛ na, 'ki n pe sro ŋga lewo we li chiin na we yila mbe tni waŋgra nu, la kee ŋga Nyiɛkpↄↄ yuu kre na yi.' "
40004005	Ŋga kↄkro kre, Sutna na u bali wa mna sɛ Jerusalɛm chia kre na, mna sɛ yire na u ni suminyuŋgo gedeŋge titi kre ndra na,
40004006	mna yo u pan mbo, "Na ŋu wi Nyiɛkpↄↄ Pↄ wre titi kre, ye mu to tra mbe ni le. Ŋgi na, pra ki nyunↄ mu tɛɛ mbo, 'Mbe ni bitumblↄ tun mbe pe paan mu le, mbe mu shↄ brɛm, mbe mu jele waa gbun dnɛ na.' "
40004007	A Yesu na kna mbo, "A pe ki nyunↄ mu tɛɛ na chↄↄ mbo, 'Maa shia mu Tafun Nyiɛkpↄↄ pe mbe le.' "
40004008	A Sutna na Yesu bali na, mna sɛ na u ni nyua gedeŋge ka ndra na, mna u nyina waŋgra ŋunumulie, na ki yirɛ chichiele nyjɛ mu chin ŋga kro,
40004009	mna kna mu yo Yesu pan mbo, "Na mu kosie kan mbe ni sumi kre, mbe mu ŋga yirɛ nyjɛ mu nyaa ŋga kro."
40004010	A Yesu na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Sutna, flo wa! Pra ki nyunↄ mu tɛɛ na 'Mu Tafun Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre chiin yiɛ ki fna mbe mu kosie kan mbe u sumi.' "
40004011	Ŋga wra yo ma kre, a Sutna wre na u ti wa mna se, a nyjeeri bitumblↄ na pan mna u sumi wa.
40004012	Ŋga Yesu na loo na pe Jↄn yii mu le nyuŋgo kre, wra sɛ Galilii tra nu.
40004013	U nsra sɛ tni Nazrɛt na, la, Kapɛnↄm chia ŋga kii wa Galilii tapla kre nyu na, Zebulↄn na Naftali tra na kre, bawa wra sɛ tni.
40004014	Yire kee nyjɛ krɛrɛ na pe mna tia Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun Yisaia kee ŋga wra yo mu tɛɛ kre, a kra pe kpra mbo, "Zebulↄn tra na Naftali tra nyjɛ yii wa tapla mbɛɛ na kre,
40004015	Jↄↄdan lↄↄ kro kre, Galilii leele mblɛ pe n pe Judae tra kre,
40004016	leele mblɛ praa wa mu tni wↄmu nu kre, pe kania kpↄↄ nya, mblɛ praa wa mu tni kumu tra na kre, pe lawee nyaa kama."
40004017	Mu yire kre nyjila kre, Yesu na nyaari mu tro, mna yuu na leele pe pe jawala chinɛ. Ŋgi na, Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre mbra mna.
40004018	Ŋga Yesu naa nyaari Galilii tapla kre nyu na kre, wra Siimↄn ŋmba praa yeeri Pita wre na u chunu Andriu nya, na pee wa na asau waa, na mbroe woni.
40004019	A Yesu na pe yeeri mbo, "E pan e taa ni kro, mbe ti mbe e pe leele wↄfɛɛnlɛ."
40004020	Titɛɛ kre nu, a pra pe asau kre ti wa mna pan mu taa Yesu kro.
40004021	Ŋga wra yiri wa mna sɛ yiɛ chiɛri kre, wra Zebedii biile, Jemisi na Jↄn, nya na pee wa mu tni pe krↄ nu, na pe lɛ Zebedii ni, na pe asau gbeele. A Yesu na biile pre yeeri.
40004022	Titɛɛ kre nu, a pra krↄ kre na pe lɛ ti wa, mna pan mu taa u kro.
40004023	Yesu na kila Galilii tra kre nu kro mna na leele nyina Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre ketaan kre, pe fninyinyi yire nu, mnaa yambla trai.
40004024	A u kee na kpali mna sɛ Siria tra nu kro, a pra pan na yambla nyini nyini mblɛ praa wa kanyana nu, na mblɛ nu ŋumufuɛn nyi, na tↄↄlↄfɛɛnlɛ, na mblɛ pe fuuru kro ni, a wra pe tra peii.
40004025	A lenɛɛrɛ na yiri Dakapoli chiɛ kɛ yire na, na Jerusalɛm, na Judea tra nu, na Galilii tra nu, na Jↄↄdan lↄↄ kre kro, mna pan mu taa u kro.
40005001	Ŋga Yesu na lenɛɛrɛ pre nya ma kre, a wra nduu nyua ka na mna sɛ tni wa, a u bitumblↄ pre na u kↄŋgↄ ni mna sɛ tni u jaara.
40005002	A wra paara mna pe nyina mbo,
40005003	"Mblɛ pe nyɛni mblɛ pe Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee kre shian kre, pe wo yi dwamu. Ŋgi na, pre wo yi nyjeeri ŋunumu kre.
40005004	Mblɛ pe nyɛni pre wo yi dwamu. Ŋgi na, pre pie bre.
40005005	Mblɛ pe peyɛ nyjii pre wo yi dwamu. Ŋgi na, pre pie tra kre ta mbe tni.
40005006	Mblɛ pe kefrakaa klo, na ki gbↄↄ ta kre, pre wo yi dwamu. Ŋgi na, pre pie yↄↄ.
40005007	Fooro chinfɛɛnlɛ wo yi dwamu. Ŋgi na, pre fooro pie chin.
40005008	Mblɛ jawala ki nyu kre pre wo yi dwamu. Ŋgi na, pre pie Nyiɛkpↄↄ nya.
40005009	Mblɛ pe pan na wejinyiŋge ni kre, pre wo yo yi dwamu. Ŋgi na, pre pie yeeri Nyiɛkpↄↄ biile.
40005010	Mblɛ leele pra pe frakaa na kre, pre wo yi dwamu. Ŋgi na, pre wo yi nyjeeri ŋunumu kre.
40005011	Yire mblɛ pe yila ni na, na e tɛɛlɛ, mu tia e na kala nyaa, mu na sisam kee ŋga kro fnɛ na taari e na kre, e wo yi dwamu.
40005012	E ti mbe e yiɛshↄ, mbe e wejinyi saan e na, yaka ma, e fↄtↄↄrↄ kpↄↄ nyjeeri. Pan chↄↄ pra Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ mblɛ pra yiɛklu mu pan kre pra."
40005013	"Yire lɛ waŋgra weŋge. La, na tnamu kↄ weŋge nu kre, ki n nyu mu yaka ŋga na, kna pie ki kna mbe wo, mbe leele ki taanla.
40005014	A yire lɛ waŋgra kania, chia ŋga kii wa nyua na kre wa jaa ndra.
40005015	A pan chↄↄ, pia kania mu mbe ki juule na gbaŋgↄ ni, la, nyjeeri pie ki taa mbe kra nyaa katoo lam.
40005016	Kena e ti mbe e kania nyi leele yiɛ na, mbe pe e kepele chichie nya, mbe e Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre ŋga mɛɛ."
40005017	"Yaa shia jawa na mbra yire ndee Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ kee yire klahaa ni pan, ni n pan mbe yi kla, la, ni pan mbe li yi kro na mbe yi pe chiriri.
40005018	La, kpra na ni yuu e pan, ŋga nyjeeri na tra n ta mu tro ŋga, kee fiɛn nunu kuraa wa wↄ mbra yire nu, fↄna yi kro we tnumu tun mbe kↄ.
40005019	Ki tia na wa mbra yire fiɛn ka gbun mu wa, maa leele nyina fↄŋgↄ kre, pie ufun pe fiɛn Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nu. La, ŋmba we li yi na mbe leele nyina, mbe pe li yi na kre, pie u yeeri lekpↄↄ Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nu.
40005020	A e ti ni yo mbe e loo, na e kepele chichie n wɛ Farisiie na Judae nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre na kre, yaa Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre ta mbe le fio."
40005021	"E loo na pra yo fawolo pre pan na, 'Maa shia liiku! Ŋgi na, linkufun we pimi li kpra kun ble kre.'
40005022	La, mi yuu e pan na ŋmba we krↄ wru na u ŋmbrↄ ni kre we pimi li. A ŋmba we u ŋmbrↄ tɛɛlɛ kre we yire loplombo yiɛ. A ŋmba we yo u ŋmbrↄ pan na lewaa wi kre, we pimi li mbe sɛ kanyana kanhun kre nu.
40005023	Kena na muu wa sra wↄ yira ka ni mbe sɛ yire sragbuɛnlɛɛ na, mbe sra wↄ mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋga, a mu sↄↄnri na mu sisaa pe mu ŋmbrↄ na kre,
40005024	kena mu sra wↄ yirɛ yire ti sragbuɛnlɛɛ yire jaara, mu sɛ ŋu na mu ŋmbrↄ wre lalaa gbeele tun, mu chin mu pan mu mu sra kre wↄ.
40005025	Na ŋu na ndro ta, a wra shie na mu ni kalalifɛɛnlɛ yiɛ na kre, kolo cha mbe e eyɛ lalaa gbeele tun, mbe waa chiin da na mu ni kpra kunfun wre yiɛ na. Na kre ma, kprakunfun wre we mu kala li, mbe mu le nyuŋgo lefɛɛnlɛ pre kɛɛ, mbe pe sɛ mu le nyuŋgo.
40005026	Kpra na ni yuu e pan, kifun wre wa yili nyuŋgo wa, fↄŋga we yira ŋga pie shↄ u pan kre tↄ kro tun."
40005027	"E loo na fawolo pre na yo na, 'Yaa shia tiɛri',
40005028	La, mi yuu e pan na ŋmba we chlↄ le mbra u chaa u loloŋgo nu kre, kena u tiɛri u loloŋgo nu.
40005029	Kena na mu kalie nyini shie na mu ni sisam nu kre, ki foli mu wa, ki nyu mu mu ŋga na mu kokoo we kla, mu wɛ ŋga pie sɛ na mu wejiŋge poŋgo ni kanyana lawee kre nu.
40005030	A na mu kalie kɛ shie na mu ni sisam nu kre, ki kun mu wa, ki nyu mu mu ŋga na mu kokoo we kla, mu wɛ ŋga mu wejiŋge poŋgo ta, mbe pe sɛ na mu ni kanyana lawee kre nu."
40005031	"A pra ki yo fa mu tɛɛ mbo, 'Blↄ ŋmba we u chↄ je kpan, ki fna mbe u chlↄ wre ŋga hlɛ, mbe ki nyina na u u je.'
40005032	La, mi rɛ, ni yuu e pan na, na ki n yire tiɛrɛɛ na, a blↄ u chↄ je kre, kena blↄ wre tia chlↄ wre tiɛri. A blↄ ŋmba we chlↄ wre leŋge kre tiɛri na."
40005033	"A e loo na pra yo fawolo pre pan na pia na Nyiɛkpↄↄ dani finfin, la, ki fna kee ŋga na mu da kre mbe ki pe kpra.
40005034	La, mi yuu e pan na yaa shia da kuraa, yaa shia nyjeeri da, ki pe Nyiɛkpↄↄ tnihaa.
40005035	Ndee mbe tra da, ki pe Nyiɛkpↄↄ jeelee taa yira, ndee mbe Jerusalɛm da, ki pe ŋunu kpↄↄ chia.
40005036	Ndee mbe lewo ndra da. Ŋgi na, wa wa jaa nyjuro nunu fiŋge ndee wↄↄ kuraa gbeele.
40005037	La, e ti mbe kee ŋga ee yo kro pe kpra, mbe e 'Ɛnhɛɛn' pe 'Ɛnhɛɛn', mbe e 'Ↄↄnhↄn' pe 'Ↄↄnhↄn', nyjɛ ee yo nyjɛ kↄkro kre, pe sisam."
40005038	"E loo na pra yo fawolo pre pan na, 'Na ndro mu nyini ja, ki fna mbe pe u wo ja ka na, ndee na ndro mu ŋgaala kↄ kre, pe u wo kↄ ka na.'
40005039	La, mi rɛ, ni yuu e pan na yaa na sisampefɛɛnlɛ sisam fↄlↄ toni, na ndro mu yiɛ kalie wo ja kre, haŋa kre kna mu u ŋga.
40005040	A na ndro sɛ na mu ni kala li ndoo mu sɛ mu dodoŋgi shↄ kre, mu yoŋgo wru mu ya u pan.
40005041	A na ndro yo mu kↄnsni nunu nyaari kre, nyaari shiin.
40005042	A ŋmba we mu tali kpan, u ŋga, a ŋmba we na chaa mbe jin mu pan kre, maa shia je u pan."
40005043	"E loo na pra yo fawolo pre pan na, 'Mu ŋmbrↄ kori, mu mu loŋgo pra.'
40005044	La, mi yuu e pan na e e loŋgoolo kori, e na nyiɛtali e na mblɛ pe e leni kanyana nu kre kaan.
40005045	Na e pe ma kre, kie ti mbe e pe e Lɛ, ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre biile. Ŋgi na, wre u tii mbe yila yili sisam pefɛɛnlɛ na chichie pefɛɛnlɛ kro pan, mu tia nyiɛ na paan kprafɛɛnlɛ na denyjuufɛɛnlɛ kro pan.
40005046	Kena na e mblɛ pe e chaa chiin kori kre, fↄtↄↄrↄ ŋgi ee ta hin? Pan ma Judae lampoo shↄfɛɛnlɛ pre, leele dnumufɛɛnlɛ pre kuraa naa pini kree?
40005047	Kena na e chichie piin na e nↄↄlↄ chiin kaan kre, ŋgi kie nyina na e wɛ leele hamblɛ pre na hin? E n chin na pan leele mblɛ pe n pe Judae a pe n Nyiɛkpↄↄ chin kre pini ree?
40005048	Kena e na kee chichie piin nyjila kro nu, imi na e lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre chichie pee n nyukↄↄnrↄ ni kre."
40006001	"E dↄↄta mbe yaa na chichie piin leele yiɛ na, na aada pie e nya mbe e pni. Na e chaa mbe leele na e kaan mɛɛ e chichie nyjɛ e pini na kre, yaa fↄtↄↄrↄ ta e Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri wre pan.
40006002	Kena na e wa chichie pe u ŋmbrↄ na kre, waa ki kpali mbe tro imi na yiɛnyumufɛɛnlɛ pre pini pe fninyinyi nu na lete na kre. Pan pe pini, a leele na pe kaan mɛɛ. Kpra na ni yuu e pan na pe fↄtↄↄrↄ kro yi.
40006003	Kena yire rɛ, na wa chichie pini u ŋmbrↄ na kre, waa ti mbe leele u nya.
40006004	E ti mbe e chichie pee ndra, mbe e Lɛ ŋmba u ndra ndra kee chini kre e nya, mbe e ŋga e fↄtↄↄrↄ."
40006005	"A na e nyiɛtali kre, yaa na pini na yiɛnyumufɛɛnlɛ pre lɛ, pre pe yiree fninyinyi nu, na lete na, na nyiɛtali mbe leele nya. Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, pe pe fↄtↄↄrↄ ta mu kↄ.
40006006	La, yire rɛ, na e nyiɛtali kre, e le nyuŋgo e krↄ tↄ, e e Lɛ, ŋmba pra nya wre tali, wre u ndra ndra yirɛ kro nyaa, we loo mbe e ŋga e fↄtↄↄrↄ."
40006007	"A na e nyiɛtali kre, yaa na paara mbra keewɛɛ yuu na mblɛ pe n Nyiɛkpↄↄ chin kre lɛ. Ŋgi na, pe jawa na, pe paaraa tataara na Nyiɛkpↄↄ we loo pe pan.
40006008	Kena yaa na pini na pre lɛ. Ŋgi na, e Lɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre chin nyjɛ yi e shian, a e chin na u tali."
40006009	"Kena na e nyiɛtali kre, e na yuu na, 'O Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri, mu mɛɛ chichie ki yili.
40006010	Ti mbe mu ŋunumu pan, ŋga mu chaa ki pe tra, imi na ki piin nyjeeri kre.
40006011	O ŋga ble nyini aliire aŋga.
40006012	Mbe mu o sisam ti mbe o kɛ, imi na o tii na kee kre.
40006013	Maa sɛ na o ni nyu chaara nu, o wↄ mu yili sisam nu.'
40006014	A na e leele sisam tii na pe kee kre, e Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre we e sisam ti mbe e kɛ na.
40006015	La, na e n e ŋmbilɛ sisam ti mu pe kɛ kre, e Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri wre wa e sisam ti mbe e kɛ."
40006016	"A na e blefuni kre, yaa na yiɛ klai na yiɛnyumufɛɛnlɛ pre lɛ, pre pe blefuni mbe yiɛ kla, mbra chaa mbe leele chin na pe ble fun. Kpra na ni yuu e pan na pe fↄtↄↄrↄ kro yi.
40006017	La, yire rɛ, na e blefun kre, e weli, e e ndrɛ saanri.
40006018	Yaa ti mbe leele chin na e blefun. La, e Lɛ ŋmba u ndra ndra kee chini kre, wre nunu we ki chin, mbe e fↄlↄ tↄ."
40006019	"A yaa na krↄyirɛ chaa mbra teeri tra mna. Ŋgi na, hlemble na dumblↄ we yi ka mbe yi kla, a juoloo wa mbe yi ju.
40006020	La, e na krↄyirɛ chaa nyjeeri. Ŋgi na, hlemble na dumblↄ n wa bawa, a juolo n wa bawa mbe lee yi ju.
40006021	A mna mu krↄyira nyi kre, bawa mu loloŋgo nyi."
40006022	"Lewo wejiŋge kania yi u nyini, na mu nyini pe chasi, mu wejiŋge kro we pe chasi.
40006023	A na mu nyinii wa sisam na kre, kie ti mbe sisam tni mu nu. Kena na kania ŋga kii wa mu nu fii kre, kie ti mbe wↄmu ŋga kii wa mu nu kre sna.
40006024	Ndro n wa mbe jaa tafɛɛnlɛ shiin sumi. We na nunu kee chaa mbe wɛ nunu na. Ndee mbe uyɛ wru mbe nunu ŋga mbe nunu ti. A lewo wa jaa swa na Nyiɛkpↄↄ sumi."
40006025	"Kre ndra na ni yuu e pan na, yaa na kawa ŋga ee ka, ndee ŋga ee gbↄ, ndee ŋga ee tↄ ni. Kena e ŋmaa n shian mu wɛ sro na ree? Ndee e wejiŋge kee n shian mu wɛ yoŋgo na ree?
40006026	E yiɛ wa e hanyiɛlɛ le nyjeeri, pra fali mbe sro luu, a pra sro kun mbe tɛɛ, a nde e Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre tia pra lii nyjila kro nu. Kena e kee n shian mu wɛ hanyiɛlɛ na ree?
40006027	A e ŋmbi we jaa tni mbra kawa mbe ki ti u jaa ble nunu chom ya u ble na hin?
40006028	A mni a e na kawa na nyjɛ ee tↄ ni ma ŋga hin? E yiɛ wa e lↄↄ chia toto le lↄↄ imi na yi lee, nde yira tnumu tun, a yira yoŋgo tↄ.
40006029	La, ni yuu e pan na Sↄlↄmↄn kpↄↄmu nu kre, u nsra yaka ta mu le a kra nyu mu da na yi ni.
40006030	Kena na Nyiɛkpↄↄ we ja mbe nyaa kuraa tↄ yoŋgo, kre ŋga kie fin kia mu mbe pe ki sro, kena ŋgi kie ti mbe wa e tↄ mbe wɛ nyaa na hin? E shↄnlie fiɛn kpa!
40006031	Kena yaa tni mbra kawa mbra yuu na 'Yira ŋgi oo ka, ndee ŋgi oo gbↄ, ndee ŋgi oo tↄ hin?' E Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri wre chin na yire yirɛ nyjɛ krɛrɛ e shian kro.
40006032	Ŋgi na, yire yirɛ nyjɛ leele mblɛ pe n pe Judae pre chaa, la, yire ma. E Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri wre chin na yire yirɛ nyjɛ krɛrɛ e shian kro.
40006033	La, e klu e Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre na u kprahaa cha tun, we nyjɛ yi shian kro wru mbe ya e pan.
40006034	Kena yaa na kawa na baŋga ni. La, e ti mbe baŋga na kawa na kiyɛ ni. Ki n shian na ee ti mbe baŋga kala pan mbe ya aŋga wee na."
40007001	"Yaa na leele gbuun pimi ni nyaanyaa, mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ waa wa gbun na pimi ni.
40007002	Ŋgi na, pimi ŋga ni ee leele gbun kre chↄↄ ni Nyiɛkpↄↄ we e gbun. A kolo ŋga na ee tro na leele ni kre chↄↄ na Nyiɛkpↄↄ we tro na e ni.
40007003	Yira ŋgi ki tia a kra fiɛn ŋga kii wa mu ŋmbrↄ nyini kre, a mu kre nya, la, kpↄↄ ŋga kii wa ŋu titi nyini kre, a mu n kre nya hin?
40007004	Ndee ŋgi ki ti mbe mu yo mu ŋmbrↄ pan na ti mbe ni kra fiɛn ŋga wↄ mu nyini, a kpↄↄ ŋga kii wa ŋu titi nyini kre, a mu n kre wↄ tun hin?
40007005	Yire yiɛnyumufɛɛnlɛ, e kra kpↄɛ nyjɛ yii wa e nyiɛlɛ yire wↄ tun, kre ee nya chiriri, mbe chiin jaa e ŋmbilɛ wee fiɛn fiɛn yire wↄ pe pan.
40007006	Yaa shia Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kee titi yo mblɛ pe ki le kee waara kre pan. Ŋgi na, na mu yirɛ chichiele wa nyukwanla na prakoe yiɛ kre, pie yi taanla mbe kla, mbaa paan mu tↄ."
40007007	"Kena e Nyiɛkpↄↄ tali, we e ŋga, e na chaa u pan, ee nyjɛ e chaa yire kro ta. E u krↄ koori, we ki nyaa e pan.
40007008	Ŋmba u tali kre taa, a ŋmba u chaa kre we nya. A ŋmba u u krↄ koori kre, u ki nyaari u pan.
40007009	Kena e ŋmbi haa pↄ we u tali paanu mbe u u ŋga dnɛ hin?
40007010	Ndee e ŋmbi haa pↄ we u tali mbro mbe u wↄↄ le u kɛɛ hin?
40007011	A kena na yire sisampefɛɛnlɛ mblɛ kuraa chin mu na yirɛ chichiele leni e biile kɛɛ kre, kena e jawa e chin na e Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre, we mblɛ pe u wie kre ŋga yirɛ chichiele.
40007012	Kena kee nyjɛ e chaa mbe pra piin e na kre, e na yi pini e ŋmbilɛ na. Pan Mbose mbra yire na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ pre kee yire nyina."
40007013	"E tro jlonwee fiɛn kre na. Jlonwee ŋga ki shie kanhun nu kre vala, a ki kolo kre vala na, lenɛɛrɛ troi ki na.
40007014	La, jlonwee ŋga ki shie ŋmaa lawee kre pe fiɛn, a kolo kre pe foo, ki tia leele chiɛri plɛ pe troi ki na."
40007015	"E eyɛ le chichie kafinɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ pre haa. Pie peyɛ nyjii imi na mbaala pe yɛ nyjiri kre, mbe pan e pan. La, pan pe nyi na komboolo lɛ.
40007016	Pe kepeelee ni ee pe chin. Ŋgi na, wufiŋge tiŋge wa jaa lombru sɛ, a mbrambra tiŋge wa jaa gbena sɛ.
40007017	Tiŋge chiriri ki sɛŋgɛ chiriri sɛni, a tiŋge sisaa na sɛŋgɛ sisaa sɛni.
40007018	Tiŋge chichie na sɛŋgɛ sisaa sɛ, a tiŋge sisaa na sɛŋgɛ chichie sɛ.
40007019	Tiŋge ŋga kraa sɛ chiriri kre, pie ki kun mbe wa kanhun.
40007020	Kena kafinɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ pre, pe kepele ni ee pe chin."
40007021	"Ki n pe mblɛ pe ni yeeri 'ni Tafun, ni Tafun', kre kro pie sɛ nyjeeri ŋunumu kre nu. La, mblɛ pe ŋga ni Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri chaa pini kre, pre pie le u ŋunumu kre nu.
40007022	Na ki ble kre waa da, leele tataara we pan mbe yo mbo, 'O Tafun, mu mɛɛ ni, o nsraa mu kee nyaa na yuu kree? A o n na mu mɛɛ tɛɛ mna ŋumufuɛn wↄ leele nu, mna kawako kee tataara pe kree?'
40007023	Bawa mbe kna mbe yo pe pan na, 'E laa ni na e sɛ. Ni n e chin. Yire sisampefɛɛnlɛ mblɛ.' "
40007024	"Kena ndro ŋmba we ni kee nyjɛ loo mbe li yi na kre, we pe na kachiŋu ŋmba wra u nyuŋgo sin dnɛ lawee nu kre wi.
40007025	Ŋga wra ki sin mu kↄ kre, nyiɛ na pan, a lↄↄɛ na nyi mna fo mu le nyuŋgo kre jaara, a fuflɛ na gbun badaaŋga mna le nyuŋgo kre nu, a nde ki nsra ja mu nyuŋgo kre chan, na wra ki sin dnɛ na.
40007026	A ŋmba we ni kee nyjɛ loo, a u n li yi na kre, we pe na jijuo ŋmba wra yo we u nyuŋgo sin mna sɛ ki sin tablↄ na kre wi.
40007027	Ŋga nyiɛ na pan kre, a lↄↄɛ na nyi mna fo mu le nyuŋgo kre jaara, a fuflɛ na gbun kpↄↄ mna le nyuŋgo kre nu, a nyuŋgo kre na to, kra tia nyuŋgo kre too na peere."
40007028	Ŋga Yesu na kee nyjɛ krɛrɛ yo mu kↄ kre, u kee yire nyinaa na lenɛɛrɛ pre pe kawako ni.
40007029	Ŋgi na, u nsra u kee yire nyina na pe nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre lɛ, la, wraa paara na jaŋga ni.
40008001	Ŋga Yesu na yiri nyua kre na mna tii tra kre, lenɛɛrɛ na taa u kro.
40008002	Bawa kokoefun wa na pan mna kosie kan u yiɛ mna yo u pan mbo, "Ni Tafun, jande, na ki tna mu pan, ti mbe ni saanla."
40008003	A Yesu na kɛ tini mna taa u na, mna kna mbo, "Ki tna ni pan, Kena saanla!" Titɛɛ kre nu, a wra saanla.
40008004	A Yesu na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Le, maa shia ki yo mbe ndro loo. La, sɛ Judae sↄfue pre pan, mu sɛ sra yirɛ nyjɛ Mbose mbra nyina kre wↄ, mbe ki mu dansiɛrɛ li pe yiɛ na."
40008005	Ŋga Yesu na sɛ le Kapɛnↄm na kre, Romae sojae lopom wa na pan mna Yesu tali mbo,
40008006	"Ni Tafun, ni sumifun wa fuuru mu sni katoo na kala nyaa tataara, kena jande, ni mu tali mbe mu paan ya ni na."
40008007	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Ni loo, mbe paan u tra."
40008008	A sojae lopom wre na kna mbo, "Ni Tafun, ni n fna na mu le ni katoo. Kena na mu yire mna mu paara kuraa kre, ni sumifun wre we saanla.
40008009	Mi chↄↄ, ni pe lewo ŋmba nii wa na jaŋga ni, a nii wa na sojae ni a pee wa ni jaara. Na ni yo wa pan na u sɛ, we sɛ, a na ni yo wa pan na u pan, mbe u pan. A na ni yo ni tnu pan na ŋga imi pe, we ki pe."
40008010	Ŋga Yesu na kee nyjɛ blↄ wre na yo kre loo kre, kra u pe kawako ni, a wra kna mu yo mblɛ pra taa u kro kre pan mbo, "Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, Israel leele nu kuraa kre, ni n shↄnlie kpↄↄ ka nya imi tun.
40008011	Kpra na ni yuu e pan na lenɛɛrɛ we yiri yila finhaa na yila tohaa mbe paan chaa mbe li na Abraham na Isaki na Jakↄb ni Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nu.
40008012	La, mblɛ wo yi ŋunumu kre, pie pe viŋge mbe wa haaleelee wↄmu nu. Bawa leele we na nyɛni mbra pe ŋgaala chrɛ."
40008013	A Yesu na kna mna yo sojae lopom wre pan mbo, "Sɛ katoo! Imi na mu shↄnli kre, ki pe ma mbe mu ŋga." Kre nyjila kre nu, na yaŋu wre saanla katoo.
40008014	Ŋga Yesu na yiri wa mna sɛ le Pita katoo kre, wra nya na kabro Pita nafun chlↄ gbun.
40008015	A Yesu na kɛ taa u kɛ na to, a kabro kre na laa u na, a wra yiri mna sro pe mu u ŋga.
40008016	Ki ble kre yilakↄŋgↄ kre, pra pan na ŋumufuɛnfɛɛnlɛ tataara ni Yesu pan, a wra u nyu kee tɛɛ mna ŋumufuɛn yire wↄ pe nu, mna mblɛ praa yaa kro tra.
40008017	Yire kee nyjɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun Yisaia na nya mu yo kre mbo, "Wra o pↄlɛm shↄ, mna o kanyana wru mu tio."
40008018	Ŋga Yesu na lenɛɛrɛ pre nya na pe u kun mu le lalaa ma kre, a wra kna mna yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan, na pe kun mbe sɛ tapla kre kro.
40008019	A Mbose mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre wa na kna mna yo Yesu pan mbo, "Nyinafun, ni chaa mbe taa mu kro. Mna mu sɛ kpan, mbe mi na ŋu sɛ."
40008020	A Yesu na yo u pan mbo, "Ŋmbokuŋmboe wa na wee ni na sni, a nyjeeri hanyiɛlɛ wa na pe zeere ni, la mi Lewo Pↄ wre n wa ndra tɛɛhaa ni."
40008021	A Yesu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre nunu na kna mbo, "Ni Tafun, ni ŋga kolo mbe ni sɛ ni lɛ gboo le tun, mbe chiin paan taa mu kro."
40008022	A Yesu na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Pan mbe o sɛ, ti mbe mblɛ pe ku kre na pe gboolo leni."
40008023	A Yesu na yire wa mna le krↄ nu, wre na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre ni.
40008024	Ŋga praa shie kre, fuflɛ badaaŋga ka na gbun, a krↄ kre na chaa kna mbe juule, kre nyjila kre na Yesu sni na ŋunu krↄ kre nu.
40008025	A pra sɛ u gbun mu nyi mbo, "O Tafun, yiri mu o shↄɛ, o chaa fun."
40008026	A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Mni a e na fiɛ ma hin? E shↄnlie fiɛn titi." A wra yiri mna fuu fuflɛ kre na, a nyumu kre na yire dimm.
40008027	A kra leele pre praa wa krↄ kre nu kre pe kawako ni. A pra kna na yuu mbo, "Lewo ŋmbi nyini wi ŋmba kuraa a fuflɛ na nyumu na u kayolo ndru ŋga hin?"
40008028	Ŋga pra kun tapla kre kro mna sɛ to Garasiie tra nu kre, bilɛ shiin plɛ na yiri fanyi lawee mna pan mu u fni, pre leele mblɛ, na ŋumufuɛn wa pe nu, kra tia mna pra nyi kre, ndro nsraa wa mbe jaa tro wa.
40008029	Ŋga pra Yesu nya kre, titɛɛ kre nu, a pra gblee fↄↄri mu le mbo, "Nyiɛkpↄↄ pↄ Yesu, kala ŋgi ni wre na ŋu nyi hin? O klahaa mu pan mbe nyjila kre chiin da ree?"
40008030	Kre nyjila kre na prakoe tataara plɛɛ wa na kaa pe mbɛɛ na,
40008031	a ŋumufuɛn pre na Yesu tali mbo, "Jande, na mu o ni, ti mbe o sɛ le prakoe mblɛ nu."
40008032	A Yesu na kna mu yo ŋumufuɛn pre pan mbo, "E yili pe nu." Titɛɛ kre nu, a pra yili mna sɛ le prakoe pre nu, a prakoe pre na mↄŋↄ mna tii landɛɛ kre nu mna sɛ to epo kre nu, a kra pe li.
40008033	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, leele mblɛ praa prakoe pre le kre na jele fↄↄri tra, na feni na shie chia lam, na kee ŋga ki pe kre yuu na shie, na ŋumufuɛnfɛɛnlɛ pre kee kre kpali.
40008034	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, chia kre leele kro na yili chia kre na mna sɛ Yesu fni, mna u tali na u yili pe pan tra kre na mbe sɛ.
40009001	A Yesu na sɛ le krↄ kre nu mna tapla kre kun mna sɛ wre titi chia.
40009002	Ŋga wra le wa kre to, leele plɛ na pan na fna wa ni u pan, na u fuuru mu sni u dɛŋglɛ na. Ŋga Yesu na leele pre shↄnlie nya ma kre, a wra kna mna yo fna wre pan mbo, "Ni pↄ, muyɛ gbun yii, ni mu sisam ti mu mu kɛ."
40009003	Ŋga Yesu na yo ma kre, na Judae mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre plɛɛ wa mu yire wa, a pra kna na yuu peyɛ pan mbo, "Jiɛnlɛ kee blↄ ŋmba yuu kre."
40009004	A Yesu na pe jawala chin mna kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Mni a e na sisam kee jawa ma hin?
40009005	Ŋga mbe yo na ni mu sisam ti mu mu kɛ yoo kii nyaanyaa ree, ŋga mbe yo na yiri mu mu dɛŋglɛ wru mu nyaari yi hin?
40009006	La, ŋga ni chaa mbe e chin yi na, Lewo Pↄ wree wa na jaŋga ni tra mna na mbe sisam ti mbe kɛ." A Yesu na kna mna yo yaŋu wre pan mbo, "Yiri, mu mu dɛŋglɛ wru mu sɛ katoo."
40009007	A yaŋu wre na taan mu yiri mna sɛ u katoo.
40009008	Ŋga lenɛɛrɛ pre na kee kre nya ma kre, fiɛrɛ na pe yii, a praa Nyiɛkpↄↄ kaan mɛɛ, na u lewo ŋga kre jaŋga ŋga sembremu.
40009009	Blↄ wa naa wa praa u yeeri Matio, a wra pe lampoo shↄfun. Ŋga Yesu na yiri wa na shie kre, wra u nya u lampoo shↄ nyuŋgo. A wra kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Yiri mu taa ni kro." A Matio na yiri mu taa u kro.
40009010	A Yesu na sɛ Matio katoo. Ŋga pra sɛ na lii kre, lampoo shↄfɛɛnlɛ tataara na sisampefɛɛnlɛ na pan, a pre na Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na chaa mu na lii.
40009011	Ŋga Farisiie pre na pe nya ma kre, pra u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre wie mbo, "Ŋgi ki tia a e nyinafun wre na lampoo shↄfɛɛnlɛ na sisampefɛɛnlɛ na chaa na lii ŋga hin?"
40009012	Ŋga pra kre kee ŋga wie ma kre, a Yesu na kee kre loo, a wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Leele mblɛ pe n na yaa kre n shia mbe sɛ dↄkita, fↄna mblɛ pe yaa kre.
40009013	Kena e sɛ kee ŋga nↄↄ twan, na ni n na srawↄↄ chaa, la, fooro chiɛn ni chaa. Ni n pan mblɛ pe fraka pan, la, sisampefɛɛnlɛ pan ni pan."
40009014	Bawa Jↄn, ndrajefun wre, kotↄmblↄ na pan mna Yesu wie mbo, "Ŋgi ki tia wre na Farisiie pre na blefuni, a mu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na blefun ŋga hin?"
40009015	A Yesu na kna mna pe wie mbo, "Nyjila ŋga ni bijↄplↄ wree wa kre, ki fna mbe bijↄplↄ wre nↄↄlↄ fooro li ra? Pan ma ki fna, la, ble kaa wa na paan, mbe pe paan bijↄplↄ wre wru pe jaara, kre nyjila kre ki fna pe blefun.
40009016	Ndro n wa mbe yoŋgo fↄŋgↄ kↄↄn wru mbe yoŋgo lɛɛ ŋga ki wali tↄ. Na ki pe ma kre, kie lɛɛ kre tini mbe foli, mbe ki walihaa kre kpↄↄ mbe ya.
40009017	A lewo wa n wa mbe sifiŋge fↄŋgↄ le yurↄ hlɛ gbolo lɛɛ nu. Na ki pe ma kre, sifiŋge kre we kan mbe gbolo kre wali, mbe sifiŋge kre wo. Fawolo pre naa sifiŋge leni yurↄ hlɛ gbolo nu. Kena sifiŋge fↄŋgↄ fna yurↄ hlɛ gbolo fↄŋgↄ nu."
40009018	Ŋga Yesu naa wa mu yire na leele pre nyina yire kee nyjɛ kre, Judae ŋulo pre wa na pan mna kosie kan u yiɛ mbo, "Fuŋgaami ni pↄ bichable ku. Kena, jande, pan mu kɛ taa u na mbe u ŋmaa ta ni pan."
40009019	A Yesu na u bitumblↄ pre na yiri mna taa blↄ wre kro a pra sɛ.
40009020	Bawa chlↄ wa, na nyimi woni u pan yɛlɛ kɛmbↄshiin, a wra Yesu nya mna fɛ mu taa u kro.
40009021	Chlↄ wre na klu mu yo u ndra mbo, "Na ni kɛ taa u dodoŋgi nyu na kuraa kre mbe saanla."
40009022	Ŋga wra kɛ taa Yesu dodoŋgi kre nyu na kre to, a Yesu na kna mu chlↄ wre nya, mna kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Ni pↄ, mu yɛ gbun yii, mu shↄnlie tia mu saanla." Titɛɛ kre nu wa to, a chlↄ wre na saanla.
40009023	Ŋga Yesu na sɛ le ŋunu wre katoo kre, wra nya na pe yoo na nyɛni na gble na pↄ wre kumu pini,
40009024	a wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "E kro e yili fimi na. Bichable wre n ku; sni u sni." A leele pre kro na kna poŋgo na Yesu le, na u tɛɛ.
40009025	Ŋga leele pre na yili fimi na kre, a Yesu na le nyuŋgo ŋga nu bichable wre na nyi kre nu, mna sɛ u kɛ yii, a bichable wre na yiri mu tni.
40009026	Kee ŋga Yesu na pe kre na kpali bawa tra kre nu kro.
40009027	Ŋga Yesu na yiri wa na shie kre, fuunlo shiin plɛ na taa u kro, na gble leni badaaŋga mbo, "O fooro le ɛ, Devid nana."
40009028	Ŋga Yesu na sɛ le katoo kre, fuunlo pre na sɛ u pan wa, a Yesu na pe wie mbo, "E shↄnli na mbe jaa kee ŋga e wie ŋga pee?" A pra kna mbo, "Ɛnhɛɛn, o Tafun."
40009029	A Yesu na kɛ taa taa pe nyiɛlɛ na, mna yo pe pan mbo, "Imi na e shↄnlie nyi kre, ki pe ma mbe e ŋga."
40009030	Titɛɛ kre nu a pe nyiɛlɛ yire na nyaa nyaa. A Yesu na pe jaari mbo, "Yaa shia sɛ ki yo ndro pan."
40009031	La, ŋga pra yili wa mnaa shie kre, praa kee kre yuu na shie, kra tia kra kpali tra kre nu kro.
40009032	Ŋga fuunlo pre na yili na shie kre, leele plɛ na pan na kpo wa ni Yesu pan, na ŋumufↄↄn wa u nu, kra tia u nsra ja na paara.
40009033	Ŋga Yesu na tia ŋumufↄↄn kre na yili u nu kre, a wra paara, a kra lenɛɛrɛ pre praa wa wa kre kro pe kawako ni, a praa yuu mbo, "O n da mu kee ŋga nyini nya Israel tra nu tun."
40009034	La, Farisiie pre naa yuu mbo, "Ŋumufuɛn ŋunu wre, wre u u ŋga jaŋga a u ja na ŋumufuɛn woni leele nu."
40009035	Yesu na yili wa mna sɛ na kila chiɛ nyjɛ yiraa wa bawa lawee yire nu kre na, na leele nyina pe fninyinyi nu, na Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre ketaan kre yuu, na yira nyininyini trai.
40009036	Ŋga Yesu na kna mu lenɛɛrɛ pre pra taa u na kre nya ma kre, fooro na u yii. Ŋgi na, pe keshiɛn na nɛɛ, a ndro nsraa wa mbe ya pe na, pan pra nyi na mbaala mblɛ pe n lefɛɛnlɛ ni lɛ.
40009037	A wra kna mna yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo, "Yirɛ kun nyjila kre da, a tnumu kre kpↄↄ, a kunfɛɛnlɛ pree fiɛn.
40009038	Kena e nyiɛtali mbe yirɛ Tafun wre tnumu tunfɛɛnlɛ tun mbe pe paan u yirɛ yire kun."
40010001	Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ kɛmbↄshiin pre yeeri mu pan u jaara, mna pe ŋga jaŋga mbe pra ŋumufuɛn woni leele nu, mbra yambla kro trai.
40010002	Twanfɛɛnlɛ kɛmbↄshiin pre mɛɛ na yi kre, ŋmba wra yiɛklu na wi Siimↄn, ŋmba praa yeeri Pita kre, na u chunu Andriu, na Jemisi, Zebedii pↄ wre, na u chunu Jↄn,
40010003	na Filipo, na Batolomio, na Tↄmasi, na Matio ŋmba wraa lampoo shio kre, na Alfio pↄ Jemisi wre, na Tadio,
40010004	na Siimↄn Kaanan wo wre, na Judas Iskariↄt, ŋmba wra kↄ mu Yesu wↄ mu ŋga kre.
40010005	Leele kɛmbↄshiin mblɛ, pre Yesu na tun mna yo pe pan mbo, "Yaa shia tro leele mblɛ pe n pe Judae, ndee Samariae chia ka na.
40010006	La, e sɛ Israel leele mblɛ pe fun na mbaala lɛ kre pan.
40010007	E sɛ yo pe pan na 'Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre mbra mna'.
40010008	E na yambla kro trai, e na gboolo nyini e na yira nyiɛrɛfɛɛnlɛ trai, e na ŋumufuɛn woni leele nu. Ni e ŋga jaŋga kre finfin, kena e na yaa pe na finfin.
40010009	Yaa shia swa wru mbe le greree nu.
40010010	A yaa shia bↄtↄe wru, a yaa shia dodonyi shiin shiin wru, ndee mbe kpawrɛ shiin wru, kanyie kuraa kre, yaa shia ka wru mbe yii. Ŋgi na leele mblɛ na ee sɛ ya kre we e ŋga nyjɛ yi e shian kro.
40010011	A chia ŋga na ee le kpan, e Nyiɛkpↄↄ chinfun wa lawee haa cha e le, a na e waa ta mu le u pan kre, e tni wa e sɛ su ŋga ble ee yili wa.
40010012	A katoo ŋga nu ee le kpan, e ki leele shaari kama.
40010013	Kena na katoo kre leele waa e shↄ mu e kee loo kre, e ti mbe e dwamu kro ki nu. La, na pe n shia e shↄ kre, e ndru e sɛ na e dwamu kre ni.
40010014	A na pe n shia e shↄ ndee mu e kee ŋga ni e sɛ loo chia ka na ndee katoo ka nu kre, e yili kre lawee kre nu, e e jeelee tra pↄ e wo wa mbe ki pe sisam dansiɛrɛ li.
40010015	Kpra na ni yuu e pan, na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kpra kun ble kre waa da, Sodom na Gomora kanyana kuraa we prↄ pefɛɛnlɛ na."
40010016	"E le, ni e tun mbe e sɛ na mbaala shie komboolo nu. Kena e kala chin na wↄↄlↄ lɛ, e eyɛ nyjii na katoo kotulo lɛ.
40010017	E le, e na eyɛ le chichie, pie e yii mbe sɛ na e ni kala li hɛɛ nu, mbe e frↄ pe fninyinyi nu.
40010018	Mi ndra na pie e yii mbe sɛ loplombo na ŋulo yiɛ, mbe e sɛ ni dansiɛrɛ li pre na waŋgrafɛɛnlɛ yiɛ.
40010019	La, na pe e wↄ mu ŋga kre, yaa shia na kawa na ŋga ee yo ni. Ŋgi na, na nyjila kre da kre, Kpra Ŋumu wre we e ŋga, ŋga ee yo.
40010020	Kre nyjila kre, na yire ma e paara na, la, na e Lɛ wre Ŋumu we paara e nu.
40010021	E le, lo pↄ we lo pↄ wↄ mbe ŋga mbe pe u gbo, mbe lɛ u pↄ wↄ mbe ŋga mbe pe u gbo, mbe biile yiri mbe paara mbe pe sefɛɛnlɛ taanla, mbe pe wↄↄ ŋga mbe pe pe gbo.
40010022	E le, mi ndra na, lenɛɛrɛ we e pra, la, ŋmba we jaa frↄ ta mbe sɛ su ni pan nyjila kre, wre ŋmaa mbe shↄ.
40010023	La, na pe e pra chia ka na kre, e yili wa e sɛ fↄŋgↄ na. Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, yaa jaa tnumu tun Israel leele chiɛ kro na mbe kↄ mbe Lewo Pↄ wre chiin pan.
40010024	Twanfun wa jaa wɛ u nyinafun na, a tnu wa jaa wɛ u tafun na.
40010025	Ki nyu mu fna na twanfun we pe na u nyinafun wi, mbe tnu jaa pe na u tafun wi. Kena na pe katoo tafun wre yeeri ŋumufuɛn ŋunu kre, yira ŋgi kie ti mbe pia katoo kre tnifɛɛnlɛ yeeri ma na hin? Pre wo kuraa we wɛ."
40010026	"Kena yaa na pe fiɛ. Ŋgi na, kre yira n wa a pe ki tↄ, mbe pia kↄ mbe ki nyaa, a ndra ndra kee ka n wa mbe kia kↄↄ yili fimi na.
40010027	Kena kee nyjɛ ni ndra na yuu e pan kre, e na yi yuu fimi na. A nyjɛ ni juu na yuu e pan kre, e yire lete na e yi kpali.
40010028	A yaa shia mblɛ pie jaa wejiŋge gbo, a pia jaa ŋumu gbo kre fiɛ, la, e na Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋmba we jaa ŋumu na wejiŋge kro gbo, mbe sɛ na ki ni kanyana kanhun nu kre fiɛ.
40010029	Hanyiɛlɛ bɛɛlɛ mblɛ kuraa pia prɛ shiin kↄbↄ kre, pe wa n wa mbe ku mbe e lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre wa chin ki nu.
40010030	La, ni yuu e pan na, e nyjuro nyjɛ yii wa e ndrɛ na kuraa u yi nyu chin.
40010031	Kena yaa shia fiɛ. Ŋgi na, e tnu kpↄↄ mu wɛ hanyiɛlɛ tataara na."
40010032	"A ŋmba we yire leele yiɛ na mbe yo na u Tafun wi mi kre, mbe u mɛɛ sↄↄnri ni Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre yiɛ na.
40010033	A ŋmba we yo na u Tafun ma mi leele yiɛ na kre, mba ufun mɛɛ sↄↄnri ni Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre yiɛ na."
40010034	"Yaa shia jawa na wejinyiŋge ni ni pan tra mna, wejinyiŋge ni ma ni pan, la, kakrↄ ni ni pan.
40010035	Ni pan mbe e yↄↄlɛ, 'mbe pↄ na u lɛ to peyɛ na, mbe bichable na u lo to peyɛ na, mbe nafun na nafun to peyɛ na.
40010036	mbe lewo sele ndro kaari u loŋgo.'
40010037	A ŋmba we na u lɛ ndee u lo kee chaa mbe wɛ ni na kre n fna ni wo. A ŋmba we na u biile kee chaa mbe wɛ ni na kre n fna ni wo.
40010038	A ŋmba u n u kanyana kumu kaan wru mu taa ni kro kre n fna ni wo fio!
40010039	A ŋmba ŋmaa kee kie u shian mbe tro kre, kie yili u kɛɛ. A ŋmba we yila ni na mbe u ŋmaa wa mbe fun kre we ki ta."
40010040	"Ŋmba we e shↄ kre, u ni shↄ. A ŋmba we ni shↄ kre, u ŋmba u ni tun kre shↄ.
40010041	A ŋmba we Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun chin mbe u le kre, ufun we Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun fↄtↄↄrↄ ta. A ŋmba we lewo ŋmba u fraka chin mbe u kre, ufun we lewo ŋmba u fraka fↄtↄↄrↄ ta.
40010042	A ŋmba we fiɛn fiɛn mblɛ wa chin na ni twanfun wi, mbe u ŋga nyumu chirɛgbↄↄ nyini nunu chom kre, kpra na ni yuu e pan, ufun wa u fↄtↄↄrↄ la."
40011001	Ŋga Yesu na paara mu u twanfɛɛnlɛ kɛmbↄshiin pre nyina mu kↄ kre, wra yili wa, mna sɛ na kila chiɛ nyjɛ yiraa wa wa yire na, na ketaan kre yuu na leele nyina.
40011002	Kre nyjila kre nu, na pe Jↄn, ndrajefun wre, yii mu le nyuŋgo, a wra tni nyuŋgo wa mna Yesu tnumu nyjɛ wra pan na tuni yire kee loo, mna yire wa mna u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre plɛ tun
40011003	na pe sɛ Yesu wie na wre wi ŋmba u paan kre ree? Ndee pra lefuŋu sri hin?
40011004	A Yesu na yo pe pan mbo, "E sɛ kee nyjɛ e nya na nyjɛ e loo yire kee yo Jↄn pan,
40011005	na mblɛ pe fun nyiɛlɛ na kre nyaa, a finla na nyaari, a yira nyiɛrɛfɛɛnlɛ saanla, a kpoolo na ndru na paara, a gboolo na nyini, a shianfɛɛnlɛ ketaan kre ta na ndru.
40011006	Kena ŋmba we ni shↄ mbe li mbe wa ni je kre we dwamu ta."
40011007	Ŋga Jↄn bitumblↄ pre na ndru na shie kre, Yesu na wre Jↄn kee yo lenɛɛrɛ pre pra fni wa kre pan mbo, "Ŋga e na yili na shie Jↄn pan fimi lawee yire nu kre, yirɛ nyji sembremu e naa jawa na ee sɛ nya hin? Nyaa nyjɛ fuflɛ mↄŋↄi le haa e naa shie ree?
40011008	Kena yirɛ nyji pan kuraa e na sɛ wa hin? Ndee lewo ŋmba u dodonyi chichiele le e naa shie mbe sɛ le ree? E le, e ti ni yo e pan, dodonyi chichiele lefɛɛnlɛ pre, ŋunu katoo pe nyi.
40011009	Kena e ni nyina nyje pan e na sɛ wa, Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun wa lehaa e na sɛ ree? Kpra yi, e ti ni yo e pan, e na ŋmba wra wɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun na nya.
40011010	Ŋgi na, Jↄn kee pra nyunↄ mu tɛɛ fa mbo, 'Le, mbe ni bituŋu tun mbe u yiɛ klu mu pan, wre we kolo gbeele mu pan.'
40011011	Kpra na, e ti ni yo e pan, leweele nu kro, wa n wa a Jↄn ndrajefun wre n wɛ u na. La, ŋmba uu fiɛn Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nu kuraa kre, u wɛ u na.
40011012	A mu yire Jↄn ndrajefun wre nyjila mu pan mu su ble nyjɛ nu o nyi ŋga nu kre, nyjeeri ŋunumu kre sɛɛ sheli. A mblɛ pe chaa mbe sɛ ki nu kre, gbeŋmbaa ni pe ki shie.
40011013	Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ pre na Mbose mbra yire na klu mna nyjeeri ŋunumu kre kee tataara nya mu yo a Jↄn ndrajefun na chin mu pan.
40011014	Kena na e chaa mbe ni kee ŋga shↄ mbe li kre, ni yuu e pan na Elaija ŋmba kee pra yo fa na we yiɛklu mbe pan Kristo wre na kre, wre wi Jↄn ndrajefun wre.
40011015	Kena ŋmba uu wa ndie ni kre u loo.
40011016	Kena leele mblɛ nyini ni kuraa mbe fuŋga leele mblɛ wru mbe gbun hin? Pan pe nyi na biile mblɛ pe pna jafa lawee nu lɛ, mbe plɛ kna mbra yuu plɛ pan mbo,
40011017	'O binyi gbun e pan, a e je; e n yↄ. A o kum kpali, a e je; e n nyɛni.'
40011018	Jↄn na pan, u nsraa sro lii, a u nsraa simi gboo. Kpatↄ na srɛ chiin na lɛ u sro, a nde leele naa yuu mbo, 'Ŋumufↄↄn wa u nu.'
40011019	A mi Lewo Pↄ wre pan, na lii na simi yɛ gboo, a e na yuu na lilio na gbↄgbↄↄ wi mi, a ni nↄↄlↄ lɛ lampoo shↄfɛɛnlɛ na sisampefɛɛnlɛ. La, na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kachindɛ wa lewo nu kre, u kepele kie ki nyina."
40011020	Chiɛ yɛ naa wa wa, bawa Yesu na u kawako kee yire pe nɛɛrɛ mu tro. La, bawa leele nsra pe jawala chinɛ. Ki tia Yesu na paara mna chiɛ yire taan mbo,
40011021	"Yire Chorazin na Bɛtsaida leele, e atɛ! Ŋgi na, kawako kee tataara nyjɛ ni pe e nu ŋga, na yire ndaa pe Tiro na Sidon na kre, bawa leele wra fooro yonyi tↄ, mbra tↄↄnrↄ fa, mbe kra nyina na pe laa pe sisam kro.
40011022	Kena e jawa e chin na waŋgra kla ble kre, Nyiɛkpↄↄ we Tiro na Sidon leele fooro chin mbe wɛ e na.
40011023	A yire Kapɛnↄm leele, e eyɛ kpↄↄ, na jawa na ee sɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ lawee, la, kanyana lawee ee sɛ. Ŋgi na, kawako kee nyjɛ ndaa pe a e na nya kre, na Sodom na ndaa yire kee nyjɛ pe kre, pe wra pe jawala chinɛ, a kaa chia kree wa aŋga tɛ.
40011024	Kena e jawa e chin na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kpra kun ble kre, we Sodom leele fooro chin mbe wɛ e na."
40011025	Ŋga Yesu na paara mu da wa kre, a wra kna mbo, "Ndoo, nyjeeri na tra Tafun, ni mu kaan mboo na mu mu kee kre ndra kachimblɛ na, mu ki wↄ mu bibɛɛlɛ nyina.
40011026	Yɛŋgɛ yi ndoo, ŋga ki tna mu pan mu pini.
40011027	Ni Lɛ wre yirɛ kro le ni kɛɛ, la, ndro n u Pↄ wre chin fↄna Lɛ wre chiin, a ndro n Lɛ wre chin, fↄna u Pↄ wre na mblɛ Pↄ wre chaa mbe u Lɛ wre wↄ mbe nyina pre."
40011028	"Kena e pan ni pan, yire mblɛ pe tio tuuro a e fna kre, mbe e tuu mbe e wuu.
40011029	E ni sumiɛ le e ki twan. Ŋgi na, ni nyjii, a ni ndra n sheli, kena na e pan mu ni sumi kre, ee wuu.
40011030	Ni sumiɛ n sheli, ki tia e tuuro wa sna."
40012001	Judae wuuble ka nu Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na sɛ tro fifiire see ka nu. Ŋga pra da wa kre, na klo twanfɛɛnlɛ pre ta, a pra yi sɛnyi yire yɛ mbru na kaa.
40012002	Ŋga Farisiie pre na pe nya kre, a pra pan mu Yesu wie mbo, "Ŋgi ki tia mu twanfɛɛnlɛ o wuuble mbra taan mu na sro kuun wuuble ŋga hin?"
40012003	A Yesu na kna mu Farisiie pre wie mbo, "E n da mu tↄↄnri mu loo kala ŋga Devid na u kotↄmblↄ na pe, nyjila ŋga klo na pe ta,
40012004	a Devid na sɛ le Nyiɛkpↄↄ nyuŋgo, mna sɛ paanu ŋga praa teeri Nyiɛkpↄↄ yiɛ kre wru, a wre na u kotↄmblↄ pre na ka, la, na ki mbra taan na pie kre paanu kre sembremu ka. Ŋgi na, Sↄfue chiin praa kre paanu kre nyini kaa.
40012005	Ndee e n Mbose mbra yire tↄↄnri mu nya na, Israel sↄfue mblɛ praa lee suminyuŋgo kre nu wuuble na pe tnumu tuni kre, praa wuuble yire klai ree? A nde pe nsra da mu yo wa pan na u wuuble kla.
40012006	Kena e ti ni yo e pan mbe e loo, ndro waa wa mna mu wɛ sumi nyuŋgo kre na.
40012007	Pe ki nyunↄ mu tɛɛ mbo, 'Ni n na yurↄ srawↄↄ chaa, la, fooro chiɛn, kre ni cha.' Na e na kee ŋga nↄↄ loo kre, kaa leele mblɛ pe n fↄↄn pe kre, yaa naa pe gbuun na pimi ni.
40012008	Ŋgi na, Lewo Pↄ wre wi wuuble kre Tafun."
40012009	Ŋga Yesu na yiri wa kre, a wra sɛ pe fninyuŋgo.
40012010	Ŋga wra le wa kre, na blↄ waa wa wa a u kɛ ku. Kre nyjila kre nu na leele plɛɛ wa fninyuŋgo wa na chaa na pie Yesu nyu cha, mbe u ta mbe yii. Kra tia pra Yesu wie mbo, "Kena mbra kolo ŋga na mu yaŋu tra wuublee?"
40012011	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "E ŋmbi haa we mbↄↄ ta, na mbↄↄ wre to wee wuuble, mbe ufun wa sɛ u wↄ hin?
40012012	Kena e ti ni e wie, mbↄↄ wɛ lewo na ra? Kena ni chaa mbe e loo na mbra o ŋga kolo mbe o chichie pe wuuble."
40012013	A Yesu na kna mu yo kɛyaŋu wre pan mbo, "Mu kɛ kre tini!" A wra u kɛ kre tini, a kra nyu na shiin wo kre yi.
40012014	A Farisiie pre na yili mna sɛ kolo cha,
40012015	ŋga na pie tro mbe u taa gbo, a wra yili wa na shie, a lenɛɛrɛ na taa u kro, a wra mblɛ praa yaa kro tra.
40012016	Mblɛ wra tra kre kro, wra yo pe pan na pia shia u mɛɛ kpali.
40012017	Kre kee ŋga ki tia kee ŋga Yisaia na yo mu tɛɛ kre na pe yɛŋgɛ mbo,
40012018	"E le, ni sumifun ŋmba ni wↄ wi kre, wre wi ŋmba ni kori, a ni yiɛ shↄ u na, mbe ni Ŋumu le u nu, mbe u leele mblɛ pe n pe Judae pre nyina kprakuↄn kee kre.
40012019	A wa nyu kna ndro ni, a wa gble lete na mbe ndro u mana loo.
40012020	We ti ŋmba u n yire kre yire haa ta, a ŋmba kanhun ki firi u nu kre, we ti ki nyi, we wi mbe sɛ su ŋga kpra we yili.
40012021	A wre na waŋgra leele we na kaan."
40012022	Bawa leele plɛ na pan na blↄ wa ni Yesu pan, na ŋumufↄↄn wa u nu. Ki tia u nsraa nyaa, a u nsra ja na paara. Yesu na blↄ wre tra, a wra ja na paara na nyaa kama.
40012023	A Kra leele pre kro pe kawako, a pra kna na peyɛ wie mbo, "Devid nana wre ma ŋmbaa?"
40012024	Ŋga Farisiie pre na kee kre Yesu pe kre loo kre, a praa yuu mbo, "Bɛɛlzebul, ŋumufuɛn ŋunu wre u Yesu ŋga jaŋga, kre ki tia a u ja na ŋumufuɛn woni leele nu kre."
40012025	Titɛɛ kre nu Yesu na leele pre jawala nya, a wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Na waŋgra ki yɛ yↄↄlɛ na wii na kiyɛ ni kre, waŋgra kre wa jaa yire. A chia ndee sele ŋga kie kiyɛ yↄↄlɛ mbra wii na kiyɛ o ni kre wa yire.
40012026	Na Sutna kna na wii na uyɛ ni kre kena u uyɛ yↄ shiin, a u ŋunumu kre wa yire haa ta.
40012027	Kena na Bɛɛlzebul, ŋumufuɛn ŋunu wre ni ni ŋumufuɛn woni leele nu kre, kena yire titi biile pre, jaŋga ŋgi ni pre ŋumufuɛn woni hin? E biile pre titi kuraa chin na kala e fni.
40012028	Kena na Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre u ni ŋga ŋumu wre a ndaa ŋumufuɛn woni kre, kena e ja e chin na Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre mbra e na.
40012029	Ndro wa jaa le faŋgafun nyuŋgo mbe u yirɛ koli, fↄna u klu mu faŋgafun wre pↄ tun, kre we jaa le u nyuŋgo mbe u yirɛ koli."
40012030	"Ŋmba u n wa ni kro kre, mu chin na u ni pra. A ŋmba wa ya ni na mbe o leele ble titɛɛ kre, mu chin na wre u pe zaanri.
40012031	Kena e ti ni yo e pan mbe e loo, sisam na jiɛnlɛ kee ŋga lewo we yo kpan, Nyiɛkpↄↄ we jaa ki ti mbe u kɛ, la, ŋmba we jiɛnlɛ kee yo mbe Kpra Ŋumu wre taan kre, Nyiɛkpↄↄ wa ki tii u kɛ fio.
40012032	A ŋmba we paara mbe Lewo Pↄ wre taan kre, we jaa sisam tinkɛɛ ta, la, ŋmba we paara mbe Kpra Ŋumu wre taan kre wa sisam tinkɛɛ ta fio, hali waŋgra shiin wo kre nu."
40012033	"Tiŋge chichie ki sɛŋgɛ chichie sɛni, a tiŋge sisaa na sɛŋgɛ sisaa sɛni. A tiŋge sɛŋgɛ na pe yiree na ki chini.
40012034	Yire leesaala mblɛ, ŋga sisam wa e nu ŋga, mni ee pe mbe jaa paaraa chichie paara hin? Kala ŋga ki yili nyuu kre, mu chin na loloŋgo nu ki yili.
40012035	Lewo kepele chichie ŋga kii wa u loloŋgo nu kre, kre ki tia wra chichie pini. A lewo kepele sisaa ŋga kii wa u loloŋgo nu kre, kre ki tia wra sisam pini.
40012036	E ti ni yo e pan mbe e loo, Nyiɛkpↄↄ kpra kun ble kre, kee ŋga ki da mu yili lewo nyuu kpan, we ki nyu wↄ.
40012037	A lewo nyu kayolo na pie yire mbe u kee li, mbaa u gbun pimi ni, ndee mbaa u ŋga tam."
40012038	Bawa Mbose mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre plɛ na Farisiie pre plɛ na yiri mna paara mbo, "Nyinafun, o chaa mbe mu kawako kee yire ka pe mbe o nya."
40012039	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Yire aŋga leele sisam pefɛɛnlɛ mblɛ, e Nyiɛkpↄↄ je, na kawako kee chaa mbe nya, yaa ka nya na, fↄna Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun Jona kee kre chiin bↄkↄ.
40012040	Imi Jona na ble taarɛ li, lafo na blee, mbro badaaŋga wre lɛɛ kre, pan chↄↄ Lewo Pↄ wre we ble taarɛ li wee nu tra lam, lafo na blee.
40012041	Kena Nyiɛkpↄↄ kpra kun ble kre, yire na Nineve leele we yiri, mbe pe paara mbe e taan. Ŋgi na, ŋga Jona na kↄ mu ketaan kre kee yo Nineve leele pan kre, pra ki loo mna pe jawala chinɛ, mna laa pe sisam kro. La, ndro waa wa mna fuŋgaami, a u wɛ Jona na, a e n u shↄnli.
40012042	Nyiɛkpↄↄ kpra kun ble kre, yire na Sheba ŋuchlↄ wre we yiri, mbe u paara mbe e taan. Ŋgi na, wra yiri haalee mna pan mu Sↄlↄmↄn kachindɛ kee kre loo. A e le, ndro waa wa mna fuŋgaami mu wɛ Sↄlↄmↄn na, a e n u shↄnli."
40012043	"Na ŋumufↄↄn yili lewo nu kre, kie sɛ kuraa fimi lawee yire nu mbe sɛ lawee chaa tni. La, na ki n shia lawee ta kre,
40012044	mbe ki kna mbe yo ki yɛ pan mbo, 'Mbe ndru mbe sɛ katoo ŋga nu ndaa yili kre nu,' kena na ki waa ndru mu pan mu tnihaa kre nya, na pe ki pↄ pleple a yaka n wa ki nu kre,
40012045	kie ndru mbe sɛ ŋumufuɛn kↄↄnashin nyjɛ yi wɛ ki na cha, mbe yi paan tni ki tnihaa kre nu. Na ki pan ma kre, lewo ŋmba nu yie tni kre sisam we wɛ u fa na. Pan aŋga leele sisam pefɛɛnlɛ mblɛ pe n ni shↄnli ŋga we pe."
40012046	Ŋga Yesu na yire wa na paara na leele pre nyina kre, u lo na u chinlɛ na pan u pan. A pra yire fimi na, na Yesu yeeri mbe paara na u ni.
40012047	A leele pre praa wa wa kre wa na kna mu yo Yesu pan mbo, "Le, mu lo na mu chinlɛ wa mu yire fimi na na mu chaa."
40012048	A Yesu na kna mna pe wie mbo, "Mblɛ lɛ ni lo na ni chinlɛ hin?"
40012049	Bawa wra kna mna kɛ nyini u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na, mna yo pe pan mbo, "E le, mblɛ lɛ ni chinlɛ na ni loolo.
40012050	Kena ŋmba u ni Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kee ndru na ŋga u chaa pini kre, wre wi ni chunu, ni jaa na ni lo."
40013001	Ki ble kre lam Yesu na yili wa mna sɛ tni epo kre mbɛɛ na.
40013002	A lenɛɛrɛ na pan u jaara, kra tia a wra le krↄ lam mna tni ki nu, a leele pre kro naa wa mu yire epo kre nyu na.
40013003	A wra tni wa mna pe nyina kee tataara yomɛɛlɛ nu mbo, "Kena falifun wa wra sɛ u yirɛ bie wohaa.
40013004	Ŋga wraa yirɛ bie yire woni kre, yɛ na sɛ wo kolo mbɛɛ na, a hanyiɛlɛ na yi nya mna yi yoori mu li.
40013005	A yɛ na sɛ wo tra ŋga tapan dnɛ nyi na. Ki nsra mu a yira fin. Ŋgi na, yi nsra ja mu sɛ tapan.
40013006	Ŋga yila na yili mna yi gbun to, a yira ku, na yi didinyi nsra ja mu sɛ tapan.
40013007	A yɛ na sɛ wo wuuro nu, a wuuro yire na fin mu yi fↄ, a yira ku.
40013008	A yɛ na sɛ wo tra chichie na mna fin mu sɛ, yɛ na sɛ lafaa lafaa, a yɛ na sɛ fuloe tataarɛ, a yɛ na sɛ fulo na kɛ."
40013009	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Ŋmba uu ndie ni kre, u ndie tɛɛ u loo."
40013010	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, Yesu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na pan mu u wie mbo, "Mni a mna paara na leele mblɛ nyina yomɛɛlɛ nu ŋga hin?"
40013011	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Nyjeeri ŋunumu ndra ndra kee kre, pe yire nyina ki yi, la, pre rɛ, pe n pe nyina kee kre.
40013012	Lewo ŋmba uu shↄnlie ni kre, pie ka ya u pan mbe u ta nɛɛrɛ. La, ŋmba u n shↄnlie ni kre, fiɛn ŋga ni u nyi kre, pie ki shↄ u kɛɛ.
40013013	Kee ŋga ki tia ndaa paara pe pan yomɛɛlɛ nu yi kre, pee nyiɛlɛ ni, nde pe n na nyaa, pee ndiile ni, nde pe n na ndru, a pe n na kee kre nↄↄ ndru.
40013014	Pe kepele yire tia a Yisaia kee yire wra yo mu tɛɛ kre, a yi pe ma yɛŋgɛ mbo, 'Ee kee kre loo, la yaa ki nↄↄ loo, ee le chiin, a yaa nya.
40013015	Ŋgi na, pre leele mblɛ jawala ku, a pe pe ndiile yurↄ, mu pe nyiɛlɛ tↄ, ki tia pe n na nyaa, a pe n na ndru mbe pe jawala tɛɛ mbe kee kre nↄↄ loo ndee mbe pe jawala chinɛ mbe pan ni pan, mbe ni pe shↄ.'
40013016	A yire rɛ, e ndra nyu titi, e nyaa, na ndru.
40013017	E ti ni yo mbe e loo, Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ pre na Nyiɛkpↄↄ leele pre tataara naa chaa na pie na kalɛɛ nyjɛ e nya mu loo ŋga nya mbra yi loo. A la, pe nsra yi nya, a pe n sra yi loo."
40013018	"Kena e ndie tɛɛ, e yirɛ bie woo yomini kre nↄↄ loo.
40013019	Ŋmba we Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre ketaan kre loo a wa ki nↄↄ loo kre, pan we pe na yirɛ bie nyjɛ pra wo a yira sɛ wo kolo mbɛɛ na kre yi. Na Sutna pan, we paan kee kre pe luu ufun loloŋgo nu kre, wↄ u nu.
40013020	A yirɛ bie nyjɛ yira sɛ wo dnɛ lawee yire nu kre lɛ mblɛ pe ketaan kre ndru, mbe ki shↄ na yɛshↄↄrↄ ni.
40013021	La, kee kre wa didinyi kan pe lolonyi nu, pie frↄ chiɛri, kena na kanyana ndee na pe yila ketaan kre na mu wa pra to, na u fɛ mu wa.
40013022	A yirɛ bie yire yira wo wuuro nu kre lɛ mblɛ pe ketaan kre ndru, la, waŋgra yirɛ jawala tataara, na swa chaara we ti kee kre ku u nu.
40013023	A yirɛ bie yire yira sɛ wo tra taan kre nu kre lɛ mblɛ pe ketaan kre ndru mbe ki nↄↄ loo, mbe ki sɛŋgɛ sɛ, mbe plɛ sɛ lafaa lafaa, mbe plɛ sɛ fuloe tataarɛ, mbe plɛ sɛ fulo na kɛ."
40013024	Yesu na ndru mu pe gbun yomini fↄŋgↄ mbo, "Pan nyjeeri ŋunumu kre nyi na, blↄ wa na sɛ u yirɛ bie chichiele yɛ wo u see.
40013025	Ŋga ble na wↄ a leele na sni peii kre, a u loŋgo na yiri mna sɛ nyaa fuɛn yɛ sɛnyi wo mu chaa yi nu.
40013026	Kena nyjila ŋga ni yirɛ yire na fin kre, a nyaa fuɛn yire na fin mu chaa yi nu na.
40013027	Ŋga blↄ wre sumifɛɛnlɛ na sɛ yi nya kre, a pra pan mu yo u pan mbo, 'O Tafun, yirɛ chichie yire mna wo see wa kre, nyaa fuɛn yɛ fin mu chaa yi nu, sena yi yiri hin?'
40013028	A seefun wre na kna mbo, 'Ni loŋgo wa u sɛ yi wo mu chaa yi nu kre.' A u sumifɛɛnlɛ pre na kna mbo, 'Kena mu chaa mbe o sɛ yi klↄ mbe wo ra?'
40013029	A seefun wre na kna mbo, 'E frↄ, na kre ma, na e yo ee yi klↄ kre, e waa yirɛ chichiele yire yɛ klↄ mbe chaa yi nu.
40013030	Kena e yi ti mbe yire na yirɛ chichiele yire kro chaa mbe lɛ, na yirɛ yire kun nyjila waa da, mbe yo kunfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbe pe nyaa yire klↄ mbe yi ble titɛɛ, mbe kanhun le yi na, mbe chiin yirɛ chichiele yire kun mbe sɛ yi le sugbaa.' "
40013031	Yesu na ndru mna pe gbun yomini fↄŋgↄ mbo, "Pan nyjeeri ŋunumu kre nyi na mↄstad bie ŋga lewo wru mbe sɛ luu u see yi.
40013032	Kre ki pe fiɛn yirɛ bie kro nu, la, na pe ki luu a ki fin, ki tiŋge kpↄↄri mbe wɛ tinyi tataara na. Ki tiŋge kpↄↄri mbe hanyiɛlɛ jaa zeere le ki klɛ nu."
40013033	Wra ndru mna pe gbun yomini ka na mbo, "Pan nyjeeri ŋunumu kre nyi na yiisi yi. Na paanufↄfun ki chiɛri wↄ mu le paanu mimi nu kre, kie paanu mimi kre shↄ mbe ta, mbe ki tin."
40013034	Yomɛɛlɛ nu Yesu naa paara lenɛɛrɛ pre pan, nyjila ŋga nu we paara pe pan kpan kre, yomɛɛlɛ nu wraa paara.
40013035	Pan wraa paara, ki tia Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun wre kee ŋga wra yo mu tɛɛ kre na pe kpra mbo, "Yomɛɛlɛ nu mbe paara pe pan, a kee nyjɛ yi ndra mu yire waŋgra gbeele nyjila krɛrɛ kre, mbe yi wↄ mbe pe nyina."
40013036	Ŋga Yesu na lenɛɛrɛ pre ti wa mna sɛ katoo kre, a u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na u kↄŋgↄ ni mna sɛ yo u pan mbo, "Jande, o nyina nyaa fuɛn yire yira fin see kre nu kre yomini kre nↄↄ."
40013037	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Blↄ ŋmba wra yirɛ bie yire wo kre na wi mi Lewo Pↄ wre,
40013038	A see kre nu wra yi wo kre na yi waŋgra ŋga. Yirɛ bie chichiele yire lɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ leele pre, a nyaa yire yi Sutna leele pre.
40013039	A loŋgo ŋmba wra sɛ nyaa yire wo kre na wi Sutna wre. A yirɛ kun ble kre yi waŋgra kla ble kre. A kunfɛɛnlɛ pre lɛ nyjeeri bitumblↄ pre.
40013040	A imi na pe nyaa fuɛn ble titɛɛ mbe kanhun le yi na kre, pan chↄↄ waŋgra kla ble kre we pe.
40013041	Ki ble kre mi Lewo Pↄ wre we ni nyjeeri bitumblↄ pre tun mbe pe paan nyjɛ yi tia leele na sisam pini kre, na sisam pefɛɛnlɛ pre kro wↄ mbe yili yi ŋunumu kre nu,
40013042	mbe sɛ pe wa kanyana kanhun kre nu, bawa pie na nyɛni mbra pe ŋgaala chirɛ.
40013043	A Nyiɛkpↄↄ leele pre we na chiɛnri na yila yi, pe lɛ ŋunumu kre nu. Kena ŋmba uu wa na ndie ni kre, u loo."
40013044	"Kena pan nyjeeri ŋunumu kre nyi na swa nyiɛɛ wa tra ka nu, a lewo sɛ ki nya, mu ndru mu gbeele mu ki tↄ tra ni mu ya, mbe ki yɛshↄↄrↄ sisaa ti mbe u sɛ yirɛ nyjɛ yii wa u pan kro prɛ mbe sɛ kre tra kre lↄ."
40013045	"Nyjeeri ŋunumu kre, pan ki nyi na jafalifun yira chichie ka chaa,
40013046	na waa sɛ ki nya imi na ki ndrↄ we da kpan, mbe u sɛ yirɛ nyjɛ yii wa u pan kro prɛ mbe sɛ ki lↄ."
40013047	"Nyjeeri ŋunumu kre, pan ki nyi na imi na pe asau waa lↄↄ nu, mbe ki mbroe nyini nyini wↄ.
40013048	Na ki nyi kre, asau kre wafun we ki tini mbe paan tɛɛ tanyiɛ na, mbe tni mbe mbroe pre yoori, mbe chichiele pre le yira lam, mbe fuɛn pre wa.
40013049	Pan kie pe waŋgra kla ble kre. Ki ble kre, nyjeeri bitumblↄ pre we sɛ sisam pefɛɛnlɛ pre yoori mbe yili chichie pefɛɛnlɛ pre nu,
40013050	mbe sɛ fuɛn pre le kanyana kanhun kre nu. Bawa pie nyɛni, mbra pe ŋgaala chirɛ."
40013051	A Yesu na kna mu pe wie mbo, "E kee nyjɛ krɛrɛ nↄↄ loo?" A pra kna mbo, "Ɛnhɛɛn!"
40013052	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Kena Judae mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre, pe ŋmba we paan pe twanfun nyjeeri ŋunumu kre nu kre, we kee chichiele shiin ta, lɛɛ na fↄŋgↄ mbe leele nyina."
40013053	Ŋga Yesu na paara pe pan yomɛɛlɛ nu mu kↄ kre, wra yili wa,
40013054	mna sɛ u chia, mna na leele nyina pe fni nyinyi nu, a kra pe pe kawako ni. A pra kna na peyɛ wie mbo, "Sena ŋmba yiri na jaŋga na kachindɛ kee nyjɛ sembremu ni imi hin?
40013055	Kapinta pↄ wre ma ŋmbaa? Wre ma Maria pↄ kree? Wre chinlɛ ma Jemisi na Josɛf na Siimↄn na Judas kree?
40013056	Wre jaala ma pee wa o pan mna kree? A sena u yiri na yire kee nyjɛ ni hin?"
40013057	U kee na pe pe kawako ni mu tro, a kra tia pe krↄ na kun na u ni. A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun kro pe u shↄnli lawee kro nu, fↄna u chia, na u sele leele nu."
40013058	Ki tia Yesu nsra kawako kee nɛɛrɛ pe wa, ŋga pe nsra u shↄnli kre na.
40014001	Nyjila ŋga nu Yesu naa kila kre, Ŋunu Hɛrodi na u kawako kee yire wraa piin yire loo.
40014002	Ki tia wra yo u sumifɛɛnlɛ pan mbo, "Kie pe Jↄn ŋmba ndaa gbo kre u ndru mu nyi kre, kre ki tia u jaŋga ŋga sembremu ta kre."
40014003	Ŋga kra tia Ŋunu Hɛrodi na Jↄn gbo rɛ, Hɛrodi na u chunu Filipo chↄ ŋmba praa yeeri Hɛrodias kre shↄ mna leŋge. A Jↄn na paara mu Hɛrodi taan na ki n fna mbe u u chunu chↄ shↄ mbe leŋge. Jↄn na ki yo u pan gbee tataara. Kena ŋga wra klu mu ki yo kre, Hɛrodias wre krↄ na kun paa, a wra tia Ŋunu Hɛrodi na Jↄn yii mu sɛ le nyuŋgo. Ŋunu Hɛrodi naa chaa mbe Jↄn gbo, la, leele tataara na Jↄn shↄnli na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun wi. Kra tia Hɛrodi naa fiɛ na we u gbo jle kre. Praa wa wa ki ble ka, Ŋunu Hɛrodi naa u seble lii, a Hɛrodias pↄ bichable wa na pan mu yↄ, a kra Hɛrodi yiɛ shↄ. Kra tia wra da mu pↄ wre ŋga lenɛɛrɛ pre yiɛ na, na yira ŋga we u wie kpan, we u ŋga ki yi. A pↄ wre na sɛ ki yo u lo pan, a u lo na u nyina na u sɛ yo na Jↄn ndra u chaa. A pↄ wre na pan mbo, "Ni ŋga Jↄn ndra taa paawa na mna fuŋgaami!"
40014009	Ŋga kre pan ma kre, Ŋunu Hɛrodi yiɛ na je chiɛri, la, ŋga wra da mu pↄ wre ŋga fumblↄ yiɛ na, u nsraa chaa mbe kↄ u danyi yire na. Ki tia wra yire wa mna tia pra sɛ Jↄn ndra kↄ nyuŋgo wa mna pan mu bichable wre ŋga lalaa wa. A pↄ wre na sɛ u lo ŋga ki yi.
40014012	Ŋga pra Jↄn gbo kre, a u twanfɛɛnlɛ na sɛ u gboo wre wru mu sɛ le, mna chin mu sɛ Yesu bↄ mandiɛ.
40014013	Ŋga Yesu na Ŋunu Hɛrodi kee kre loo kre, wra sɛ krↄ wru mna sɛ lawee waa ka nu wre na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre ni. Leele pre na lawee ŋga nu wraa shie kre haa chin, a pra nyaari tra mna u kↄŋgↄ ni.
40014014	Nyjila ŋga wra yili krↄ kre nu mu to fimi na kre, wra leele pre nya tataara, a pe kee na pe fooro ni u pan mu tro, a wra pe mblɛ praa yaa kro tra.
40014015	Ki ble kre yila kↄŋgↄ, u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na pan mna yo u pan mbo, "O Tafun, yila koo, a leele ma pee wa lawee ŋga nu, mbe lenɛɛrɛ mblɛ yaka ta mbe lↄↄ ka, kena pe wa kolo mbe pe sɛ sro cha mbe lↄ kabɛɛlɛ yire na mbe li."
40014016	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Ki n shian na pie sɛ sro cha peyɛ, kena e pe ŋga yirɛ yɛ mbe pe ka."
40014017	A twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na kna mbo, "Paanu kunↄ na mbroe shiin chiin ni o nyi mna."
40014018	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "E pan na yi ni e ni ŋga."
40014019	A wra kna mu yo leele pre pan na pe tni nyaa yire na, a wra kna mu paanu kunↄ yire na mbroe shiin pre wru mu yii kɛɛ, mna yiɛ wa nyjeeri, mna Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋga mboo, mna paanu yire na mbroe pre pile mna le u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre kɛɛ, a pra yi kɛ mna leele pre ŋga.
40014020	Leele pre kro na ka mna yↄↄ, a twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na pe kampraa yire koli kakɛɛ kɛmbↄshiin.
40014021	Bilɛ mblɛ pra yirɛ yire ka kre naa kagbeŋ kunↄ, pe nsra chiɛlɛ na biile tↄↄnri mu chaa.
40014022	Ŋga pra li mu kↄ kre, a Yesu na yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan na pe krↄ wru mbra yiɛklu tapla kre kro, mbe u leele pre wa kolo mbe pan.
40014023	Ŋga Yesu na leele pre wa kolo mu kↄ kre, a wre nunu na sɛ nyiɛtali nyua ka na. Yila na Yesu kↄ wa.
40014024	Kre nyjila kre na krↄ kre wa tapla kre lalaa, a fuflɛ naa gbuun na pe fni, a pe sɛ haa yiɛ na sheli.
40014025	Kre nyjila kre na kie pe nyjila jijirɛ nyisee nyu na, a Yesu naa nyaari tapla kre yiɛ na, na shie u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan.
40014026	Ŋga u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na u nya na u nyaari nyumu kre yiɛ na kre, fiɛrɛ na pe yii, praa jawa na gboo wi, kra tia pra gble le.
40014027	Titɛɛ kre nu, a Yesu na paara na pe ni mbo, "E eyɛ gbun yii, mi wi, kena yaa fiɛ."
40014028	A Pita na kna mna yo Yesu pan mbo, "Ni Tafun, na ŋu wi kain kre, ti mbe ni nyaari nyumu ŋga yiɛ na mbe pan mu jaara."
40014029	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Yiri mu pan!" A Pita na yili krↄ kre lam mu to tapla kre yiɛ na, na nyaari na shie Yesu pan.
40014030	Ŋga Pita na nya imi fuflɛ kre nyumu kre wru kre, fiɛrɛ na u yii, to, a wraa tri tapan, ŋga wra ki nya ma kre, a wra gble fↄↄri mu le mbo, "Ni Tafun, ni shↄ!"
40014031	A Yesu na kɛ tini mu u fa mu yii, mna kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Mu shↄnlie fiɛn kpa, mni a mu mu jawala pe shiin ŋga hin?"
40014032	A Yesu na Pita yii a pe kro shiin na le krↄ kre lam,
40014033	a leele pre kro naa kosie kani na yiri na yuu mbo, "Kpra na, Nyiɛkpↄↄ Pↄ titi wi ŋu."
40014034	Ŋga pra tapla kre kun kre, pra to Genesarɛt tra nu.
40014035	Leele pre praa wa wa kre na Yesu nya mna u chin, titɛɛ kre nu, a praa feni na pe yambla wru na paan Yesu pan. Ki nsra da nyjila ka, na pe pan pe tra kre yambla kro ni mu ble Yesu yiɛ,
40014036	na u tali na u ti mbe yambla pre kɛnyi taa u dodoŋgi nyu na, mblɛ pra ja mna kɛ taa u dodoŋgi na kre kro na saanla.
40015001	Praa wa wa ki ble ka, a Farisiie plɛ na Mbose mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ plɛ na yiri Jerusalɛm na mna pan mu Yesu wie mbo,
40015002	"Ŋgi ki tia paala nyjɛ o tolɛɛlɛ le mu tɛɛ kre, a mu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na na lii yi na hin? Pra kɛnyi je o paala kolo na mbe chiin li."
40015003	A Yesu na kna mbo, "A yire titi, ŋgi ki tia e Nyiɛkpↄↄ mbra yire je mu taa e paala yire kolo na hin?
40015004	Nyiɛkpↄↄ yo mbo, 'Mu lɛ na mu lo shↄnli, ŋmba we kee sisaa yo u lo na u lɛ na kre, ki fna mbe pe u gbo'.
40015005	La, yire yo na ndro yira ka ta mbe u lɛ ndee mbe u lo ŋga kre, kena ufun u ki tɛɛ mbe sra wↄ mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋga. Kena ki n shian na we u lɛ ndee u lo ŋga yaka na. E tro e paala kolo nyjɛ krɛrɛ na mu Nyiɛkpↄↄ mbra kee kre je.
40015007	Yire yiɛnyumufɛɛnlɛ, yɛŋgɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun Yisaia na e kee nya mna yo kre mbo,
40015008	'Leele mblɛ, ni mɛɛ pe yeeri, a nde pe n na ni kee chaa pe lolonyi nu.
40015009	Finfin pe ni sumi. Ŋgi na, lewo paala kolo pe leele nyina, na yuu na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kolo yi.' "
40015010	Ŋga Yesu na paara na pe ni mu kↄ kre, a wra lenɛɛrɛ pre yeeri mna yo pe pan mbo, "E ndie tɛɛ e kee kre nↄↄ loo chiriri.
40015011	Ki n pe yira ŋga ki lee lewo nyuu kre, ki nɛɛrɛ woni u na, la, kee ŋga ki yili lewo nyuu kre, kre ki u toni na nɛɛrɛ ni."
40015012	Ŋga wra yo ma kre, a u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na flo mu da u na, mna yo u pan mbo, "Mu chin na kee ŋga mu yo kre, ki Farisiie pre yaa?"
40015013	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Tiŋge ŋga ni Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre n luu kro kre, pie ki kↄ mbe wa.
40015014	Kena e pe ti wa, fuunlo lɛ, a pra plɛ nyina kolo, a na fuun u ŋmbrↄ fuun nyina kolo kre, wee nunu pe kro we to."
40015015	A Pita na taan mu yiri mu yo Yesu pan mbo, "Jande, o nyina yomini kre nↄↄ."
40015016	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Kena e n na kaalɛɛ nyjɛ nↄↄ ndru tuun?
40015017	Kena e n chin na yira ŋga ki lee nyuu kre, lɛɛ ki shie, mbe yire wa mbe yili mbe wo ree?
40015018	A la, kee ŋga ki yilii nyuu kre, loloŋgo nu ki yilii, kre ki ja na lewo toni nɛɛrɛ ni.
40015019	Lewo loloŋgo nu sisam jawala ŋga kro yili na paan, linkuuro kee, leŋgeere klaa, tiɛrɛɛ, juuro, kafinɛ dansiɛrɛ lie, na kabaara.
40015020	Yire kee nyjɛ krɛrɛ yi lewo toni nɛɛrɛ ni, kena na mu kɛnyi nyjɛ pe n je paala kolo na tɛɛ mu li kre, kia jaa lewo tↄ na nɛɛrɛ ni."
40015021	Ŋga Yesu na paara a u nyu na to kre, wra yili wa mna sɛ Tiro na Sidon lawee yire nu.
40015022	Chlↄ wa naa wa wa, a wra yiri Kenaan sele nu. Ŋga chlↄ wre na Yesu nya kre, a wra fɛ mna taa u kro na nyɛni mbo, "Jande, Devid nana, ni fooro le, ni Tafun. Ni pↄ bichable nu ŋumufↄↄn nyi na u hau. Kena jande, ya ni na."
40015023	Ŋga chlↄ wre na yo ma kre, Yesu nsra nyu kun, a u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na kna na Yesu tali mbo, "Jande, chlↄ wre ni mbe u laa o kro, u gble o ndie titi."
40015024	A Yesu na kna mu yo chlↄ wre pan mbo, "Israel leele mblɛ pe fun Nyiɛkpↄↄ kolo na kre, pre pan pe ni tun."
40015025	A chlↄ wre na kosie kan Yesu yiɛ mbo, "Jande, ni Tafun, ya ni na."
40015026	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Ki n fna mbe wa u biile sro wru mbe wa nyukwanla pan."
40015027	A chlↄ wre na kna mbo, "Ni ki chin, ni Tafun, la, sro knumɛɛ nyjɛ yi woni tra kre, nyukwanla yi yoori na kaa."
40015028	Ŋga chlↄ wre na yo ma kre, a Yesu na kna mbo, "Mu pe chlↄ ŋmba mu shↄnlie kpↄↄ. Kena ŋga mu tali kre, ki pe ma mbe mu ŋga." Titɛɛ kre nu to, a chlↄ wre pↄ wre na saanla.
40015029	A Yesu na yili wa mna sɛ tro Galilii epo kre nyu na, mna sɛ nyua ka nduu mu tni wa.
40015030	Lenɛɛrɛ na sɛ na yamblɛ ni u pan, fuunlo na finla na mblɛ pe fuuru, na kpoolo na yira nyininyini fɛɛnlɛ ni kro, mna pan mu pe wa Yesu yiɛ, a wra pe tra peii.
40015031	Ŋga leele pre na kpo nya a wra paara, mu fna ŋmba u fuuru nya a wra nyaari, mu nya a fuun nyiɛlɛ nyaa kre, kra pe pe kawako, a praa Israel Nyiɛkpↄↄ kaan mɛɛ.
40015032	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, Yesu na yire wa mna u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre yeeri mna pan u jaara, mna yo pe pan mbo, "Leele mblɛ kee fooro ni ni pan. Ŋgi na, pe tni ni jaara kie pe ble nununu taarɛ yi ŋga, a pe n yaka ta mbe ka. A ni n na chaa mbe pe ndru mbe sɛ na klo ni, na kre ma, plɛ we jire kolo."
40015033	A u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na kna mu u wie mbo, "A sena oo sro ta mbe ki leele tataara mblɛ da mbe li fimi lawee ŋga nu hin?"
40015034	A Yesu na kna mu pe wie mbo, "Paanu mni yii wa e pan hin?" A pra kna mbo, "Paanu kↄↄnashin na mbroe chiɛri plɛ ni o nyi."
40015035	A Yesu na kna mu yo lenɛɛrɛ pre pan, na pe tni tni nyaa yire na.
40015036	Yesu na paanu yire na mbroe pre wru mu yii, mna Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋga mboo, mna yi pile na mbroe pre ni mna le u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre kɛɛ, a praa lenɛɛrɛ pre kaan.
40015037	Lenɛɛrɛ pre kro na ka mna yↄↄ, a twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na pe kampraa yire yoori kakɛɛ kↄↄnashin.
40015038	Bilɛ mblɛ pra yirɛ yire ka kre naa kagbeŋ jijirɛ, pe nsra pe chiɛlɛ na pe biile tↄↄnri mu chaa.
40015039	Ŋga lenɛɛrɛ pre na kↄ kre, a Yesu na pe wa kolo, mna sɛ le krↄ nu, mna sɛ Magadan tra nu.
40016001	Ki ble ka Farisiie na Sadukie pre plɛ na pan mna Yesu pe mu le. Pra yo Yesu u kawako kee pe mbe pe nya.
40016002	A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Na yila shie mbe sɛ to, a lawee nyina haa kre, e ja na chini na yuu na, imi na lawee pe ŋga, baŋga ndramu we saan.
40016003	A na nyiŋge se bnimi kre, e ja na tloe le na yuu na nyiɛ we pan. E ja na ndramu pee le na kalɛɛ taa na yuu, a la, yire ble nyjɛ nu e nyi ŋga, e n ja mbe kee nyjɛ yi piin yi nu le mbe yi kee nya mbe yo.
40016004	E ti ni yo e pan mbe e loo, yire leele sisam pefɛɛnlɛ mblɛ, e Nyiɛkpↄↄ je, na kawako kee chaa mbe nya, la, yaa kawako kee ka ta mbe nya na, fↄna Jona wo ŋga kra pe kre." Ŋga Yesu nyu na to kre, a wra pe ti wa mna sɛ.
40016005	Ŋga Yesu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na tapla kre kun mna kna ki kro kre, pra paanu fɛɛ.
40016006	Ŋga praa wa wa kre, Yesu na yo pe pan mbo, "E le, e eyɛ dↄↄta Farisiie pre na Sadukie pre yiisi yire haa."
40016007	A pra kna na yuu peyɛ pan mbo, "Ŋga o n pan na paanu ni kre, kre ki tia a wra yuu o pan ma kre."
40016008	Kee ŋga praa yuu kre, Yesu na pe jawala nya, a wra kna mu pe wie mbo, "Ŋgi ki tia a e na jawa na ŋga e n pan na paanu ni kre ki tia ndaa yuu e pan ma ŋga hin? E shↄnlie fiɛn kpa.
40016009	Kena e n ta mu kee nyjɛ nↄↄ loo tun? A e n sↄↄnri na ndaa paanu kunↄ pile mna leele kagbeŋ kunↄ ŋga ŋgaa? A ŋga pra ka mu yↄↄ kre, yi mbuuroe yire kakɛɛ mni e na yoori hin?
40016010	A ŋga ndaa paanu kↄↄnashin yire pile mna leele kagbeŋ jijirɛ ŋga kre, yi mbuuroe kakɛɛ mni e na yoori hin?
40016011	Kena yira ŋgi ki tia e n kee ŋga ni yo ŋga nↄↄ loo, a e na jawa na paanu kee ni yuu ŋga hin? Kena e jande, ni yuu e pan na e eyɛ dↄↄ ta Farisiie pre na Sadukiie pre yiisi yire haa."
40016012	Ŋga Yesu nyu na to kre, bawa u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na chin mu kee kre nↄↄ loo, na yiisi ŋga pe leni paanu nu kre kee ma u yuu, la, Farisiie pre na Sadukie pre kooloe fuɛn nyjɛ praa leele nyina kre kee wraa yuu, na pe peyɛ dↄↄ ta yi na.
40016013	Ŋga Yesu na le Kaesaria Filipo tra nu kre, wra u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre wie mbo, "Ndro ŋmbi sembremu leele mi Lewo pↄ wre kra hin?"
40016014	A pra kna mbo, "Plɛ yuu na Jↄn ndrajefun wre wi, a plɛ na yuu na Elaija wi, a plɛ na yuu na Jeremia wi, a plɛ na yuu na aada fawolo Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ pre wa wi."
40016015	A Yesu na kna mbo, "A yire hin? Ndro ŋmbi sembremu e ni kra hin?"
40016016	A Siimↄn Pita na kna mbo, "Ŋu wi Kristo wre, Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋmba u le wre Pↄ wre."
40016017	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Siimↄn, Jona pↄ, Nyiɛkpↄↄ mu dwan. Ŋgi na, lewo ma u mu nyina kre kee ŋga, la, ni Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri wre u ki wↄ mu mu nyina.
40016018	Kre ndra na ni yo mu pan, ŋu wi Pita, ŋu wi dnɛ ŋga mbe wↄ mbe ni leele yire ki na mbe ni sumi, a kumu waa ki ja.
40016019	Ŋu kɛɛ mbe nyjeeri ŋunumu kre safwa le, kena kee ŋga mu yii tra mna kre, pie ki yii nyjeeri, a kee ŋga mu je tra mna kre, pie ki je nyjeeri."
40016020	Bawa Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre jaari na pia shia ki yo mbe ndro loo na wre wi Kristo ŋmba Nyiɛkpↄↄ wↄ kre wre.
40016021	Mu yire kre nyjila kre nu na shie kre, Yesu na paara chasi mna u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre nyina mbo, "Ki fna mbe ni sɛ Jerusalɛm na, mbe sɛ kala nya loplombo pre na Judae sↄfue loplombo pre, na pe mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre kɛɛ. Pie ni gbo, a ki ble taarɛ ble na mbe nyi."
40016022	Ŋga Yesu na yo ma kre, Pita na Yesu yeeri mbɛɛ na mna sɛ u yiɛ kee yo u pan mbo, "Ni Tafun, Nyiɛkpↄↄ we sɛ na kre kee ŋga mu yo ŋga ni lee. Kre kee ŋga n fna mbe pan mu na."
40016023	A Yesu na kna mna yo Pita pan mbo, "Laa ni na! Sutna wi ŋu! Mni a mna ni toni kolo hin? Mu n na Nyiɛkpↄↄ wo haa jawa, la, lewo wo haa mu jawa."
40016024	A Yesu na kna mu yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo, "Na ndro chaa mbe taa ni kro kre, u fun u uyɛ fɛɛ, mbe u kanyana kumu kaan tio mbe taa ni kro.
40016025	Ŋgi na, ŋmba we na wii u ŋmaa na kre, kie yili u kɛɛ. La, ŋmba we yila ni na mbe u ŋmaa wa mbe fun kre, we ki ta.
40016026	Kena na lewo waŋgra ŋga yirɛ kro ta, mu u ŋmaa wa mu fun, yira ŋgi tnu we ta hin? Ndee yira ŋgi sembremu lewo we jaa ta tra mna mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋga, mbe ki jaa ti u ŋmaa ta hin?
40016027	Mi Lewo Pↄ wre, mbe pan ni Lɛ wre yɛnyiŋge kre nu, mi na nyjeeri bitumblↄ ni, mbe paan lewo ŋga kee nyjɛ u pe kro fↄtↄↄrↄ.
40016028	Kpra na, e ti ni yo e pan mbe e loo, plɛɛ wa mu yire e nu mna a pia kumu chin, fↄna pe mi Lewo Pↄ wre nya ni ŋunumu kre nu tun."
40017001	Ble kↄↄnanu kↄkro kre, Yesu na Pita na Jemisi na u chunu Jↄn pre chiin bali a pra sɛ nyua gedeŋge ka na.
40017002	Bawa Yesu na sɛ chinɛ pe yiɛ na, a u yiɛ naa chiɛnri na yila yi, a u dodoŋgi na fniŋge prupru u na.
40017003	Bawa Mbose na Elaija na peyɛ wↄ mu paara Yesu pan.
40017004	A Pita na kna mna yo Yesu pan mbo, "Ni Tafun, ki nyu na oo wa mna, na mu chaa oo sugbɛɛ taarɛ sin e pan fuŋgaami, mu wo nunu, Mbose wo nunu, Elaija wo nunu."
40017005	Ŋga Pita naa wa na paara to, a sugbeŋge ka na pan mu pe tↄ, a mana ka na yili sugbeŋge kre nu mbo, "Ŋmba wi ni pↄ ŋmba ni kori, a ni yiɛ shↄ u na kre. Kena e ndie tɛɛ u pan."
40017006	Ŋga twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na mana kre loo ma kre, fiɛrɛ na pe yii kpↄↄ, a pra yiɛ juule tra.
40017007	A Yesu na pan mna kɛ taa taa pe na mna yo pe pan mbo, "E yiri, yaa fiɛ!"
40017008	Ŋga pra yiɛ yire kre, Yesu chiin pra nya na u wa mu yire pe jaara.
40017009	Ŋga pra yiri nyua kre na na tri tra kre, Yesu na yo pe pan mbo, "Yaa shia kee ŋga e nya na ŋga bↄ mbe ndro loo, fↄna mi Lewo Pↄ wre ku mu nyi tun."
40017010	Ŋga wra yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan ma kre, a pra kna mbo, "A ŋgi ki tia a Judae mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre na yuu na ki fna mbe Elaija klu mbe pan Kristo wre na hin?"
40017011	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Kpra kee pe yuu na Elaija we klu mbe pan mbe yirɛ kro nyu mbra, mbe ni chiin pan.
40017012	La, e ti ni yo e pan mbe e loo, Elaija na yiɛ klu mu pan, la, pe nsra u chin, ki tia pra nyjɛ praa chaa kro taa u na. Pan chↄↄ mi Lewo Pↄ wre pan, mbe paan kala nya pe kɛɛ."
40017013	Ŋga wra yo ma kre, a u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na chin mu kee kre nↄↄ loo, mna chin na Jↄn ndrajefun wre kee Yesu yuu.
40017014	Ŋga pra tii nyua kre na mna pan lenɛɛrɛ pre lawee kre, blↄ wa na fɛ mna pan mu kosie kan Yesu yiɛ mbo,
40017015	"Ni Tafun, ni pↄ ŋmba fooro le. Tonkolii wa u na mu tia wra kala nya tataara, ki tia wra tuuri kanhun, ka nu mbe u to nyumu nu.
40017016	Kre ni pan na u ni mu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan a pe n ja mu u tra."
40017017	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Yire aŋga leele mblɛ nu shↄnlie n wa, e ndie kan kpa, ni tni e jaara, ndee ni kala nya na e ni mbe sɛ su nyjila ŋgi nu hin? E pan na u ni e ni ŋga."
40017018	A pra pan na u ni, a Yesu na fuu ŋumufↄↄn kre na, a kra yili yaŋu wre nu, a wra saanla titɛɛ kre nu.
40017019	Kee ŋga kↄkro kre, twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na Yesu yeeri mbɛɛ na mna u wie mbo, "Kena yira ŋgi ki tia a wre n ja mu ŋumufↄↄn kre wↄ ŋga hin?"
40017020	A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "E shↄnlie fiɛn, kre ki tia. Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, na e shↄnlie da na mↄstad bie ni kre, ee jaa yo nyua ŋga pan na, kↄ mu sɛ to lawee fↄŋgↄ nu, mbe ki kↄ. A yaka n wa mbe yaa jaa ki pe."
40017021	La, blefuun na nyiɛtalaa chiin kie jaa kre ŋumufↄↄn ŋga wↄ lewo nu.
40017022	Ŋga Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre kro na sɛ fni Galilii na kre, wra yo pe pan mbo, "Pie Lewo Pↄ wre wↄ mbe le leele kɛɛ, mbe pe u gbo, a we ndru mbe nyi ki ble taarɛ ble na." Ŋga wra yo ma kre, pe sↄↄnrↄ na ku.
40017024	Ŋga pra yiri wa kre, pra sɛ Kapɛnↄm na, bawa sumi nyuŋgo tↄↄ swa shↄfɛɛnlɛ pre na pan mu Pita wie mbo, "Kena e nyinafun ŋmba sumi nyuŋgo tↄↄ kre toni ŋgaa?"
40017025	A Pita na kna mbo, "Ŋgi ki tia mbe wa ki tↄ hin? U toni." Ŋga Pita na yiri wa mna le katoo to, a Yesu na klu mu u wie mbo, "Siimↄn, mni nyini mu kee ŋga jawa hin? Leele mblɛ haa pan ŋulo tra swa shio hin? Fumblↄ pan ree? ndee kabiile pan hin?"
40017026	A Pita na kna mbo, "Fumblↄ pan pe ki shio." A Yesu na kna mbo, "Kena ki nyina na kabiile pre wuu kre tↄↄ ŋga kɛɛ.
40017027	La, o n na chaa mbe ti leele pre krↄ kun, kena drawa wru mu sɛ tapla kre nyu na, mu sɛ ki wa lↄↄ kre nu, mbro jlewo ŋmba mu wↄ kre, u nyu nyaa, mu swa nya wa, ki wↄ mu pan mu mi na ŋu wo tↄ."
40018001	Kre nyjila kre nu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na pan mu Yesu wie mbo, "Kena o ŋmbi haa we pe lekpↄↄ nyjeeri ŋunumu kre nu ŋga hin?"
40018002	A Yesu na kna, mna pↄ fiɛn wa yeeri, mna pan mu yire pe lalaa,
40018003	mna kna mbo, "Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, na e n eyɛ pe na biile lɛ kre, kolo ka n wa na ee sɛ nyjeeri ŋunumu kre nu fio.
40018004	Ŋmba we ja mbe uyɛ nyjii na pↄ ŋmba wi kre, wre we pe lekpↄↄ nyjeeri ŋunumu kre nu.
40018005	A ŋmba we le ni na, mbe pↄ imi le kre, kena u ni le.
40018006	A ŋmba we ti biile fiɛn fiɛn mblɛ pe ni shↄ ŋga wa laa u shↄnlie kro kre, na pra dnɛ badaaŋga pↄ ufun lagboo mu u wa lↄↄ a kra u li pro, ŋga we tni na.
40018007	Waŋgra ŋga nu kaalɛɛ nyi mu tia leele na punu Nyiɛkpↄↄ na kre, ki atɛ. Leele punui Nyiɛkpↄↄ na la, ŋmba we ti mbe ndro punu kre, u atɛ.
40018008	Kena na mu kɛ ndee mu jele shie na mu ni sisam nu kre, ki kun mu wa. Ki nyu mu mu ŋga na mu sɛ ŋmaa lawee na kɛ nunu, ndee jele nunu ni, mu wɛ ŋga mu kɛnyi shiin, ndee jeelee shiin ta mbe sɛ kanhun ŋga kra fii kre nu na.
40018009	A na mu nyini shie na mu ni sisam nu kre, ki foli mu wa, ki nyu mu mu ŋga na mu sɛ na nyini nunu ni ŋmaa lawee, mu wɛ ŋga mu nyiɛlɛ shiin ta mbe sɛ kanyana kanhun kre nu."
40018010	"Kena e dↄↄ ta mbe yaa shia bibɛɛlɛ mblɛ wa le fiɛn. Ŋgi na, pe nyjeeri bitumblↄ wa mu tni ni lɛ wre jaara nyjeeri nyjila kro nu.
40018011	Lewo Pↄ wre pan mbe paan mblɛ pe fun kre ŋmaa shↄ.
40018012	Kena na lewoo wa na mbaala lafaa ni, a nunu fun pe nu, mni e jawa na ufun we pe hin? Wa fuloejirɛ na kɛmbↄkↄↄnajirɛ pre ti pe ka haa wa, mbe sɛ nunu ŋmba u fun wre haa cha tun ree?
40018013	A na waa u nya, kpra na ni yuu e pan na, u yiɛ we shↄ u na mbe wɛ tataara mblɛ pe n fun kre na.
40018014	Pan ki nyi ni Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre pan chↄ. Ki tia u n na chaa mbe bibɛɛlɛ mblɛ wa fun."
40018015	"Kena na mu ŋmbrↄ fun mu na kre, sɛ mbe ŋu na wre shiin tni, mbe mu sisam ŋga u pe mu mu taan kre yo u pan. Na waa u sisam nↄↄ loo kre, kena e pe nunu.
40018016	A na u n shia ki nↄↄ loo kre, kena mbe mu ndro nunu, ndee shiin cha mbe ya muyɛ na, 'mbe pe mu kee ŋga mu sɛ yo kre, dansiɛrɛ li mbe ya mu na.'
40018017	A na u n shia pe kee ŋga pie yo u pan loo kre, kena mu sɛ kee kre ni Kristo leele pan. Na pe waa u yeeri, a u n shia pe kee loo kre, kena yaa ufun wre jawa Kristo ndro.
40018018	Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, kee ŋga ee yii tra mna kre, pe ki yii nyjeeri, a kee ŋga ee je tra mna kre, pe ki je nyjeeri.
40018019	Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, na e shiin nyu ta nunu tra mna kre, yira ŋga ee tali kpan, ni Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri wre we ki pe mbe e ŋga.
40018020	Ŋgi na mna leele shiin ndee taarɛ we fni ni mɛɛ nu kre, na nii wa pe lalaa."
40018021	Bawa Pita na taan mu yiri mu sɛ Yesu wie mbo, "Ni Tafun, na ni ŋmbrↄ sisam piin ni na, gbee mni ki fna mbe ni u sisam ti mbe u kɛ hin? Gbee kↄↄnashin ree?"
40018022	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Ki n pe gbee kↄↄnashin chiin, la, gbee kↄↄnashin ma tataara."
40018023	"Kena nyjeeri ŋunumu kre, pan kie pe na ŋunu ŋmba wraa chaa mbe wre na u sumifɛɛnlɛ pe lalaa fↄↄlɛɛ kee le mbe yo yi.
40018024	Ŋga ŋunu wre na tni u fↄↄlɛɛ yire kee na kre, pra pan na u sumifɛɛnlɛ pre nunu ni, na u fↄlↄ li kie da pↄni kagbeŋ lafɛɛ kɛ.
40018025	A u sumifun wre nsra swa kre ta mbe tↄ, a kra tia ŋunu wre na yo na pe sɛ sumifun wre, na u chↄ, na u biile, na u yirɛ nyjɛ yii wa u pan kro prɛ mbe paan fↄlↄ kre tↄ."
40018026	"Bawa sumifun wre na kosie kan ŋunu wre yiɛ mna u tali mbo, 'Jande, ni Tafun, frↄ ta, mbe ki cha mbe mu ŋga.'
40018027	Ŋga wra yo ma kre, u kee na pe u pan fooro ni, a wra fↄlↄ kre ti mu u kɛ, mna u wa a wra sɛ."
