40018028	"Ŋga wra yili wa kre, u ŋmbrↄ sumifun wa katoo wra sɛ, na u fↄlↄↄ wa u na kie pe pↄni lafaa gbi, a wra sɛ to u na na tini mbo, 'Ni fↄlↄ tↄ.' "
40018029	"A u ŋmbrↄ sumifun wre na kosie kan u yiɛ mna u tali mbo, 'Jande, frↄ ta, mbe ki tↄ mbe mu ŋga.' "
40018030	"Ŋga wra yo ma kre, wra je mna sɛ u le nyuŋgo mbe hɛ su ŋga nyjila we u fↄlↄ kre tↄ.
40018031	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, u ŋmbilɛ sumifɛɛnlɛ pre na kee kre kro nya, a kra pe pe fooro ni mu tro. A pra sɛ mandiɛ kre kro bↄ pe kro tafun wre pan."
40018032	"Bawa ŋunu wre krↄ na kun u sumifun wre ni, a wra u yeeri a wra pan, a wra kna mbo, 'Ŋu, mu ndra sheli. Lewaa titi wi ŋu. Ŋga ni mu yii ni fↄlↄ na mna, a mu ni tali, ni n ki ti mu mu kɛɛ?
40018033	Kena imi na ni mu fooro chin mu mu wa kre, ŋgi ki tia a mu n mu ŋmbrↄ sumifun ŋmba fooro chin ma ŋga hin?'
40018034	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, ŋunu wre krↄ na kun kpↄↄ, a kra tia wra sɛ u sumifun wre le nyuŋgo lefɛɛnlɛ kɛɛ mbe pe u fiŋge mbe hɛ su ŋga ble we fↄlↄ kre tↄ."
40018035	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Na e n na tii na e ŋmbilɛ kee loloŋgo nu, pan ni lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre we e pe."
40019001	Ŋga Yesu na kee nyjɛ yo a u nyu na to kre, wra yili Galilii na mna sɛ Judea tra na, Jↄↄdan lↄↄ kre kro.
40019002	Ŋga wraa shie kre lenɛɛrɛ na taa u kro, a wra pe tra wa peii.
40019003	Bawa Farisiie pre plɛ na pan mna u pe n le, mna u wie mbo, "Kena mbra kolo ŋga mbe lewo na u chↄ je kolo kro naa?"
40019004	A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "E n ki tↄↄnri mu nya na, 'ŋmba wra klu mu lewo faanri kre', na 'blↄ na chlↄ wra klu mu faanri rↄ'?
40019005	'Kena kre na blↄ we u lo na u lɛ ti, mbe sɛ mbra u chↄ na, mbe pe shiin pre pe wejiŋge nunu.'
40019006	Na pe ta mu mbra mu kↄ, kena pe n pe leele shiin na, la, pe pe ndro nunu. Kena ŋga Nyiɛkpↄↄ mbra kre, yaa ti mbe lewo ki kla."
40019007	A Pra kna mna Yesu wie mbo, "Kena ŋgi ki tia a Mbose na mbra le na, na mu yo mu chlↄ je ki fna mu u ŋga hlɛ mbe ki nyina na mu u je hin?"
40019008	A Yesu na kna mbo, "E ndikana ndra na Mbose na tia e naa e chiɛlɛ jee, pan ma kra nyi jle kre.
40019009	La, mi yuu e pan na, na ki n yire tiɛrɛɛ na a blↄ u chↄ je, maa sɛ wa leŋge kre, kena u leŋgeere kla."
40019010	A Yesu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Kena na pan kre kee ŋga nyi blↄ na chlↄ lalaa rɛ, kena ki n fna mbe o na leŋgei."
40019011	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Ndro kro ma we jaa tni mbe wa leŋge, fↄna mblɛ pe ŋga ki yi kre.
40019012	Leele plɛɛ wa pra leŋge. Pan pe pre se. A plɛɛ wa pe pe san, kre ki tia pra leŋge. A plɛɛ wa mu yila nyjeeri ŋunumu kre na, ki tia pra leŋge. Kena ŋmba we jaa li kre kolo kre na kre, e ti u taa ki na."
40019013	Bawa leele plɛ na pan na biile plɛ ni Yesu pan na u kɛ taa taa pe ndrɛ na, mbe nyiɛtali mbe pe ŋga, a twanfɛɛnlɛ pre naa fuuru leele pre na.
40019014	A Yesu na kna mna yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo, "E biile pre ŋga kolo mbe pe pan ni pan, yaa pe tↄ kolo, pre imi wo yi nyjeeri ŋunumu kre."
40019015	A pra pe ŋga kolo, a leele pre na pan na biile pre ni, a Yesu na kɛ taa taa pe ndrɛ na, mna chin mu yili wa.
40019016	Titɛɛ kre nu wa, yirifuŋu wa na pan mu Yesu wie mbo, "Nyinafun, kee chichie ŋgi mbe pe mbe blenyini ŋmaa kre ta hin?"
40019017	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Ŋgi ki tia mna ni wie kee chiriri ŋga mu jaa pe hin? Nyiɛkpↄↄ chiin u kee chichie chin. Kena na mu chaa mbe ŋmaa ta kre, li Nyiɛkpↄↄ mbra yire na."
40019018	A blↄ wre na kna mu Yesu wie mbo, "Mbra nyji na Nyiɛkpↄↄ yo o taa hin?" A Yesu na kna mbo, " 'Maa shia linkuuro kee pe, a maa shia leŋgeere kla, a maa shia ju, a maa shia kafinɛ dansiɛrɛ li.
40019019	Mu lo na mu lɛ shↄnli, mu mu ŋmbrↄ kori na mu yɛ yi.' "
40019020	A yirifuŋu wre na kna mbo, "Yire kee nyjɛ krɛɛrɛ, ni li yi na kro, kena ŋgi ki kro na hin?"
40019021	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Kena na mu chaa mbe pe cheche kre, sɛ yirɛ nyjɛ yii wa mu pan kro prɛ, mu shianfɛɛnlɛ ŋga yi swa kre, mu pan mu taa ni kro, kre mu krↄyirɛ ta nyjeeri."
40019022	Ŋga yirifuŋu wre na kre kee ŋga loo kre, u sↄↄnrↄ na ku, a wra kna brɛm na shie. Ŋgi na, na yirɛɛ wa u pan tataara.
40019023	A Yesu na kna mna yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo, "Kpra na ni yuu e pan, kie sheli mbe swafun ŋga na we sɛ nyjeeri ŋunumu kre nu."
40019024	E le, kie pe yiɛyiɛ nyuuma pan na we le pandiɛ wee mbe wɛ ŋga swafun we le nyjeeri ŋunumu kre nu.
40019025	Ŋga twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na kre kee ŋga loo ma kre, kra pe pe kawako ni mu tro. A pra kna na yuu mbo, "A kena ndro ŋmbi haa we ŋmaa ta na hin?"
40019026	A Yesu na kna mu pe le komm, mna yo pe pan mbo, "Lewo pan kia jaa pe, la, Nyiɛkpↄↄ pan kre, kee kro we jaa pe."
40019027	Bawa Pita na kna mna yo Yesu pan mbo, "Le, o o yirɛ kro ti mu pan mu taa mu kro, kena tnu ŋgi oo ta ki nu hin?"
40019028	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, waŋgra shiin wo kre nu kre, Lewo Pↄ wre we tni u yɛnyiŋge ŋujↄↄn kre na, a yire mblɛ e taa u kro aŋga ŋga we tni ŋujↄɛn nununu kɛmbↄshiin na, mbra Israel sele kɛmbↄshiin yire kpra kuun.
40019029	A ŋmba u u kalonyi ndee, u chinlɛ, ndee u jaala, ndee mu u lɛ, ndee u lo, ndee mu u biile, ndee mu u tra ti mu pan mu taa ni kro kre, ufun we ndru mbe yi ta ma gbee lafaa lafaa, mbe blenyini ŋmaa kre ta mbe ya.
40019030	La, lenɛɛrɛ mblɛ pe yiɛklu kre we kro tↄ, mbe kotↄmblↄ kna mbe yiɛklu."
40020001	Yesu na yomini gbun mbo, "Pan nyjeeri ŋunumu kre nyi na, falifun ŋmba wra yiri bnimi pupu, mna sɛ falifɛɛnlɛ wru mbe pe sɛ fali u see kre wi.
40020002	Ŋga wre na pre na paara mna fni kre, pra yo pie shↄ swa denari nununu ble nunu, a wra tia pra sɛ na fali.
40020003	Kie pe nyjila kↄↄnajirɛ kre, wra sɛ leele plɛ da jafa lawee na pe yire finfin.
40020004	A wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, 'Wolo, yaa sɛ fali ni pan mbe ni e fↄlↄ tↄ imi na ki fnaa?' A pre na sɛ ya mblɛ pre na.
40020005	Kie pe nyjila kɛmbↄshiin na nyjila taarɛ lalɛɛ yire nu kre, seefun wre na sɛ plɛ da na, mna pe yeeri ma na.
40020006	A kie pe nyjila kunↄ kre, wra sɛ plɛ da na pee wa mu yire, a wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, 'Yira ŋgi e yire na ble poŋgo klai finfin ŋga.'
40020007	A pra kna mbo, 'Na ndro n o wru tnumu ka nu.' A seefun wre na kna mbo, 'E tro e sɛ fali ni see wa.'
40020008	Ŋga yila na kↄ a pra pan katoo kre, a seefun wre na u tnumu lefun yeeri a wra pan, a wra kna mbo, 'Tnumutunfɛɛnlɛ pre kro yeeri mu pe fↄlↄ tↄ. Yire mblɛ pe kro tↄ kre na mu sɛ su yiɛkulo pre na.'
40020009	Ŋga mblɛ pra kro tↄ falihaa kre na pan, a wra pe tↄ denari nununu kre,
40020010	yiɛkulo pre na chin na pre we ta mbe ki wɛ ma na. La, denari nununu wra pre ŋga na.
40020011	Ŋga pra swa yire shↄ mu kↄ kre, a praa taanri seefun wre na mbo,
40020012	'Kotↄmblↄ mblɛ, nyjila nunu chom ni pe tnumu tun, a wre mblɛ wre kala nya a yila o gbun chiin kre, nde fↄtↄↄrↄ nunu o kro ta.'
40020013	A seefun wre na kna mna yo pe wa pan mbo, 'Awe, ni n wa pe sisaa, mi na yire n paara a o nyu fni, a e yo denari nununu ee shↄ kre ra?
40020014	Kena yire e e wie shↄ e sɛ. Mi ni chaa mu mblɛ ŋga ma na.
40020015	Kena ni n kolo ni na mbe ni swa tɛɛ mbe ŋga ni chaa pe ree? Ndee mni a ni chichie pee kaari e pan krↄ ŋga hin?' "
40020016	A Yesu na u yomini kre nyu le mbo, "Kena ni yuu e pan na kotↄmblↄ we kna mbe yiɛklu, mbe yiɛkulo kna mbe kro tↄ."
40020017	Yesu na lenɛɛrɛ naa shie Jerusalɛm na, ŋga praa shie mu da kolo kre, a wra u twanfɛɛnlɛ kɛmbↄshiin pre yeeri mbɛɛ na mna yo pe pan mbo,
40020018	"E le, Jerusalɛm na o shie kre, bawa pie Lewo Pↄ wre wↄ mbe le Judae sↄfue loplombo pre na pe mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre kɛɛ, mbe pe u gbun kumu pimi ni,
40020019	mbe u wru mbe le leele mblɛ pe n Nyiɛkpↄↄ chin kre kɛɛ, mbe pe u tɛɛlɛ, mbe u frↄ, mbe sɛ u kan kanyana kumu kaan kre na, a ki ble taarɛ ble na we nyi."
40020020	Bawa Zebedii chↄ na pan na u biile Jemisi na Jↄn ni, mna pan mu kosie kan Yesu yiɛ, na Yesu u ya u na.
40020021	A Yesu na kna mu u wie mbo, "Ŋgi mu chaa mbe ni pe mbe mu ŋga hin?" A chlↄ wre na kna mbo, "Jande, ni chaa mbe mu ti mbe ni biile shiin mblɛ, mbe wa tni mu kalie kɛ, mbe wa tni mu kamɛŋɛ kɛ, na maa sɛ mu ŋunumu kre nu."
40020022	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Mu n chin kee ŋga mu yuu." A Yesu na kna mu Jemisi na Jↄn wie mbo, "Eee jaa gbↄ kanyana gbↄyira ŋga ni ni gboo nii?" A pra kna mbo, "Oo jaa gbↄ na ki ni."
40020023	A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Ee jaa gbↄ na kanyana gbↄ yira ŋga ni ni gboo ni, la, mbe tni ni kalie na ni kamɛŋɛ kɛ kre rɛ, ni wo ma mbe ni jaa ki kolo ŋga, la, mblɛ pan ni lɛ ki gbeele mu tɛɛ kre wo yi."
40020024	Ŋga twanfɛɛnlɛ kɛ hamblɛ pre na kre kee ŋga loo kre, pe krↄ na kun Jemisi na Jↄn ni.
40020025	A Yesu na twanfɛɛnlɛ pre kro yeeri mna yo pe pan mbo, "E chin na leele mblɛ pe n Nyiɛkpↄↄ chin kre, pe loplombo pre peyɛ pe tafɛɛnlɛ na jaŋga lii hamblɛ naa?
40020026	A yire rɛ, pan ma ki nyi e nu. La, ŋmba we na chaa mbe pe lekpↄↄ e nu kre, u kaari e kro sumifun.
40020027	A ŋmba we na chaa mbe e yiɛklu kre, u kaari e kro tnu.
40020028	Lewo Pↄ wre kuraa n pan na pe u sumi, la, sumi haa u pan, mbe u ŋmaa tɛɛ mbe sra wↄ mbe lenɛɛrɛ ŋga."
40020029	Ŋga Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na yili Jɛriko na, na shie kre, leele tataara na taa pe kro.
40020030	Kre nyjila kre nu na fuunlo shiin plɛɛ wa mu tni kolo mbɛɛ na. Ŋga pra loo na Yesu tro pe jaara kre, a pra gble fↄↄri mu le mbo, "O Tafun, Devid nana, o fooro le."
40020031	A lenɛɛrɛ pre naa fuuru pe na, na pe pieri, a pra taa kuraa na gble kre leni kpↄↄ na yaa mbo, "O Tafun, Devid nana, jande, o fooro le."
40020032	A Yesu na yire mna pe yeeri, mna pe wie mbo, "Kee ŋgi e chaa mbe ni pe mbe e ŋga hin?"
40020033	A pra kna mna yo Yesu pan mbo, "Jande, ti mbe o nyiɛlɛ nyaa."
40020034	Ŋga pra yo ma kre, fooro na Yesu yii, a wra kɛ taa taa pe nyiɛlɛ yire na, titɛɛ kre nu to, a yira nyaala, a pra taa Yesu kro.
40021001	Ŋga Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre naa mbra Jerusalɛm na kre, pra le chia ka na praa ki yeeri Bɛtfage, a kii wa Olive nyua kre na. Bawa Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre shiin wↄ mu tun mbo,
40021002	"E sɛ chia ŋga kii wa e yiɛ ŋga na. Na e le to, ee nya na pe bubnↄ pↄ tiŋge ka na, a u pↄↄ wa mu yire u jaara, e pe saan e pan na pe ni e ni ŋga.
40021003	Na ndro waa e wie kre, e yo na o Tafun u pe shian, we ti mbe e pan na pe ni."
40021004	Kre kee ŋga na pe mna tia Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun wre kee ŋga wra yo mu tɛɛ kre na pe yɛŋgɛ mbo,
40021005	"Yo Ziↄn chia leele pan na, E le, e ŋunu paan e pan, a u nyjii kama, a uu wa mu tni bubnↄ pↄ na."
40021006	A twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na sɛ kee ŋga Yesu na yo pe sɛ pe kre pe.
40021007	Pra sɛ pan na bubnↄ wre na u pↄ wre ni, a pra pe dodonyi wↄ mu taa taa pe na, a Yesu na tni.
40021008	A lenɛɛrɛ pre plɛ naa pe dodonyi na pe yonyi chaan kolo kre na, a pe plɛ naa tinyi wrɛ kuari na chaan u yiɛ.
40021009	A leele mblɛ pra u yiɛ klu kre na mblɛ pra u kro tↄ kre kro naa gble leni na yuu mbo, "Hosana! Devid nana, ŋmba u paan o kro Tafun wre mɛɛ na kre wo yi dwamu. E Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre ŋga mɛɛ."
40021010	Ŋga Yesu na le Jerusalɛm na kre, chia kre kro na yiri mu paari, pra peyɛ wie mbo, "A ndro ŋmbi wi ŋmba hin?"
40021011	A lenɛɛrɛ pre naa yuu mbo, "Nyiɛkpↄↄ keenyanyofun Yesu wre, ŋmba u yiri Nazrɛt chia ŋga kii wa Galilii tra nu kre, wre wi kre."
40021012	A Yesu na sɛ le Nyiɛkpↄↄ sumi nyuŋgo wa, mna mblɛ praa wa wa na jafa lii kre kro ni, mna mblɛ praa swa chinɛ, mblɛ praa katoo kotulo prɛ kre yirɛ kna mu juule.
40021013	A wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Pe ki nyunↄ mu tɛɛ na, 'Pie ni katoo kre yeeri nyiɛtalihaa' 'A yire ki wru mu pe juuro lawee.' "
40021014	Bawa fuunlo na mblɛ pe fuuru kro na pan u pan suminyuŋgo wa, a wra pe tra.
40021015	Ŋga Judae sↄfue loplombo pre na pe mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre na kawako kee yire Yesu na pe kre nya, mna loo na biile gble suminyuŋgo wa na yuu na "E Devid nana wre ŋga mɛɛ" kre, pe krↄ na kun na u ni.
40021016	A pra tin mna pan Yesu pan mbo, "Le, mu loo kee nyjɛ leele mblɛ yuu ŋgaa?" A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Ɛnhɛɛn, e n da mu ki kee ŋga pe nyunↄ mu tɛɛ kre tↄↄnri tun ra?" Mbo, "Hali biile fiɛn fiɛn kuraa we u ŋga mɛɛ."
40021017	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, wra yili mu pe ti wa mna sɛ ŋunu Bɛtani na.
40021018	Ŋga nyiŋge na se bnimi kre, Yesu na ndru na shie Jerusalɛm na bnimi nyu kre na. Ki nyjila kre na klo u ta.
40021019	A wra kna mna fig tiŋge ka nya kolo mbɛɛ na, mna flo mu da ki jaara, ŋga wra da wa kre, u nsra sɛŋgɛ nya ki na, na wrɛ bribri yi tiŋge kre na. A Yesu na kna mu yo tiŋge kre pan mbo, "Ŋu waa sɛŋge sɛ na fio." Titɛɛ kre nu to, a tiŋge kre na yua mu nyaara.
40021020	Ŋga u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na kre kee ŋga nya ma kre, kra pe pe kawako ni. A pra kna na wie mbo, "Mni fig tiŋge ŋga pe mu yua titɛɛ ŋga nu ma hin?"
40021021	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, na e shↄnli, a e n e jawala pe shiin kre, kee ŋga ni pe fig tiŋge ŋga na ŋga chiin ma ee jaa pe, hali na e yo nyua ŋga pan na kↄ mu sɛ to epo nu kuraa kre, kie kↄ mbe sɛ to ki nu.
40021022	A kee ŋga ee wie nyiɛtalaa nu kpan, ee ki ta, na e shↄnli wala."
40021023	Ŋga Yesu na yiri wa kre, wra sɛ le pe suminyuŋgo wa, na leele pre nyina, a Judae sↄfue loplombo pre na pe loplombo na pan mu u wie mbo, "Ŋmbi u mu ŋga jaŋga a mna yire kee nyjɛ pini ŋga hin?"
40021024	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Mbe e wie kee nunu ka. Na e ja mu ki nyu wↄ, mbe e nyina mna ni ni jaŋga kre ta.
40021025	E ti ni e wie. Sena haa Jↄn ndrajee kre jaŋga na yiri hin? Nyiɛkpↄↄ pan kra yiri ndee lewo pan hin?" A pra kna na kakra lii na peyɛ ni mbo, "Na o yo na nyjeeri kra yiri kre, we yo o pan na, a ŋgi ki tia a e nsra u shↄnli hin?
40021026	A waa sro mbe yo na lewo pan kra yiri, o fiɛ lenɛɛrɛ pre na. Ŋgi na, pe kro na chin na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun na wi Jↄn."
40021027	A pra kna mna yo Yesu pan mbo, "O n chin." A Yesu na kna mbo, "Kena mba e nyina mna ni ni jaŋga kre ta."
40021028	A Yesu na kna mu pe wie mbo, "Mni e kee ŋga jawa hin? Blↄ wa naa bibilɛ shiin ni. Ki ble ka a wra yiri mna sɛ lopom wre da mbo, 'Ni pↄ, sɛ fali ni see wa aŋga.'
40021029	A pↄ wre na kna mu yo u lɛ pan mbo, 'Ndoo, mba sɛ!' La, wra kↄ mu u jawala chinɛ mna sɛ see kre nu.
40021030	A pe lɛ wre na sɛ shiin wo wre pan mna sɛ kee nunu kre chↄↄ yo u pan, a wre na kna mbo, 'Ndoo, mbe sɛ.' La, u nsra kↄ mu sɛ.
40021031	Kena biile mblɛ shiin ŋmbi haa wra kee ŋga u lɛ chaa pe hin?" A pra kna mbo, "Lopom wre wi." A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, lampoo shↄfɛɛnlɛ na tiɛrifɛɛnlɛ pre, lewaala pre, pie le Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nu mbe e ti.
40021032	Ŋgi na, Jↄn ndrajefun wre na pan mu e nyina kpra kolo kre, a e nsra u shↄnli. La, lampoo shↄfɛɛnlɛ pre na tiɛrifɛɛnlɛ pre na u shↄnli. E pe kpra kre nya, a e je e n e jawala chinɛ mu shↄnli."
40021033	Bawa Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "E ndie tɛɛ e yomini ŋga loo. Falifun wa wra u see tɛɛ, mna ki le kagbla mu fni, mna wee kun ki lam, ŋga nu we na tre sɛnyi simi yuwi. Mna nyuŋgo sin gedeŋge see kre lam, mna ki wru mu le tnumutunfɛɛnlɛ plɛ kɛɛ, mna sɛ waŋgra ka nu.
40021034	Ŋga sro na le kre, blↄ wre na yire mna wra sɛ kre, mna u sumifɛɛnlɛ plɛ tun u see kre lefɛɛnlɛ pre pan, mbe pe sɛ sro yɛ shↄ mbe paan u ŋga.
40021035	Ŋga pra sɛ kre, see kre lefɛɛnlɛ pre na sumifɛɛnlɛ pre yii mna nunu frↄ, mna nunu gbo, mna nunu waari na dnɛ ni.
40021036	A seefun wre na ndru mna u sumifɛɛnlɛ pre plɛ wↄ mu tun shiin wo na, pre na nɛɛ mu wɛ jle wolo pre na. A pra pe pe imi pra jle wolo pre pe kre chↄↄ.
40021037	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, a wra wre titi pↄ wↄ mu tun pe pan, wraa jawa na pie u pↄ wre shↄↄli.
40021038	Ŋga pra pↄ wre nya na u paan kre, a pra kna mna yo peyɛ pan mbo, 'Wolo, pↄ ŋmba we u lɛ wre krↄ li kre u paan kre, e pan mbe o u gbo. Kena krↄ yirɛ yire pe o wee.'
40021039	A pra pↄ wre yii mna u tini mu yili see kre lam, mna sɛ u gbo.
40021040	Kena na seefun wre waa pan, mni e jawa na we pe pe hin?"
40021041	A leele pre na kna mna yo Yesu pan mbo, "Na seefun wre titi waa pan kre, pre sisampefɛɛnlɛ pre nyini, we pe luuro pre sro peii. Mbe see kre wru mbe le lefumblↄ kɛɛ, mblɛ pie see kre le, na ki sro pan, mbe pe u ŋga nyjɛ yi fna u ta."
40021042	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "E n kee kre pe nyunↄ mu tɛɛ kre tↄↄnri mu nya tun ree? 'Dnɛ ŋga nyuŋgo sinfɛɛnlɛ pre na je na ki n nyu kre, kre ki kↄ mu pe nyuŋgo kre ndra. O Tafun Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre kepele yi nyjɛ kro, a yi pe kawako ni o pan.'
40021043	Kena e ti ni yo e pan mbe e loo, na Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre, pie ki shↄ e pan mbe sɛ waŋgra ŋga pie ki le mbe tnu pan ki nu kre ŋga ki yi.
40021044	Kena ŋmba we gbro dnɛ kre na mbe to kre we pile. A ŋmba na dnɛ kre we to kpan, kie u brɛri."
40021045	Ŋga Yesu na yomini kre gbun kre, Judae sↄfue loplombo pre na Farisiie pre na chin na pre kee u yuu.
40021046	A praa u chaa mbe yii, la, pra fiɛ lenɛɛrɛ pre na. Ŋgi na, lenɛɛrɛ pre na chin na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun wi Yesu.
40022001	Ŋga Yesu nyu na to kre, wra ndru mu pe gbun yomini fↄŋgↄ ka na mbo,
40022002	"Pan nyjeeri ŋunumu kre nyi na, ŋunu wa na chlↄ leŋge mna u pↄ ŋga. Bijam kre nu kre, pra sro pe kama mbe leele li.
40022003	Ŋunu wre na u sumifɛɛnlɛ tun mbe pe mblɛ u kɛ wa mu yeeri kre kro yeeri mbe pe paan li, a pra je, pe nsra pan.
40022004	A Ŋunu wre na ndru mna sumifɛɛnlɛ pre plɛ tun shiin wo na, mandiɛ nunu kre ni na chↄↄ mbo, 'E le, e sɛ yo mblɛ ni kɛ wa mu yeeri kre pan na ni yira kro pe mu kↄ, ni nui, na yurɛ mblɛ nu nyina gbo, mu sro kre pe kama, kena pe pan mbe paan bijam sro kre li.'
40022005	Mblɛ pra sɛ yeeri kre nsra ki wru mu pe kɛshian, wa na yiri mna sɛ u see, a wa na sɛ na u jafa lii,
40022006	a hamblɛ pre na sumifɛɛnlɛ pre yii mna pe gbun mna pe fiŋge tataara, mna pe gbo mu wa.
40022007	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, ŋunu wre krↄ na kun, kra tia wra sojae wↄ mu tun a pra sɛ linkufɛɛnlɛ pre kro gbo, mna kanhun le pe chia na mna ki sro.
40022008	Bawa ŋunu wre na kna mna yo u sumifɛɛnlɛ pre plɛ pan mbo, 'Ni bijam sro kre pe mu kↄ, a mblɛ ni kɛ wa mu yeeri kre n pe cheche na pie ki li.
40022009	Kena e sɛ lete na, mblɛ ee nya kpan, e pe yeeri mbe pe pan mbe sro kre li.'
40022010	A sumifɛɛnlɛ pre na yili mna to lete na, mna mblɛ pra nya kro yeeri, mblɛ pra nyu na pe mblɛ pe nsra nyu kro chaara, a pra pan mu bijↄ plↄ katoo kre nyi.
40022011	Ŋga ŋunu wre na yiri mbe paan fumblↄ pre le kre, wra fumblↄ pre wa nya na u n u yɛ kna na bijam lawee u paan.
40022012	Ŋga ŋunu wre na u nya ma kre, a wra kna mna yo u pan mbo, 'Awe, mni a mu n bijam dodonyi le mu pan mna ŋga hin? Mu n muyɛ pe na bijam lawee mu paan.' A blↄ wre na yire na ŋunu wre yiɛ le.
40022013	A ŋunu wre na kna mu yo u sumifɛɛnlɛ mblɛ praa wa mu yire na fumblↄ pre le kre pan mbo, 'E u yii, e u kɛnyi na u jeelee pↄ, e sɛ u wa wↄmu lawee kre nu.' Bawa leele we na nyɛni mbra pe ŋgaala chirɛ.
40022014	Ŋgi na, Nyiɛkpↄↄ we tataara yeeri la, chiɛri plɛ we wↄ."
40022015	Ŋga Yesu nyu na to kre, Farisiie pre na yili wa, mna sɛ kolo cha mbe paan u wie kebɛɛlɛ, mbe u ta mbe yii.
40022016	Farisiie pre na sɛ pe bitumblↄ wↄ mna ya Hɛrodi lekpↄɛ plɛ na, mna pe tun Yesu pan. A pra pan mu Yesu da mbo, "Nyinafun, o chin na mu pe kprafun, a mna Nyiɛkpↄↄ kolo nyina na kpra ni. A mu kee ka ma ŋga lewo we yo ni. A mu n na lewo yiɛ fiɛ.
40022017	Kena mu jawala yi ŋgi kre kee ŋga ni hin? Ki fna o tↄↄ tↄ mbe ŋunu lopom Kaisari ŋga ndee mni hin?"
40022018	La, Yesu na pe kolo sisaa ŋga praa chaa na u ni kre nya, a wra kna mbo, "Yire yiɛnyumufɛɛnlɛ, mni a e na ni piin na le ŋga hin?
40022019	E ni ŋga swa nyjɛ ni e tↄↄ toni yire ka." A pra pan na swa bie ka ni mu Yesu ŋga.
40022020	A Yesu na kna mna pe wie mbo, "Ŋmbi kumu na u mɛɛ yi swa ŋga na ŋga hin?"
40022021	A pra kna mbo, "Ŋunu lopom Kaisari wi." A Yesu na kna mbo, "Kena yirɛ nyjɛ yi pe Kaisari wee kre, e u ŋga u yirɛ. A nyjɛ yi pe Nyiɛkpↄↄ wee kre, e Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋga yi yi."
40022022	Ŋga pra Yesu kee kre loo kre, kra pe pe kawako ni, a pra u ti wa mna sɛ.
40022023	Ki ble kre lam Sadukiie mblɛ pe yuu na, na ndro ku wa jaa nyi na kre, na pan mu Yesu wie mbo,
40022024	"Nyinafun, Mbose na yo na, na lewo leŋge a u n shia se chlↄ wre na, a waa ku mu chlↄ wre ti kre, ki fna mbe u chunu u lekuchlↄ wre wru mbe leŋge, mbe se mbe gboo wre mɛɛ wa fun."
40022025	A pra kna mbo, "Kena nyjↄↄlↄ na chinlɛ kↄↄnashin plɛ praa wa mu tni mna. Jle wo wre na leŋge, a u nsra se chlↄ wre na mna ku mu u chlↄ wre ti u chunu pan.
40022026	Pan kra shiin wo wre nya na, hali mu sɛ su kↄↄnashin wo wre na.
40022027	Kre kↄkro kre, chlↄ wre na ku.
40022028	Kena kunnyiɛ ble kre, leele kↄↄnashin mblɛ, ŋmbi haa chↄ wi chlↄ wre hin? Na pe kro u leŋge mu fni."
40022029	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Na e n kee kre pe nyunↄ mu tɛɛ kre nↄↄ loo, a e n Nyiɛkpↄↄ jaŋga kre nↄↄ chin, kre ki tia e na jawa ma kre,
40022030	Ŋgi na, kunnyiɛ ble yire nu kre, ndro wa leŋge. Ndro kro we pe na nyjeeri bituŋu wi nyjeeri.
40022031	A kunnyiɛ kre kee ŋga Nyiɛkpↄↄ na yire u kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ na mu yo e pan kre, e n ki tↄↄnri tun ree?"
40022032	Mbo, "Mi wi Abraham, Isaki, na Jekↄb Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre." U n pe gboolo Nyiɛkpↄↄ, la, ŋmaafɛɛnlɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ wi.
40022033	Ŋga lenɛɛrɛ pre na kee kre loo ma kre, kee nyjɛ Yesu na pe nyina kre na pe kawako ni.
40022034	La, ŋga Farisiie pre na loo na Yesu Sadukiie pre nyu gbo kre, pre na ndru mna sɛ fni.
40022035	A pe mbra twanfun wa na pan mna Yesu wie kee ka mna u pe mu le mbo,
40022036	"Nyinafun, mbra yire nu ŋgi ki sna titi hin?"
40022037	A Yesu na kna mbo, " 'Ki fna mbe mu mu Tafun Nyiɛkpↄↄ kori na mu loloŋgo kro ni, na mu faŋga kro ni, na mu jawala kro ni.'
40022038	Kre mbra ŋga ki kpↄↄ mu sna.
40022039	A ŋga ki taa kre, pan ki nyi to na jle wo kre yi. 'Ki fna mu mu ŋmbrↄ kori, imi na mu muyɛ kori kre.' "
40022040	A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Yire mbra shiin nyjɛ ni e nyina ŋga, yire yi Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ pre mbra yire kro ndra."
40022041	Farisiie pre plɛ na fni, a Yesu na pe wie mbo,
40022042	"Mni sembremu e Kristo wre kee jawa hin? A ndro ŋmbi sele ndro wi hin?" A pra kna mbo, "Devid nana wi."
40022043	A Yesu na kna mu pe wie mbo, "Ŋgi ki tia Kpra Ŋumu wre na tia Devid na u yeeri u Tafun hin? Devid wre titi na yo mbo,
40022044	'O Tafun, Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre, na yo ni Tafun pan na, tni ni kalie, mu sɛ su nyjila ŋga mbe ti mu mu jeelee taa mu loŋgoolo na.'
40022045	Na Devid wre titi Kristo wre yeeri ni Tafun, kena mni ki kↄ mu pe, a u pan mu pe u nana hin?"
40022046	Ŋga Yesu na kre kee kre wie kre, ndro nsra ja mu ki nyu wↄ, a mu yire kre ble kre ndro nsra u wie kee ka na fio.
40023001	Bawa Yesu na paara u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na lenɛɛrɛ pre pan mbo,
40023002	"Mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre na Farisiie pre, Mbose titɛɛ pe nyi mu tni na u mbra yire nyina.
40023003	Kena e ndie tɛɛ pe pan, e li nyjɛ pe e nyina kre na, la, yaa taa pe kepelee na. Ŋgi na, pe paara na e nyina, la, pre titi na taa nyjɛ pe e nyina yire na.
40023004	Pe tuuro nyjɛ leele wa ja pↄ mu pe tio, a pia kɛ le pe pan mbe pe wuu.
40023005	Pe chaa kee nyjɛ pe piin kro mbe leele na yi nyaa. Ŋgi na, pe Nyiɛkpↄↄ nyu kee nyunↄ mu le hlɛ nu, mu yi fra mu pↄ pe nduweele na, na pe kɛnyi na, mu yirɛ pↄ mu hlu pe dodonyi nyu na.
40023006	A na pe sɛ lenɛɛrɛ fninlihaa nu kre, kpↄↄmu lawee pe chaa. A na pe sɛ fninyinyi nu kre, tni hɛɛ chichiele nu pe jiin,
40023007	na lete shaaraa chaa, na chaa mbe leele na pe yeeri nyinafɛɛnlɛ.
40023008	La, yire rɛ, yaa ti mbe pra e yeeri nyinafɛɛnlɛ. Ŋgi na, e nyinafun wree nunu, a e kro ndra yila, nyjↄↄlↄ na chinlɛ lɛ e kro.
40023009	A yaa ndro wa yeeri, 'O lɛ' tra ŋga na. Ŋgi na, e Lɛ wree nunu chom, ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre.
40023010	A yaa ti mbe pra e yeeri yiɛkulo. Ŋgi na? E yiɛklo wree nunu, wre wi Kristo wre.
40023011	Kena ŋmba u pe lekpↄↄ e nu kre, u pe e kro tnu.
40023012	La, ŋmba we uyɛ kpↄↄ kre, pie u pe fiɛn. A ŋmba we uyɛ nyjii kre, pie ufun kpↄↄ.
40023013	Yire Judae mbra nyina fɛɛnlɛ na Farisiie, yiɛnyumufɛɛnlɛ, e atɛ. Ŋgi ndra na? E nyjeeri ŋunumu kre kolo tↄ leele na, a yire titi wa sɛ ki nu. A yaa leele mblɛ pie sɛ kre ŋga kolo. E eyɛ pe na e pe cheche mu wɛ ndro kro na, na yiree lete na na nyiɛtali titnↄŋↄ, a nde e lekuchiɛlɛ yirɛ juu pe kalonyi nu. Ki tia e sisam fↄtↄↄrↄ we kpↄↄ.
40023015	Yire Judae mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ, na Farisiie, yiɛnyumufɛɛnlɛ, e atɛ. E nyaari na shie lee, mbe sɛ ndro nunu chom cha mbe u jawala chinɛ mbe u pe na yire lɛ, a na e u ta mu kↄ kre, mbe ufun sisam fↄtↄↄrↄ kpↄↄ mbe wɛ e na.
40023016	Fuunlo lɛ yire, a e na leele nyina kolo, e atɛ. Yire e yuu leele pan na, na ndro suminyuŋgo kre da na we yaka pe, a u n ja mu ki pe kre, ki n shian, la, na ndro swa nyiɛ ŋga kii wa suminyuŋgo wa kre da kre, kena ufun fna mbe ti u nyu kee pe yɛŋgɛ.
40023017	Fuunlo jijiele lɛ yire, yirɛ shiin nyjɛ, ŋgi ki wɛ ŋgi na hin? Suminyuŋgo ŋga nu swa nyiɛ kre nyi mu ki pe cheche kre ki wɛ, ndee swa nyiɛ kre yi hin?
40023018	Yire chↄↄ e leele nyina na, na wa sra gbunu kre da, ki n shian na we li u nyu kee na, la, na ndro yirɛ nyjɛ pe taa sra gbunu kre na kre da kre, kena ufun fna mbe li u nyu kee na.
40023019	Fuunlo mblɛ, ŋgi haa ki wɛ ŋgi na hin? Sra yirɛ yire yi wɛ ndee, sra gbunu ŋga na pe yirɛ yire taari mbe ki ti yi pe cheche kre yi hin?
40023020	Kena e ti ni yo e pan mbe e loo na, ŋmba we sra gbunu kre da kpan, kena u kre na yirɛ nyjɛ pe taa ki na kre kro da.
40023021	Kena ŋmba we suminyuŋgo kre da kpan, kena u kre na ŋmba u jiin ki nu kre kro da.
40023022	A ŋmba we nyjeeri da kpan, kena u Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋujↄↄn kre na Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre titi da.
40023023	Yire Judae mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ na Farisiie, yiɛnyumufɛɛnlɛ, e atɛ. Ŋgi na, e kagblɛ yirɛ chiɛri nyjɛ e taa kre, e yi yↄↄlɛ kɛ mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋga nunu kama, la, u mbra kee nyjɛ yi sna titi kre e yire wa, yire yi kpra kↄↄn, fooro chiɛn na shↄnlie. Yire kee nyjɛ yi fna e naa piin mbe ya.
40023024	Yire fuunlo mblɛ na shunshun to e simi nu, e wre woni na waa la, na nyuuma to e simi nu kre, e na wre wↄ mbe wa, e wre juru.
40023025	Yire Judae mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ na Farisiie, yiɛnyumufɛɛnlɛ, e atɛ. Yire e e gbↄ yirɛ na e taahɛɛ krↄ jee mbe yi lam ti, e juuro yirɛ na jajaara yirɛ le yi lam a yi nyi.
40023026	Yire Farisiie fuunlo, e e gbↄ yirɛ na e taahɛɛ lam je tun, e chin e yi krↄɛ je.
40023027	Yire Judae mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ na Farisiie, yiɛnyumufɛɛnlɛ, e atɛ. Pan e nyi na fanyi nyjɛ pe faanri mu yi fniŋge na penti ni yi, yi nyu fimi na kama, la, gboolo kajle na kafuɛn bribri yi yi lam.
40023028	Kena leele yiɛ na kre, e fraka kama, la, yiɛnyumu kee na sisam bribri yi e lam nyi.
40023029	Yire Judae mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ na Farisiie, yiɛnyumufɛɛnlɛ, e atɛ. Yire e fawolo Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ mblɛ pra fraka a pra pe gbo gbo kre fanyi faanri, mu yi lam san kama.
40023030	Na yuu na, na o naa wa o tolɛɛlɛ pre nyjila, waa na chaa mblɛ pra Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ mblɛ gbo gbo kre nu.
40023031	Na e tolɛɛlɛ lɛ mblɛ pra Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ pre gbo kre, kena e nyu kee e dansiɛrɛ li mu e taan.
40023032	Kena kee nyjɛ e tolɛɛlɛ na pe kre, e yi taa e pe.
40023033	Leesaala, na leesaala biile, mni ee pe mbe shↄ mbe pia sɛ na e ni kanyana kanhun kre nu hin?"
40023034	A Yesu na kna mbo, "E ti ni yo e pan mbe e loo, mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ, na kachimblɛ, na nyinafɛɛnlɛ tun mbe pe pan e pan, mbe e plɛ gbo gbo, mbe plɛ kan kanyana kumu kaan na, a ee plɛ frↄ e fni nyinyi nu, mbe e pe ni mbe pe yili chia na mbe sɛ chia na.
40023035	Kena mu yire Abɛl na mu sɛ su Zakaria, Barachia pↄ ŋmba e tolɛɛlɛ na gbo sra gbuɛnlɛɛ yire na suminyuŋgo kre lalaa kre, na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ mblɛ pra gbo finfin kre kro, pe hakɛɛ wa e na.
40023036	Kpra na ni yuu e pan, pre leele mblɛ krɛrɛ hakɛɛ wa e na.
40023037	Jerusalɛm leele, yire e Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ yii mu gbo gbo mu leele mblɛ pe tun e pan waari na dnɛ ni. Nyjila kro nu ni chaa mbe e yii mbe le kuɛn jaara, imi na ŋgolo u biile leni u kuɛn jaara kre, a e je.
40023038	Ki tia mba e shↄ na.
40023039	Kpra na ni yuu e pan, yaa ni nya na fio, fↄna ŋga ble ee na yuu na, 'Ŋmba u paan o Tafun mɛɛ nu kre wo yi dwamu kre bↄkↄ.' "
40024001	Ŋga Yesu na yili suminyuŋgo kre nu na shie kre, u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na pan u jaara mna kna na u nyina suminyuŋgo kre.
40024002	A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "E yirɛ nyjɛ krɛrɛ nyaa. Kpra na ni yuu e pan na pie yi krɛɛrɛ juari mbe wo, dnɛ ka n wa mbe pe ki ti ki ŋmbrↄ na."
40024003	Yesu na yiri wa mna sɛ tni Olive nyua kre na, bawa u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na pan u jaara wa mna u wie brɛmm mbo, "Jande, o nyina nyjila ŋga nu yire kee nyjɛ krɛrɛ we pan, na kee nyjɛ yie pe mu paan shiin wo kre nu. A na waŋgra kre waa na paan mbe kↄ kre, kee nyji yie pe hin?"
40024004	A Yesu na kna mbo, "E le, e eyɛ dↄↄ ta mbe ndro wa e fana.
40024005	Ŋgi na, leele tataara we pan na ni mɛɛ ni, mbra yuu na, 'Mi wi Kristo wre.' A pie leele tataara wa mbe fun.
40024006	Ee nya na waŋgra na waŋgra, na chia na chia tuni, mbra kakrↄɛ kee ndru, a la, yaa shia fiɛ. Ŋgi na, yire kee nyjɛ krɛrɛ fna mbe pan. La, yire nyjila kre, na nyjila kre n ta mu da tun.
40024007	Waŋgra we yiri mbe wi na waŋgra ni, mbe ŋunu na ŋunu to peyɛ na, mbe klo to waŋgra nu, mbe tra na seeri lawee lawee nu. Na chlↄ yo we se, imi na lɛɛ klu na u yaa kre, pan yire kee nyjɛ we yiɛ klu mbe pe.
40024009	Yire ble yire nu pie e yii mbe leele ŋga mbe pe e fiŋge, mbe e gbo. Mi ndra na, waŋgra leele kro we e pra.
40024010	Kre nyjila kre nu tataara we laa pe shↄnlie kro, mbe pe ŋmbilɛ wↄ mbe ŋga, mbe pe ŋmbilɛ pra.
40024011	Kre nyjila kre kafinɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ tataara we yiri mbe lenɛɛrɛ wa mbe fun.
40024012	Kre nyjila kre nu leele ndra we sheli kpↄↄ, mbe ki ti lewo koroo wa jaa sna.
40024013	La, ŋmba we jaa frↄ ta kee nyjɛ krɛrɛ nu kre, we ŋmaa ta.
40024014	A Nyjeeri ŋunumu kre ketaan kre we kpali mbe tro waŋgra kro nu, mbe pe dansiɛrɛ, mbe waŋgra nyukↄↄnrↄ chiin pan.
40024015	'Kena na e waa afuŋgo kee ŋga ki lawee jee kre nya cheche lawee kre nu', ŋga kee Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun Daniel na yo mu tɛɛ kre, kena e ti mbe tↄↄnrifun wre, mbe u kee kre nↄↄ loo.
40024016	Mbe e ti mblɛ pee wa Judea na kre na feni mbra nyua ndru.
40024017	A ŋmba uu wa nyuŋgo ndra na kre, waa shia tii mbe le katoo lam mbe yaka wru.
40024018	A ŋmba uu wa see kre, waa shia ndru mbe pan katoo mbe u yoŋgo bali.
40024019	Yire ble yire nu chiɛlɛ lɛɛfɛɛnlɛ, na mblɛ biile pee fiɛnfiɛn kre, pe atɛ.
40024020	Kena e nyiɛtali mbe kre ble kre waa shia pan weere nyjila na wuuble nu.
40024021	Yaka ndra na ma, ki ble kre we pe kanyana ble kpↄↄ, mu yire waŋgra gbeele nyjila ki ka n da mu pan tun, a ka waa pan ma na fio.
40024022	Nyiɛkpↄↄ we ka kun kanyana ble yire na. Na u n ka kun yi na kre, wa ndro nunu chom ta. Ki tia u yila mblɛ u wↄ kre na, mbe ka kun ble yire na.
40024023	Kena na ndro waa yo e pan mbo, 'E le, Kristo wre wi kre, ndee Kristo wre wi wa kre', yaa shia ufun shↄ mbe li.
40024024	Ŋgi na, kafinɛ Kristoe na kafinɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ we yiri yire ble yire nu, mbe kebadɛnyi na kawako kee pe mbe yire yi na mbe lenɛɛrɛ wa mbe fun. Hali mblɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre wↄ kre kuraa, na pie ja, pie pe fana.
40024025	E loo, kre na ni klu na ki yuu e pan mbe nyjila kre chiin da.
40024026	Kena na pe waa yo e pan na e le, uu wa fimi lawee yire nu kre, yaa shia yili mbe sɛ wa. Ndee na pe waa yo e pan na, e le, uu wa mu uyɛ ndra lawee ka nu mna wa kre, yaa shia ki shↄ mbe li.
40024027	Kena imi na nyiɛ nyini yila finhaa mbe nya yila tohaa kre, pan Lewo Pↄ wre paan kre we pe.
40024028	A mna kaara gboo nyi kre, bawa kↄkↄsachie fni.
40024029	Kena na kanyana ble kpↄɛ yire nyu waa to, ndram we wↄ lawee kro nu, a nyiɛpↄ wa jaa fniŋge na, mbe wↄɛlɛɛ na klↄ nyjeeri mbra tuuri tra. Mbe jaŋga ŋga kii wa nyjeeri kro na seeri.
40024030	Bawa pie kee ŋga kie pe Lewo Pↄ wre paan nu kre nya nyjeeri. Kre nu waŋgra ŋga leele kro we nyɛni, a pie Lewo Pↄ wre nya na u paan jaŋga na yɛnyiŋge kpↄↄ ni tloe nu.
40024031	Kre nu we u nyjeeri bitumblↄ tun mbe pe bnↄ badaaŋga fↄ mbe paan u wolo mblɛ u wↄ kre wↄ mbe yili waŋgra kokoe jijirɛ yire nu, mbe sɛ su ki nyukↄↄnrↄ na.
40024032	E fig tiŋge kre yomini kre twan. Na e waa nya na ki wrɛ nyaara kre, kena e chin na ndram wrɛm nyjila dani.
40024033	Kena na e waa nya na yire kee nyjɛ waa na pini kre, kena e chin na nyjila kre dani, kre nyjila kre na ki mbra e na kuraa mu kↄ.
40024034	Kpra na ni yuu e pan, fuŋga leele mblɛ wa kↄ, fↄna yire kee nyjɛ ni yuu ŋga krɛɛrɛ pe tun.
40024035	Nyjeeri na tra we kla, la, ni nyu kee nyjɛ ni yuu ŋga wa pe finfin.
40024036	A ble kre na nyjila kre, ndro n ki chin, nyjeeri bitumblↄ pre n ki chin, hali Nyiɛkpↄↄ Pↄ wre titi kuraa n ki chin, fↄna ni Lɛ wre chiin bↄkↄ.
40024037	Imi na Noa nyjila kre, nyjila ŋga ni nyumu nsra ta mu tra yiɛ tↄ kre,
40024038	na leele kaa, na gboo, a chiɛlɛ na bilɛ naa peyɛ leŋgei, mna sɛ su ŋga ble Noa na le krↄ kre nu.
40024039	Leele nsra chin ŋga ki piin, bawa pra nyi a nyiɛ na pan a lↄↄɛ na nyi mna pe wru peii. Pan chↄↄ Lewo Pↄ wre pan ble kre we leele fo.
40024040	Kre nyjila kre, leele shiin we pe see, mbe pe sɛ nunu wru mbe haŋu wre ti.
40024041	Chiɛlɛ shiin we na yirɛ suu mbe pe nunu wru mbe nunu ti.
40024042	Kena e e ye le chichie. Ŋgi na, Na e n chin ŋga ble e Tafun wre we pan.
40024043	Kena e jawa e chin na, na katoofun na chin ŋga nyjila juo we pan u katoo kre, we na u shie, wa na tni mbra le, mbe pe paan u katoo juari mbe le ki nu.
40024044	Kena yire, e eyɛ shie. Ŋgi na, Lewo Pↄ wre we pan nyjila ŋga ni e n na u kra nu.
40024045	Kena ŋmbi u pe sumifun kprafun, mu pe kachiŋu hin? Wre fun wi ŋmba u tafun we wↄ mbe tɛɛ u katoo sumifɛɛnlɛ kro nyu na, mbe kolo kun, mbe wra pe le mbra pe kaan sro nyjila ŋga ni ki fna nu.
40024046	Na u ja mu pe le, a u tafun wre waa ndru mu pan kre, we dwamu ta u pan.
40024047	Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, na ki pan ma kre, we u tɛɛ u katoo yirɛ kro nyu na.
40024048	La, na sumifun wre waa pe lewo sisaa, maa jawa na u tafun wre mu titi,
40024049	maa sun kre na mu na u ŋmbilɛ sumifɛɛnlɛ pre gbuun, a wre na gbↄgbↄↄlↄ waa na chaa na lii na gboo na tro kre,
40024050	u tafun wre we pan mbe u fo, nyjila ŋga ni u n na u kra nu.
40024051	Bawa we u ndie tini, mbe sɛ u wa yiɛnyumufɛɛnlɛ pre lawee, bawa we nyɛni, mbe kala nya tataara.
40025001	Yire ble yire nu, pie nyjeeri ŋunumu kre wru mbe gbun bichabɛɛlɛ kɛ mblɛ pra pe kaniɛ wru mna sɛ bijↄplↄ wre fni haa kre ni.
40025002	Bichabɛɛlɛ pre kunↄ na daŋga, a pe kunↄ hamblɛ pre na pe kachimblɛ.
40025003	Kena ŋga jijiele pre na pe kaniɛ wru kre, pe nsra simi wru mu ya.
40025004	La, kachimblɛ pre na simi wru mu le yirɛ nu mu ya pe kaniɛ na.
40025005	A bijↄplↄ wre nsra pan yaari. Ki tia pra gbunu chiin mna kↄ na ŋunu.
40025006	Kie pe ndroo nyjila kɛmbↄshiin kre, leele na gble le mbo, 'E le, bijↄplↄ wre paan! E yiri, e u fni!'
40025007	A bichabɛɛlɛ pre na tin mu yiri na pe kaniɛ gbeele,
40025008	bawa jijiele pre na kna mu yo kachimblɛ pre pan mbo, 'E jande, e o ŋga simi mbe o le o kaniɛ nu. Na kre ma, yie fii.'
40025009	A kachimblɛ pre na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, 'Yia o kro da, kena e sɛ mblɛ pe yi prɛ kre pan e sɛ ka cha e lↄ.'
40025010	Ŋga bichabɛɛlɛ pre na sɛ simi cha haa kre, bijↄplↄ wre na pan pe kro, a wre na mblɛ pra peyɛ kna na u sri kre na sɛ le nyuŋgo ŋga nu pra bijam sro pe mu tɛɛ kre nu, mna krↄ kan.
40025011	Praa wa wa maa, a bichabɛɛlɛ jijiele pre na pan, mna pan na krↄ koorii mbo, 'Ndoo, Ndoo, jande, o nyaa!'
40025012	Bawa wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, 'E laa ni na, ni n e chin.'
40025013	Kena e eyɛ kna, e na sri, na e n ble kre na nyjila kre chin.
40025014	Pan ki nyi na, blↄ wa kolo kuun mbe sɛ haka, mu u sumifɛɛnlɛ yeeri mu pan u jaara, mna u yirɛ wru mu le pe kɛɛ.
40025015	Wra sumifɛɛnlɛ pre kro ŋga u yirɛ mbe praa le. Wra nunu ŋga swa talɛnti kunↄ, mna nunu ŋga shiin, mna taarɛwo wre ŋga nunu, imi pe kro we jaa le mbe da. Mna to kolo mu sɛ.
40025016	Ŋmba wra ŋga swa talɛnti kunↄ kre na sɛ jafa li na ki ni, mna kunↄ ta mu ya ki na.
40025017	Pan chↄↄ ŋmba wra ŋga shiin kre na sɛ jafa li na ki ni mna shiin ta mu ja u wo na.
40025018	A ŋmba wra ŋga nunu kre na sɛ tra uu mna ki le.
40025019	Pe tafun wre na mu mna chin mu pan, a wre na u sumifɛɛnlɛ pre na fni, a wra pe wie nyjɛ pe pe na pe swa yire ni.
40025020	Bawa ŋmba pe tafun wre na ŋga talɛnti kunↄ kre na pan mu talɛnti kunↄ ya ŋga pra u ŋga kre na, mna kna mbo, 'Ni tafun, talɛnti kunↄ mna ni ŋga, a ni pe mu talɛnti kunↄ ta mu ya ki na.'
40025021	A u tafun wre na kna mna yo u pan mbo, 'Lefↄ! Sumifun chichie kprafun. Ŋga mu swa chiɛri ŋga kpra li ŋga, mbe mu wru mbe tɛɛ yirɛ nɛɛrɛ nyu na. Kena pan mbe ŋu na mu tafun wre yiɛshↄ.'
40025022	A ŋmba wra ŋga talɛnti shiin kre na pan mna yo u tafun wre pan mbo, 'Ni tafun, talɛnti shiin mna ni ŋga, a ni pe mu talɛnti shiin ta mu ya ki na.'
40025023	A u tafun wre na kna mbo, 'Lefↄ! Sumifun chichie kpralifun, ŋga mu swa chiɛri ŋga kpra li ŋga, mbe mu tɛɛ yirɛ nɛɛrɛ nyu na. Kena pan mbe ŋu na mu tafun wre yiɛshↄ.'
40025024	A ŋmba wra ŋga talɛnti nunu kre na pan mna yo u pan mbo, 'Ni tafun, ni mu chin na mu pe pↄↄrↄfun, mna mu n luu kuraa mu kuun wa, a mna mu n yira tɛɛ kuraa mu ja na wrui na dani wa.
40025025	Ki tia ŋga mna ni ŋga swa kre, fiɛrɛ na ni yii, a ndaa sɛ ki le wee, kena mu yira ye.'
40025026	A u tafun wre na kna mbo, 'Ndro sisaa titi wi ŋu. Mu gbashia kpↄↄ. Mu chin na ni kuun mna ndaa luu, na kolii mna ni n tɛɛ.
40025027	Na mna wa jin ki yi, ŋga ni pan ŋga, mbe na ki ta, mbra tnu ta ki nu.'
40025028	Bawa u tafun wre na kna mbo, 'E ki shↄ u kɛɛ, e ki wru e ya talɛnti kɛfun wre pan.
40025029	Ŋgi na, Ŋmba uu ka ni mu ki le chichie kre, pie ka ya u pan mbe u ta nɛɛrɛ, la, ŋmba pan fiɛn nyi a u n ki le chiriri kre, ŋga kii wa u pan kre kuraa pie ki shↄ u kɛɛ.
40025030	Kena sumifun lewaa wre, e sɛ u wa wↄmu lawee kre nu, bawa leele we nyɛni, mbe kala nya tataara.'
40025031	Kena na Lewo Pↄ wre na nyjeeri bitumblↄ pre waa pan u yɛnyiŋge kre nu kre, kre nu we paan tni u ŋujↄↄn kre na.
40025032	Kre nu waŋgra leele kro we paan fni u yiɛ. Bawa we pe yↄↄlɛ imi na mbaala lefun u mbaala na u sikaala yↄↄlɛ kre,
40025033	mbe u mbaala pre tɛɛ u kalie kɛ, mbe sikaala pre tɛɛ u kamɛŋɛ.
40025034	Bawa Ŋunu wre we kna mbe yo mblɛ pee wa u kalie kre pan mbo, 'Yire mblɛ ni Lɛ dwan kre, e pan e ŋunumu ŋga pe gbeele mu tɛɛ e pan mu yire waŋgra gbeele nyjila kre wru e li.
40025035	Ŋgi na klo na ni ta, a e na ni ŋga sro a ndaa li a gbↄↄ na ni ta, a e na ni ŋga nyumu a ndaa gbↄ, a ndaa fuŋum li, a e na ni wru mu sɛ katoo.
40025036	Ndaa tro wejiwaara, a e na ni tↄ yoŋgo, a ndaa yaa a e na sɛ ni shaari, a pra ni le nyuŋgo, a e na sɛ ni le.'
40025037	Bawa mblɛ pe pe cheche kre we kna mbe pe Tafun wre wie mbo, 'Ŋgi ble o na mu nya na klo mu ta a o na mu ŋga sro hin? Ndee a gbↄↄ na mu ta a o na mu ŋga nyumu a mna gbↄ hin?
40025038	Ndee ŋgi ble o na mu nya na mu fuŋum lii a o na mu tio mu sɛ katoo hin? Ndee mna mu nya na mu to wejiwaara a e na mu tↄ yoŋgo hin?
40025039	Ndee ŋgi ble o na mu nya nyuŋgo, ndee na mu yaa a o na sɛ mu shaari hin?'
40025040	Bawa Ŋunu wre we kna mbe yo pe pan mbo, 'Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, imi na e pe mu ni chinlɛ fiɛn fiɛn mblɛ wa ŋga kre, mi e pe mu ŋga kre.'
40025041	Mbe Ŋunu wre kna mbe yo mblɛ u kamɛŋɛ kre pan na, 'E laa ni na! Nyiɛkpↄↄ suŋgↄ e yii. E laa ni na. E sɛ ble nyini kanhun ŋga pe gbeele mu tɛɛ Sutna na u nyjeeri bitumblↄ pan kre nu.
40025042	Ŋgi na, Ŋga klo na ni ta, e nsra ni ŋga yaka a ndaa ka; gbↄↄ na ni ta, e nsra ni ŋga nyumu a ndaa gbↄ.
40025043	Ŋga ndaa fuŋum lii, e nsra ni wru mu sɛ katoo, a ŋga ndaa tro wejiwaara, e nsra ni tↄ yoŋgo; a ŋga ndaa yaa, na ŋga pra ni yii mna sɛ le nyuŋgo kre, e nsra ni shaari.'
40025044	Bawa pre we kna mbo, 'O Tafun, nyjila ŋgi nu o na mu nya na klo mu ta, ndee na gbↄↄ mu ta, ndee na mu fuŋum lii, ndee na mu tro wejiwaara, ndee na mu yaa, ndee na pe mu yii mu le nyuŋgo, a o nsra mu le hin?'
40025045	Bawa we kna mbe yo pe pan mbo, 'Kpra na ni yuu e pan, ŋga e n pe mu fiɛn fiɛn mblɛ wa ŋga kre, e n yaka pe mu ni ŋga.'
40025046	Bawa pie flo u jaara mbe sɛ ble nyini kanyana kre nu, la, mblɛ pe fraka kre we sɛ ble nyini ŋmaa kre nu."
40026001	Ŋga Yesu na yire kee nyjɛ krɛɛrɛ yo mu kↄ kre, wra kna mna yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo,
40026002	"E chin na ki kro ble shiin mbe pe klɛntro ble kre lii? A pie Lewo Pↄ wre wↄ mbe le leele kɛɛ mbe pe u kan kanyana kumu kaan na."
40026003	Kre nyjila kre nu na Judae sↄfue loplombo pre na pe loplombo pre sɛ fni sↄfue lopom titi wre, ŋmba praa yeeri Kaiafas wre katoo.
40026004	Bawa praa kolo chaa ŋga na pie tro mbe Yesu ta mbe yii brɛmm mbe sɛ u gbo mbe ndro wa chin ki nu.
40026005	Pra yo na pia u yii ble kpↄɛ yire nu, na kre ma, lenɛɛrɛ pre we tun na ni.
40026006	Ŋga Yesu na le Bɛtani na kre, wra sɛ le Siimↄn, yiranyiɛrɛfun wre katoo.
40026007	Bawa chlↄ wa na pan na Alabasta gbolo ka ni, na tlade ndiom taan ndrↄ shelee wo kaa wa ki nu. Na Yesu wa mu tni na lii, a wra ki kna mna wo u ndra na.
40026008	Ŋga Yesu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na ki nya kre, pe krↄ na kun na chlↄ wre ni. A pra kna mna chlↄ wre wie mbo, "Mni a mu tlade ŋga kla finfin ŋga hin?
40026009	Mu na jaa ki prɛ mbra swa nɛɛrɛ shↄ, mbra shianfɛɛnlɛ ŋga"
40026010	Yesu na kee nyjɛ praa chaa mbe yo kre chin, a wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Mni a e na chlↄ wre hau ma ŋga hin? U kee chiriri pe mu ni ŋga.
40026011	Yire na shianfɛɛnlɛ pre lɛ mna nyjila kro nu, la, nyjila kro nu ma ee mi ta e jaara.
40026012	U tlade ŋga kna mu wo ni na, mu ki tɛɛ mu ni wejiŋge gbeele kama, mbe pe chiin ni le wee.
40026013	Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, waŋgra ŋga nu, mna pie ketaan kre kpali kpan, pie chlↄ ŋmba kee ŋga u pe ŋga yo mbe tɛɛ mbe u sↄↄnri."
40026014	Bawa twanfɛɛnlɛ pre nunu ŋmba praa yeeri Judas Iskariↄt, wre na sɛ Judae sↄfue loplombo pre pan,
40026015	mna sɛ yo mbo, "Na ni Yesu wre wↄ mu e ŋga yira ŋgi ee ni ŋga hin?" Ŋga wra yo ma kre, a pra swa fiŋge tↄↄnri nununu fulo na kɛ mna u ŋga.
40026016	Mu yire kre nyjila kre krɛɛrɛ, Judas naa Yesu kolo chaa mbe u ta, mbe pe u yii.
40026017	Ŋga ble nyjɛ nu pe nsraa yiisi paanu kaa yire na da kre, Yesu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na pan mu wie mbo, "O Tafun, sena haa mu chaa mbe o sɛ gbeele mu pan mbe mu sɛ klɛntro ble yire li hin?"
40026018	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "E sɛ chia ŋga kii wa e yɛsimi ŋga na, blↄ waa wa wa, e yo u pan na, 'Nyinafun wre yo na u nyjila kre mbra mna, a mu katoo mna wre na u twanfɛɛnlɛ we klɛntro ble yire li.' "
40026019	A twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na sɛ ŋga wra yo pe sɛ pe kre pe, mna lawee kre gbeele kama mbe pe sɛ klɛntro ble yire li.
40026020	Ki ble kre yilakↄŋgↄ, Yesu na le chia kre na, a wre na u twanfɛɛnlɛ kɛmbↄshiin pre na sɛ tni na lii.
40026021	Ŋga praa lii kre, Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Kpra na ni yuu e pan na e wa we ni wↄ mbe ŋga?"
40026022	Ŋga wra yo ma kre, fooro na pe kro yii, a pra kna na u wie nununu mbo, "Ni Tafun, mi wi ree?"
40026023	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Ŋmba mi na wre kɛ leni kotolo na lii kre we ni wↄ mbe ŋga.
40026024	Lewo Pↄ wre we ku, imi na pe ki nyunↄ mu tɛɛ kre, la, ŋmba we Lewo Pↄ wre wↄ mbe ŋga kre, u atɛ. Na pe nsra ufun wre se kuraa prↄ."
40026025	Bawa Judas ŋmba wra u wↄ mu ŋga kre na yiri mbo, "Nyinafun mi wi ree?" A Yesu na kna mbo, "Mu nyuu ki yili."
40026026	Ŋga praa wa mu tni na lii kre, Yesu na paanu wru mna ki dwan mna ki pile mu u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre ŋga, mna kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "E shↄ e ka, ŋga yi ni wejiŋge."
40026027	A wra gbↄ yira wru mu yii, mna Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋga mboo, mna pe ŋga ki yi mbo, "E kro, e shↄ e gbↄ!
40026028	Kre yi ni nyimi ŋga ni Nyiɛkpↄↄ nyu nunu fↄŋgↄ kre pini, mbe ki kna mbe wo mbe lenɛɛrɛ ŋga, mbe pe sisam tinkɛɛ ta.
40026029	E ti ni yo mbe e loo, mba tre sɛnyi simi ŋga ka gbↄ na fio, fↄŋga ble o kro we fni mbe ki gbↄ na ni Lɛ wre ŋunumu kre nu.
40026030	A pra mɛɛ kↄ mna yiri mna sɛ Olive nyua kre na."
40026031	Bawa Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "E kro we fɛ mbe ni ti blee ŋga. Ŋgi na, pe ki nyunↄ mu tɛɛ na, 'Nyiɛkpↄↄ we mbaala lefun wre gbo, mbe mbaala pre fɛ mbe nyina.'
40026032	La, na ndaa nyi kre, mbe yiɛklu e na mbra shie Galilii na."
40026033	A Pita na kna mbo, "Pe kro we fɛ mbe laa mu kro, la, mba fɛ fio."
40026034	A Yesu na kna mna yo Pita pan mbo, "Kpra na ni yuu mu pan na ŋgopilɛ wa nyɛni, na mu ni je gbee nununu taarɛ."
40026035	A Pita na kna mbo, "Na ki pan kumu kuraa kre, mi na ŋu we ku, mba mu je fio." Pan chↄↄ twanfɛɛnlɛ hamblɛ pre na yo na.
40026036	A Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na yiri wa mna sɛ lawee ka nu, praa ki yeeri Gɛtsɛmani, bawa wra yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo, "E tni mna e ni shie, mbe ni sɛ yiɛ chiɛri mbe sɛ nyiɛtali mbe pan."
40026037	A wra Pita na Zebedii biile shiin pre wru mna ya uyɛ na, a fooro na u yii, a u jawala na kla.
40026038	A wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Fooro ni yii kpↄↄ na shie kumu nu, kena yire e tni mna e na ni sri, yaa shia ŋunu."
40026039	A Yesu na pe ti wa mna sɛ yiɛ chiɛri, mna sɛ yiɛ juule tra mna nyiɛtali mbo, "Ndoo, na kie ja kre, ti mbe kanyana ŋga ni tro mbe sɛ, imi na mi chaa ma, la, imi na ŋu chaa."
40026040	Ŋga wra ndru mna pan mna wra twanfɛɛnlɛ pre ti kre, na pe ŋunu, a wra kna mna Pita wie mbo, "Kena e n ja mu ni shie nyjila chiɛri kuraa?
40026041	E jande, e gbeŋmba e eyɛ yii, e na nyiɛtali, mbe yaa to nyu chaara nu. Ŋumu chaa, la, faŋga n wa."
40026042	Yesu na ndru mu pe ti wa mna sɛ nyiɛtali shiin wo na mbo, "Ndoo, na mu chin na kanyana ŋga nyini wa jaa tro, fↄna mbe ki nya kre, kena ŋga mu chaa ki pe."
40026043	Ŋga Yesu na ndru mu pan na kre, na pe sni na ŋunu, a ŋunumu kre wɛ pe na kuraa.
40026044	A wra pe ti mu ndru mu sɛ nyiɛtali taarɛ wo na, kee nunu kre chↄↄ wra yo na.
40026045	Ŋga wra sɛ mu pan kre, a wra yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo, "Ee wa mu sni na ŋunu, na wuui tɛɛ? E le, nyjila kre da, mbe pe Lewo Pↄ wre wↄ mbe le sisampefɛɛnlɛ kɛɛ.
40026046	E yiri mbe o na shie, ŋmba we ni wↄ mbe ŋga kre da mna."
40026047	Ŋga Yesu naa wa mu na paara to, a twanfɛɛnlɛ pre nunu ŋmba praa yeeri Judas Iskariↄt wre na da mu yire, na leele ni tataara, na pe brↄfiɛnlɛ na vɛɛn ni kɛɛ. Pe kro na yiri sↄfue loplombo pre na pe loplombo pre pan.
40026048	Kre nyjila kre, na ŋmba we Yesu wↄ mbe ŋga kre klu mu nyina na, "Ŋmba nyu mbe shiun kre, wre wi."
40026049	A wra tin, mna pan mu Yesu yii mbo, "Nyinafun, lefↄ!" to, mna u nyu shiun.
40026050	A Yesu na kna mna yo u pan mbo, "Awe, ŋgi pan mu pan mna hin?" Ŋga Yesu na yo ma to, a leele pre na u yii.
40026051	A mblɛ na Yesu praa nyaari kre wa na u brↄfiɛn tini mu foli, mna sↄfue loplombo pre wa tnu ndie cheeri mu kun.
40026052	A Yesu na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Mu brↄfiɛn kre le ki afoo nu. Ŋgi na, ŋmba we brↄfiɛn tini u ŋmbrↄ na kre, brↄfiɛn nyu na we ku.
40026053	Mu n chin na mbe jaa ni Lɛ tali mbe u ni ŋga nyjeeri bitumblↄ mbe pe wɛ kagbeŋ fuloe taarɛ na kɛ na, mbe paan wi na leele mblɛ ni ree?
40026054	La, na ki pan ma kre, kee kre pe nyunↄ mu tɛɛ kre wa pe kpra, kena pan ki fna mbe pan."
40026055	Kre nyjila kre nu Yesu na yo lenɛɛrɛ pre pan mbo, "E pan ni pan na brↄfiɛnlɛ na vɛɛn ni na kokↄↄn yii haa e pan. Ble nyini ŋga ni jiin suminyuŋgo wa na e nyina, e n ni yii wa.
40026056	La, nyjɛ krɛɛrɛ fna mbe pe mbe ti Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ pre kee yire pra yo mu tɛɛ kre, mbe yi pe kpra." Bawa u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na fɛ mna u ti leele pre pan.
40026057	Mblɛ pra Yesu yii kre na sɛ na u ni sↄfue loplombo pre lopom wre, ŋmba praa yeeri Kaiafas wre katoo, na Judae mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre na pe loplombo pre kro sɛ fni katoo wa.
40026058	La, Pita na taa Yesu kro mna sɛ da sↄfu lopom titi wre katoo lam, ŋga pra le katoo lam wa kre, Pita na sɛ tni lawee shiefɛɛnlɛ pre nu na le imi na kee kre we taa.
40026059	Ŋga pra sɛ na u ni kre, sↄfue loplombo pre, na leele mblɛ pra fni wa kre kro naa kafinɛ dansiɛrɛ kee chaa mbe u taan mbe yire ki na mbe u ta mbe gbo.
40026060	La, pe nsra dansiɛrɛ kee ka ta, nde leele tataara na pan mna nyjɛ pe chaa yo. Bawa leele shiin na yiri mna yo mbo, "Wre blↄ ŋmba nyu nyaa mu yo na, 'Mbe ja mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ suminyuŋgo kre juari, mbe ble taarɛ tɛɛ mbe ki sin.' "
40026062	Ŋga pe nyu na to kre, a sↄfue loplombo pre lopom wre na taan mu yiri, mu Yesu wie mbo, "Ma nyu ka kun ra? Mni mu tia pra kee nyjɛ krɛɛrɛ yuu na taari mu na ŋga hin?"
40026063	Yesu nsra paara na pe ni. A sↄfue loplombo pre lopom wre na yo u pan mbo, "Ni da Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋmba u le wre mɛɛ ni mu mu ŋga na, na ŋu wi Kristo, Nyiɛkpↄↄ Pↄ wre titi kre, kpra yo o pan."
40026064	A Yesu na kna mna yo u pan mbo, "Ŋu mu ki yo ma. La, e ti ni yo e pan mbe e loo. Mu yire aŋga na shie, ee Lewo Pↄ wre nya na u tni jaŋga kre kalie, mbra paan tloe nu nyjeeri."
40026065	A sↄfue loplombo pre lopom wre na yiri mu wre titi dodonyi tini mu wila, mna kna mbo, "U jiɛnlɛ kee yo, kena dansiɛrɛ kee ŋgi o sri na hin? Yire titi e u jini kee ŋga loo.
40026066	Kena mni e jawa hin?" A pra kna mbo, "Kumu ki fna na u ni."
40026067	A praa tɛɛnrɛ hlu na woni u yiɛ na, na gbuun kaŋgro, a plɛ naa u yiɛ juari,
40026068	mna kna na yuu mbo, "Ŋu Kristo, ndro ŋmba u mu gbun nya mu yo o pan."
40026069	Kre nyjila kre na Pitaa wa mu tni katoo lam wa. A bichable tnu wa na sɛ u da mbo, "Ŋu na Yesu ŋmba u yiri Galilii na kre ma e naa nyaari kree?"
40026070	A Pita na kaala pe kro yiɛ na wa mbo, "Ndro ŋmba kee mu yuu ŋga kuraa mi n u chin."
40026071	Pita na flo wa mna sɛ yire bamba ka na, bawa bichabɛɛlɛ tinlɛ pre wa na pan mu u da na, mna kna mu yo mblɛ praa wa mu yire wa na le kre pan mbo, "Blↄ ŋmba, wre na Yesu Nazrɛt wo wre praa nyaari."
40026072	Pita na ndru mu kaala wa na, hali mna da mbo, "Blↄ ŋmba mu nyini ŋga kuraa mi n u chin."
40026073	Kraa wa wa maa, a mblɛ praa wa mu yire mbɛɛlɛ na kre plɛ na pan mna Pita da mbo, "O shↄnli na Yesu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre wa wi ŋu, mu paaraa kuraa ki nyina ma."
40026074	A Pita na kna mbo, "Ni da na ni n blↄ ŋmba kee e yuu ŋga chin?" Titɛɛ kre nu to, a ŋgoplↄ na nyɛni.
40026075	Bawa Pita na kee ŋga Yesu na yo u pan kre sↄↄnri mbo, "Ŋgopilɛ wa nyɛni, na mu kaala gbee nununu taarɛ na mu n ni chin." A Pita na yili mna sɛ nyɛni chichie.
40027001	Ŋga nyiŋge na se bnimi pupu kre, sↄfue loplombo pre kro na chia kre loplombo pre na sɛ fni mu jawa na ki fna pe Yesu gbo.
40027002	A pra u pↄ mna sɛ u le waŋgra lopom Pilato kɛɛ.
40027003	Ŋga Judas ŋmba wra Yesu wↄ mu ŋga kre, na nya na pe Yesu gbun na kumu pimi ni kre, wra u jawala chinɛ, mna ndru mu sɛ sↄfue loplombo pre na chia loplombo pre ŋga swa ŋga wra shↄ pe pan kre, mna kna mu yo pe pan, mbo,
40027004	"Ni sisam pe na ni ndro ŋmba nu sisam n wa wↄ mu e ŋga." A pra kna mbo, "Wre kee ka ma, mu swa bali."
40027005	A Judas na swa kre viŋge mu wa suminyuŋgo kre nu mna sɛ maŋa le.
40027006	A sↄfue loplombo pre na swa kre bali, mna kna mbo, "Ki pe hankɛ swa, ki tia mbra n kolo ŋga mbe o ki chaa o swa nu."
40027007	A pra sɛ fni, mna swa kre wru mna sɛ chↄɛfaanrifun wa tra ka lↄ, na fumblↄ gboolo leni.
40027008	Mu yire kre ble kre na mu pan mu su aŋga na, kre tra kre mɛɛ "nyimi tra".
40027009	Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun Jeremia na kre kee ŋga yo mu tɛɛ a ki pe kpra mbo, "Pra swa fiŋge nununu fulo na kɛ tↄↄnri, kre swa ŋga Israel biile plɛ na jawa na ki fna pe ki tɛɛ mbe u lↄ,
40027010	a pra ki tɛɛ mna tra lↄ chↄɛfaanrifun pan, imi na Nyiɛkpↄↄ na ki kee yo ni pan kre."
40027011	A Yesu na yiri mu yire waŋgra lopom wre yiɛ, a wra u wie mbo, "Ŋu wi Judae ŋunu wre kree?" A Yesu na kna mbo, "Kre mu yuu kre."
40027012	La, ŋga sↄfue loplombo pre na chia loplombo pre naa paara na u taanla kre, u nsra paara.
40027013	A Pilato na kna mbo, "Kena kee tataara nyjɛ pe yuu na taari mu na ŋga, mu n yi loo ree?"
40027014	Yesu nsra nyu kun. Hali u nsra kee nunu chom nyu wↄ. A kra waŋgra lopom wre pe kawako ni mu tro.
40027015	Kena na pe pe ble kpↄɛ yire lii kre, waŋgra lopom wre ndro nunu woni nyuŋgo mbe wa, ŋmba lenɛɛrɛ pre chaa.
40027016	A kre nyjila kre nu na pe blↄ wa yii mu le nyuŋgo. Wre blↄ wre na lenɛɛrɛ u chin paa. Praa u yeeri Barabas.
40027017	Kena ŋga pra sɛ fni kre, Pilato na lenɛɛrɛ pre wie mbo, "Ndro ŋmbi e chaa mbe ni wↄ nyuŋgo mbe wa hin? Barabas ree? ndee Yesu ŋmba pe yeeri Kristo wre hin?"
40027018	Pilato na chin na prara ki tia pra pan na Yesu ni u pan.
40027019	Nyjila ŋga nu Pilato na sɛ tni u kpra kun jↄↄn na kre, u chↄ na tia pra pan mu yo u pan mbo, "Jande, blↄ ŋmba u fraka, kena maa shia u pe sisaa, ni u kee nya ŋunɛ nu blee ŋga, a kra ni hau paa."
40027020	A sↄfue loplombo pre na chia loplombo pre naa yuu leele pre pan na pe yo Pilato pan mbe u Barabas wↄ mbe wa, mbe Yesu gbo.
40027021	Waŋgra lopom wre na ndru mu pe wie shiin wo na mbo, "Leele mblɛ shiin, ŋmbi haa e chaa mbe ni wↄ mbe wa hin?" A pra kna mbo, "Barabas wa!"
40027022	A Pilato na kna mbo, "Kena mni e chaa mbe ni Yesu ŋmba pe yeeri Kristo wre pe hin?" A pe kro na kna mbo "Ti pe u kan kanyana kumu kaan na!"
40027023	A Pilato na kna mbo, "Mni hin? Sisam ŋgi u pe ma hin?" A pra kna na yuu poŋgo mbo, "O yo ti pe u kan kanyana kumu kaan na!!!"
40027024	Ŋga Pilato na nya na leele pre gble kpↄↄ ma kre, wra chin na wa jaa kee ka pe, a wra yiri mna sɛ nyumu ko, mna u kɛnyi je leele pre yiɛ na, mna kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Ni kɛ n wa blↄ ŋmba kumu kee ka nu, e kee ye e pan."
40027025	A leele pre kro na kna na yuu mbo, "Ti mbe kee ŋga kie pan ki kro kpan, tuu wre na o biile na."
40027026	A Pilato na Barabas wↄ mu wa, mna tia pra Yesu frↄ na fotro ni, a wra u wↄ mu le pe kɛɛ mbe pe sɛ u kan kanyana kumu kaan na.
40027027	A Pilato sojae pre na Yesu yii mna sɛ na u ni ŋunu katoo, mna sojae pre kro yeeri a pra sɛ fni wa.
40027028	A pra Yesu dodoŋgi wↄ u na, mna u le dodoŋgi nyiɛ,
40027029	mna ŋunu juulee tin na wuuro ni mu u juule, mna kaan ka wru mu le u kalie kɛ nu. A praa kosie kani u yiɛ na yiri na ŋunu wi, na u piin na tɛɛ mbo, "Judae ŋunu mu ka pe".
40027030	A praa tɛɛnrɛ hlu na woni u na, mna kaan kre shↄ u kɛɛ mna u ndra lalaa fↄↄri na ki ni.
40027031	Ŋga pra pna na u ni mu kↄ kre, a pra dodoŋgi kre wↄ u na mna u le wre titi wo kre, mna sɛ na u ni mbe sɛ u kan kanyana kumu kaan na.
40027032	Ŋga pra yili na shie kre, pra blↄ wa fni, na u yiri Kirene chia kre na, u mɛɛ naa Siimↄn, a pra u yii jaŋga na, a wra sɛ Yesu kumu kaan kre tio.
40027033	Pra sɛ na Yesu ni lawee ka nu, pe ki yeeri Golgota. Ki nyina na lewo ndra kajle lawee.
40027034	Bawa pra tuwe susrom ka chaa simi nu mna Yesu ŋga mbe u gbↄ, a u nsra ki gbↄ.
40027035	Ŋga pra sɛ u kan kanyana kumu kaan kre na kre, a pra u yirɛ nyjɛ wra le kre wↄ mna yi yↄↄlɛ mna pe yɛ ŋga, hali pra kɛɛn tɛɛ, mbe chin ŋga ki fna mbe ta ta.
40027036	Ŋga pra kↄ kre, a pra tni u jaara na u sri.
40027037	Mna u pimi kee nyunↄ mu kan u ndra nyjeeri mbo, "JUDAE ŊUNU WRE WI KRE."
40027038	A pra kokↄↄnlↄ shiin plɛ kan mna mbra u na. Wa naa wa u kalie, a wa naa wa u kamɛŋɛ.
40027039	Leele mblɛ praa tro na u nyaa kre, naa ndra nyaara na u tɛɛlɛ mbo,
40027040	"Ŋu mu yo mu jaa suminyuŋgo kre juari mbe wo, mbe jaa ble taarɛ tɛɛ mbe ki sin, muyɛ shↄ mbe o le. Na Nyiɛkpↄↄ pↄ titi wi ŋu kre, mu yɛ shↄ mu tii kanyana kumu kaan kre na!"
40027041	Pan chↄↄ sↄfue loplombo pre na chia loplombo pre, na pe mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre kro naa u piin na tɛɛ mbo,
40027042	"Wraa plɛ shio, a wa jaa uyɛ shↄ. Wre wi Judae ŋunu wre, tii kanyana kumu kaan kre na, kre oo mu shↄ mbe li.
40027043	Wre u Nyiɛkpↄↄ shↄnli, na yuu na Nyiɛkpↄↄ Pↄ wi wre, na Nyiɛkpↄↄ u chaa titi u u shↄ."
40027044	Pan chↄↄ mblɛ pra kan kɛɛn na mu ya u na kre naa u tɛɛlɛ na yuu na.
40027045	Ŋga nyjila kɛmbↄshiin na gbun kre, ndram na wↄ lawee kro nu mna sɛ su nyjila taarɛ lafo na.
40027046	Nyjila taarɛ kre nu kre, Yesu na gblee badaaŋga ka le mbo, "Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani!" Ki nyina na, "Ni Nyiɛkpↄↄ, ni Nyiɛkpↄↄ, mni a mu laa ni kro hin?"
40027047	Ŋga leele mblɛ praa wa mu yire wa kre na kre kee ŋga loo kre, a pra kna na yuu mbo, "E loo, u Elaija yeeri."
40027048	A pe wa na fɛ mu sɛ zeere le simi ŋga ki taan nyanya ka nu, mna ki su braŋgↄ kaan na, mna sɛ u ŋga mbe u gbↄ.
40027049	A plɛ kna mbo, "E ti o na u le, aada Elaija we paan u shↄ."
40027050	Ŋga Yesu na ndru mna gble kre le na to, a wra fii.
40027051	Kre nyjila kre, na pe yoŋgo ka pↄ mu suminyuŋgo kre yↄ shiin, a yoŋgo kre na peeri shiin mu yire nyjeeri mu pan mu su tapan, a tra na seeri, a dnɛ na yↄↄlɛ,
40027052	a fanyi na nyaala, a Nyiɛkpↄↄ leele mblɛ pra ku kre plɛ na nyi tataara.
40027053	Ŋga Yesu na nyi u ble taarɛ wo na kre, leele mblɛ pra nyi kre na sɛ Jerusalɛm na, a lenɛɛrɛ na pe nya.
40027054	Sojae plɛ na pe lopom wa naa wa mu yire na Yesu sri, ŋga pra nya na tra seeri, a yire kaalɛɛ nyjɛ naa pini kre, fiɛrɛ na pe yii kpↄↄ, a praa yuu mbo, "Nyiɛkpↄↄ Pↄ wi blↄ wre yɛŋgɛ."
40027055	Chiɛlɛ tataara na yiri Galilii na mna taa Yesu kro, na yaa u na, a pra sɛ yire haalee na kala le.
40027056	Maria Magdalene na Jemisi na Josɛf lo Maria wre, na Zebedii biile pre lo wre, pe kro naa wa wa.
40027057	Ŋga kra da yilakↄŋgↄ nyu na kre, blↄ swafun wa na yiri Aramatia na, u mɛɛ naa Josɛf, a wra pe Yesu kotↄmblↄ pre wa.
40027058	Wre wra yiri mna sɛ Pilato pan mna sɛ u tali Yesu gboo wre.
40027059	Pilato nsra je. Wra tia pra u ŋga u wi.
40027060	A Josɛf na sɛ gboo wre wru, mna u pↄ na mbↄfiŋge ni, mna sɛ u le wre titi dnɛ wee ŋga u tuu mu tɛɛ nu. Mna sɛ dnɛ badaaŋga ka gbila mna ki nyu tↄ, mna sɛ katoo.
40027061	Kre nyjila kre, na Maria Magdalene, na Maria shiin wo wree wa mu tni na faŋga kre jle.
40027062	Ŋga nyiŋge na se pe sumi ble kre, sↄfue loplombo pre na Farisiie pre na sɛ fni Pilato katoo,
40027063	mna yo u pan mbo "Tolɛɛ, o sↄↄnri na ŋga kafnu wre naa wa kre, wraa yuu na, na pe u gbo, we nyi ki ble taarɛ ble na.
40027064	Kena o mu tali, ti mbe leele sɛ tni u lehaa wa, mbe u shie mbe sɛ su ble taarɛ ble kre na, mbe u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre waa shia sɛ u ju mbe wↄ, mbra yuu leele pan na u nyi. Na ki pan ma kre, kee nyjɛ pie fni mbe yo kre we wɛ jle wee yire na."
40027065	A Pilato na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "E sɛ yire titi sojae wru mbe pe sɛ ki shie e pan, imi na e ki chaa."
40027066	A pra yili wa mna sɛ faŋga kre nyu mbra na yira ni kpↄↄ, mbe kia jaa nyaa, mna leele plɛ wↄ mu tɛɛ ki nyu na, mbe pra ki sri.
40028001	Ŋga Judae wuu ble kre na tro, ŋga ki nyiŋge naa sii kre, Maria Magdalene na Maria shiin wo wre na gbolo mu sɛ faŋga kre lawee.
40028002	Ŋga pra da wa kre, a tra na seeri badaaŋga, a o Tafun wre nyjeeri bituŋu na tii wa, mna dnɛ ŋga ni pra faŋga kre nyu tↄ kre gbila mu wa, mna tni ki na.
40028003	A wraa chiɛnri na nyiɛ ki nyini, a u dodoŋgi na fniŋge prupru u na, na nyiɛ subie yi.
40028004	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, fiɛrɛ na mblɛ praa wa na faŋga kre sri kre yii kpↄↄ, a pra to mu sni na gboolo lɛ.
40028005	A nyjeeri bituŋu wre na kna mna yo chiɛlɛ pre pan mbo, "Yaa fiɛ, ni chin na Yesu ŋmba pra kan kanyana kumu kaan na kre e chaa mbe le.
40028006	U n wa mna. U nyi imi wra ki yo kre. E n nyaa, e pan e u snihaa kre le.
40028007	E sɛ nyaanyaa. E sɛ yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan na u nyi. A u yiɛ klu na shie Galilii na. Bawa ee u nya imi na ni yuu e pan ŋga."
40028008	Titɛɛ kre nu, a pra krↄ kna mna fɛ mu yili faŋga lawee wa, na fiɛrɛ na yɛshↄↄrↄ badaaŋga ni, mna sɛ u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan.
40028009	Ŋga praa shie kre, Yesu na pe fni mna yo pe pan mbo, "E shaari." Ŋga wra yo ma to, a pra fɛ mna pan mu kosie kan u yiɛ, mna u jeelee yii.
40028010	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Yaa fiɛ, e sɛ yo ni wolo pan na pra shie Galilii na, bawa pie sɛ ni nya."
40028011	Ŋga chiɛlɛ pre na kna na shie kre, kre nyjila kre, na leele mblɛ pra wↄ a pra sɛ na Yesu faŋga kre sri kre, na pe plɛ sɛ chia lam, na kala ŋga ki pe faŋga lawee wa kre kro yuu sↄfue loplombo pre pan.
40028012	Ŋga pe kro na chia loplombo pre kro na fni kre, pra bↄↄnri mna fni na ki fna pe sojae pre pra sɛ faŋga kre shie kre ŋga swa tataara.
40028013	Mna yo pe pan mbo, "E yo na, 'U twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pra pan mu u ju mu wↄ ble, na o sni na ŋunu.'
40028014	Kena na ki waa pan na waŋgra lopom ki loo kuraa kre, oo yo mbe yire e kro, kena kala kↄ."
40028015	A sojae pre na swa kre shↄ, mna sɛ kee ŋga pra yo pe sɛ pe kre pe. Ki tia kre kee ŋga na kpali Judae leele nu mu yire kre ble kre mu pan mu su aŋga na.
40028016	Twanfɛɛnlɛ kɛmbↄnunu pre na sɛ Galilii nyua ŋga kee Yesu na yo pe pan kre na.
40028017	Ŋga pra Yesu fni wa kre pra kosie kan mna u sumi, la, kre nyjila kre na pe plɛ jawalaa shiin shiin.
40028018	A Yesu na flo mu da pe na mna yo pe pan mbo, "Pe ni ŋga jaŋga ŋga kii wa nyjeeri na tra kro.
40028019	Kena e sɛ waŋgra kro nu, e sɛ leele pe ni twanfɛɛnlɛ, e pe ndrɛ je e le ni Lɛ wre, na u Pↄ wre, na Ŋumu wre mɛɛ nu.
40028020	E pe nyina mbe pe taa nyjɛ ni e nyina kre kro na. E le, nii wa e kro mbe sɛ su waŋgra kla ble."
41001001	Nyiɛkpↄↄ pↄ, ŋmba pe yeeri Yesu Kristo wre, u ketaan kre nↄↄ hlɛhaa yi kre.
41001002	Imi na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun ŋmba praa u yeeri Yisaia na yo u hlɛ kre nu kre mbo, "Le, mbe ni bituŋu tun mbe u yiɛ klu mbe hɛ kolo gbeele mu pan."
41001003	"Wre mana ki yilii fimi lawee waa kre nu na, e o Tafun kolo kre gbeele, e u trohaa kre fraka."
41001004	Blↄ wa, praa u yeeri Jↄn ndrajefun, wraa wa fimi tra kre nu na nyina na fↄŋga lewo we u jawala chinɛ mbe pe u ndra je, mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ chiin u sisam ti mbe u kɛ.
41001005	Bawa Judea tra kre leele, na Jerusalɛm chia leele kro na yili mna sɛ u pan wa, a wraa pe ndrɛ jee Jↄↄdan lↄↄ kre nu, a praa pe sisam yuu.
41001006	Nyuuma yooro yoŋgo Jↄn naa toni. Yurↄ hlɛ na yi u greree, a u sro na lɛ kpatↄ na srɛ.
41001007	A wraa yuu, mbo "Ŋmba u wɛ mi naa wa kro na paan. Mi n fna kple, na u kpawrɛ kuraa mbe kɛ taa yi na.
41001008	Mi rɛ, nyumu ni ni e ndrɛ jee la, na wre waa pan, Kpra Ŋumu wre ni we e ndrɛ je."
41001009	Kre nyjila kre nu, Yesu na yiri Nazrɛt chia ŋga kii wa Galilii tra nu wa kre mna pan, a Jↄn na u ndra je Jↄↄdan lↄↄ kre nu.
41001010	Ŋga wra yili lↄↄ kre nu to, mna nyjeeri nya na ki nyaa a Ŋumu wre naa tri u na na katoo kotro wi.
41001011	A mana ka na yili nyjeeri mbo, "Ŋu wi ni pↄ ŋmba ni kori, a ni yiɛshↄ mu na."
41001012	Titɛɛ kre nu, a Ŋumu wre na sɛ na u ni fimi tra kre nu.
41001013	Bawa wra nyi, fimi tra kre nu ble fuloeshiin, a Sutna na u sɛ u nyu cha. Wre na nyaalam yurɛ praa wa wa, a Nyiɛkpↄↄ bitumblↄ na pan mna u sumi.
41001014	Pra kↄ mna Jↄn yii mu le nyuŋgo, kre kↄkro Yesu na pan Galilii tra nu wa, mnaa Nyiɛkpↄↄ ketaan kre yuu.
41001015	Mbo, "Nyjila kre da, Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre da mna. E e jawala chinɛ. E Nyiɛkpↄↄ ketaan kre shↄ e li."
41001016	Ki ble ŋga wraa tro Galilii epo kre mbɛɛ na kre, na blↄ wa wi, pe u yeeri Siimↄn, na u chunu, Andriu, na pee wa epo kre yiɛ na na asau waa. Ki nyjila kre na mbroe wↄfɛɛnlɛ lɛ.
41001017	A Yesu na yo pe pan mbo, "E pan e taa ni kro, mbe e pe leele wↄfɛɛnlɛ."
41001018	Titɛɛ kre nu, a pra pe asau yire ti wa mna pan mu taa u kro.
41001019	Ŋga pra sɛ yiɛ chiɛri na, na Jemisi na Jↄn wa pe krↄ lam, na pe lɛ Zebedii ni, na pe asau gbeele.
41001020	Yesu na pe yeeri titɛɛ kre nu, a pra pe lɛ na tnumu tunfɛɛnlɛ pre ti krↄ kre nu, mna pan mu taa Yesu kro.
41001021	Yesu na u kotↄmblↄ pre na sɛ Kapɛnↄm na. Ŋga Siwri ble na to, pe ble fuŋgo ble, wra sɛ le pe fninyuŋgo, mna na pe nyina Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee kre.
41001022	Imi wraa pe nyina kre na pe pe kawako ni. Yaka ma, wraa paara na jaŋgafun wi. U nsraa paara na pe nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre lɛ.
41001023	Jaa na ŋumufↄↄn wa blↄ wa nu fninyuŋgo wa, titɛɛ kre nu,
41001024	a wra gblee le mbo, "Kala ŋgi ni wre na ŋu nyi hin? Ŋu Yesu ŋmba mu yiri Nazrɛt na? O klahaa mu pan ree? Ni chin ndro ŋmba wi ŋu. Ŋu wi Nyiɛkpↄↄ ndro cheche wre."
41001025	Yesu na u yiɛ kee yo u pan mbo, "Pieri mu yili u nu mu sɛ!"
41001026	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, ŋumufↄↄn wre na blↄ wre chan tra, na u gbila, wra gble leni, mna chin mu yili u nu.
41001027	Kra leele mblɛ praa wa wa kre krɛɛrɛ pe kawako ni, a praa peyɛ wie mbo, "Kolo fↄŋgↄ ŋgi ni blↄ ŋmba pan ŋga hin? Jaŋga ni ma. Hali na u fuu ŋumufuɛn pre na kuraa pe ndru u pan."
41001028	Titɛɛ kre nu, Yesu kee na kpali mu tro Galilii tra kre nu kro.
41001029	Ŋga Yesu na yili fninyuŋgo wa to, a wre na Jemisi na Jↄn na sɛ Siimↄn na Andriu katoo.
41001030	Ŋga pra le wa kre, na kabro Siimↄn nafun chlↄ gbun a u sni, a pra ki yo Yesu pan titɛɛ kre nu.
41001031	A Yesu na le u kro mu u yii kɛ na, mna u yire mu yire sholo. Titɛɛ kre nu to, a kabro kre na laa chlↄ wre na, a wra yiri mu sro pe mna pe ŋga.
41001032	Ki yilakↄŋgↄ nyu na, na yila to mu kↄ kre, pra pan na yambla na mblɛ nu tiprɛm nyi ni Yesu pan, mbe u pe tra.
41001033	Chia kre leele kro na pan mu fni mna Yesu na nyi kre.
41001034	A Yesu na yambla pre tataara tra, mna tia ŋumufuɛn na yili lenɛɛrɛ nu, la, u nsra tiprɛm ŋumu pre ŋga kolo na pe paara. Ŋgi na, pra Yesu chin.
41001035	Ŋga ki nyiŋge naa paan mbe se, Yesu chiin na gbolo mu yili mu sɛ fimi lawee ka nu, mbe wre na Nyiɛkpↄↄ sɛ paara.
41001036	A Siimↄn na kotↄmblↄ hamblɛ pre na kↄ mu Yesu cha chiin,
41001037	mna sɛ u nya mna yo u pan mbo, "Lenɛɛrɛ mu chaa na tro."
41001038	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "E ti mbe o sɛ chiɛ yɛ na na, mbe ni sɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee kre yo wa na. Kre ndra na ni yila mu pan."
41001039	A Yesu na kila mu tro Galilii tra kre nu kro, mna na lee pe fninyinyi yire nu na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee kre yuu pe pan, na ŋumufuɛn woni leele nu.
41001040	Yiranyiɛrɛfun wa na pan mu Yesu tali, mna kosie kan u yiɛ mbo, "Yesu, na mu chaa, mu jaa ti mbe ni saanla mbe pe cheche."
41001041	Ŋga wra yo ma kre, u kee na pe Yesu pan fooro ni, a wra kɛ tini mu taa u na, mna yo u pan mbo, "Ni cha, kena saanla!"
41001042	Titɛɛ kre nu, yiranyiɛrɛ yire na laa blↄ wre na, a wra saanla.
41001043	A Yesu na u jaari chichie mbo, "Sɛ, mu sɛ muyɛ nyina Judae sↄfue pre pan.
41001044	La, maa shia nyu kun na ndro ni kolo. Sra yirɛ nyjɛ Mbose e nyina kre, mu sɛ na yi ni mu sɛ sↄfue pre ŋga mbe ki nyina na mu saanla."
41001045	Ŋga yaŋu wre na yili wa na shie kre, u nsra ja mu frↄ. Wraa kee kre kpali na shie. Kra tia lenɛɛrɛ na kala kre loo. Ŋga kra pan ma kre, Yesu nsra ja mbe le chia ka na na. A wra kro fimi lawee kre nu, a leele na yiri mbɛɛlɛ chiɛ yire na kro mnaa paan wa.
41002001	Kie pe ble chiɛri yɛ kↄkro kre, Yesu na ndru mu sɛ Kapɛnↄm na. Ŋga wra le wa kre lenɛɛrɛ na u kee loo na u ndru mu pan katoo.
41002002	Titɛɛ kre nu, katoo ŋga nu Yesu na nyi kre na nyi leele bribri, hali lawee nsraa wa jlonwee nyu na mbe ndro tro mbe le. A Yesu naa Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee kre yuu pe pan.
41002003	Bawa leele jijirɛ plɛ na fna wa tio u dɛŋglɛ ni mnaa paan Yesu pan.
41002004	Imi na leele pre na nɛɛ kre ndra na, pe nsraa kolo taa mbe da Yesu na. Kra tia pra nduu nyjeeri mna lahoo ŋga kra Yesu tↄ kre tuu mu vru, mna yaŋu wre tre na u dɛŋglɛ ni mu tɛɛ Yesu yiɛ tata.
41002005	Imi na Yesu na leele pre shↄnlie nya na ki kpↄↄ kre, Yesu na kna mu yo yaŋu wre pan mbo, "Ni pↄ, mu sisam kro laa mu na."
41002006	Ŋga Yesu na yo ma kre, na nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre plɛɛ wa mu tni wa. A pra kna na yuu pe jawala nu mbo,
41002007	"Mni a blↄ ŋmba na paara ma ŋga hin? U jiɛnlɛ kee yuu. Ŋmbi we jaa sisam tii kɛ hin? Na Nyiɛkpↄↄ chiin bↄkↄ."
41002008	Yesu na pe jawala nya, mna kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Mni a kala ŋga ni yo ŋga na e hau ma hin?"
41002009	Mbo, "Kee shiin nyjɛ ŋgi haa ki sheli hin? Ŋga mu yo fna pa na mu sisam kro laa mu na, ndee yiri! Mu mu dɛŋglɛ wru mu nyaari. Ŋgi ki shieli hin?
41002010	La, imi kie pe mbe e chin na mi, Lewo Pↄ wre wa na jaŋga ni tra mna, mbe jaa sisam ti mbe kɛ kre ndra na yi." A wra kna mu yo fna wre pan mbo,
41002011	"Ni yo mu pan na, yiri, mu mu dɛŋglɛ wru mu sɛ mu katoo."
41002012	Titɛɛ kre nu, a blↄ wre na yiri mu u dɛŋglɛ wru leele pre yiɛ na wa mna sɛ. Kra leele pre kro pe kawako ni, a praa Nyiɛkpↄↄ kaan mɛɛ, mbo, "O n da mu kala ŋga ŋmbrↄ nya tun!"
41002013	A Yesu na yili wa mu sɛ epo kre nyu na wa na, a lenɛɛrɛ na fɛ mu u kun, a wraa pe nyina Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee kre.
41002014	Ŋga Yesu naa nyaari na tro epo kre mbɛɛ na wa kre, wra Alfio pↄ, Levi wre, nya na uu wa mu tni u tↄↄ swa nyuŋgo. A Yesu na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Yiri mu taa ni kro." A Levi na yiri mu taa Yesu kro.
41002015	Ki ble kre blee, Levi na sro pe kama, mna u wolo tↄↄ shↄfɛɛnlɛ pre plɛ, na sisampefɛɛnlɛ mblɛ praa wa wa kre plɛ yeeri, a pe kro na sɛ chaa mu li na Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre ni kro. Kre nyjila kre na tↄↄ shↄfɛɛnlɛ na sisampefɛɛnlɛ pre plɛɛ wa tataara mu Yesu kro tↄ.
41002016	Ŋga Farisiie nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre plɛ na Yesu nya na wre na sisam pefɛɛnlɛ na tↄↄ shↄfɛɛnlɛ pre lii kre, pra u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre wie na, "Yira ŋgi ki tia a Yesu na leele mblɛ na lii hin?"
41002017	Ŋga pra wie ma kre, Yesu na ki loo, mna kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Lewo ŋmba u yaa kre, wre u fna mbe sɛ yambla trafun pan. Nde ŋmba u n na yaa kre, wre n fna mbe sɛ trafun pan." Mbo, "Ni n pan mbe paan yo leele mblɛ pe fraka pan na pe pe jawala chinɛ, la, sisampefɛɛnlɛ ndra na ni yila mu pan."
41002018	Ki ble ka Jↄn twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na Farisiie pre naa ble funi, imi praa ki piin wa kre, a leele plɛ na pan mu Yesu wie mbo, "Ŋgi ki tia a Jↄn twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na Farisiie twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na ble funi, a wre Yesu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na ble fun hin?"
41002019	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan, mbo, "Nyjila ŋga nu bijↄ plↄ wree wa kre, ki fna mbe nↄↄlↄ pre ble fun ra? Nyjila ŋga nu bijↄ plↄ wre na u nↄↄlↄ wa kre, pe yiɛ wa je mbe pe ble fun.
41002020	La, nyjila ka we pan mbe pe bijↄ plↄ wre wru pe mbɛɛ na mbe sɛ na u ni, kre nyjila kre pie u cha mbe la, mbe fooro pe yii, mbe pe ble fun mbe u sↄↄnri.
41002021	Lewo wa n wa mbe yoŋgo fↄŋgↄ ŋga pe n je tun tɛɛ mbe yoŋgo lɛɛ ŋga ki wali tↄ. Na kre ma, na pe yoŋgo kre je, fↄŋgↄ kre we suuru mbe lɛɛ kre tini mbe wali kpↄↄ mbe wɛ jle wo kre na.
41002022	A lewo wa n wa mbe sifiŋge fↄŋgↄ le yurↄ hlɛ gbolo lɛɛ nu. Na kre ma, sifiŋge kre we kan mbe gbolo kre wali, mbe sifiŋge kre wo. Ki fna mbe mu sifiŋge fↄŋgↄ le gbolo fↄŋgↄ nu." (Fawolo pre naa sifiŋge leni yurↄ hlɛ gbolo nu.)
41002023	Wuuble ka nu Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na sɛ tro fifiire yɛ nyini see. Ŋga praa tro see kre nu kre, Yesu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre naa yi sɛnyi yire yɛ mbru na kaa.
41002024	Ŋga pra piin ma kre, a Farisiie pre na Yesu wie mbo, "Yira ŋgi ki tia a mu twanfɛɛnlɛ mblɛ, kala ŋga ki n nyu mbe pe pe wuuble, a pra ki pini hin?"
41002025	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "E n da mu tↄↄnri mu loo kala ŋga Devid na pe, nyjila ŋga kra sheli mu u ŋga, a klo na u ta wre na u kotↄmblↄ ni.
41002026	Imi na wra sɛ le Nyiɛkpↄↄ nyuŋgo, na kre nyjila kre na Abiata wi sↄfu lopom. A wra sɛ paanu, ŋga praa teeri Nyiɛkpↄↄ yiɛ, wru mu ka, mna u wolo pre ŋga ka." (A ki n fna mbe lewaa ki ka, fↄŋa sↄfue pre chiin.)
41002027	Mbo, "Ni chaa mbe e chin na lewo na pra yila mna wuuble kre le. wuuble kre na ma Nyiɛkpↄↄ na yila mu lewo gbeele.
41002028	Kre ndra na, mi Lewo Pↄ wre, nii wa na jaŋga ni wuuble kre na."
41003001	Ki ble ka, Yesu na sɛ le Judae pre fninyuŋgo na. Ŋga wra le wa kre, wra blↄ wa nya wa na u kɛ nunu ku.
41003002	Ŋga ki ble kre na pe Judae pre wuuble kre ndra na, praa Yesu le na we yaŋu wre tra ki ble kre. Kena u kala ta pe pan.
41003003	Bawa Yesu na yo yaŋu wre pan mbo, "Yili mu pan mu yire lalaa mna." A wra yili mu pan.
41003004	A Yesu na kna mu leele pre wie mbo, "Kena ki fna mbe lewo chichie pe wuuble ree, ndee sisam ki fna mbe lewo pe hin? Ki fna mbe mu lewo ŋmaa shↄ ree, ndee ki fna mbe mu lewo kla hin?" Ŋga Yesu na pe wie kre, pe nsra ja mna ki nyu wↄ.
41003005	A Yesu na pe le komm, a krↄ na u kun, imi wrekro na u yii Judae pre ndra shelee kre ndra na. A wra kna mu yo yaŋu wre pan mbo, "Mu kɛ kre tini!" A wra ki tini, a kra ndru mna pe na ki fa yi.
41003006	Ŋga Farisiie pre na kre kee ŋga Yesu na pe kre nya kre, pra yili a pre na Herodie pre na sɛ bↄↄnri, kolo ŋga na pie tro mbe Yesu ta mbe gbo.
41003007	Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na ndru mu sɛ epo nyu na, a leele tataara na yiri Judea tra nu,
41003008	na Jerusalɛm chia leele na Idumia tra, na Jↄↄdan lↄↄ kro leele, na Tiro na Sidon lawee yire leele ni kro. Lenɛɛrɛ mblɛ kro na kee ŋga Yesu pe kre loo mna pan u lawee.
41003009	A Yesu na kna mu yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan na leele pre nɛɛ titi, kena pe krↄ ka cha u pan mbra u sri mbe u le. Na kre ma, leele pre we paan u ŋunↄↄ chan.
41003010	Imi Yesu na yambla tra kre, kra tia yambla tataara naa peyɛ ŋunↄ mbe da Yesu na titi, mbe kɛ taa u na.
41003011	Na ŋumufuɛn pre Yesu nya mbe pra tuuri u yiɛ, mbra gblee leni, mbra yuu Yesu pan mbo, "Ŋu wi Nyiɛkpↄↄ Pↄ wre."
41003012	A Yesu na ŋumufuɛn pre tↄ kolo na pia u kpali mbe leele loo.
41003013	Ki ble ka Yesu na sɛ nyua lawee ka nu. Bawa wra lenɛɛrɛ pre mblɛ u chaa yeeri a pra pan u jaara wa.
41003014	Leele pre, kɛmbↄshiin wra wↄ mu ya uyɛ na, mbe pe tni u mbɛɛ na mbe wraa pe tuni mbe praa Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee kre yuu.
41003015	Wre Yesu we pe ŋga jaŋga mbe pe tɛɛ mbra ŋumufuɛn woni leele nu.
41003016	Leele kɛmbↄshiin mblɛ wra wↄ kre na lɛ kre: Siimↄn, a wra u ŋga Pita mu ya,
41003017	na Zebedii pↄ, Jemisi, na u chunu, Jↄn, mna pe mɛɛ tɛɛ boanijis, (Ki nyina na nyiɛtwanraa biile.)
41003018	na Andriu, na Filipo, na Batolomio, na Matio, na Tↄmasi, na Alfio pↄ, Jemisi, na Tadio, na Siimↄn, ŋmba yiɛ ki nyinai u kee na, Kaanan wo wre,
41003019	na Judas Iskariↄt, ŋmba wra kↄ mu Yesu wↄ mu ŋga kre.
41003020	Ŋga Yesu na ndru mna pan katoo ŋga nu wra nyi kre, leele pre na ndru mna pan mu katoo kre nyi, hali Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre nsra kolo ta kuraa mbe tni mbe yaka ka.
41003021	Yesu sele leele na u kee loo mna pan u yiihaa mbe sɛ katoo. Ŋgi na, imi leele naa yuu na u ndra n wa kre na.
41003022	Judae nyinafɛɛnlɛ mblɛ pra yiri Jerusalɛm na mu pan wa kre naa yuu na Bɛɛlzebul, Sutna ŋumufuɛn ŋunu wre uu wa Yesu nu. Mbo wre na u yire mu ja na tiprɛm ŋumu woni leele nu.
41003023	Ŋga Yesu na ki loo kre wra leele pre yeeri mna pan u jaara, mna paara mu pe nyina yomɛɛlɛ nu mbo, "Mni Sutna we pe mbe ja mbe Sutna ni hin?
41003024	A na waŋgra ka kiyɛ yↄↄlɛ na wii na kiyɛ ni kre, kre waŋgra kre wa jaa yire mbe pe waŋgra.
41003025	A na katoo ka leele nyu n nunu, a pe peyɛ yↄↄlɛ mu kↄ, kre katoo kre wa jaa yire mbe pe katoo chiriri.
41003026	A na Sutna yiri mu na wii na uyɛ ni, wa yirehaa ta. Kena u faŋga nyu kↄhaa yi.
41003027	A lewo wa n wa mbe jaa sɛ le faŋgafun katoo mbe sɛ u yirɛ koli, fↄŋga we klu mbe faŋgafun wre yii mbe u pↄ tun. Kre we chin mbe jaa sɛ u yirɛ koli."
41003028	Bawa Yesu na ndru mu yo pe pan mbo, "Kpra na ni yuu e pan, na Nyiɛkpↄↄ we lewo sisam ŋga we pe kpan, na jiɛnlɛ kee ŋga we yo mbe u taan kro ti mbe ufun kɛ,
41003029	la, ŋmba we jiɛnlɛ kee yo mbe Kpra Ŋumu wre taan kre rɛ, wa ufun sisam ti mbe u kɛ fio, a we u sisam kre pimi li Nyiɛkpↄↄ yiɛ nyjila kro nu."
41003030	Judae pre na yo na ŋumufↄↄn ni Yesu tnumu tuni kre ndra na Yesu na yila mna yo pe pan ma.
41003031	Yesu lo na u chinlɛ na pan na u chaa, a pra yire fimi na, mna ndro tun Yesu pan na pe u yeeri.
41003032	Kre nyjila kre na leelee wa mu tni mu fɛ mu u kun, a pra yo Yesu pan, mbo, "Mu lo na mu chinlɛɛ wa mu yire fimi na na mu chaa."
41003033	A Yesu na kna mu leele pre wie mbo, "Mblɛ lɛ ni lo na ni chinlɛ hin?"
41003034	Mna kna mu leele mblɛ pe tni mu u fɛ mu kun kre le, mna yo pe pan mbo, "E le! Ni lo na ni chinlɛ lɛ ni jaara kre."
41003035	A wra ndru mu kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Ndro ŋmba u kee ŋga Nyiɛkpↄↄ chaa pini kre, wre wi ni chunu, na ni jaa na ni lo."
41004001	Ki ble ka Yesu na ndru mna sɛ na nyina epo nyu kre na wa, a lenɛɛrɛ na pan mu lawee kre tↄ, a kra tia wra le krↄ ka lam mu tni mna lenɛɛrɛ pre ti lↄↄ kre nyu na, na paara pe pan.
41004002	Yesu na pe nyina kenɛɛrɛ yomɛɛlɛ nu. U paaraa kre nu wra yo mbo,
41004003	"E loo! Kena falifun wa wra sɛ u yirɛ bie wohaa.
41004004	Ŋga wra yirɛ bie yire nyina kre, yɛ na sɛ wo kolo mbɛɛ na, a hanyiɛlɛ na pan mna yi li.
41004005	A yɛ na sɛ wo dnɛ lawee, mna tra nsraa wa nɛɛrɛ. Yira ja mu fin kama nyaanyaa, a na tra nsra nɛɛ wa chiriri kre ndra na,
41004006	ŋga yila na wɛɛri mna yi gbun kre to, a yira sↄndↄ. Yi didinyi yire n na tra ta chiriri mbe kan, a kra tia yira ku.
41004007	Yirɛ bie yire yɛ na sɛ wo wuuro nu, a wuuro yire na yiri mna yi fↄ, a kra tia yi nsra ja mu sɛ.
41004008	A yirɛ bie yire yɛ na sɛ wo tra taan nu mna fin mu lɛ, mu klɛ wa wa tataara mna sɛ tataara. Yɛ na sɛ ma gbee fulo na kɛ kɛ, a yɛ na ma sɛ gbee fuloe tataarɛ, a yɛ na sɛ gbee lafaa lafaa."
41004009	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Ŋmba uu wa na ndie ni mbe loo kre, ti u ndie tɛɛ mbe loo."
41004010	Ŋga kra kro Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ kɛmbↄshiin pre na leele mblɛ pra kro u mbɛɛ na kre chiin kre, pra u wie u yomɛɛlɛ yire nↄↄ.
41004011	A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Yire rɛ, Nyiɛkpↄↄ e nyina u Ŋunumu wre kee ŋga ki ndra kre, la, waŋgra leele pre yomɛɛlɛ nu u pe nyina kee kre.
41004012	Kena kee kre, 'nde pie ki nya, la, pia ki chin, pie ki loo, la, pia ki nↄↄ chin mbaa chinɛ mbe ndru mbe pan Nyiɛkpↄↄ lawee, mbe waa pe shↄ, mbaa pe sisam ti mbe pe kɛ.' "
41004013	Bawa Yesu na kna mu pe wie mbo, "A na e n yomini ŋga nↄↄ loo, kena mni ee pe mbe hɛnyi nyjɛ nↄↄ loo hin?
41004014	Falifun wre wi Nyiɛkpↄↄ ketaan kre yofun wre."
41004015	Mbo, "A yirɛ bie nyjɛ yira wo kolo mbɛɛ na kre lɛ, mblɛ pe ketaan kre ndru titɛɛ kre nu to, mbe Sutna pan mbe paan ketaan kre wↄ mbe yili pe nu.
41004016	A nyjɛ yira wo dnɛ lawee kre, pre lɛ mblɛ pe ketaan kre ndru, mbe ki shↄↄli na yɛshↄↄrↄ ni,
41004017	a nde kee kre wa jaa didinyi kan pe nu, pie tni sumɛɛ kre nu chiɛri, la, na kanyana ree, ndee na ndro waa yila ketaan kre na maa pe pra to, kena pe ketaan kre wa mbe sumiɛ ti.
41004018	A nyjɛ yira wo wuuro nu kre lɛ, mblɛ pe kee kre ndru,
41004019	na waŋgra ŋga yirɛ chaara, na swa fanaa, na waŋgra ŋga yirɛ niŋge waa pan mu le pe sumiɛ nu, mu nya mbe pe shↄnlie shↄ mbe to, kee kre wa jaa sɛŋgɛ sɛ pe nu.
41004020	A yirɛ bie nyjɛ yira wo tra taan kre nu kre lɛ, mblɛ pe Nyiɛkpↄↄ ketaan kre ndru, mbe ki shↄ mbe li, mbe ki sɛŋgɛ sɛ gbee fulo na kɛ kɛ, plɛ fuloe tataarɛ, plɛ lafaa lafaa."
41004021	Ba Yesu na ndru mna pe wie mbo, "Ndro ŋmbi we kaniɛ mu mbe bↄkiti tɛɛ mbe ki juule ndee, mbe sɛ ki le mpa tapan, mbe wa ki taa tebru ndra na hin?
41004022	Yaka n wa mbe ndra a kia kↄ mbe yili, a ndrandra kee ka n wa mbe kia kↄ mbe kpali."
41004023	Yesu na yo pe pan mbo, "Ŋmba uu wa na ndie ni, u ndie tɛɛ u loo."
41004024	A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Kee ŋga e ndru ŋga e ki le chichie. Krayira ŋga nyini ni e yirɛ kra na plɛ kaan kre, kre ni Nyiɛkpↄↄ we kra mbe e ŋga, mbe ka ya e pan.
41004025	Ŋmba uu wa ka ni kre, we ufun ŋga ka mbe ya. A ŋmba u n ka ni kre, chiɛri ŋga kii wa u pan kre kuraa we ki shↄ u pan."
41004026	Yesu na yo na mbo, "Imi na Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nyi yi kre, pan ki nyi na falifun wa we sɛ u yirɛ bie nyina see lam,
41004027	mbe ndie wↄ yi na mbra sni mbra yiri lafo na blee, mbe yirɛ bie yire kↄ mbe fin mbe lɛ, mbe wa chin imi na ki pe.
41004028	Tra kre tia yirɛ yire fin, mu ŋↄↄ, mu wrɛ jle le mu lɛ mu sɛ.
41004029	Yirɛ yire nyina haa yi to, mbe falifun wre sɛ le yi nu na u brↄfiɛn ni mbe yi knumu."
41004030	Yesu mbo, "Yira ŋgi kuraa ni mbe tɛɛ mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ Ŋunumu kre kra hin?"
41004031	Mbo, "Pan ki nyi na mↄstad bie yi. Kii fiɛn yirɛ bie kro nu,
41004032	nde na mu ki luu a ki yiri, yɛlɛ kie li mbe ndru mbe yua, a nde ki kpↄↄri mbe wɛ tinyi nɛɛrɛ na. Ki ja mbe klɛ wa, mbe hanyiɛlɛ jaa zeere le ki na."
41004033	Yire yomɛɛlɛ nyjɛ nyini nu Yesu naa Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee kre yuu pe pan, imi pie jaa loo da.
41004034	Yesu nsraa paara mbe yomɛɛlɛ la u kee nu, la na ki kↄ mu kro wre na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre chiin kre, mbe u pe nyina yomɛɛlɛ yire kro nↄↄ.
41004035	Ki ble kre yilakↄŋgↄ nyu na, Yesu na yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo, "E ti mbe o sɛ epo kre kro kokoo ŋgaa na."
41004036	A Yesu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na u bali na krↄ kre ni, imi na wra nyi ki nu kre, mna leele pre ti wa. Ŋga praa shie kre na kruɛ yɛɛ wa mu ya pe na.
41004037	Epo kre yiɛ na kre, fuflɛ badaaŋga ka na gbun, a nyumu kre na kan mu le krↄ kre lam a kra chaa nyi.
41004038	Kre nyjila kre na Yesu wa mu sni mu ndra gbun ndragbↄↄn na na ŋunu krↄ kre nↄↄhaa wa. A u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na u nyi mna u wie mbo, "O Nyinafun, kena ŋga o chaa ku mbe fun ŋga mu kee ka ma ra?"
41004039	Titɛɛ kre nu a Yesu na yiri mu fuu fuflɛ kre na, mna kna mu yo epo kre pan mbo, "Pieri, mu yire titɛɛ!" A fuflɛ kre na yire dimm!
41004040	A Yesu na kna mu u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre wie mbo, "Yira ŋgi ki tia a e kro pe fiɛrɛfɛɛnlɛ ma hin?" Mbo, "Ŋgi ki tia a e n shↄnlie ni kuraa ŋga hin?"
41004041	Fiɛrɛ na pe yii, a pra kna na yuu peyɛ pan mbo, "A ndro ŋmbi sembremu wi ŋmba kuraa, hali fuflɛ na epo kuraa u nyu kayolo ndru ŋga hin?"
41005001	Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na epo kre kun mna sɛ le Gerasie tra nu.
41005002	Ŋga Yesu na yili krↄ kre nu mu to fimi na to, na ŋumufↄↄnfun wa yili gboolo dnɛwee ka nu to mu pan mu u fni.
41005003	Wre blↄ wre, gboolo dnɛ weele nu wraa sni na tro, a pra u pↄ pↄ chiin mu pra, hali jlↄin kuraa nsra ja mbe u pↄ.
41005004	Nyjila biaa ŋga pie asɛɛrɛ na jlↄin tɛɛ mbe u pↄ kre, mbe u yi pile mbe wo, mbe asɛɛrɛ yire kuari, hali kre faŋgafun nsraa wa mbe jaa u yii.
41005005	Kena nyjila kro nu, lafo na blee, gboolo dnɛweele, na nyua ndrɛ na wraa kila na tro, na julo na uyɛ knumu na dnɛ ni.
41005006	Ŋga blↄ wre na klu mna Yesu nya haalee kre, a wra fɛ mna pan mu kosie kan u yiɛ.
41005007	Mna paara gedeeŋge Yesu pan mbo, "Ŋu Yesu, nyjeeri Nyiɛkpↄↄ Pↄ wre, kala ŋgi ni mi na ŋu nyi hin?" Mbo, "Le Nyiɛkpↄↄ na mbe ma ni fiŋge!"
41005008	Yaka na ma, kre nyjila kre na Yesu yo u pan mbo, "Ŋu ŋumufↄↄn yili u nu mu sɛ!"
41005009	Yesu na kna mna u wie u mɛɛ, a wra kna mbo "Ni mɛɛ Nɛɛmu." Mbo, "Yaka ndra na ma, o nɛɛ."
41005010	A wra Yesu tali chiin na waa shia pe ni mbe yili tra kre nu.
41005011	Kre nyjila kre na prakoe tataara plɛɛ wa nyua kre mbɛɛ na wa na kaa.
