41005012	A ŋumufuɛn pre na Yesu tali na, "O ni mu sɛ le prakoe mblɛ nu."
41005013	A Yesu na pe ŋga kolo, a ŋumufuɛn pre na yili mna sɛ le prakoe pre nu. Ŋga kra pan ma kre prakoe pre kro na mↄŋↄ mna tii landɛɛ kre nu mna sɛ to to epo kre nu, na pie pe prakoe kagbeŋ shiin, a epo kre na pe kro li.
41005014	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, leele mblɛ praa prakoe pre le kre na fɛ mna sɛ kee kre yo chia lam, na see chiɛ nyjɛ yiraa wa wa kre na. A leele na yili mbe sɛ kala ŋga ki pan kre le.
41005015	Ŋga pra pan mna da Yesu lawee kre, pra nya na blↄ ŋmba nu ŋumufↄↄn na nyi, a praa u yeeri Nɛɛmu kre, na uu wa mu yoŋgo tↄ mu tni na yiɛtom ni, a kra tia fiɛrɛ na pe yii.
41005016	Leele mblɛ pra nya kala ŋga Yesu na pe blↄ wre na, na kee ŋga kra pe prakoe pre na kre, naa ki yuu lenɛɛrɛ pre pan.
41005017	Ŋga lenɛɛrɛ pre na kee kre loo kre, a praa Yesu tali na u yili pe pan tra kre nu mbe sɛ.
41005018	Ŋga Yesu naa lee krↄ nu mbe sɛ kre, blↄ ŋmba nu ŋumufuɛn na nyi a u yiɛ na to kre na Yesu tali mbe taa u kro.
41005019	Yesu na je, mna kna mu yo u pan na, "Sɛ mu katoo mu sɛ yo mu leele pan, kala ŋga mu Tafun wre pe mu mu ŋga, na mu fooro ŋga u chin."
41005020	A blↄ wre na sɛ mnaa kee nyjɛ Yesu na pe mu u ŋga kre yuu Dekapoli chiɛ kɛ yire na, a kra lenɛɛrɛ pe kawako ni.
41005021	Ŋga Yesu na ndru mu kun krↄ ni mu sɛ epo kre kro kre, lenɛɛrɛ na pan mna u fni epo kre nyu na.
41005022	Judae fninyuŋgo loplombo pre wa, praa u yeeri Jairↄs, na pan wa. Ŋga wra Yesu nya kre a wra hɛ kosie kan u yiɛ,
41005023	mna u tali na, "Ni pↄ bichable, u chaa ku. Kena pan mu sɛ kɛ taa u na, mbe u faŋga ta mbe ŋmaa ta ni pan."
41005024	A Yesu na blↄ wre naa shie u katoo. Ŋga praa shie kre, lenɛɛrɛ na taa pe kro mna wɛ u na kuraa.
41005025	Bawa chlↄ wa, na nyimi woni u pan suwi yɛlɛ kɛmbↄshiin na kra kun.
41005026	Na u kala nya paa tuwe lefɛɛnlɛ tataara kɛɛ, mu u swa na u wejinyirɛ kro tɛɛ mu tuweele le mu pra, na fuŋga ki taa mu sheli.
41005027	Wra Yesu kee loo mna pan mu chaa lenɛɛrɛ pre nu Yesu kro, mna hɛ kɛ taa Yesu dodoŋgi na.
41005028	Mbo, "Na ni kɛ taa u dodoŋgi na kuraa, mbe ŋmaa ta."
41005029	Titɛɛ kre nu to, a nyimi kre kraa woni u pan kre na kun, a wra chin u wejiŋge nu na u saanla.
41005030	Ŋga chlↄ wre na kɛ taa Yesu dodoŋgi kre na kre, Yesu na chin titɛɛ kre nu na faŋga ka yili u nu, a wra viŋge mu kna lenɛɛrɛ pre nu mu pe wie mbo, "Ŋmbi u kɛ taa ni dodoŋgi na ŋga hin?"
41005031	A u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Ŋu titi nya imi leele mblɛ wɛ mu na, a mu tuwi na wie na ŋmbi u gbun mu na?"
41005032	Yesu na yiɛ wa mbe le na we ndro ŋmba u kee kre pe kre nya.
41005033	Ŋga chlↄ wre na chin kee ŋga ki pe u nu kre ndra na, wra fiɛrɛ na seere wru mna pan mu kosie kan Yesu yiɛ, mna kee kre kpra yo Yesu pan.
41005034	A Yesu na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Ni pↄ, mu shↄnlie mu ŋmaa shↄ. Sɛ na wejinyiŋge ni. Mu yira kre, ki laa mu na mbe mu faŋga ta."
41005035	Ŋga wraa wa na paara kre to, a leele na yiri Judae fninyuŋgo lopom wre katoo mna pan mu yo u pan mbo, "Mu pↄ bichable wre ku. Mni a mu kro na nyinafun wre hau na hin?"
41005036	Yesu nsra taa pe wo kre na, a wra kna mu yo Judae fninyuŋgo lopom wre pan mbo, "Maa fiɛ! La, shↄnlie ta rɛ!"
41005037	Bawa Yesu na tia leele pre na laa u kro, a kra kro wre na Pita na Jemisi na Jↄn, Jemisi chunu wre chiin.
41005038	Ŋga pra da Judae fninyuŋgo lopom wre katoo kre, wra leele tataara nya katoo wa, pra gble na nyɛni, a katoo kre wɛɛri poŋgo.
41005039	Ŋga wra le katoo wa kre, a wra yo leele pre pan mbo, "Mni a e na gble na nyɛni imi hin? Pↄ wre n ku. Sni u sni!"
41005040	A pra laa mu to na Yesu tɛɛ. A Yesu na leele pre ni peii mna yili katoo kre nu, mna pↄ wre lɛ na u lo bali mu ya u kotↄmblↄ taarɛ mblɛ ni wra sɛ wa kre na, a pra le lawee ŋga nu pra pↄ wre sniŋge kre.
41005041	A Yesu na bichable wre kɛ yii mu kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Talita kumi!" Ki nyina na, "Bichable, ni yo mu pan na yiri!"
41005042	Titɛɛ kre nu, a bichable wre na yiri mu yire, na nyaari. Kre nyjila kre na pↄ wre li yɛlɛ kɛmbↄshiin. Kra mblɛ praa wa wa kre kro pe kawako.
41005043	A Yesu na kna mu pe jaari paa na pia shia ti mbe ndro ki loo, la, pe yaka cha mbe pↄ wre ŋga mbe u ka.
41006001	Yesu na yili wa mna sɛ wre titi chia. Ŋga wraa shie kre u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na taa u kro.
41006002	Ŋga Judae pre wuuble na to, a wra sɛ pe fninyuŋgo wa na pe nyina Nyiɛkpↄↄ ketaan kre. Leele tataara mblɛ pra kee kre loo kre, kra pe pe kawako. A praa yuu mbo, "Sena ŋmba sɛ kee nyjɛ nyini ta ŋga hin?" Mbo, "Mni u pe mu kachindɛ ŋga sembremu twan ŋga hin?" Mbo, "Kawako kee nyjɛ u piin ŋga nↄↄ yi ŋgi hin?"
41006003	Mbo, "Kapinta wre ma ŋmbaa? Maria pↄ wre, Jemisi na Josɛf na Juda na Siimↄn ee nyjↄ wre maa? Wre na u jaala kuraa oo wa mna?" Ŋga kra pan ma kre, leele pre kro krↄ na kun na u ni.
41006004	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan, mbo, "Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun kro, pra u shↄnli u chia, na u sele, na u katoo nu."
41006005	Kra tia Yesu nsra ja mna kekpↄↄ ka pe wa, fↄŋga yambla chiɛri mblɛ na wra kɛ taa mna pe tra.
41006006	Kra Yesu pe kawako ni na u wolo pre nsra shↄnli. A wraa kila kabɛɛlɛ yire na, na pe nyina Nyiɛkpↄↄ ketaan kre.
41006007	A Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ kɛmbↄshiin pre yeeri mna pan u jaara, mna pe mbra shiin shiin mna pe tun ketaan kre yohaa. Wra pe ŋga jaŋga mbe pe tɛɛ mbra ŋumufuɛn woni leele nu.
41006008	Yesu na yo pe pan na pia shia sɛ na yaka ni kolo kre na, fↄŋga kaan yii wo chiin.
41006009	Mbo, pia shia sɛ na sro ndee, tↄkli ndee, mbe swa le greree nu, pe kpawrɛ le la pia shia dodonyi shiin shiin wru.
41006010	A Yesu na ndru mu yo pe pan mbo, "Mna ee le katoo ka nu kpan, e tni wa e hɛ su nyjila ŋga nu ee yili kre chia kre na."
41006011	Mbo, "A mblɛ lawee ee le a pe n shia e shↄ, ndee pe n shia e kee kre loo kre, na e waa yili wa na shie kre, mbe e e jeelee lam tra pↄ mbe wo wa, mbe ki pe sisam dansiɛrɛ li."
41006012	A twanfɛɛnlɛ kɛmbↄshiin pre na sɛ ketaan kre yo na leele pe pe jawala chinɛ.
41006013	A pra ŋumufuɛn wↄ leele nu tataara, mna yambla tataara fa na tlade simi ni mna pe tra.
41006014	A Ŋunu Hɛrodi na Yesu kee loo. Na u mɛɛ kpali mu tro kro, a plɛ na yo mbo, "Jↄn, ŋmba wraa leele ndrɛ jee kre, u ndru mu nyi." Mbo, "Kre ki tia a u faŋga ta mu ja na kawako kee nyjɛ pini ma kre."
41006015	A plɛ naa yuu mbo, "Elaija wi." A plɛ na yo mbo, "Ki pe na fawolo Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ pre wa wi."
41006016	Ŋga Hɛrodi na ki loo kre, mbo "Jↄn, ŋmba ndra ndaa kↄ kre, u ndru mu nyi kre."
41006017	Na Hɛrodi wre tia pe Jↄn yii mna sɛ le nyuŋgo, Hɛrodias, ŋmba wra pe u chunu Filipo chↄ, a wra u shↄ mu leŋge kre ndra na.
41006018	Mbo nde Jↄn na yo u pan na ki n fna mbe u u chunu chↄ leŋge.
41006019	Kee ŋga ndra na, Hɛrodias, Hɛrodi chↄ wre, u krↄ na kun na Jↄn ni, a wraa u chaa mbe gbo, a wa ki ja.
41006020	Hɛrodi wre titi naa Jↄn fiɛ. Wra chin na Jↄn pe lewo ŋmba u fraka mu pe cheche, kra tia wra tↄ u na, u chↄ wre kɛɛ. Na Jↄn paara u pan kre, kraa u hau tataara, a nde u yiɛ naa shio u kayooro na.
41006021	Nyiɛnyↄↄrↄ ble ka na to Hɛrodias pan, a u plↄ Hɛrodi naa u seble lii. Wra kɛ wa mna u lekpↄɛ na u loplombo na Galilii wa loplombo yeeri a pra pan mu fni mbe pe yiɛ shↄ.
41006022	A u chↄ Hɛrodias pↄ bichable wa na pan mu yↄ a kra Hɛrodi na u loplombo mblɛ praa wa wa kre yiɛ shↄ. A ŋunu wre na kna mu yo bichable wre pan mbo, "Ni wie yira ŋga mu chaa kpan. Mbe mu ŋga ki yi."
41006023	A wra da mu pↄ wre ŋga mbo, "Yira ŋga mu ni wie kpan, mbe mu ŋga ki yi, hali ni ŋunumu ŋga ni lii ŋga yↄↄ."
41006024	A bichable wre na yili mna sɛ u lo wie mbo, "Maa, ni sɛ yira ŋgi wie hin?" A u lo na kna mbo, "Sɛ yo na Jↄn ndrajefun wre ndra mu chaa."
41006025	Titɛɛ kre nu, a wra ndru nyaanyaa mna sɛ ŋunu wre lawee mna yo mbo, "Ni chaa mbe mu Jↄn ndrajefun wre ndra taa taa paawa na mbe ni ŋga fuŋgaami."
41006026	Kra ŋunu wre yaa paa, a na u danyi yire na u fumblↄ pre praa wa u jaara kre ndra na, u nsraa chaa mbe kↄ yi na mbe je pↄ wre pan.
41006027	Titɛɛ kre nu, a wra u ndrakↄŋu wↄ mu tun na u sɛ pan na Jↄn ndra ni. A wra sɛ u ndra kↄ nyuŋgo wa,
41006028	mna taa taa paawa na mna pan mu bichable wre ŋga, a wra sɛ u lo ŋga ki yi.
41006029	Ŋga Jↄn twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na ki loo na pe u gbo kre, a pra pan mna u gboo kre wru mna sɛ le.
41006030	Yesu bitumblↄ mblɛ wra tun kre na yiri pe kolo kre na mna pan mna kee nyjɛ pra hɛ pe na nyjɛ pra hɛ nyina yire krɛɛrɛ yo u pan.
41006031	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan, mbo, "E yili e sɛ lawee waa ka nu e hɛ wuu chiɛri." Na pan leele pre nɛɛ wa na shie na paan. Kra tia pe nsra kolo ta kuraa mbe yaka ka.
41006032	A pra le krↄ nu mna sɛ lawee waa ka nu.
41006033	Leele pre plɛ na pe nya pe sɛhaa, mna chin na pre lɛ, a pra wru tra, mu yili chiɛ yire kro na, mna fɛ mna sɛ yiɛ klu pe na.
41006034	Ŋga Yesu na yili krↄ kre nu mna tii kre, wra leele nya tataara, a pe kee na pe fooro ni u pan, imi na pra pe na mbaala mblɛ pe n lefɛɛnlɛ ni lɛ kre. A Yesu na yire wa mna pe nyina Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee kre tataara.
41006035	Ŋga yila na kↄ kre, Yesu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na pan u jaara, mna pan mu yo u pan, mbo "Mna pe fimi lawee, a yila kↄ.
41006036	Kena leele pre wa kolo mbe pe sɛ seele na kabɛɛlɛ nyjɛ yii wa mbɛɛlɛ na mna ŋga na mbe sɛ yɛyɛ chaa lↄↄ ka."
41006037	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "E pe ŋga yaka mbe pe ka ɛ." A twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "O sɛ mbe hɛ paanu lↄ tataara denari lafaa shiin wie mbe paan pe ŋga ra?"
41006038	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Paanu mni ni e nyi hin? E sɛ yi le." A pra sɛ yi le mbo, "Yii paanu kunↄ na mbroe shiin."
41006039	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "E ti mbe leele pre ble ble peyɛ na, nyaa yire na."
41006040	A leele pre na ble ble peyɛ na, lafaa lafaa, na fuloeshiin na kɛkɛ.
41006041	A Yesu na paanu kunↄ yire na mbroe shiin pre bali mu yii kɛɛ, mna yiɛ wa nyjeeri mna dwan mu le yi nu. Wra paanu yire knumu mna u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre ŋga na pe leele pre kɛ kɛ imi na pe tni tni kre, mna ndru mu mbroe shiin pre pile mu pe ŋga kro.
41006042	A leele pre kro na ka mna yↄↄ.
41006043	Ŋga pra ka mu kↄ kre, a pra paanu yire na mbroe pre knumɛɛ nyjɛ yira kro kre koli kakɛɛ nyini kɛmbↄshiin.
41006044	Leele mblɛ pra yi ka kre naa bilɛ kagbeŋ kunↄ.
41006045	Titɛɛ kre nu a Yesu na tia u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na le krↄ nu mbe yiɛ klu mbe hɛ epo kro chia ŋga pe yeeri Bɛtsaida kre na, mbe u leele pre wa kolo mbe chiin pan.
41006046	Ŋga Yesu na leele pre wa kolo mu kↄ kre, a wra hɛ nyua ka na, mbe wre na Nyiɛkpↄↄ hɛ paara.
41006047	Ŋga ble naa woo kre, na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre da na krↄ kre ni epo kre lalaa, a Yesu chiin na wa tra fimi na.
41006048	A wra nya na pe sɛhaa yiɛ shelii pe na, na fuflɛ kre yiri pe yiɛ na gbuun na paan. Na kie pe nyisee nyu na, a wra nyaari epo kre yiɛ na, mna pan pe jaara. Wraa chaa mbe tro pe mbɛɛ na.
41006049	Ŋga u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na u nya na u nyaari epo kre yiɛ na kre, praa jawa na gboo wi, mna gble fↄↄri mu le.
41006050	A pe kro na kna mu u nya, a gbun na yↄ pe na. Titɛɛ kre nu to, a Yesu na paara na pe ni, mna yo pe pan mbo, "E eyɛ yii! Mi wi, yaa fiɛ!"
41006051	A Yesu na le pe kro krↄ kre nu, a fuflɛ kre na yire. A kra pe pe kawako ni mu tro.
41006052	Na pe n paanu yire leele tataara pre na ka mu pra kre nↄↄ loo, a pe kala nↄↄ loohaa naa wa mu sheli tɛ.
41006053	Ŋga pra kun kre, pra sɛ to Genesarɛt tra nu, mna tii wa.
41006054	Ŋga pra tii krↄ kre nu kre, titɛɛ kre nu, leele mblɛ praa wa wa kre na u chin na Yesu wi.
41006055	A pra tafɛŋgɛ wru mna tro mbɛɛlɛ chiɛ nyjɛ yiraa wa wa yire kro na, mnaa paan na yambla mblɛ pee wa mu sni sni dɛŋglɛ na kro ni, mna pie loo na u nyi kpan.
41006056	Lawee ŋga nu Yesu we sɛ kpan, see chiɛ na o, kakpↄɛ na o, seele nu o, praa yilii na yambla pre ni lete na mbra u tali na u ti mbe yambla pre kɛ taa u dodoŋgi nyu chiin na, a lenɛɛrɛ mblɛ pra ja mu kɛ taa u dodoŋgi kre na kpan na saanla.
41007001	Ki ble ka Farisiifɛɛnlɛ pre plɛ na pe nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre plɛ na yiri Jerusalɛm na mna pan mu fni Yesu lawee.
41007002	Bawa pra nya na Yesu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre plɛ kɛnyi nyjɛ pe n je tɛɛ na lii.
41007003	Kre nyjila kre na Farisiie pre, na pre Judae pre kro, na wa n kɛnyi je chiriri wa li na yi ni ma. Ŋgi na pe fa loplombo paala yire kro praa toni.
41007004	Na pe yiri jafa na mu pan kuraa, na pe n peyɛ je, pia li, a paala yire tataara naa wa a pra yi piin. Pe gbↄyirɛ, na pe chↄɛ, na pe tↄↄnrↄ yirɛ nyjɛ ni pe sro piin kro, fↄŋga pie yi je mbe chiin yi tɛɛ mbe yaka pe.
41007005	A kra tia Farisiie pre na nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre na Yesu wie, mbo, "Ŋgi ki tia a mu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na li fa loplombo kee yire na, mu na kɛnyi nyjɛ pe n je tɛɛ na lii hin?"
41007006	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan, mbo, "Yɛŋgɛ na Yisaia na yire yiɛnyumufɛɛnlɛ mblɛ kee nya mu yo kre, imi na pe ki nyunↄ u hlɛ kre nu mbo, 'Leele mblɛ, nyu ni pe ni mɛɛ yeeri, a nde pe n na ni chaa pe lolonyi nu.
41007007	Finfin pe ni sumi, leele mbra nyjɛ pe le yire, yire pe leele nyina mu yo Nyiɛkpↄↄ mbra yi.'
41007008	E Nyiɛkpↄↄ mbra yire ti, mu fawolo kee yire yi kɛshiin."
41007009	Mna ndru mu yo pe pan mbo, "E ki chin, imi na ee Nyiɛkpↄↄ kolo kre wa mbe taa e fawolo kee yire na.
41007010	Mbose na yo mbo, 'Mu lɛ na mu lo ŋga buuro.' 'Ŋmba we u lo ndee u lɛ kee sisaa yo kre, kum ki fna mbe e ti u ku.'
41007011	A yire rɛ, e yo na, na ndro yo u lɛ ndee u lo pan na, 'Tnu yira ŋga ee na ta mbe yili ni pan kre, ki pe srayira.'
41007012	Kena e na ti mbe ufun yaka pe mbe u lɛ ndee u lo ŋga na.
41007013	A e na fawolo kee nyjɛ krɛɛrɛ teeri na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee kre klai. Hali kee nyjɛ nyini tataara wa, a e na yi pini, na teeri e krofɛɛnlɛ pan."
41007014	A wra lenɛɛrɛ pre kro yeeri, a pra pan mu fni u jaara, a wra kna mbo, "E kro e ndie tɛɛ e loo. E kee kre nↄↄ loo.
41007015	Fimi yira ka n wa, ŋga kie le lewo nu mbe jaa u tↄ nɛɛrɛ ni fↄna nyjɛ yie yiri u lam mbe yili fimi na kre, yire yi ja na lewo toni nɛɛrɛ ni.
41007016	Ŋmba uu wa ndie ni kre, ti ufun ndie tɛɛ mbe loo."
41007017	Ŋga Yesu na yili lenɛɛrɛ pre nu mna sɛ katoo kre, a u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na u wie yomini kre nↄↄ.
41007018	A Yesu na kna mu pe wie mbo, "Pan yire kuraa kala nↄↄ loohaa sheli imi ra? Kena e n chin na fimi yira ŋga ki lee lewo lɛɛ kre na ja mbe u tↄ na nɛɛrɛ ni ra?
41007019	Ŋgi na, na kra le u loloŋgo nu, lɛɛ ki lee, mbe sɛ yili mbe wo tra nu." Kena wra nyina na sro kro nyu.
41007020	A wra kna mu yo mbo, "Ŋga ki yilii lewo lam mbe pan kre, kre ki u toni na nɛɛrɛ ni."
41007021	Mbo, "Lewo loloŋgo nu jawala sisaa yilii na paan. Tɛtiɛrɛɛ kee, juuro kee, linkuuro kee,
41007022	chachaara, blɛchaara, yira kro chaara, ndra shelee, dnumu lie, jajaara, nyibinyiɛ sisaa, kro yoo, yiɛkpↄↄmu, kepele fↄↄn yire
41007023	sisam kee nyjɛ krɛɛrɛ, lewo loloŋgo nu yi kro yilii na paan, na nɛɛrɛ woni lewo na."
41007024	A Yesu na yiri wa mna sɛ Tiro na Sidon lawee yire nu. Ŋga wra sɛ kre, wra sɛ le katoo ka nu. U nsraa chaa mbe ndro u lee loo a na wa jaa ndra.
41007025	Na ŋumufↄↄn wa chlↄ wa pↄ bichable wa nu, titɛɛ kre nu a chlↄ wre na Yesu kee loo mna pan mu kosie kan u yiɛ,
41007026	nde na Hela ndro wi chlↄ wre, a u sehaa kre, wra pe Siro-Foinika ndro. A wra Yesu tali na u ŋumufↄↄn wre wↄ mbe yili u pↄ wre nu.
41007027	A Yesu na kna mu yo chlↄ wre pan mbo, "Ti mbe biile pre yↄↄ tun." Mbo, "Ki n fna mbe mu biile sro wru mbe wa nyukwanla pan."
41007028	A chlↄ wre na kna mu yo Yesu pan, mbo, "Kii wa ma, ni Tafun, ande nyukwanla mblɛ pee wa tebru tapan kre kuraa kre, pe biile sro knumɛɛ nyjɛ yi mbru na woni tra kre yoori na kaa."
41007029	A Yesu na kna, mbo, "Kee ŋga mu yo ŋga ndra na sɛ. Ŋumufↄↄn wre yili mu pↄ wre nu."
41007030	Ŋga chlↄ wre na ndru mna sɛ le katoo kre, wra sɛ da na ŋumufↄↄn wre yili u pↄ wre nu mu sɛ, a uu wa mu sni dɛŋglɛ na.
41007031	Yesu na yili Tiro tra nu, mna tro Sidon na mu sɛ Dakapoli tra nu, Galilii epo kre mbɛɛ na.
41007032	Bawa leele plɛ na pan na geŋgefun dintaana wa ni Yesu pan, mna Yesu tali na u kɛ taa u na.
41007033	A Yesu na dintaana wre bali mu yili lenɛɛrɛ pre nu chiɛri mna u kambɛɛlɛɛ le le u ndiile nu, mna tɛɛnrɛ hlu u kambɛlɛ na mu taa u ndile na,
41007034	mna yiɛ wa mna le nyjeeri, mu ŋu mu tii lam mna kna mu yo mbo, "Hafata! Ki nyina na, Nyaa."
41007035	Titɛɛ kre nu to, a blↄ wre ndiile na nyaala, a u ndile na saan, a wra ja mna paara kama.
41007036	A Yesu na leele pre jaari na pia shia kee kre kpali mbe leele loo, a imi na wraa pe jaari, pan chↄↄ praa kee kre kpali na shie yiɛ.
41007037	Kee kre na pe pe kawako ni mu tro, a praa yuu, mbo u yirɛ kro piin chichie, u tia a ndikambla na ndru, a kpoolo na paara.
41008001	Kre lalaa kre nu, ki ble ka, leele na pan mu nɛɛ Yesu lawee, a kra pan na pe n yaka ta mbe ka kre, Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre yeeri mna yo pe pan,
41008002	mbo, "Lenɛɛrɛ mblɛ kee pe fooro ni ni pan, yaka ma. Pe ja mu tni ni jaara mu taala ble taarɛ yi ŋga, a pe n yaka ni mbe ka.
41008003	A na ni tia pe sɛ na klo ni pe katooe nu ma kre, pe yiɛ we wↄ pe na kolo, ŋga pe plɛ yiri haalee kre ndra na."
41008004	A u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na kna mu u wie, mbo, "A hena ndro we ja mbe paanu ta fimi lawee ŋga nu mbe leele mblɛ ŋga mbe pe ka mbe yↄↄ hin?"
41008005	A Yesu na kna mu pe wie mbo, "Paanu mni yii wa e pan hin?" A pra yo, "Kↄↄnashin!"
41008006	A wra tia leele pre na tni tra. A Yesu na paanu kↄↄnashin yire wru mna Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋga mboo, mna yi pile mna le u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre kɛɛ na pe leele pre kɛ.
41008007	Na mbroe chiɛri plɛ wa pe pan, a wra pe shↄ mna dwan mu le pe nu, mna yo na pe pe kɛ mbe ya leele pre pan.
41008008	A leele pre na ka mna yↄↄ, a pra yi knumɛɛ nyjɛ yira kro kre koli kakɛɛ nyini kↄↄnashin.
41008009	Na leele pre we pe kagbeŋ jijirɛ, a wra chin mna pe wa kolo.
41008010	Titɛɛ kre nu, a Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na le krↄ nu mna sɛ Dalmanuta lawee yire nu.
41008011	Bawa Farisiie pre na yili mna pan, mnaa Yesu wie kee bɛɛlɛ, mna u penle na u nyjeeri kawako kee ka pe mbe pe nya.
41008012	A Yesu na ŋu fɛɛn, mna yo pe pan mbo, "Ŋgi ki tia a aŋga leele na kawako kee chaa mbe nya ŋga hin? Kpra na ni yuu e pan na aŋga leele mblɛ wa kawako kee ka nya na nyini ni."
41008013	A wra pe ti wa mna ndru mna sɛ tni krↄ kre nu na, mna sɛ epo kro kokoo ka na.
41008014	Ŋga praa shie kre, pra fɛɛ a pe nsra paanu wru, a yaka nsraa wa pe pan krↄ kre lam na paanu nunu chom ka bↄkↄ.
41008015	A wra kna mna yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo, "E dↄↄ ta. E eyɛ le chichie Farisiie pre yiisi kre, na Hɛrodi yiisi yire na."
41008016	U twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na ki kna peyɛ ni na paanu n wa pe pan mbe pe ka.
41008017	Ŋga Yesu na pe dↄↄ ta ma kre, a wra kna mna yo pe pan, mbo, "Mni a e na jawa na paanu n wa e pan ŋga hin? Kena e n nya tun ra? A e n kee kre nↄↄ loo tun ra? E kala nↄↄ loohaa wa mu sheli tɛ ra?
41008018	Nyiɛlɛ wa e pan, a nde e n na nyaa, a ndiile wa e pan, a nde e n na ndru. E le, kena e na kee sↄↄnri ra?
41008019	Ŋga ndaa paanu kunↄ knumu mna bilɛ kagbeŋ kunↄ ŋga kre, knumɛɛ kakɛɛ nyini mni e na koli hin?" A pra kna mna yo u pan mbo, "Kɛmbↄshiin!"
41008020	"A ŋga ndaa kↄↄnashin knumu mna leele kagbeŋ jijirɛ ŋga kre, knumɛɛ kakɛɛ nyini mni e na koli hin?" A pra yo mbo, "Kↄↄnashin!"
41008021	A wra kna mbo, "Kre e je, a e n nↄↄ loo ta tun ŋgaa?"
41008022	Ŋga pra le Bɛtsaida na kre, pra pan mu u ŋga fuun wa mna u tali na u u kɛ taa u na.
41008023	A Yesu na fuun wre kɛ yii mna yili na u ni chia kre lam, mbookrↄ, mna tɛɛnrɛ hlu mu wo u nyiɛlɛ yire na, mna kɛ ta u na mna kna mu u wie mbo, "Mu nyaa ra?"
41008024	A wra yɛ yire mna yo Yesu pan mbo, "Ni leele nyaa a pra tro, a la ni pe nyaa na tinyi yi."
41008025	A Yesu na ndru mu kɛ taa u nyiɛlɛ yire na na, a wraa le haan, to, mna saanla, mnaa nyaa chiriri.
41008026	A wra tia wra sɛ u katoo, mna yo u pan na waa shia tro chia kre lam.
41008027	Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na yiri wa mna sɛ Kaisaria Filipi kabɛɛlɛ yire na. Ŋga praa shie kre, a wra u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre wie, mbo, "Ndro ŋmbi sembremu leele ni jawa hin?"
41008028	A pra kna mbo, "Pe yo na Jↄn ndrajefun wre wi ŋu, a plɛ yo Elaija wi ŋu, a plɛ na yuu na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ pre wa wi ŋu."
41008029	A Yesu na kna mna pe wie mbo, "A yire, ndro ŋmbi e ni jawa hin?" A Pita na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Ŋu wi Kristo ŋmba Nyiɛkpↄↄ wↄ wre."
41008030	A Yesu na pe jaari na pia shia u kee yo ndro pan.
41008031	Ba Yesu na yire mna na pe nyina kanyana tataara nyjɛ yi fna mbe wre lewo pↄ wre nya, na imi na loplombo na sↄfue loplombo na pe nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre we laa u kro mbe pe u gbo, ki ble taarɛ ble na mbe u ndru mbe nyi.
41008032	Ŋga wra kee kre yo mu wali ma kre, a Pita na u yeeri brɛmm mna sɛ na u ni mbɛɛ ka na, mna sɛ u yiɛ kee yo u pan.
41008033	A Yesu na kna mu twanfɛɛnlɛ hamblɛ pre le komm mna kna mu Pita yiɛ kee yo u pan mbo, "Sutna, laa ni na. Mu n na Nyiɛkpↄↄ haa jawa, fↄna lewo haa."
41008034	A Yesu na lenɛɛrɛ pre na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre yeeri mu pan u jaara mna yo pe pan, mbo, "Na ndro chaa mbe taa ni kro kre, ufun u uyɛ fɛɛ, mbe u kanyana kumu kaan kre wru mbe taa ni kro.
41008035	Ndro ŋmba we na kɛ toni u ŋmaa na kre, kie yili u kɛɛ, a ŋmba we u ŋmaa wa mbe fun mi na ketaan kre ndra na kre, we u yira ta.
41008036	Na ndro waŋgra ŋga kro ta, mu u ŋmaa wa mu fun, tnu ŋgi kii wa ki nu hin?
41008037	Ndee kena yira ŋgi ni lewo we jaa tɛɛ mbe u ŋmaa chinɛ na hin?
41008038	A ndro ŋmba we nyifɛɛrɛ pe mi na ni kee kre na, aŋga leele leŋgeere klafɛɛnlɛ na sisampefɛɛnlɛ mblɛ nu kre, wrefun kee we pe lewo pↄ wre pan nyifɛɛrɛ ni na, ŋga ble wre Yesu na Nyiɛkpↄↄ bitumblↄ chechee pre we pan u Lɛ yɛnyiŋge kre nu kre."
41009001	A Yesu na yo pe pan mbo, "Kpra na ni yuu e pan na plɛɛ wa mu yire mna, a pia kumu naa mbe le kuraa mbe hɛ su ŋga pie Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nya na ki pan na jaŋga ni."
41009002	Ble kↄↄnanu kↄkro kre, Yesu na sɛ na Pita, na Jemisi, na Jↄn chiin ni nyua gedeeŋge ka na. Bawa wra chinɛ pe yiɛ na,
41009003	a u dodoŋgi naa chiɛnri mu fniŋge prupru u na, hali kre yonyi jefun n wa tra ŋga na mbe jaa yoŋgo je mbe ki fniŋge ma.
41009004	Bawa Elaija na Mbose na peyɛ wↄ mu pe nyina a pre na Yesu naa paara.
41009005	A Pita na kna mu yo Yesu pan, mbo "Rabi (O Nyinafun)," mbo, "ki nyu paa na oo wa mna. Kena ti mbe o sugbɛɛ taarɛ sin e pan, ŋu wo nunu, Mbose wo nunu, Elaija wo nunu."
41009006	Pita nsra chin kee ŋga u yuu, yaka ndra na ma, na fiɛrɛ pe yii paa.
41009007	Bawa tlo badaaŋga ka na pan mna pe tↄ, a mana ka na yili ki nu mbo, "Ŋmba wi ni pↄ ŋmba ni kori kre. Kena e ndie tɛɛ u pan."
41009008	Titɛɛ kre nu ŋga pra kna kre, pe nsra ndro nya na, na pre na Yesu chiin bↄkↄ.
41009009	Ŋga pra yiri nyua kre na na tri kre, Yesu na pe jaari na pia shia kee nyjɛ pe nya kre yo mbe ndro loo, fↄŋga lewo pↄ wre ku mu nyi tun.
41009010	A pra tia kee kre na kro pe ndra, a pra kna na peyɛ wie, mbo, "Mbe ku mbe ndruu nyi na, kre nↄↄ yi ŋgi hin?"
41009011	A pra Yesu wie mbo, "Ŋgi ki tia a Judae nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre na nyina na ki fna mbe Elaija klu mbe pan Kristo wre na hin?"
41009012	A wra yo pe pan mbo, "Yɛŋgɛ! Na Elaija n klu mu pan mu yirɛ kro gbeele, wa jaa pan. A mni a pe ki nyunↄ na lewo pↄ wre we kala nya tataara, mbe pe u le na lewaa wi hin?
41009013	La ni yuu e pan na, Elaija pan fuŋga ma, a nyjɛ praa chaa, pra yi taa u na, imi na pra ki nyunↄ mu tɛɛ kre."
41009014	Ŋga pra pan mu da twanfɛɛnlɛ hamblɛ pre na kre, pra nya na leele tataara fɛ mu pe kun, pre na nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre na peyɛ wie kee bɛɛlɛ.
41009015	Titɛɛ kre nu, ŋga leele pre na Yesu nya kre, kra pe fo, a pra fɛ mna sɛ u shaari.
41009016	A Yesu na pe wie mbo, "Yira ŋgi kee yire na pre eyɛ wie hin?"
41009017	A leele pre nunu na kna mbo, "Nyinafun, ŋumufↄↄn uu wa ni pↄ nu, a ki tia u pe kpo. Wre ni ni pan mu pan.
41009018	Lawee ŋga nu kie yiri u nu kpan, mbe ki u chan tra, mbe ti u sheli, mbe u nyu na tafↄkↄ kuun, mbe wra u ŋgaala kaa. Kre ni pan mu yo mu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan na pe yira kre wↄ mbe yili u nu, a pe n ja mu ki wↄ."
41009019	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Oo! Yire aŋga leele mblɛ nu shↄnlie n wa, ni tni e jaara mbe hɛ su nyjila ŋgi nu hin? E pan na u ni e ni ŋga."
41009020	A pra pan na u ni mu u ŋga. Ŋga ŋumu kre na Yesu nya kre, a kra u viŋge, mna chan tra, na u gbila, a u nyu naa tafↄkↄ kuun.
41009021	A Yesu na pↄ wre lɛ wie mbo, "Ŋga ki u pe ki mu ra?" A wra kna mbo, "U bimi ki yire na u ni.
41009022	Ki u chaan kanhun na nyumu nu, mbe chaa u gbo. Kena na mu kolo ka chin mbe jaa pe o pan kre, o fooro le, mu ya o na."
41009023	A Yesu na kna mu u wie mbo, "Mu yo, na mbe jaa? Yira kro we jaa nyu mbe ŋmba u shↄnli ŋga."
41009024	Titɛɛ kre nu a pↄ wre lɛ na paara kpↄↄ mu yo Yesu pan, mbo, "Ni shↄnli. Jande, na ni n shↄnli kpↄↄ kuraa o, ya ni na."
41009025	Ŋga Yesu na nya na lenɛɛrɛ feni na paan na yaa kre, a wra fuu ŋumufↄↄn kre na, mbo, "Ŋu ŋumu kpo, ni yo mu pan na, yili u nu mu sɛ, maa shia le u nu na."
41009026	A ŋumufↄↄn kre na pↄ wre chan tra, a wraa gble leni, na uyɛ tini na jaŋga ni, a ŋumufↄↄn wre na chin mu yili u nu. A wra pe na gboo wi, a lenɛɛrɛ naa yuu mbo, "U ku!"
41009027	A Yesu na u kɛ yii mna u yire, a wra yiri mu yire.
41009028	Ŋga Yesu na yiri wa mu sɛ katoo kre, a u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre chiin na u wie mbo, "Ŋgi ki tia wre n ja mu ŋumufↄↄn kre wↄ pↄ wre nu hin?"
41009029	A wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Kre yira ŋga nyini rɛ, ma jaa yaka tɛɛ mbe ki wↄ, fↄŋga mu blefun na nyiɛtalaa ni."
41009030	Ŋga pra yili wa kre, pra hɛ tro Galilii na, a u nsraa chaa mbe ndro u kee loo.
41009031	Na kre nyjila kre u u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre nyina, na pie wre Lewo Pↄ wre wↄ mbe le leele kɛɛ, mbe pe u gbo, a na pe u gbo, ki ble taarɛ ble na mbe u nyi.
41009032	Kee kre wra yo kre, pe nsra ki nↄↄ loo, a praa fiɛ na pie u wie ki nↄↄ.
41009033	A pra sɛ le Kapɛnↄm na. Ŋga praa wa katoo kre, a Yesu na pe wie, mbo, "Yira ŋgi kee e yuu yuu kolo wa kre hin?"
41009034	A pra pieri, yaka ma kra tia, na kolo wa kre, na peyɛ pe wie na pe ŋmbihaa wi pe lekpↄↄ hin?
41009035	A Yesu na tni mna kɛmbↄshiin pre yeeri mu yo pe pan mbo, "Na wa chaa mbe kↄↄ pe yɛklo kre, u pe e kro kotↄŋↄ, mbe pe e kro sumifun."
41009036	A Yesu na pↄ fiɛɛn wa wru mna yire pe lalaa mna u kↄ mu yii, mna kna mu yo pe pan,
41009037	mbo, "Ŋmba we pↄ imi wa shↄ mi ndra na kre, kena u ni shↄ; a ŋmba we mi shↄ kre, mi ma u shↄ, la ŋmba u ni tun kre u shↄ." Yesu yɛkpↄↄmu kolo tↄ
41009038	A Jↄn na kna mu yo mbo, "Nyinafun, o blↄ wa nya a u mu mɛɛ tɛɛ na ŋumufuɛn woni leele nu, a o u tↄ kolo na u n chaa o nu."
41009039	A Yesu na kna mu yo mbo, "Yaa u tↄ kolo. Ndro wa n wa mbe jaa ni mɛɛ tɛɛ mbe faŋga tnumu tun lawee, mbe kↄ kre na mbe jaa ni kefↄↄn yo wa.
41009040	Ŋmba u n na kee ka piin na o taanla kre, e chin na o kro u nyi.
41009041	Ndro ŋmba we e ŋga nyumu chirɛgbↄↄ nyini mbe e gbↄ, na e pe Kristo wolo kre, kpra na ni yuu e pan na ufun wa ke fↄtↄↄrↄ la."
41009042	"Ŋmba we ti mbe bibɛɛlɛ mblɛ pe ni shↄnli ŋga wa le sisam nu kre, na pra fifiire tre dnɛ badaŋga pↄ ufun lagboo mu u wa epo nu kuraa kaa ki prↄ.
41009043	Kena na mu kɛ shie na mu ni sisam nu kre, ki kun mu wa. Ki nyu mu mu ŋga na mu sɛ na kɛkↄↄn ni ŋmaa lawee mu wɛ ŋga mu kɛnyi shiin ta mbaa sɛ kanyana lawee kre nu, kanhun ŋga kra fii kre nu,
41009044	mna fiɛnlɛ pra ku, a kanhun kre wa fii.
41009045	Na mu jele shie na mu ni sisam nu kre, ki kun mu wa! Ki nyu mu mu ŋga na mu sɛ na jeekↄↄn ni ŋmaa lawee, mu wɛ ŋga mu jeelee shiin ta mbe pe sɛ mu wa kanyana lawee kre nu.
41009047	A na mu nyini shie na mu ni sisam nu kre, ki foli mu wa! Ki nyu mu mu ŋga na mu sɛ na nyini nunu ni Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu nu, mu wɛ ŋga mu shiin ta, mbe pe sɛ na mu ni kanyana lawee kre nu,
41009048	'mna fiɛnlɛ pra ku, a kanhun kre wa fii.'
41009049	Pie kanhun wo ndro kro na mbe u chiin nyu, imi na pe weŋge leni chiin nu mbe yi chiin tna kre.
41009050	Weŋge nyu, a na weŋge ki tnamu wa mu fun, ŋgi ki ki taan na hin? Kena e ti mbe weŋge tni e nu, mbe e wejinyiŋge ta eyɛ nu."
41010001	Ŋga Yesu na yiri wa kre, wra sɛ Judea tra nu, na Jↄↄdan lↄↄ kre kro lawee yire nu. Bawa leele na peyɛ nya nya tataara na paan u lawee wa a wraa pe nyina imi na wraa pini kre.
41010002	Bawa Farisiie pre na pan mna u wie mbo, "Kena lewo blↄ wa na kolo ni na we u chↄ je ŋgaa?" Kena pra ki tɛɛ mbe u pee le.
41010003	A wra kna mna pe wie mbo, "Mbra ŋgi Mbose na le e pan kre hin?"
41010004	A pra kna, mbo, "Mbose na o nyina na, na mu yo mu chlↄ je, ki fna mbe mu jeerehlɛ nyunↄ mbe u ŋga mbe chiin u je."
41010005	A Yesu na kna mbo, "E ndra shelee ndra na wra kre mbra kre le e pan ma."
41010006	Mbo, "Mu yire yirɛ krokro gbeele nyjila kre, kre Nyiɛkpↄↄ na blↄ na chlↄ pe.
41010007	Kre ki tia mbe blↄ u lɛ na u lo ti, mbe hɛ mbra u chↄ na kre,
41010008	mbe pe kro shiin hɛ kaari wejiŋge nunu.
41010009	Kena yira ŋga Nyiɛkpↄↄ mbra kre, yaa ti mbe lewo ki laa."
41010010	Ŋga pra yiri wa mu sɛ katoo kre, u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na u wie kee nunu kre na.
41010011	A wra kna mna yo pe pan, mbo, "Blↄ ŋmba we u chↄ je mbe hɛ fↄŋgↄ leŋge kre, u leŋgeere kla chlↄ wre haa,
41010012	a na chlↄ wre waa u plↄ je maa hɛ fↄŋgↄ leŋge, kena u leŋgeere kla na."
41010013	Bawa praa paan na biile plɛ ni u pan, mbe u kɛ taataa pe na, a u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre naa fuuru leele pre praa paan na biile pre ni kre na, na pia pan na pe ni.
41010014	Ŋga Yesu na pe nya kre, u krↄ na kun, a wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "E biile pre ŋga kolo mbe pe pan ni lawee. Yaa pe tↄ kolo. Mblɛ imi wo yi Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre.
41010015	Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, ŋmba u n Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre shↄ na pↄ wi kre, wa ki ta mbe sɛ."
41010016	A wra biile pre pe atuu! Mna kɛ taataa pe na mna pe dwan.
41010017	Ŋga wra yiri wa mnaa shie kre, blↄ wa na fɛ mna pan mu kosie kan u yiɛ, mna yo u pan mbo "Nyinafun chichie, kee ŋgi mbe pe mbe blenyini ŋmaa ta hin?"
41010018	A Yesu na kna mu u wie mbo, "Mni a mu ni yeeri Nyinafun chichie hin? Ndro n wa mu pe chiriri na nunu wre bↄkↄ, wre wi Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre."
41010019	Mbo, "Mu Nyiɛkpↄↄ mbra yire chin rↄ, maa shia linkuuro kee pe, maa shia leŋgeere kla, a maa shia ju, maa shia kafinɛ dansiɛrɛ li, maa shia dnumu li, mu lɛ na mu lo shↄnli."
41010020	A blↄ wre na kna mu yo u pan, mbo, "Nyinafun, nyjɛ krɛɛrɛ, mu yire ni bimi ni li yi na kro."
41010021	A Yesu na u le kom, mna u kori u loloŋgo nu, mna kna mu yo u pan, mbo, "Ki kro mu kee nunu. Sɛ mu hɛ mu yirɛ nyjɛ yii wa mu pan kro prɛ mu shianfɛɛnlɛ ŋga ki swa kre, mu pan mu taa ni kro, kre mu krↄyirɛ ta nyjeeri."
41010022	Ŋga Yesu na yo ma kre ndra na, u jawala na kla a wra sɛ na fooro ni katoo. Ŋgi ndra na hin? Na wejiyirɛɛ wa blↄ wre pan tataara.
41010023	A Yesu na yiɛ wa mu le mu fni mna kna mu yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo, "E nya imi na kie sheli mbe wejiyirɛfun ŋga na we sɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nu."
41010024	A u kee na weere wo pe na. A Yesu na yo pe pan na, mbo, "Biile e n nya imi na kie sheli mbe mblɛ pe peyɛ taa wejiyirɛ na ŋga, na pie sɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nu ɛ?"
41010025	Mbo, "Kii yiɛyiɛ kuraa yurↄ, ŋmba pe yeeri nyuuma kre pan na we yili minyini wee nu, mu wɛ ŋga swafun we sɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nu."
41010026	Ŋga wra yo ma kre kra pe weeri ni pe pan mu tro, a pra kna na yuu peyɛ pan mbo, "A kena ndro ŋmbi ŋmaa pie shↄ na hin?"
41010027	A Yesu na pe le komm, mna kna mu yo pe pan, mbo, "Lewo kɛhaa kia jaa pan ma, nde Nyiɛkpↄↄ haa ma. Nyiɛkpↄↄ pan rɛ, yira kro we jaa pe."
41010028	Bawa Pita na kna mu yo Yesu pan mbo, "Le, o yira kro kro ti mu pan mu taa mu kro."
41010029	A Yesu na kna mbo "Kpra na ni yuu e pan na ndro n wa mbe u katoo ti, ndee u nyjↄↄlↄ, ndee u chinlɛ, ndee u jaala, ndee u lo, ndee u lɛ, ndee u biile, ndee tra, mi na ketaan kre ndra na,
41010030	mbe wa kalonyi, na nyjↄↄlↄ na chinlɛ na jaala na loolo, na biile na tra, ta ta ma gbee lafaa lafaa mbe ya, mbe pe u pra fuŋgaami tra mna, la, mbakↄ waŋgra kre, blenyini ŋmaa we ta.
41010031	La, yɛkulo tataara we kↄↄ kro tↄ, mbe kotↄmblↄ yiɛklu."
41010032	Ŋga praa shie Jerusalɛm na kre, a Yesu na yɛklu pe pan, a kra weere wo pe na, a fiɛrɛ na mblɛ pra taa u kro kre kro yii. Bawa wra kɛmbↄshiin pre yeeri na, mnaa kee nyjɛ yie u nya kre yuu pe pan,
41010033	mbo, "E le! Jerusalɛm na o shie kre, bawa pie mi lewo pↄ wre wↄ mbe le Judae sↄfue loplombo, na pe nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre kɛɛ, mbe pe ni gbun na kumu pimi ni (na ki fna ni ku), mbe ni wↄ mbe le waŋgra leele kɛɛ,
41010034	mbe praa ni piin mbra tɛɛ, mbe tɛɛnrɛ wo wo ni na, mbe ni frↄ na fuɛ ni, mbe chiin ni gbo. Ki ble taarɛ ble na, mbe ni ndru mbe nyi."
41010035	A Zebedii biile, Jemisi na Jↄn na pan Yesu jaara mna pan mu yo u pan mbo, "Nyinafun, o chaa kee ŋga oo mu tali kpan, mbe mu ki pe mbe o ŋga."
41010036	A wra kna mna pe wie mbo, "Yira ŋgi e chaa mbe ni pe mbe e ŋga hin?"
41010037	A pra kna mbo, "Ŋga o chaa mbe mu pe mbe o ŋga yi na na mu waa sɛ mu yɛnyiŋge kre nu kre, mu ti mbe o wa tni mu kalie, mbe nunu tni mu kamɛŋɛ."
41010038	A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "E n chin kee ŋga e yuu." Mbo, "Ee jaa gbↄ na, kanyana gbↄyira ŋga ni ni gboo nii, ndee e jaa ti mbe pe e ndrɛ je kanyana nu na mi wi ra?"
41010039	A pra kna mbo, "Oo ki ja." A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Kanyana gbↄyira ŋga ni ni gboo kre, ee jaa gbↄ na ki ni, a ee jaa ti mbe pe e ndrɛ je kanyana nu na mi wi,
41010040	la, ni kalie na ni kamɛŋɛ tnɛɛ kre rɛ, mi wo ma mbe ni ndro ŋga ki yi. Mblɛ pan Nyiɛkpↄↄ ki gbeele mu tɛɛ kre wo yi."
41010041	Ŋga u twanfɛɛnlɛ kɛ pre na Jↄn na Jemisi kee kre loo kre, ki nsra pe lamnyiŋge kee pe pan.
41010042	A Yesu na pe yeeri mna pan, mna yo pe pan mbo, "E chin na mblɛ waŋgra leele yeeri ŋulo kre, pe peyɛ wru mu pe tafɛɛnlɛ, a pan pe lekpↄɛ jaŋga lii pe naa?
41010043	A yire rɛ, pan ma ki nyi yire pan. Ŋmba we na chaa mbe pe e nu kekpↄↄ kre, ki fna mbe u uyɛ pe sumifun.
41010044	A ŋmba we na chaa mbe pe e yɛklo kre, u pe e kro tnu.
41010045	Mi Lewo Pↄ wre n pan na pe ni sumi, la, sumihaa ni pan, mbe ni ŋmaa tɛɛ mbe pe ŋmaashↄmu mbe lenɛɛrɛ ŋga."
41010046	Pra sɛ da Jɛriko na. Ŋga kra pan na wre na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na leele tataara na yili Jɛriko na mbe sɛ kre, na Timio pↄ, Batimio fuun wre, na uu wa mu tni kolo mbɛɛ na na tali.
41010047	Ŋga wra loo na Yesu ŋmba u yiri Nazrɛt na wre wi kre, a wra na gble leni, mbo Yesu Devid nana, ni fooro le ɛ!
41010048	A leele tataara na fuuru u na na u pieri, kre kuraa wra taa na gblee kre leni kpↄↄ, mbo, "Devid nana, ni fooro le ɛ!"
41010049	A Yesu na yire mna kna mbo, "E u yeeri." A pra fuun wre yeeri mna yo u pan mbo, "Muyɛ yii mu yiri. U mu yeeri!"
41010050	A fuun wre na u yoŋgo kun mu wa mna yiri mna pan Yesu lawee.
41010051	A Yesu na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Kee ŋgi mu chaa mbe ni pe mbe mu ŋga hin?" A wra kna mbo, "Ni Tafun, ni chaa mbe mu ti ndaa nyaa."
41010052	A Yesu na yo u pan mbo, "Sɛ! Mu shↄnlie mu shↄ!" Titɛɛ kre nu to, a wraa nyaa, mna kna mu taa Yesu kro.
41011001	Ŋga praa mbra Jerusalɛm na, mna da Bɛtfage na Bɛtani na, Olive nyua kre mbɛɛ na kre, a wra u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre shiin wↄ mna tun,
41011002	mna yo pe pan mbo, "E sɛ kable ŋga kii wa e yɛsimi ŋga na. Na e le wa to, ee bubnↄ pↄ wa nya, ŋmba na ndro n da mu tni tun, a pe maŋa le u na mu pↄ, mbe e u saan mbe pan.
41011003	Na ndro waa e wie na mni a e ma piin na hin? Mbe e yo ufun pan na, o Tafun u u chaa, a we ndru mbe pan na u ni mna fuŋgaami."
41011004	A pra sɛ nya na pe bubnↄ pↄ wa pↄ katoo ka yiɛ lete na, a pra u saan.
41011005	A leele mblɛ praa wa wa kre na kna mbo, "Ŋgi e bubnↄ pↄ ŋmba saanri mbe sɛ pe hin?"
41011006	A pra kee ŋga Yesu na yo pe pan kre yo, a pra pe ŋga kolo a pra u saan mna sɛ.
41011007	A pra pan na bubnↄ pↄ wre ni, mu Yesu ŋga, mna pe yonyi wo bubunↄ wre na, a Yesu na tni u na.
41011008	A leele tataara na pe yonyi chan kolo kre na, a wraa tro yi na, a plɛ na tinyi klɛ knumu nyaa wa mu nyina kolo kre na kro.
41011009	A mblɛ pra yiɛklu kre na mblɛ pra u kro tↄ kre na gblee leni mbo, "Hosana!" "Dwamu yi ŋmba u nyaari o Tafun mɛɛ nu na paan kre."
41011010	"Dwamu yi o tolɛɛ Devid ŋunumu ŋga ki paan kre!" "Hosana wa nyjeeri nyjeeri!"
41011011	Ŋga wra le Jerusalɛm na kre, wra sɛ pe sumi ndoo. Ŋga wra yirɛ yire le mna kna mu nya na yila kↄ kre, a wra kɛmbↄshiin pre yeeri, a pra sɛ Bɛtani na.
41011012	Ŋga nyiŋge na se a pra ndru mu yiri Bɛtani na na paan kre, klo na u ta.
41011013	A wra yire mna tiŋge ka nya haaleelee ka nu, pe ki yeeri fig tiŋge, na wrɛɛ wa ki na tataara, a wra sɛ ki jaara na aada we sɛŋgɛ ta ki na. Ŋga wra da ki jaara kre, u nsra yaka nya ki na, na wrɛ chiin bↄkↄ, yaka ma kra tia, na tiŋge kre sɛ nyjila ma.
41011014	A Yesu na kna mu tiŋge kre sun mbo, "Ndro n wa mbaa ŋu sɛŋgɛ ta mbe li na fio!" Ŋga wra yo ma kre, u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na ki loo.
41011015	Ŋga pra le Jerusalɛm na kre, a wra sɛ le pe sumindoo mna na leele mblɛ praa wa wa na yirɛ prɛ, na mblɛ praa loni kre kro nini na yilii fimi na. Mna pe swa chinɛfɛɛnlɛ tebru na pe mblɛ pe katoo kotulo prɛ kro jↄɛn kna mu juule.
41011016	U nsra ndro ŋga kolo, mbe u yira wru mbe tro sumi ndoo wa.
41011017	A wra yire wa mu pe nyina, mbo, "Pe ki nyunↄ mu yo na, 'Pe ni katoo kre yeeri nyiɛtalaa ndoo mbe waŋgra kro ŋga.' A yire rɛ, e ki wru mu pe 'juolo ndrahaa.' "
41011018	A pe sↄfue loplombo na nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre na ki loo, na kolo ka chaa mbe u gbo, a na praa u fiɛ, yaka ma kra tia, imi na wraa leele pre nyina kre na ndro kro pe kawako ni.
41011019	Ŋga blee na wↄ kre, a pra yili chia kre na.
41011020	Ŋga nyiŋge na se bnimi pupu a pra ndru na tro kre, pra nya na fig tiŋge kre, ku mu sɛ su ki didinyi na.
41011021	A Pita na sↄↄnri, mna kna mu yo Yesu pan mbo, "Nyinafun, le! Fig tiŋge ŋga mna sun kre ku!"
41011022	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "E Nyiɛkpↄↄ shↄ e li.
41011023	Kpra na ni yuu e pan, na ndro ŋmba we yo nyua ŋga pan na kↄ mu sɛ to epo ŋga nu! A ufun n u jawala pe shiin, mu shↄnli na ŋga u yuu kre we pe yɛŋgɛ kre, kie pe ma mbe ufun ŋga.
41011024	Kre ndra na ni yuu e pan na yira ŋga ee wie kpan nyiɛ talaa nu kre, e shↄ e li na e ki ta, a kie pe ma mbe e ŋga.
41011025	A na e yire na nyiɛtali, na kala kaa wa yire na wa lalaa kre, e ki ti e ufun kɛ, mbe e Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre, e sisam ti mbe e kɛ.
41011026	A na e n ti mu kɛ naa, e Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre, wa e sisam ti mbe e kɛ."
41011027	A pra ndru mu pan Jerusalɛm na. Ŋga pra le na tro pe sumindoo kre lam kre, pe sↄfue loplombo pre, na nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre na loplombo pre na pan u jaara,
41011028	mna u wie mbo, "Jaŋga ŋgi ni mu tnumu ŋga tuni hin? Ndee ndro ŋmbi sembremu u mu ŋga jaŋga, a mu tɛɛ na kee nyjɛ pini hin?"
41011029	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Mbe e wie kee nunu. Na e ki nyu wↄ kre, mbe e nyina jaŋga ŋga ni ni tɛɛ na kee nyjɛ pini.
41011030	Jↄn ndrɛ jee kre, nyjeeri kra yiri ree, ndee lewo pan hin? E ki nyu wↄ!"
41011031	A pra ki jawa mna ki kna peyɛ nu mbo, "Na o yo na nyjeeri kra yiri, we yo na ŋgi kra tia o nsra u shↄnli hin?
41011032	Kena o yo na lewo pan kra yiri ra?" Pe nsra ja mu nyu ka kun, na pe lenɛɛrɛ pre fiɛ. Ŋga kra tia rɛ, lenɛɛrɛ na Jↄn shↄnli na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun wi yɛŋgɛ.
41011033	A pra kna mu yo Yesu pan mbo, "O n chin." A Yesu na kna mbo, "A mba e nyina jaŋga ŋga ni ni tnumu ŋga tuni."
41012001	A Yesu na yire wa mna paara pe pan yomɛɛlɛ nu mbo, "Ndro wa wra tresɛnyi bribri see ka pe mna ki le kagbla mu fni mna wee kun ki lam, ŋga nu we na tresɛnyi simi yuwi, mna nyuŋgo sin gedeeŋge ki lalaa, mna ki wru mu falifɛɛnlɛ plɛ jin mna sɛ chia ka na.
41012002	Ŋga yi nyjila na da kre, a wra yire wa mu u sumifun wↄ mu tun falifɛɛnlɛ pre pan na u sɛ kagbla kre sro yɛ shↄ mbe paan u ŋga.
41012003	A falifɛɛnlɛ pre na u yii mna u gbun mna u ni, a wra ndru mu sɛ kɛ waara ni.
41012004	A wra ndru mna u sumifɛɛnlɛ pre shiin wo wↄ mu tun pe pan na, a pra wre yii mu u gbun mu u ndra vru, mna cheu wↄ u na.
41012005	A wra ndru mna fↄŋgↄ tun, a pra wre yii mu gbo. Pan pra tataara mblɛ wra kↄ mu tun pre kↄkro kre plɛ frↄ, mna plɛ gbo.
41012006	Na ki kro nunu wa tɛ, u pↄ nunu chom ŋmba u kori, wre wra tun kro pe pan mbo, 'Ni pↄ wi ŋmba pie wre nyifɛɛrɛ pe.'
41012007	A falifɛɛnlɛ pre, ŋga pra u nya kre, a pra kna mu yo peyɛ pan mbo, 'Krↄlifun wre wi kre. E pan mbe o u gbo. Kena krↄyirɛ yire pe o wie.'
41012008	A pra u yii mna u gbo, mna u fulo mu yili kagbla kre nu, mna sɛ u wa.
41012009	Kena na kagblafun wre waa pan, ŋgi we falifɛɛnlɛ mblɛ pe hin? We pan mbe pe gbo na, mbe tre sɛnyi kagbla kre wru mbe le lefumblↄ kɛɛ.
41012010	E n da mu Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee kre pe nyunↄ kre tↄↄnri tun, 'Dnɛ ŋga nyuŋgo sinfɛɛnlɛ pre na je kre, na, ki kↄ mu pe nyuŋgo kre ndra,' ra?
41012011	'O Tafun Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre kepele yi nyjɛ kro, a yi pe kawako ni o nyibie na.' "
41012012	Bawa Yesu loŋgoolo pre plɛ naa u chaa mbe yii, yaka ma kra tia, pra chin na yomini kre u gbun kre, na pre na u nyi. A na praa fiɛ lenɛɛrɛ pre na. Kra tia pra sɛ mu u ti.
41012013	A pra Farisiie na Hɛrodie pre plɛ tun u lawee na pe sɛ u nyu cha.
41012014	Ŋga pra pan kre, a pra yo u pan mbo, "Nyinafun, o chin na mu pe kprafun, a mu n na yaka le mbe yili ndro pan, a mna ndro yiɛ le, a mu Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee kre nyina kpra ni. Kena kii wa na kolo ni na oo na tↄↄ woni mbra Kaisari waŋgra lopom wre kaan ree mni hin?
41012015	O na yi woni ree, ndee waa na yi wↄni hin?" Ŋga wra pe yiɛnyumu kee kre nya ma kre, a wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Mni a e na ni piin na le hin? E pan na swa kre ka ni mbe ni le."
41012016	A pra pan na ka ni. A wra kna mu pe wie mbo, "Ŋmbi nyunↄmu na u tnↄmu yi ki na ŋga hin?" A pra kna mbo, "Kaisari wee yi."
41012017	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Kena e Kaisari wee wru e Kaisari ŋga, e Nyiɛkpↄↄ wee wru e Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋga." Ŋga wra yo ma kre, a u kala na pe kawako ni pe pan.
41012018	A Sadukiie mblɛ praa yuu na kunnyiiɛ n wa kre na pan mna Yesu wie,
41012019	mbo, "Nyinafun, Mbose nyjila kre, wra nyunↄ mu o ŋga na, na wa nyjↄ, ndee u chunu ku mu u chↄ ti, a u n se chlↄ wre na kre, u nyjↄ ndee u chunu we jaa u leŋge, mbe biile se mbe u ŋga.
41012020	A lobiile kↄↄnashin plɛ naa wa mu tni, a pe lopom wre na leŋge, u nsra se chlↄ wre na mna ku mu u ti.
41012021	A ŋmba u taa shiin kre na chlↄ wre wru mna leŋge, a wre nsra se u na mna ku. A ŋmba wra taa taarɛ kre na sɛ chlↄ wre leŋge, kala nunu kre na yi na.
41012022	Leele kↄↄnashin pre kro na chlↄ wre leŋge mu fni kro a wa nsra se u na. Pe kro kum kↄkro kre chlↄ wre titi na ku na.
41012023	Kena na pe kro waa nyi kunnyiiɛ kre nu, pe ŋmbihaa chↄ wi chlↄ wre hin? Na leele kↄↄnashin pre kro u leŋge mu fni?"
41012024	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Na e n Nyiɛkpↄↄ jaŋga na u kee kre pe nyunↄ kre chin, kre ki tia e punu kre.
41012025	Na pe ta mu ku mu nyi mu kↄ, pia leŋge na, wrunkɛɛ na leŋgeere n wa bawa. Pe kro we pe na nyjeeri bitumblↄ lɛ nyjeeri wa.
41012026	Kunnyiiɛ kee kre, e n ki tↄↄnri Mbose hlɛ kre nu, u nyaa shↄↄ kre kee kre, imi na Nyiɛkpↄↄ na yo u pan mbo, 'Mi wi Abraham Nyiɛkpↄↄ na Isaki Nyiɛkpↄↄ na Jekↄb Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre.' "
41012027	Mbo, "U n pe gboolo Nyiɛkpↄↄ, la, blenyini ŋmaafɛɛnlɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ wi. Yire e punu kee kre na tataara."
41012028	Ŋga nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre nunu na pan mna nya na pe peyɛ wie kee bɛɛlɛ a Yesu na pe kee kre nyu wↄ chichie kre, a wra kna mu Yesu wie mbo, "Mbra yire nu, ki ŋgihaa ki yiɛklu hin?"
41012029	A Yesu na kna mu yo u pan, mbo, "Ŋga ki yiɛklu mbra yire nu yi, 'Israel, e loo! O tafun Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre, Tafun nunu wi.
41012030	Kena mu Tafun Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre kori mu loloŋgo nu, na mu ŋumu kro ni, na mu jawala kro ni, na mu faŋga kro ni.'
41012031	A ŋga ki taa shiinwo yi, 'Mu ŋmbrↄ kori na ŋu titi wi.' Mbra ka n wa na mu wɛ nyjɛ na."
41012032	A nyinafun wre na kna mu yo Yesu pan mbo, "Nyinafun, mu kpra yo na Nyiɛkpↄↄ uu nunu, a wa n wa na, na Wre bↄkↄ,
41012033	mbe mu u kori na mu loloŋgo kro ni, na mu nↄↄloo kro ni, na mu faŋga kro ni, mbe mu ŋmbrↄ kori na ŋu titi wi. Kre ki nyu mu wɛ yurↄ poŋgo sroo sra, na Nyiɛkpↄↄ srayira kro na."
41012034	Ŋga Yesu na nya na u kee kre nyu wↄ kachindɛ ni kre, a wra kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Ŋu na Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre haa n le." Ndro nsra ja mna Yesu wie kee ka wa na.
41012035	Ŋga Yesu naa nyina sumindoo kre nu kre, bawa wra pe wie mbo, "Ŋgi ki tia a nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre na yuu na Kristo wre Devid nana wi hin?
41012036	A Devid wre titi na ki yo Kpra Ŋumu wre jaŋga ni fa na, 'O Tafun Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre na yo ni Tafun pan na, tni ni kalie, mu sɛ su nyjila ŋga nu mbe ti mu mu jeelee taa mu loŋgoolo na.'
41012037	Devid wre titi na Kristo wre yeeri 'ni Tafun', mni ki kↄ mu pe a u pan mu u ta nana hin?" Bawa lenɛɛrɛ na ndie tɛɛ mna u kee kre loo na yɛshↄↄrↄ ni.
41012038	Ŋga wraa pe nyina kre wra yo pe pan mbo, "E eyɛ dↄↄ ta na nyinafɛɛnlɛ mblɛ pe dodonyi tutunↄnyi lenkilaa chaa, na lete shaara,
41012039	na loplombo tnihaa fninyinyi nu, na loplombo tnihaa lihaa kre na.
41012040	Pre pe lekuchiɛlɛ yirɛ shio pe pan, mbe tuwi mbe nyiɛtali tutunↄↄŋↄ leele yiɛ na. Pre pie Nyiɛkpↄↄ kanyana kre nya kpↄↄ."
41012041	A Yesu na sɛ tni pe swa leyira kre yiɛ, na pe le a praa paan na pe swa leni, a swafɛɛnlɛ tataara na pan swa le le tataara.
41012042	Ba lekuchlↄ shianfun wa na pan na u swa bie shiin ni mna pan mu le, yie pe kↄbↄ.
41012043	A Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre yeeri a pra pan. A wra yo pe pan mbo, "Kpra na ni yuu e pan na lekuchlↄ shianfun ŋmba pan mu swa le nɛɛrɛ mu wɛ leele mblɛ na kro.
41012044	Ŋgi na, mblɛ pe pan mu swa le kre krɛɛrɛ, pe swɛ nyjɛ yi taataa pe katoe wie na kre yɛ ni pe pan, a chlↄ ŋmba rɛ, u shian, nde ŋga kii wa u pan kro wra kaan ki na kre, kre u pan mu le kre."
41013001	Ŋga wra yili sumindoo kre nu kre, a u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre nunu na kna mbo, "Nyinafun, dnɛ badɛnyi nyjɛ nyini le pe tɛɛ mu nyinyi nyjɛ sin ma!"
41013002	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Nyinyi badɛnyi nyjɛ e nyaa ŋga, dnɛ ka n wa mbe kↄↄ kro ki ŋmbrↄ na mbe pia ki laa mbe wa tra."
41013003	Ŋga Yesu na sɛ tni Olive nyua kre na, pe sumindoo kre yɛsimi wa kre, bawa Pita, na Jemisi, na Jↄn, na Andriu chiin na u wie mbɛɛ na,
41013004	mbo, "O nyina nyjila ŋga nu kee nyjɛ mu nyini nyjɛ krɛrɛ we pe? A na nyjila kre waa da, kee ŋgi kie nyina mbe o chin hin?"
41013005	A Yesu na yire wa mna yo pe pan mbo, "E dↄↄta mbe ndro waa shia e fana.
41013006	Leele tataara we pan na ni mɛɛ ni mbe yo na, 'Mi wi Kristo wre', mbe paan leele fana tataara.
41013007	Kena na e waa na ŋunↄ kee ndru lawee lawee nu kre, yaa shia ti mbe gbun yↄ e na, fna ki fna mbe yire kee yire pe tun, la, na waŋgra nyukↄↄrↄ kre n ta mu da tun.
41013008	Waŋgra na waŋgra we to peyɛ na, mbe ŋunu na ŋunu ta peyɛ na, mbe tra na seeri lawee lawee nu, mbe klo to. Kena kanyana yire nↄↄ hlɛhaa yi kre."
41013009	"Kena e eyɛ le chichie, pie e ble loplombo pan, mbe e frↄ fninyinyi nu. A mi ndra na pie e ble loplombo na ŋulo yiɛ, mbe e ni dansiɛrɛ li.
41013010	A ki fna mbe e klu mbe ketaan kre yo mbe waŋgra kro nyina.
41013011	Na pe waa sɛ e ble, mu e wↄ mu ŋga kre, yaa shia klu mbra nyjɛ ee sɛ yo jawai, na mu ta mu sɛ yire wa kre, ŋga Nyiɛkpↄↄ we mu ŋga kre yo. Kre nyjila kre, ŋu ma mu paara. Kpra Ŋumu wre we paara mu nu.
41013012	Lopↄ we u lopↄ wↄ mbe ŋga, mbe pe u gbo, mbe lɛ u pↄ wↄ mbe ŋga, mbe biile pe sefɛɛnlɛ wↄↄ mbe ŋga mbe pe pe gbo.
41013013	Ni mɛɛ ndra na, leele kro we e pra. A ŋmba we jaa yire kanyana nyjɛ nu mbe sɛ su u kumu nu kre, wre we ŋmaa ta."
41013014	"Kena na e waa 'afuŋgo kee ŋga ki waŋgra jee' kre nya a ki yire mna ki n fna mbe yire kre, kena tↄↄnrifun wre, ti u ki le chichie mbe ki nↄↄ chin. Kena leele mblɛ pee wa Judea na kre, mbe praa feni mbra nyuaɛ ndru.
41013015	A ŋmba uu wa nyuŋgo ndra na kre, waa shia tii mbe le katoo lam mbe u yaka wru.
41013016	A ŋmba uu wa see kre, waa ndru mbe pan katoo mbe paan u yoŋgo bali.
41013017	Kre ble kre, lɛɛfɛɛnlɛ na mblɛ biile pe ŋgoorii, pe atɛ!"
41013018	"Kena e na nyiɛ tali mbe ble kre waa shia pan weere nyjila.
41013019	Ŋgi na, yire ble yire we pe kanyana ble kpↄↄ, ŋga ka ki n da mu pan tun, mu yire waŋgra gbeele nyjila. A ka waa pan ma na.
41013020	A na o Tafun wre n na ka kun ble yire na kre, kaa wa na ndro nunu chom kuraa ta. A mblɛ u yeeri mu pe wↄ kre ndra na u yila mu ka kun ble yire na."
41013021	"A yire ble yire nu kre, na ndro waa yo e pan mbo, 'E le, Kristo wre wa mna.' Ndee, 'E le! Uu wa mna wa kre', yaa shia ki shↄ mbe li.
41013022	Kafinɛ Kristoe, na kafinɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ we pan. Pie kefↄnyi na kawako kee pe, na pie ja kuraa kre, mblɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ wↄ kre, pie pe fana mbe laa kpra kre na.
41013023	A yire rɛ, e le chichie, kre na ni klu mu yi kro yo e pan kre."
41013024	"A yire ble yire nu kre, kanyana yire kↄkrↄ kre, 'ndram we wↄ lafo na, a nyiɛpↄ wa jaa fniŋge na.
41013025	Mbe wↄɛlɛɛ na klↄ nyjeeri mbra tuuri tra. Mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ jaŋga ŋga kii wa nyjeeri kro nyaara.'
41013026	Bawa pie Lewo Pↄ wre nya na u paan na jaŋga na yɛnyiŋge ni tloe nu.
41013027	Kre nu we nyjeeri bitumblↄ tun mbe pe paan u wolo mblɛ u wↄ mu yili waŋgra ŋga kokoo jijirɛ yire kro nu, mu yire tra nyukↄↄrↄ na mu sɛ su nyjeeri nyukↄↄrↄ na, mbe pe ble lawee nunu nu."
41013028	"E fig tiŋge kre yomɛɛlɛ kre twan. Na e waa nya na ki wrɛ nyaara, mu ndru na funi kre, kena e chin na ndram wrɛm nyjila dani.
41013029	Pan yi chↄↄ, na e waa nya na kee nyjɛ ni nyina ŋga waa na pini kre, kena e chin na nyjila kre mbra mna, kre nyjila kre, kena ki da e na kuraa mu kↄ.
41013030	Kpra na ni yuu e pan, na fuŋgaami leele mblɛ wa kↄ fio, fↄŋga kee nyjɛ krɛrɛ we pe tun.
41013031	Nyjeeri na tra we paan tro, la, ni kee wa tro fio."
41013032	"La ble kre na nyjila kre rɛ, wa n ki chin, nyjeeri bitumblↄ pre kuraa n ki chin, hali Nyiɛkpↄↄ Pↄ wre titi kuraa n ki chin fↄna u Lɛ wre chiin.
41013033	Kena e eyɛ le chichie, e eyɛ shie, e na nyiɛtali ŋgi na. e n chin ble ŋga na ble kre we to.
41013034	Pan ki nyi na lewo kolo kuun mbe u katoo ti u sumifɛɛnlɛ pan mbe jaŋga kro wru mbe le pe kɛɛ, mbe pe kro ŋga tnumu peyɛ yɛ, mbe yo jlonwee nyu lefun wre pan na wra katoo kre sri u pan.
41013035	Kena e eyɛ le chichie. Ŋgi na, e n chin ŋga ble katoofun wre we pan. We pan yilakↄŋgↄ o, blee o, ŋgoplↄ mana na o, bnimi o,
41013036	e n chin, mbe waa shia paan e fo mbe e nya na e sni sni.
41013037	Kre kee ŋga ni yuu e pan ŋga ndro kro pan ni ki yuu, na e eyɛ shie e tni."
41014001	Na ki kro ble shiin mbe pe Klɛntro ble kpↄↄ kre, na yiisi paanu fun ble yire li. A sↄfue loplombo pre na pe nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre naa u chaa mbe yii kachindɛ kolo ka na, mbe u gbo.
41014002	A pra yo mbo "Waa u yii ble kpↄↄ titi kre nu, na kre ma, lenɛɛrɛ we tun na o ni."
41014003	Ŋga praa wa Bɛtani na, Siimↄn yiranyiɛrɛfun wre katoo na lii kre, bawa chlↄ wa na pan na alabasta gbolo ŋga nu tlade ndiom taan, ŋga ki yili nard tiŋge nu, a ki ndrↄ sheli ni, mna ki nyu ja, mna tlade kre kna mu wo Yesu ndra na.
41014004	Ki nsra tna leele mblɛ praa wa wa kre plɛ pan, a praa yuu mbo, "Ŋgi ki tia u tlade ŋga kla finfin ŋga hin?
41014005	We na jaa ki prɛ mbra shↄ mbe ki wɛ denari lafɛɛ taarɛ na, mbra shianfɛɛnlɛ ŋga." A praa taanri u na.
41014006	A Yesu na kna mbo, "E u ti! Ŋgi ki tia a e na u hau ma hin? U kee chichie pe mu ni ŋga.
41014007	Yire na shianfɛɛnlɛ pre lɛ mna nyjila kro nu, ble ŋga na e chaa kpan, ee jaa pe pe chichie. A mi rɛ, nyjila kro nu ma ee mi ta e jaara.
41014008	Ŋga we ja u pe kre, u klu mu tlade kna mu wo ni wejiŋge na, mbe pe chiin ni le wee.
41014009	Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, waŋgra lawee ŋga nu pie ketaan ŋga yo kpan, kee ŋga chlↄ ŋmba pe ŋga, pie ki yo wa mbe tɛɛ mbe u sↄↄnri."
41014010	Bawa Judas Iskariↄt, kɛmbↄshiin pre nunu, na yiri mna sɛ sↄfue loplombo pre lawee, mbo we Yesu wↄ mbe pe ŋga.
41014011	Ŋga pra ki loo kre, kra pe pe yɛshↄↄrↄ, a pra kna mna yo u pan na pie u ŋga swa. A wraa kolo chaa imi na we u wↄ mbe pe ŋga.
41014012	Ŋga ble nyjɛ nu pe nsraa yiisi paanu kaa kre na da, ki ble ŋga kra yiɛklu a praa Klɛntro sra mbↄↄ wre kuu kre, u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na u wie, mbo "Hena mu chaa mbe o sɛ gbeele mu pan mbe hɛ Klɛntro ble kre li hin?"
41014013	A wra u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre shiin wↄ mu tun, mna yo pe pan mbo, "E sɛ chia kre lam. Na e shie, ee ndro wa fni na u chↄkoo tio na nyumu ni. E taa u kro.
41014014	Katoo ŋga nu we le kre, e le wa, e yo katoofun wre pan na, Nyinafun wre yo na, 'Sena fumblↄ nyuŋgo ŋga nu wre na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre we Klɛntro ble kre li kre nyi hin?'
41014015	Wre titi we e nyina nyuŋgo badaaŋga ka nyjeeri, ŋga lam pe san, mu ki lam gbeele kama, mbe e bawa gbeele o pan.'
41014016	A u twanfɛɛnlɛ shiin pre na to kolo mna sɛ. Ŋga pra le chia kre na kre, pra nya imi na Yesu na yo pe pan kre, a pra Klɛntro lawee kre gbeele.
41014017	Ŋga yila na kↄ kre, wre na kɛmbↄshiin pre na le chia kre na.
41014018	Ŋga pra tni na lii kre, a Yesu na yo pe pan mbo, "Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, yire mblɛ mi na yire lii ŋga wa we ni wↄ mbe ŋga."
41014019	Bawa fooro na pe yii, a praa Yesu wie nununu, mbo, "Mi wi ree?"
41014020	A wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Yire kɛmbↄshiin mblɛ wa wi, ŋmba mi na wre kɛ leni kotolo nunu nu na lii.
41014021	Lewo Pↄ wre shie imi na pe ki nyunↄ kre, la, ndro ŋmba we Lewo Pↄ wre wↄ mbe ŋga kre, u atɛ! Na pe nsra ufun wre se, ka ki nyu mu ufun ŋga."
41014022	Ŋga praa lii kre, Yesu na paanuu wru mna ki dwan mna ki pile mna pe ŋga, mna yo pe pan mbo, "E shↄ. Ŋga yi ni wejiŋge."
41014023	A wra gbↄyira wru mna Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋga mboo, mna pe ŋga, a pe kro na gbↄ ki nu.
41014024	A wra kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Ŋga yi ni nyimi ŋga nyu Nyiɛkpↄↄ na le na pie knaa wo lenɛɛrɛ pan kre.
41014025	Kpra na ni yuu e pan, na mba tre sɛnyi nyumu ŋga ka gbↄ na, mbaa sɛ su ŋga mbe ki gbↄ fↄŋgↄ Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nu na."
41014026	Ŋga pra yire wa mna mboo mɛɛ kↄ mna Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋga kre, a pra sɛ Olive tinyi nyua kre na.
41014027	Bawa Yesu na yo pe pan mbo, "E kro we fɛ mbe laa ni kro. Pe ki nyunↄ mu yo na, 'Mbe mbaala lefun wre gbo, mbe mbaala pre nyina.' "
41014028	La, ni kunnyiɛ kↄkro kre, mbe yiɛklu mbe sɛ Galilii na.
41014029	A Pita na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Na pe kro we fɛ mbe laa mu kro kuraa kre, mba fɛ."
41014030	A Yesu na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Kpra na ni yuu mu pan na, aŋga lam, blee ŋga, ŋgoplↄ wa nyɛni gbee shiin na mu kaala gbee taarɛ na mu n ni chin kuraa."
41014031	Pita rɛ yɛnyiɛ ni wre naa paara, mbo, "Na kumu yi kuraa kre, mi na ŋu we ku, mba laa mu kro." Imi Pita na yo kre chↄↄ, pan hamblɛ pre na yo na.
41014032	Ŋga pra da lawee ka nu, praa ki yeeri Gɛtsɛmani kre, bawa wra yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo, "E tni mna, mbe ni sɛ nyiɛtali mbe pan tun."
41014033	A wra Pita, na Jemisi, na Jↄn wru mna ya uyɛ na a pra sɛ yiɛ chiɛri. Bawa weere na wo u na, a u jawala naa u hau.
41014034	A wra kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Fooro ni yii na shie kumu nu. E tni mna e na le. Yaa shia ŋunu."
41014035	A wra pe ti wa mna sɛ yiɛ chiɛri mna sɛ juule tra, mna nyiɛtali mbo, "Na kie ja, ti mbe kanyana nyjila ŋga tro ni na mbe sɛ."
41014036	A wra kna mbo, "Abba, Ndoo! Mu ja na yira kro pini, kena kanyana gbↄyira ŋga flo ni mbɛɛ na mu sɛ. Imi na mi chaa ma, la, imi na ŋu chaa ki pe."
41014037	Ŋga wra ndru mu pan kre, wra pan mu da na pe ŋunu, a wra kna mu yo Pita pan mbo, "Siimↄn, mu sni ra? Kena mu n ja mu shie nyjila nunu kuraa.
41014038	E yiɛ tɛɛ, e na nyiɛtali, mbe yaa shia to nyu chaara kee nu. Jawala ki chaa, la, wejiŋge pe yiɛyiɛ."
41014039	A Yesu na ndru mu sɛ nyiɛtali shiin wo na, mna kee nunu kre yo chↄ.
41014040	A wra ndru mna pan mu da na pe ŋunu na, na ŋunumu kre wɛ pe na kuraa. Ki tia pe nsra chin imi na pie yo.
41014041	A wra ndru mna sɛ mu pan gbee taarɛ wo, mna pan mu pe da na pe ŋunu tɛ, a wra yo pe pan mbo, "Ee wa mu sni na wuui tɛ ra? Ki yila ma. Nyjila kre da mbe pe mi Lewo Pↄ wre wↄ mbe le sisampefɛɛnlɛ kɛɛ.
41014042	Kena e yiri mbe o sɛ. E le, ŋmba we ni wↄ mbe ŋga kre, u mbra mna."
41014043	Titɛɛ kre nu, ŋga wraa wa mu yire wa na paara kre to, a Judas pe kɛmbↄshiin pre nunu na pan wa. Na lenɛɛrɛ mblɛ pe bↄↄnfiɛnlɛ na vɛɛn yii mu yiri sↄfue loplombo pre, na nyinafɛɛnlɛ na chia loplombo pre nuu wa mu taa u kro.
41014044	Na ŋmba we u wↄ mbe pe ŋga kre, pe nyina na "ŋmba nyu mbe shiun kre, wre wi", kena pe u yii chichie mbe sɛ na u ni.
41014045	Ŋga pra da u na kre, titɛɛ kre nu to, a wra pan Yesu jaara, mbo, "Ni Tafun!" to, mna u nyu shiun.
41014046	A leele pre na sɛ u yii.
41014047	A leele mblɛ praa wa wa kre wa na brↄfiɛn tini mna sↄfu lopom wre tnu chieri ndie na mu kↄ.
41014048	A Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "E pan ni pan na brↄfiɛnlɛ, na vɛɛn ni mbe paan ni yii na kokↄↄn wi mii?
41014049	Ŋga nii wa e jaara sumindoo nyila kro nu, na e nyina kre, e n ni yii wa. A imi kie pe mbe kee kre pe nyunↄ kre pan ma kre ki tia."
41014050	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na fɛ mu laa u kro.
41014051	A nyanyjɛble wa na mbↄfiŋge tↄ mu taa u kro, a pra wre yii na,
41014052	a wra u yoŋgo kre kun mu wa pe pan mna fɛ mu sɛ na wejiwaara ni.
41014053	A pra sɛ na Yesu ni sↄfue loplombo pre lopom wre pan, a sↄfue loplombo pre na chia loplombo pre na nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre kro na pan mu fni.
41014054	Pita na taa pe kro mu lalaa wa lee wre na Yesu pan, mna sɛ le sↄfu lopom wre katoo lam wa, mna sɛ chaa sumifɛɛnlɛ pre nu mu tni na kanhun yuai.
41014055	A sↄfue loplombo pre na leele mblɛ pra fni wa kre, naa dansiɛrɛ kee ka chaa mbe yire kre na mbe Yesu gbo, a pe nsraa kee ka taa.
41014056	A leele tataara na kafinɛ dansiɛrɛ li mu Yesu taan, a pe dansiɛrɛ yire pra li kre krɛrɛ na yili yiyɛyɛ.
41014057	A plɛ na yiri mna kafinɛ dansiɛrɛ ka li mna Yesu taan,
41014058	mbo, "O loo a wraa yuu na, mbe suminyuŋgo badaaŋga ŋga pe kɛnyi tɛɛ mu sin kre juari, mbe ndru mbe ki sin ble taarɛ ni, ŋga pe n kɛ tɛɛ mu sin."
41014059	Kre dansiɛfɛɛnlɛ pre kuraa nyu na yili yiyɛyɛ na.
41014060	A sↄfu lopom wre na yiri mu yire lalaa, mna Yesu wie mbo, "Ma nyu kun ra? Ŋgi mu pieri a pra kee nyjɛ nyini yuu na taari mu na ŋga hin?"
41014061	A wra u nyu tↄ, hali u nsra nyu kun na ndro ni. A sↄfu lopom wre na ndru mu u wie na mbo, "Ŋu wi Kristo, Nyiɛkpↄↄ Pↄ wree?"
41014062	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Mi wi, a ee mi Lewo Pↄ wre nya na ni tni Jaŋga kre kalie mbra paan tloe nu nyjeeri."
41014063	A sↄfu lopom wre na wre toto dodoŋgi tini mu wila uyɛ na, imi u krↄ na kun kre na, mbo, "Dansiɛrɛ ŋgi o chaa na hin?
41014064	E u jiɛnlɛ kee ŋga loo ŋgaa. A mni e jawa hin?" A pe kro na u gbun pimi ni, na u fna kumu ni.
41014065	A plɛ naa tɛɛnrɛ hlu na woni u na, mna u yiɛ fo, na u gbuun kaŋguroe na yuu u pan mbo, "Ŋmba u mu gbun nya mu yo o pan ɛ!" A sumifɛɛnlɛ pre naa u gbuun ka na.
41014066	Ŋga Pita naa wa tra katoo lalaa wa kre, a chiɛlɛ mblɛ pe sↄfu lopom wre sumi kre nunu na pan wa,
41014067	mna Pita nya na uu wa mu tni na kanhun yuai, a wra u le komm, mbo, "Ŋu na Yesu Nazrɛt wo wre ma e nyaari kree?"
41014068	A wra kaala mbo, "Ni n u chin, a ni n kee ŋga mu yuu ŋga kuraa nↄↄ loo." A wra yiri wa mna sɛ jlonwee nyu taanlaa na wa, to a ŋgoplↄ jle na nyɛni.
41014069	A bichable wre na ndru mu pan mu u da wa na, mna kna na yuu leele mblɛ praa wa wa kre pan mbo, "E le, blↄ ŋmba u chaa Yesu leele pre nu."
41014070	A Pita na ndru mu kaala na. Praa wa wa maa, a leele mblɛ praa wa wa kre wa na kna mu yo Pita pan mbo, "Yɛŋgɛ yi. Ŋu, mu chaa pe nu. Galilii wo wi ŋu."
41014071	Bawa Pita naa uyɛ suni kuraa na dani, mbo, "Ndro ŋmba kee e yuu ŋga kuraa, ni n u chin."
41014072	Titɛɛ kre nu to, a ŋgoplↄ na nyɛni shiin wo. A Pita na kee ŋga Yesu na yo u pan kre sↄↄnri, na wra yo na ŋgoplↄ wa nyɛni gbee shiin, na u kaala gbee taarɛ na u n u chin. Ŋga wra ki sↄↄnri kre to, a wraa nyɛni.
41015001	Ŋga nyiŋge naa sii bnimi pupu to, a sↄfue loplombo pre na nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre, na loplombo pre na mblɛ pra fni wa kre kro na sɛ bↄↄnri, mna Yesu pↄ mna sɛ u le Ŋunu Pilato kɛɛ.
41015002	Bawa Pilato na u wie mbo, "Ŋu wi Judae ŋunu wre kree?" A Yesu na kna mbo, "Ŋu mu ki yo."
41015003	A sↄfue loplombo pre na kee tataara yo na Yesu yi pe.
41015004	A Pilato na ndru mu u wie mbo, "Kena ma ka nyu kun ra? Kee tataara nyjɛ pe yuu na mu taanla ŋga le ma rɛ."
41015005	Yesu nsra paara na, a kra Pilato wre pe kawako ni.
41015006	Kena na pe pe ble kpↄↄ kre lii kre, u ndro nunu woni nyuŋgo mbe wa, ŋmba pe chaa.
41015007	A kre nyjila kre, na linkufɛɛnlɛ plɛ kanyaa le mu abani taan, mna ndro gbo, a pra pe yii mna sɛ le nyuŋgo, na nunu waa wa pe nu, a praa u yeeri Barabas.
41015008	A leele tataara pre na flo mu da na yuu Pilato pan, na u wa wↄ nyuŋgo mbe pe ŋga imi na u pini na pe kaan kre.
41015009	A Pilato na pe wie mbo, "E chaa mbe ni Judae ŋunu wre wↄ mbe e ŋga ree?"
41015010	Wra chin na prara na sↄfue loplombo pre na kanhun le leele pre nu na pe ti mbe u Barabas wↄ mbe pe ŋga.
41015012	A Pilato na ndru mu kna mu pe wie, mbo, "Kena mni e chaa mbe ni ŋmba e yeeri Judae ŋunu wre pe hin?"
41015013	A lenɛɛrɛ pre na kna mbo, "U kan kanyana kumu kaan kre na!"
41015014	A Pilato na kna mbo, "Mni hin? Sisam ŋgi u pe hin?" A pra ndru mu gble le kpↄↄ mbo, "U kan kanyana kumu kaan kre na!"
41015015	Ŋga Pilato naa chaa mbe lenɛɛrɛ pre gbun nyiŋge kre ndra na, a wra Barabas ti mna pe ŋga, mna tia pra Yesu frↄ na fwa ni, a wra pe ŋga kolo na pe sɛ u kan kanyana kumu kaan kre na.
41015016	A sojae pre na sɛ na u ni ŋunu wre katoo, a pra sojae pre kro yeeri a pra pan mu fni.
41015017	A pra u le dodoŋgi nyiɛ ka, mna wuuro juulee tin mu u juule.
41015018	A praa u shaari na yuu mbo, "Judae Ŋunu, mu ka pe!"
41015019	A pra braŋgↄ fwa tɛɛ mu u ndra lalaa fↄↄri, mnaa tɛɛnrɛ woni u na, na kosie kani u yiɛ, na sumi pe u sumi.
41015020	Ŋga pra pna na u ni mu kↄ kre, a pra dodoŋgi nyiɛ kre tini mu wↄ u na, mna u le wre titi dodoŋgi kre. A pra sɛ na u ni mbo pe shie mbe sɛ u kan kanyana kumu kaan kre na.
41015021	Ŋga praa shie kre, pra Kirene ndro, Siimↄn ŋmba biile lɛ Alɛksandria na Rufo kre fni na wre yiri see na paan, a pra u yii mna u tio kanyana kumu kaan kre.
41015022	A pra sɛ da na Yesu ni lawee ka nu praa ki yeeri Golgota ki nyina na lewo ndra kajle lawee.
41015023	Bawa pra u ŋga simi ka pra tuwe susrom ka chaa ki nu, a u nsra ki gbↄ.
41015024	A pra u kan kanyana kumu kaan kre na, mna u dodonyi yire wru mu yↄↄlɛ mu peyɛ ŋga, hali mna yi kɛɛn tɛɛ, mbe chin kokoo pie ta ta.
41015025	Ŋga pra u kan kanyana kumu kaan kre na kre, na kie pe bnimi nyjila kↄↄnajirɛ.
41015026	A pra u pimi kee nyunↄ u ndra nyjeeri mbo, "JUDAE ŊUNU".
41015027	Na pe kokↄↄnlↄ shiin plɛ kan mu ya u na, nunu naa wa u kalie, a nunu naa wa u kamɛŋɛ.
41015028	(Bawa Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee ŋga pra nyunↄ kre, na pie u chaa sisampefɛɛnlɛ nu kre, na pan ma.)
41015029	Leele mblɛ praa tro na u nyaa kre naa u tɛɛlɛ na tro, na pe ndrɛ nyaara, mbo, "Ao! Ŋu ŋmba mu suminyuŋgo juari mbe wo, mbe ndru mbe ki sin ble taarɛ kre wi ŋmbaa?
41015030	Muyɛ shↄ mu yili kanyana kumu kaan ŋga na mu tii tra."
41015031	Pan chↄↄ, sↄfue loplombo pre na nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre naa pna na u ni na yuu mbo, "Wraa plɛ shio, a wa jaa uyɛ shↄ.
41015032	Fuŋgaami ŋga e ti mbe Kristo wre, Israel Ŋunu wre, mbe u tii kanyana kumu kaan kre na mbe o nya, mbe shↄↄli." A mblɛ pra kan mu ya u na wa kre naa u tɛɛlɛ ka na.
41015033	Ŋga nyjila kɛmbↄshiin na gbun kre, ndram na wↄ lawee kro nu, mna sɛ su nyjila taarɛ lafo na.
41015034	Ki nyjila taarɛ wo kre nu Yesu na mana kpↄↄ tɛɛ mu fuu, mbo, "Eli! Eli! Lama sabaktani?" Ki nyina na "Ni Nyiɛkpↄↄ! Ni Nyiɛkpↄↄ! Mni a mu laa ni kro hin?"
41015035	Ŋga leele mblɛ praa wa wa kre plɛ na kee kre loo kre, a pra kna mbo, "E loo, u Elaija yeeri!"
41015036	A pe nunu na fɛ mu sɛ zeere le simi ŋga ki taan nyanya ka nu, mu ki su braŋgↄ kaan nyu na, mna u ŋga mbe u gbↄ, mbo, "E ti mbe o na le, na Elaija we paan u tire tra rɛ."
41015037	Ŋga Yesu na ndru mu gble kpↄↄ kre le na ma kre to, mna fii.
41015038	Kre nyjila kre nu yoŋgo ŋga pe pↄ mu suminyuŋgo kre yↄ kre na peeri shiin, mu yire nyjeeri mu pan mu su tapan.
41015039	Ŋga sojae lopom ŋmba wraa wa mu yire u yɛsimi na u le kre na nya na Yesu fii kre, a wra kna mbo, "Kpra na, ndro ŋmba, Nyiɛkpↄↄ Pↄ wre wi yɛŋgɛ."
41015040	Na chiɛlɛ plɛɛ wa mu yire haalee na ka le, na Maria Magdalene, na Jemisi ble, na Joses lo Maria, na Salome, na pee wa mu chaa pe nu.
41015041	Pre chiɛlɛ mblɛ, nyjila ŋga ni Yesu naa wa Galilii na kre, pe kro na taa u kro mna u sumi, a chiɛlɛ mblɛ pra taa u kro mu pan Jerusalɛm na wa kre plɛ na chaa.
41015042	Ŋga kra da yilakↄŋgↄ nyu na kre, na kre ble kre yi peyɛ kna ble, mbe nyiŋge se Judae wuuble. Kre ndra na,
41015043	Josɛf, ŋmba u yiri Aramatia na, ŋmba wra chaa loplombo kalalifɛɛnlɛ pre nu, a pra u shↄnli kama, a wraa Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre sri na chↄↄ, na gbun titirem wru mna sɛ Pilato yiɛ mna sɛ u tali Yesu gboo wre.
41015044	Pilato ndra nsra saan u na na Yesu ku tun. Ki tia wra u sojae lopom wre yeeri mna u wie na u ku rɛ?
41015045	Ŋga sojae lopom wre na yo u pan na u ku kre, a wra tia Josɛf na sɛ u gboo wre wru.
41015046	A Josɛf na sɛ mbↄfiŋge lↄ, mna sɛ Yesu laa kaan kre na, mna mbↄfiŋge kre tɛɛ mu u pↄ, mna sɛ u le dnɛ wee ŋga pe tuu mu tɛɛ ka nu, mna dnɛ gbila mu wee kre nyu tↄ.
41015047	A Maria Magdalene na Maria, Joses lo, na Yesu lehaa kre nya.
41016001	Ŋga wuuble kre na tro kre, Maria Magdalene, na Jemisi lo Maria, na Salome, na sɛ tuwe ndiom taan ka lↄ mbe sɛ Yesu fa na ki ni.
41016002	Ŋga nyiŋge naa paan mbe se mbe pe kranu nↄↄ hle kre, bnimi pupu, a pra yiri mna sɛ faŋga kre lawee, na yila yili.
41016003	A pra kna mu na peyɛ wie mbo, "A ŋmbi we dnɛ kre laa faŋga kre nyu na o pan hin?"
41016004	Ŋga pra yiɛ yire mbe le kre, pra nya na pe dnɛ kre laa faŋga kre nyu na, dnɛ kre na kpↄↄ.
41016005	Ŋga pra le faŋga ndoo wa kre, pra nya na nyanyjɛble waa wa mu tni pe kalie kɛhaa, mu dodoŋgi titnↄŋↄ fiŋge le. Ŋga pra u nya ma kre, fiɛrɛ na pe yii.
41016006	A wra kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Yaa fiɛ! Yesu (Nazrɛt wo) ŋmba pra kan kanyana kumu kaan kre na wre e chaa ra? U nyi! U n wa mna! E le! Lawee ŋga nu pra u sniŋge yi kre.
41016007	E sɛ yo Pita na twanfɛɛnlɛ hamblɛ pre pan, na u yiɛ klu na shie Galilii na. Bawa ee u nya, imi na wra yo e pan kre."
41016008	Titɛɛ kre nu, a pra krↄ kna mna fɛ mu yili faŋga ndoo wa mu sɛ. Na seeree na fiɛrɛ wo pe kro na. Pe nsra kala ka yo ndro pan, ŋgi na, na pe fiɛ.
41016009	Ŋga Yesu na yiri ble ŋga ki kranu yiɛklu kre bnimi kre, wra klu mu uyɛ wↄ mu Maria Magdalene ŋmba nu wra ŋumufuɛn kↄↄnashin wↄ kre nyina.
41016010	A wra sɛ ki yo mblɛ pre na Yesu naa nyaari fa kre pan, na pee wa na fooro lii na nyɛni.
41016011	Ŋga pre na loo na u u nya a uu wa na le kre, pe nsra ki shↄnli.
41016012	Kre kↄkro kre, wra uyɛ wↄ mna pe shiin plɛ nyina kepele fↄŋgↄ ka na, na pe nyaari na shie kable ka na.
41016013	A pra ndru mna pan mna ki yo hamblɛ pre pan, a pe nsra pe shↄnli na.
41016014	Kre kↄkro na, na u twanfɛɛnlɛ kɛmbↄnunu pree wa mu tni na lii, a wra uyɛ wↄ mu pe nyina, mna pe yiɛ kee yo pe pan, shↄↄ ŋga pe nsra shↄnli, na pe ndikana sisaa, na ŋga pe nsra mblɛ pra u nya mu pan mu yo kre shↄnli kre ndra na.
41016015	A wra yo pe pan, mbo, "E sɛ waŋgra kro nu. E sɛ ketaan kre yo e leele kro nyina.
41016016	Ŋmba we shↄↄli, mbe e u ndra je kre, ŋmaa ta, a ŋmba u n shↄnli kre, pie u gbun pimi ni.
41016017	Kee nyjɛ mɛɛ yie taa ni shↄnlifɛɛnlɛ pre na yi kre, ni mɛɛ ni, pie ŋumufuɛn wↄ leele nu, pie paara kayooro fↄnyi nu,
41016018	pie wↄↄlↄ yii na kɛ ni, a na pe tuwe sisaa gbↄ kuraa kre, kia jaa pe pe yaka, pie kɛ taa yambla na mbe pe faŋga ta."
41016019	Ŋga o Tafun Yesu na paara pe pan mu kↄ kre, a Nyiɛkpↄↄ na u wru mu sɛ nyjeeri, a wra sɛ tni Nyiɛkpↄↄ kalie.
41016020	A u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na yiri wa mna sɛ ketaan kre yo lawee kro nu, a o Tafun wre jaŋga na tnumu tun pe nu, a pra yire kawako kee yire na mna faŋga le kee kre nu.
42001001	Tiofilos chichie, ŋga leele tataara na gbeŋmba mna kaalɛɛ nyjɛ yira pe o nu yire kee nyunↄ kre,
42001002	mblɛ pra kee yire nya mna yi tnumu tun, mna yire yi nↄↄ na kre, imi na pra yi yo o pan kre, pan plɛ yi nyunↄ kre.
42001003	Kena Tiofilos chichie, ŋga ni ja mu kee yire twan mu yire yi nↄↄ na kre ndra na, ki tia ni jawa na ki nyu na mbe yi nyunↄ chichie mbe paan mu ŋga.
42001004	Na ni pe ma kre, kie ti mbe mu chin na kee yire pe mu nyina kre na kpra yi.
42001005	Nyjila ŋga ni Hɛrodi na ŋunumu li Judea tra nu kre, na kre nyjila kre na sↄfu waa wa wa a praa u yeeri Zakaria, a wra yiri Abija sↄfue feko kre nu. U chↄ mɛɛ naa Elisabɛt, a wra pe Aarↄn sele ndro.
42001006	Pe kro shiin na fraka Nyiɛkpↄↄ yiɛ, mnaa lii Nyiɛkpↄↄ mbra na u kaalɛɛ kro na.
42001007	Gbende na wi Elisabɛt, kra tia pe nsraa biile ni, a na Zakaria pe blɛlↄↄ, a u chↄ pe chalↄ.
42001008	Ki ble ka kra da Zakaria na mbe u sɛ sↄfum tnumu tun Nyiɛkpↄↄ suminyuŋgo.
42001009	Imi na sↄfue pre tnumu kre kolo naa nyina kre, pra kɛɛn tɛɛ paala kolo na, a kra Zakaria wↄ na wre ki fna mbe u sɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ suminyuŋgo wa mbe sɛ tuwe ndiom tɛɛn sro. A wra sɛ le o Tafun wre suminyuŋgo wa,
42001010	nyjila ŋga ni wraa wa wa na tuwe ndiom tɛɛn yire sroi kre, na leele wa mu yire fimi na tataara na nyiɛtali.
42001011	Bawa Nyiɛkpↄↄ nyjeeri bituŋu na u yɛ wↄ mna u nyina, mna pan mu yire sragbuɛnlɛɛ yire kalie mna wraa tuwe ndiom tɛɛn yire sroi kre.
42001012	Ŋga Zakaria na nyjeeri bituŋu wre nya ma kre gbun na yↄ u na, a fiɛrɛ na u yii.
42001013	La, nyjeeri bituŋu wre na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Maa fiɛ, Zakaria, Nyiɛkpↄↄ mu nyiɛtalaa loo, mu chↄ Elisabɛt we biblↄ se mbe mu u mɛɛ tɛɛ Jↄn.
42001014	We ti mu yiɛ shↄ, a u seble lenɛɛrɛ yiɛ we shↄ. Ŋgi na,
42001015	we pe lekpↄↄ Nyiɛkpↄↄ pan, a waa simi ka na ka gbↄ, a Kpra ŋumu wre we tni u nu mbe yire u seble.
42001016	We yiri mbe Israel leele tataara kna mbe paan taa pe Tafun Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre kro.
42001017	Wre we yiɛ klu o Tafun wre pan, mbe Kpra Ŋumu wre tni u nu mbe u jaŋga ta na Elaija wi. We ti mbe lɛɛlɛ ndru mbe pe biile kori. We ndikanmbla kna mbe pe kee nyjɛ yi fraka jawa, mbe ti leele peyɛ kna mbra o Tafun wre sri."
42001018	A Zakaria na kna mna nyjeeri bituŋu wre wie mbo, "Ŋga mi na ni chↄ kro lɛ, ŋgi kie ti mbe o kee ŋga shↄ mbe li hin?"
42001019	A bituŋu wre na kna mbo, "Mi wi Gabiral. Nyiɛkpↄↄ u yire nyjeeri mu ni tun na ni paan ketaan ŋga yo mu pan kre.
42001020	Le, kee nyjɛ krɛrɛ we pan yɛŋgɛ, la, ŋga mu n ni kee nyjɛ shↄnli ŋga ndra na, mu kaari kpo mbe sɛ su ŋga ble kee nyjɛ ni yuu mu pan ŋga we pe."
42001021	Leele pre naa wa mu yire yire fimi na wa na Zakaria sri, kra pe pe kawako ni na u mu suminyuŋgo wa.
42001022	Ŋga Zakaria na yili fimi na wa leele pre yiɛ na kre, na wa jaa paara na pe ni. ŋga kra pan ma kre, pra ki chin na u yirɛ nya nyiɛlɛ na suminyuŋgo wa. Kra tia kɛ ni wraa paara pe pan.
42001023	Ŋga Zakaria na tnumu tun suminyuŋgo wa mu kↄ kre, wra sɛ katoo.
42001024	Kie pe ble chiɛri yɛ kↄkro kre, u chↄ Elisabɛt na siire ta. U nyiɛpↄ nununu kunↄ na wra yili fimi na,
42001025	mnaa yuu mbo, "Fuŋga Nyiɛkpↄↄ kala pe mu ni ŋga, mu nyifɛɛrɛ ŋga ki ni kuu leele nu kre laa ni na."
42001026	Ŋga Elisabɛt siire kre na nyiɛpↄ kↄↄnanu ta kre, Nyiɛkpↄↄ na nyjeeri bituŋu Gabiral tun Galilii chia ŋga pe yeeri Nazrɛt kre na,
42001027	Kre nyjila kre, na pe bichable ŋmba u n blↄ chin wru mu blↄ wa ŋga wa mbe u u leŋge. Blↄ wre mɛɛ naa Josɛf. A wra yiri Ŋunu Devid sele nu. Bichable wre mɛɛ naa Maria.
42001028	A nyjeeri bituŋu wre na pan mu yo bichable wre pan mbo, "Chlↄ, ti mbe mu yiɛ shↄ. Pe mu dumi chiɛlɛ nu, a o Tafun wree wa mu kro."
42001029	Ŋga Maria na kala kre bituŋu wre na yo kre loo kre, u gbun na yↄ u na, a fiɛrɛ na u yii, a wra yo u jawala nu mbo, "A shaaraa ŋgi nyini yi ŋga hin?"
42001030	A nyjeeri bituŋu wre na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Maria maa fiɛ! Nyiɛkpↄↄ u mu dumi.
42001031	Le, mu siire ta, mbe biblↄ se, mbe u mɛɛ tɛɛ Yesu.
42001032	We pe lekpↄↄ, mbe pe u yeeri Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri wre pↄ. O Tafun wre we u ŋga u tolɛɛ Devid ŋunumu kre.
42001033	A we ŋunumu li Jekↄb jlom kre na nyjila kro nu, a u ŋunumu lie kre nyu waa to fio."
42001034	A Maria na kna mna nyjeeri bituŋu wre wie mbo, "Mni mbe pe mbe jaa se hin? Na ni n blↄ chin tun."
42001035	A Nyiɛkpↄↄ bituŋu wre na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Kpra Ŋumu wre we paan tni mu nu, mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ jaŋga kre pan mu nu. Kre kie ti pↄ cheche ŋmba mu se kre, mbe pe u yeeri Nyiɛkpↄↄ Pↄ.
42001036	Le, mu sele ndro Elisabɛt ŋmba pe yeeri gbende kre, u chalɛm nu kre, u siire ta, u nyiɛpↄ kↄↄnanu wo nu u nyi kre.
42001037	Kee ka n wa mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ wa jaa ki pe."
42001038	A Maria na kna mbo, "O Tafun wre letaa wi mi, kena kee ŋga mu yo kre ki pe ma mbe ni ŋga." A nyjeeri bituŋu wre na u ti wa mu sɛ.
42001039	Yire ble yire nu, Maria na yiri nyaanyaa mna fↄↄri mu sɛ nyua jaara chia ŋga kii wa Judea tra nu kre na.
42001040	Wra sɛ le Zakaria katoo mu Elisabɛt shaari.
42001041	Ŋga Maria shaaraa kre na to Elisabɛt ndie kre, a u pↄ wre na seeri u lɛɛ.
42001042	A Kpra Ŋumu wre na pan mu le Elisabɛt nu, a wra kna mu paara kpↄↄ mbo, "Pe mu dwan chiɛlɛ nu, mu mu pↄ ŋmba uu wa mu lɛɛ kre dwan na.
42001043	Ŋgi ki pan na kre kekpↄↄ ŋga ni, a ni Tafun lo pan ni shaarihaa ŋga hin?
42001044	Ŋga mu shaaraa to ni ndie to, a ni pↄ wre seeri ni lɛɛ na yiɛshↄↄrↄ ni.
42001045	Mu dwamu ta, ŋga mu shↄnli na ŋga o Tafun yo mu pan kre we pe ma yɛŋgɛ kre na."
42001046	A Maria na kna mbo, "Mbe ni loloŋgo kro tɛɛ mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋga mboo.
42001047	Ni ŋmaashↄfun Nyiɛkpↄↄ tia ni ŋumu yiɛshↄ.
42001048	Ŋgi na, u u letaa ŋmba u n fna kre sↄↄnri. Mu yire aŋga na shie kre, leele kro we ni yeeri, 'ŋmba Nyiɛkpↄↄ dwan.'
42001049	Ŋgi na, jaŋgafun ŋmba mɛɛ ki pe cheche kre, u kekpↄↄ pe mu ni ŋga.
42001050	Leele mblɛ pe u fiɛ kre, pre fooro u chini, mbe yire sem nunu na mbe sɛ su sem shiinwo na.
42001051	U u kɛnyi tɛɛ mu kekpↄɛ pe, a u mblɛ pe peyɛ kpↄↄri kre zaanri na pe kee nyjɛ pe jawa ni.
42001052	U jaŋgafɛɛnlɛ kↄ pe ŋujↄɛn na, mu tinlɛ tɛɛ yi na.
42001053	U mblɛ klo ta kre ŋga yirɛ chichiele, mu swafɛɛnlɛ ni a pe sɛ kɛwaara.
42001054	U u letaala Israel leele fooro chin na yaa pe na nyjila kro nu,
42001055	imi wra yo o tolɛɛ Abraham na u sele leele pan fa kre."
42001056	Maria na tni Elisabɛt jaara nyiɛpↄ taarɛ mna chin mu sɛ u katoo.
42001057	Ŋga Elisabɛt se nyjila na da kre, wra biblↄ se.
42001058	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, u sele leele kro, na u tnifɛɛnlɛ kro na chin na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kekpↄↄ pe mu u ŋga. Kra tia pe kro yiɛ na shↄ.
42001059	Ŋga pↄ wre na li ble kↄↄnataarɛ kre, pra pan mbe pↄ wre fɛŋgɛ kun, mbe u mɛɛ tɛɛ Zakaria, u lɛ mɛɛ na.
42001060	A pↄ wre lo na kna mbo, "Ↄↄnhↄn, e u mɛɛ tɛɛ Jↄn."
42001061	A pra kna mna yo u pan mbo, "Mu sele ndro wa mɛɛ ma kre mɛɛ ŋga."
42001062	A pra kna mu paara kɛ ni Zakaria pan, mu u wie na mɛɛ ŋgi u chaa mbe pe u pↄ wre ŋga hin?
42001063	A wra kna mna kɛ pe mbo pe u ŋga nyunↄ yira, a wra nyunↄ ki na mbo, "U mɛɛ Jↄn." A kra leele pre kro pe kawako ni.
42001064	Titɛɛ kre nu wa to, a Zakaria na ja mna nyu nyaa, a u ndile na saan u nyuu, a wra ja mna paara, mna Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋga mɛɛ.
42001065	Ŋga kra pan ma kre fiɛrɛ na u tnifɛɛnlɛ pre kro yii, a pra kee kre kpali Judea tra nu kro mu tro.
42001066	Leele mblɛ pra kee kre loo kro naa yuu pe jawala nu mbo, "Ndro ŋmbi sembremu pↄ ŋmba nyini we kↄↄ pe hin? Yaka n nyina na Nyiɛkpↄↄ jaŋga n wa u nu."
42001067	A Kpra Ŋumu wre na pan mu le u lɛ Zakaria nu, a wraa Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyaa na yuu mbo,
42001068	"Israel Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre wo yi dwamu. Ŋgi na, u pan mu u leele le mu pe shↄ.
42001069	Mu tia ŋmaashↄfun pan u letaa Devid katoo.
42001070	Imi na wra yire u kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ na mna ki yo fa kre.
42001071	Wra kre kee ŋga yo na we ti mbe pe paan o shↄ mbe yili o loŋgoolo, na jaŋgafɛɛnlɛ mblɛ pe o pra kre kɛɛ.
42001072	Wra yo na we o tolɛɛlɛ pre fooro le, mbe u nyu nunu ŋga wre na pre na pe mu tɛɛ kre sↄↄnri.
42001073	Wra u nyu yo o tolɛɛ Abraham pan,
42001074	mna da mu u nyina na we o shↄ mbe yili o loŋgoolo kɛɛ, mbe ti o u sumi mbe waa fiɛ.
42001075	A oo pe cheche mbe pe kprafɛɛnlɛ u yiɛ, o ble nyjɛ oo li kro nu.
42001076	A ŋu, ni pↄ, pie mu yeeri Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre kee nyanyofun. Ŋu mu yiɛ klu mbe hɛ o Tafun wre kolo gbeele,
42001077	mbe mu leele nyina na pie ŋmaashↄmu na sisam tinkɛɛ ta.
42001078	Ŋga o Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre pe fooro chinfun kre ndra na, we ti mbe u ŋmaashↄfun wre pan na brimi yila yi, mbe o le.
42001079	Mbe mblɛ pee wa wↄmu na kumu jaŋga nu kre nya, mbe ya o na mbe o nyaari wejinyiŋge kolo na."
42001080	Pↄ wre na lɛ mna faŋga ta Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋumu nu. Fimi tra lawee yire nu wra nyi chiin mna hɛ su ŋga ble wra uyɛ wↄ mna Israel leele nyina.
42002001	Yire ble yire nu kre Ŋunu Augustus na mbra le na pe u waŋgra kre leele kro tↄↄnri.
42002002	Kre na yi leele tↄↄnrↄↄ ŋga kra yiɛ klu. A kre nyjila kre na Kirenio wi Siria waŋgra kre lopom.
42002003	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, ndro kro na sɛ u chia mbe pe sɛ u tↄↄnri.
42002004	Kra tia Josɛf na yili Galilii chia ŋga pe yeeri Nazrɛt kre na mna sɛ Judea chia ŋga pe yeeri Bɛtlɛhɛm kre na, kre chia kre na pra Ŋunu Devid se. Josɛf rɛ, Ŋunu Devid sele nu wra yiri, kre kra tia wra sɛ wa,
42002005	mbe sɛ wre na u chↄ Maria mɛɛ nyunↄ, mbe pe pe tↄↄnri. Kre nyjila kre na pe Maria wru mu Josɛf ŋga mbe u u leŋge, a wra siire ta.
42002006	Kena ŋga praa wa Bɛtlɛhɛm na wa kre, Maria se nyjila na da.
42002007	A wra u bijlo se blↄ, mna u fo yoknumɛɛ nu mna u sniŋge mbaala ka yira nu. Ŋgi na, lawee nsraa wa fumblↄ lehaa mbe pe tni.
42002008	Kre nyjila kre nu, na mbaala lefɛɛnlɛ plɛɛ wa nyaa na ŋunu na pe mbaala ni kre tra kre nu.
42002009	A Nyiɛkpↄↄ nyjeeri bituŋu wa na sɛ uyɛ wↄ mna pe nyina. A Nyiɛkpↄↄ yɛnyiŋge na tia lawee kre na fniŋge poŋgo. A fiɛrɛ na pe yii.
42002010	A nyjeeri bituŋu wre na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Yaa fiɛ! E le, ketaan ŋga kie pe yɛshↄↄrↄ ni leele kro pan ni ni paan e pan.
42002011	Aŋga pe o Tafun ŋmaashↄfun Kristo wre se Devid chia.
42002012	Kee ŋga ee nya mbe chin na ki pe kpra yi na, ee nya na pe pↄ wa fo yoknumɛɛ nu mu u sniŋge mbaala ka yira ka nu."
42002013	Titɛɛ kre nu to a bitumblↄ tataara plɛ na yiri nyjeeri mna pan mna ya bituŋu wre na, a praa Nyiɛkpↄↄ kaan mɛɛ na yuu mbo,
42002014	"Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre wo yi yɛnyiŋge, a mblɛ na u yiɛshↄ tra mna kre we pe ŋga wejinyiŋge."
42002015	Ŋga bitumblↄ pre na yiri mna sɛ nyjeeri mu pe ti wa kre, mbaala lefɛɛnlɛ pre na kna mna yo peyɛ pan mbo, "E ti mbe o sɛ Bɛtlɛhɛm na mbe sɛ kee ŋga ki pe wa, a o Tafun ki wↄ mu o nyina ŋga le."
42002016	A pra pe nyaanyaa mna sɛ le, mna Maria na Josɛf na pↄ wre nya na pe u sniŋge mbaala ka yira nu.
42002017	Ŋga mbaala lefɛɛnlɛ pre na pↄ wre nya mu kↄ kre, pra pↄ wre kee nyjɛ bituŋu wre na sɛ yo pe pan yire krɛrɛ yo.
42002018	Kee ŋga mbaala lefɛɛnlɛ pre na sɛ yo kre, na ndro ŋmba wraa wa wa kro pe kawako ni.
42002019	La, Maria na kee yire krɛrɛ loo mna yi tɛɛ u jawala nu.
42002020	A mbaala lefɛɛnlɛ pre na ndru na shie na mɛɛ koni na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kaan yɛnyiŋge, kee nyjɛ pe loo mna sɛ yi nya ma, imi na bituŋu wre na yo pe pan kre na.
42002021	Ŋga pↄ wre na li ble kↄↄnataarɛ kre pra u fɛŋgɛ kun, mna u mɛɛ tɛɛ Yesu, mɛɛ ŋga bituŋu wre na u ŋga a pra chin mna u siire ta kre.
42002022	Ŋga nyjila na da mbe Josɛf na Maria sɛ cheche paala pe imi na Mbose mbra yire naa nyina kre, pra sɛ na pↄ wre ni Jerusalɛm na mna sɛ u wru mu le o Tafun wre kɛɛ,
42002023	imi na Mbose na ki nyunↄ Nyiɛkpↄↄ mbra kee yire nu kre mbo, "Biblↄ ŋmba pie klu mbe se kre, we pe cheche mbe o Tafun wre ŋga."
42002024	A imi na o Tafun mbra yire nyina kre, "Pra sɛ na kotulo shiin ni mna sɛ sra wↄ."
42002025	Kre nyjila kre, na blↄ waa wa Jerusalɛm na, u mɛɛ naa Siimiↄn. A wra pe lewo ŋmba wra fraka, mnaa Israel shↄmu kre sri. Kpra Ŋumu wre naa wa blↄ wre nu,
42002026	mna klu mu wↄ mu u nyina na we o Tafun Kristo wre nya mbe chiin ku.
42002027	A Kpra Ŋumu wre na sɛ na Siimiↄn ni suminyuŋgo wa, na kre nyjila kre na pe sɛ na Yesu ni wa mbe sɛ paala kolo ŋga mbra yire nyina kre pe.
42002028	A Siimiↄn na sɛ Yesu wru mna yii kɛɛ mna Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋga mboo mbo,
42002029	"Fuŋga rɛ, ni Tafun, mu tia mu kee ŋga mu yo mu tɛɛ kre pe yɛŋgɛ, kena ti mbe mu letaa ku wejinyiŋge nu.
42002030	Ŋgi na, ni mu ŋmaashↄfun wre nya na nyini ni, ŋmba mu gbeele mbe waŋgra kro u nya kre.
42002032	Wre we pe kania mbe leele mblɛ pe n pe Judae pre ŋga, mbe mu leele Israel pre ŋga yɛnyiŋge."
42002033	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, Yesu lo na u lɛ na kee yire Siimiↄn yo yire kro loo, a kra pe pe kawako ni.
42002034	A Siimiↄn na pe dwan mna kna mna yo Maria pan mbo, "Le, wre pↄ ŋmba pe wↄ, a Israel leele tataara we yire u na mbe to, a tataara we yire u na mbe yiri. A wre Nyiɛkpↄↄ wↄ mbe pe paara mbe u taanla.
42002035	A wre we leele jawala kee wↄ fimi na, a u kee kre we pe na snimi yi, mbe le mu loloŋgo nu."
42002036	Kre nyjila kre na chlↄ Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun waa wa Jerusalɛm na wa, a u mɛɛ naa Anna, Fannuel pↄ na wi, a wra yiri Ashɛ sele nu. Chlↄ wre plↄ na u leŋge mna u da, a pra tni yɛlɛ kↄↄnashin, a u plↄ na ku mu u ti. A wra kaari lekuchlↄ mna tni yɛlɛ fuloejirɛ na jijirɛ. Wra lɛ chalↄ kama, nde u nsraa laa suminyuŋgo wa. Nyjila kro nu wraa wa na sumi na blefuni, na nyiɛtalaa ni lafo na ble.
42002038	Nyjila ŋga nu praa wa suminyuŋgo wa kre, chlↄ wre na pan mna pe da, mna Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋga mboo, mna pↄ wre kee yo mblɛ praa Nyiɛkpↄↄ sri mbe u paan Jerusalɛm shↄ kre kro pan.
42002039	Ŋga pra yira kro pe mna kↄ o Tafun wre mbra kolo na kre, pra ndru mna sɛ pe chia Nazrɛt na, Galilii tra nu.
42002040	Pↄ wre naa lee mna faŋga ta, mna kala chin, a Nyiɛkpↄↄ na u dwan.
42002041	Yɛlɛ nyini Yesu sefɛɛnlɛ naa shie Jerusalɛm na, na shie na klɛntro ble kpↄↄɛ yire lii.
42002042	Ŋga Yesu na li yɛlɛ kɛmbↄshiin kre, pra sɛ ble kpↄↄɛ yire lihaa imi na praa pini yɛlɛ nyini kre.
42002043	Ŋga pra ble yire li mu kↄ kre, pra ndru mbe sɛ pe chia, mna Yesu ti Jerusalɛm na, pe nsra chin na pe u ti wa.
