42002044	Hali pra ble poŋgo kolo nyaari mnaa jawa na aada wre na u nↄↄlↄ lɛ, la, ŋga pe nsraa u nyaa kre, pra u cha mu tro pe sele leele, na pe nↄↄlↄ lawee nu kro.
42002045	Ŋga pra u cha a pe nsra u nya kre, pra ndru mna sɛ u cha Jerusalɛm na wa.
42002046	Pra u cha ble nununu taarɛ mna chin mu sɛ u nya sumi nyuŋgo wa, na uu wa mu tni nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre nu, na ndru pe pan na pe wie kaalɛɛ.
42002047	A mblɛ pra u kee yire loo, mna nya imi na wraa kee nyu woni kachindɛ ni kre, u kee na pe pe pan kawako.
42002048	A ŋga u sefɛɛnlɛ pre na sɛ u nya kre, kra pe pe kawako ni kpↄↄ, a u lo na kna mna yo u pan mbo, "Ni pↄ, mni a mu o fiŋge ma ŋga hin? Mi na mu lɛ yiɛnyina, a o na mu chaa fuŋga ma."
42002049	A wra kna mbo, "Mni a e na ni chaa hin? E n chin na ki fna ni tni ni lɛ katoo ree?"
42002050	Paaraa ŋga wra paara kre, pe nsra ki nↄↄ loo.
42002051	A Yesu na yiri a pe kro na pan Nazrɛt na. Ŋga pra pan kre, wra ndie tɛɛ u lo na u lɛ kee na kama. A u lo na kee yire krɛrɛ tɛɛ jawala nu.
42002052	Yesu naa lee kama, mna kala chin, a Nyiɛkpↄↄ yiɛ na shↄ u na, a leele yiɛ na shↄ u na.
42003001	Ŋga Kaisari Tiberio na waŋgra ŋunumu li kre, u yɛlɛ kɛmbↄkunↄ wo nu kre, na Pontio Pilato wi Judea ŋunu. Kre nyjila kre chↄↄ na Hɛrodi wi ŋunu Galilii na, a na u chunu Filipo wi ŋunu Iturea na Trankoniti tra yire nu na. Lisania na wi Abilene ŋunu,
42003002	A Anaasi na Kaifa na lɛ Judae sↄfue loplombo. Kre nyjila kre Nyiɛkpↄↄ na tia u kee na pan Zakaria pↄ Jↄn nu fimi lawee yire nu.
42003003	A Jↄn naa kila Jↄↄdan lↄↄ kre tra nu na yuu mbo, "E e jawala chinɛ e laa e sisam kro, mbe pe e ndrɛ je, kre ee sisam tinkɛɛ ta."
42003004	Imi na pra ki nyunↄ Yisaia Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun wre hlɛ kre nu kre mbo, "Ndro wa mana yilii fimi lawee kre nu na, e o Tafun kolo kre gbeele, e u trohaa kre fraka.
42003005	Weele na nyuɛ kro we pe mbrɛrɛ, a kooloe nyjɛ yi ŋmaala mu kla kla yire kro, pie yi fraka, mbe yi gbeele kama.
42003006	A lewo kro we Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋmaashↄmu kre nya."
42003007	A lenɛɛrɛ na yili mna sɛ Jↄn pan mbe u pe ndrɛ je, a wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Yire leesaala mblɛ! Ŋmbi u yo e pan na e fɛ mbe yili kanyana ŋga ki paan e pan ŋga nu hin?
42003008	E na kepele nyjɛ yi nyina na e laa e sisam kro pini. Yaa tni mbra yuu na, 'Abraham nanae lɛ wre!' E ti ni yo e pan mbe e loo, Nyiɛkpↄↄ we jaa dnɛ kaari nanae mbe Abraham ŋga.
42003009	E le, pe gbana kan tiŋge kre didinyi na, kena tiŋge ŋga ki n sɛŋgɛ chichie sɛ kre, pie ki kun mbe chan, mbe ki le kanhun."
42003010	A lenɛɛrɛ pre na kna mu u wie mbo, "Kena ŋgi ki fna o pe hin?"
42003011	A wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Ŋmba pan dodonyi shiin nyi kre, u ŋmba u n ka ni kre ŋga nunu. A ŋmba u sro ta kre, u u ŋmbrↄ ŋmba u n ka ta kre ŋga ka."
42003012	Bawa lampooshↄfɛɛnlɛ plɛ na pan mbe u pe ndrɛ je, a pra kna mu Jↄn wie mbo, "Nyinafun, kee ŋgi ki fna o pe hin?"
42003013	A Jↄn na kna mbo, "Yaa na shio mbra weni nyjɛ pe kun mu e ŋga na."
42003014	A sojae na pan mna u wie mbo, "A wre hin? Mni ki fna mbe o pe hin?" A wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Yaa shia swa dnumu ndro pan jaŋga na, ndee mbe kala fnɛ mbe taa ndro na mbe u yii, a fↄtↄↄrↄ ŋga ee ta kpan e ti mbe ki e yiɛ nyi."
42003015	Ŋga leele pre kro kro naa Kristo wre paan kre sri kre ndra na, kra tia praa jawa na aada Jↄn wi Kristo wre.
42003016	A Jↄn na kna mna yo pe kro pan mbo, "Mi rɛ, nyumu ni ni e ndrɛ jee, la, ŋmba uu wa na jaŋga ni mu wɛ mi na kree wa kro na paan, ni n fna kple na mbe kɛ taa u kpawrɛ na, wre we e ndrɛ je na Kpra ŋumu wre na kanhun ni.
42003017	U kↄↄŋgↄↄ ŋga ni u yirɛ foo wa u kɛɛ, mbe u tɛɛ mbe yirɛ bie yire fↄ mbe yi wↄ mbe tɛɛ, mbe sɛ fue yire le kanhun ŋga kra fii nu."
42003018	Jↄn na paara tataara mna leele pre jaari, mna ketaan kre yo pe pan.
42003019	La, wra paara mna waŋgra ŋunu Hɛrodi taan. Ŋgi ndra na hin? Na u u chunu chↄ ŋmba praa yeeri Hɛrodias wre shↄ mu leŋge, mna sisam tataara pe mu ya.
42003020	Nyjɛ krɛɛrɛ kↄkro kre, sisam kpↄↄ ŋga Hɛrodi na pe yi na wra tia pra Jↄn yii mna sɛ le nyuŋgo.
42003021	Ŋga Jↄn na lenɛɛrɛ pre ndrɛ je mu kↄ kre, Yesu na pan a wra u ndra je. Ŋga wraa nyiɛ tali titɛɛ kre nu wa to, nyjeeri na nyaa,
42003022	a Kpra Ŋumu wre na tii u na, mna pe na katoo kotro wi. A mana ka na yiri nyjeeri mbo, "Ŋmba wi ni pↄ ŋmba ni kori, a ni yiɛ shↄ u na kre."
42003023	Ŋga Yesu na u tnumu nↄↄ hle kre, na we pe yɛlɛ fulo na kɛ, Heli pↄ Josɛf wre pↄ na wi Yesu. Pan leele naa jawa.
42003024	Heli lɛ na wi Matat, a Matat lɛ na wi Levi, a Levi lɛ na wi Melchi, a Melchi lɛ na wi Janai, a Janai lɛ na wi Josɛf. A Josɛf lɛ na wi Matatias.
42003025	Matatias lɛ na wi Amↄs, a Amↄs lɛ na wi Nahum. Nahum lɛ na wi Hɛsli, Hɛsli lɛ na wi Nagai, Nagai lɛ na wi Maati.
42003026	Maati lɛ na wi Matatias, Matatias lɛ na wi Semein, Semein lɛ na wi Josɛk, Josɛk lɛ na wi Joda.
42003027	Joda lɛ na wi Joanan, Joanan lɛ na wi Resa, Resa lɛ na wi Zerubabel, Zerubabel lɛ na wi Shealtiel, Shealtiel lɛ na wi Neri, Neri lɛ na wi Melchi.
42003028	Melchi lɛ na wi Adi, Adi lɛ na wi Kosam, Kosam lɛ na wi Elmadam, Elmadam lɛ na wi Er, Er lɛ na wi Joshua.
42003029	Joshua lɛ na wi Eliezar, Eliezar lɛ na wi Jorim, Jorim lɛ na wi Matat, Matat lɛ na wi Levi, Levi lɛ na wi Siimiↄn.
42003030	Siimiↄn lɛ na wi Juda, Juda lɛ na wi Josɛf, Josɛf lɛ na wi Jonam, Jonam lɛ na wi Eliakim.
42003031	Eliakim lɛ na wi Melia, Melia lɛ na wi Mena, Mena lɛ na wi Matata, Matata lɛ na wi Natan, Natan lɛ na wi Devid,
42003032	Devid lɛ na wi Jɛsi, Jɛsi lɛ na wi Obɛd, Obɛd lɛ na wi Boaz, Boaz lɛ na wi Salmↄn, Salmↄn lɛ na wi Nashon, Nashon lɛ na wi Aminadab.
42003033	Aminadab lɛ na wi Admin, Admin lɛ na wi Aani, Aani lɛ na wi Hezrↄn, Hezrↄn lɛ na wi Perez, Perez lɛ na wi Juda, Juda lɛ na wi Jekↄb.
42003034	Jekↄb lɛ na wi Isaki, Isaki lɛ na wi Abraham, Abraham lɛ na wi Tera, Tera lɛ na wi Nahↄↄ,
42003035	Nahↄↄ lɛ na wi Serug, Serug lɛ na wi Reu, Reu lɛ na wi Pelɛg, Pelɛg lɛ na wi Eber, Eber lɛ na wi Shela Shela lɛ na wi Kainan.
42003036	Kainan lɛ na wi Afaksad, Afaksad lɛ na wi Shem, Shem lɛ na wi Noa, Noa lɛ na wi Lamek, Lamek lɛ na wi Metusela.
42003037	Metusela lɛ na wi Enↄku, Enↄku lɛ na wi Jared, Jared lɛ na wi Mahalaleel, Mahalaleel lɛ na wi Kenan,
42003038	Kenan lɛ na wi Enↄs, Enↄs lɛ na wi Set, Set lɛ na wi Adam, Adam lɛ na wi Nyiɛkpↄↄ.
42004001	Kpra Ŋumu wre na pan mna le Yesu nu, a wra yili Jↄↄdan lↄↄ lawee wa, a Kpra Ŋumu wre na u bali mu sɛ fimi lawee yire nu.
42004002	A Sutna na sɛ u nyu cha ble fuloe shiin, yire ble yire nu krɛɛrɛ u nsra yaka ka, kra tia ŋga ble yire nyu na to kre, na klo u ta.
42004003	A Sutna na kna mna yo u pan mbo, "Na mu chin na Nyiɛkpↄↄ Pↄ wi ŋu kre, dnɛ nyjɛ ka kaari paanu mu ka mbe ni le."
42004004	A Yesu na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Pe ki nyunↄ mu yo na ki n pe sro chiin ki lewo tɛɛ waŋgra ŋga nu."
42004005	A Sutna wre na Yesu na sɛ nyua gedeŋge ka ndra na, mna sɛ u nyina waŋgra ŋunumu na yirɛ nyjɛ mu chin ŋga kro titɛɛ kre nu.
42004006	A Sutna na kna mna yo Yesu pan mbo, "Mbe mu ŋga jaŋga ŋga kro, na yirɛ nyjɛ mu nyaa ŋga kro. ŋgi na, pe ni ŋga yi yi, a ndro ŋmba ni chaa, wre mbe ŋga yi yi.
42004007	Kena na mu kosie kan mbe ni sumi kre, mbe mu ŋga yirɛ nyjɛ kro."
42004008	A Yesu na kna mna yo u pan mbo, "Pe ki nyunↄ mu tɛɛ na, kosie kan mu Tafun Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre chiin yiɛ, a wre chiin ki fna mbe mu sumi."
42004009	A Sutna wre na sɛ na u ni Jerusalɛm na, mna sɛ u yire suminyuŋgo kre ndra lalaa, mna yo u pan mbo, "Na mu chin na Nyiɛkpↄↄ Pↄ wi ŋu kre, ye mu to tra.
42004010	Ŋgi na, pe ki yo mu tɛɛ mbo, 'Nyiɛkpↄↄ we u nyjeeri bitumblↄ tun mbe pe paan mu le.'
42004011	Mbo, 'A pie mu tↄwi na kɛnyi ni, mbe mu jele wa gbun dnɛ na.' "
42004012	A Yesu na kna mna yo u pan mbo, "Pe ki nyunↄ na chↄↄ na maa shia mu Tafun Nyiɛkpↄↄ nyu cha."
42004013	Ŋga Sutna wre na Yesu nyu cha kolo kro na a u nyu na to kre, wra u ti ma na nyjila ka sri.
42004014	A Yesu na ndru mna sɛ Galilii na, na Kpra Ŋumu wree wa u nu, a u kee na kpali mu tro waŋgra kre nu kro poŋgo.
42004015	A wraa pe nyina pe fninyinyi nu, a leele pre kro naa u kaan mɛɛ.
42004016	Yesu na sɛ Nazrɛt na, chia ŋga na pra u pↄↄri kre na, mna sɛ pe fninyuŋgo wuuble, imi na wraa pini kre. Wra yiri mbe hlɛ tↄↄnri,
42004017	a pra Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun Yisaia hlɛ kre nyaa mna le u kɛɛ, a wra hlɛ kre lawee ka nyaa, na pe nyunↄ wa mbo,
42004018	"O Tafun Ŋumu wree wa ni kro, ki tia u ni wↄ mbe ni ketaan kre yo mbe shianfɛɛnlɛ nyina. U ni tun mbe ni paan kee ŋga kie ti mbe tinlɛ peyɛ ta kre yo, mbe fuunlo na nyaa, mbe mblɛ pe fiŋge a pra kala nyaa kre shↄ mbe pe wuu.
42004019	Mbe paan o Tafun wre leele nyina yɛlɛ ŋga na we pe shↄ."
42004020	Ŋga Yesu na lawee kre tↄↄnri mu kↄ kre, wra hlɛ kre tↄ mna ki le ŋmba wra pan mu u ŋga ki yi kre kɛɛ, mna tni. A leele pre praa wa fninyuŋgo wa kre kro na nyiɛlɛ kan u na na u le poŋgo.
42004021	A wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Kee kre pe nyunↄ mu tɛɛ fa kre, aŋga ki pe kpra, a e ki loo na ndie ni."
42004022	Leele pre kro yiɛ na shↄ u na, a kee tɛɛn yire yiraa yilii u nyuu kre na pe kro pe kawako ni. A pra kna na peyɛ wie mbo, "Josɛf pↄ wre ma ŋmbaa?"
42004023	A wra kna mna yo pe pan "Kakra n wa ki na na yaa kre kee ŋga yo ni pan fio, na yambla trafun, muyɛ tra, kee nyjɛ o loo na mu pe Kapɛnↄm na kre, fuŋga mu da ŋu titi chia, yi pe mbe o le."
42004024	Mbo, "Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun wa n wa a pe u shↄnli u chia fio.
42004025	La, kpra kee ni yuu e pan kre, nyjila ŋga nu Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun Elaija naa wa kre, lekuchiɛlɛ naa wa Israel leele nu tataara a pra nyjeeri tↄ yɛlɛ taarɛ na nyiɛpↄ kↄↄnanu, na nyiɛ na pan, a klo na to tra kre nu kro.
42004026	Nde Nyiɛkpↄↄ nsra tia Elaija na sɛ ya pe wa na, la, Nyiɛkpↄↄ na tia wra sɛ ya lekuchlↄ wa na, wra yiri Zarifat na.
42004027	A Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun Elaisha nyjila kre, yiranyiɛrɛfɛɛnlɛ tataara naa wa Israel leele nu, nde u nsra pe wa tra, la, Naaman ŋmba wra yiri Siria na kre chiin wra tra."
42004028	Ŋga leele mblɛ praa wa fninyuŋgo wa kre na kee yire loo kre, krↄ na pe kun kro.
42004029	A pra taan mna yiri, mna u krↄ ŋunↄ mna yili na u ni chia kre na, mna sɛ na u ni nyua ŋga na pra pe chia kre sin kre mana na, mbra u ŋunↄↄ wa nyua krↄ wee ka nu.
42004030	A Yesu na nyaari mna tro leele pre nu mna sɛ.
42004031	A wra yiri wa mna sɛ Galilii chia ŋga pe yeeri Kapɛnↄm kre na, mna sɛ paara mu pe nyina Judae wuuble ka nu.
42004032	A kee yire wra pe nyina yire na pe pe kawako ni. Ŋgi na, wra paara na jaŋga ni.
42004033	Ŋumufↄↄn naa wa blↄ wa nu fninyuŋgo wa, a wra paara gedeŋge mbo,
42004034	"Yesu ŋmba mu yiri Nazrɛt na, kee ŋgi ni wre na ŋu nyi hin? O klahaa mu pan ree? Ni chin ndro ŋmba sembremu wi ŋu, ŋu wi Nyiɛkpↄↄ Pↄ cheche wre."
42004035	A Yesu na kna mna fuu u na mbo, "Pieri mu yili u nu mu sɛ." A ŋumufↄↄn wre na blↄ wre chan tra leele pre yiɛ na, mna chin mu yili u nu mu sɛ, a yaka nsra u ta.
42004036	Kra leele pre kro pe kawako ni, a pra kna mna na peyɛ wie mbo, "Yira ŋgi kee nyini yi ŋga hin? A ndro ja mu fuu jaŋga ni ŋumufↄↄn na a ki yili lewo nu ŋga hin?"
42004037	Titɛɛ kre nu, Yesu kee na kpali tra kre nu kro poŋgo.
42004038	Yesu na yili fninyuŋgo wa mna sɛ Siimↄn katoo, kre nyjila kre na kabro Siimↄn nafun chlↄ yii, a pra u kee yo Yesu pan.
42004039	A wra sɛ yire u jaara mna fuu yira kre na. Titɛɛ kre nu a kabro kre na laa chlↄ wre na, a wra saanla, a wra yiri mna sro pe mna pe ŋga.
42004040	Ŋga yila na kↄ kre, mblɛ katoo yambla nyininyini na nyi kre na pe tio mna pan mu Yesu ŋga. A wra kɛnyi taataa pe kro na nununu mna pe tra kro.
42004041	Ŋumufuɛn na yili leele nu tataara, a praa gble leni na yuu mbo, "Ŋu wi Nyiɛkpↄↄ Pↄ wre." A Yesu na fuu pe na, u nsra tia pra paara. Ŋgi na, pra chin na wre wi Kristo wre.
42004042	Ŋga nyiŋge na se kre Yesu na yili wa mna sɛ fimi lawee waa ka nu. A lenɛɛrɛ pre na u cha, mna sɛ u lawee. Ŋga pra u nya kre, pe nsraa chaa mbe u sɛ haka na.
42004043	La, Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Ki fna mbe ni Nyiɛkpↄↄ ketaan kre yo mbe tro chiɛ yɛ na na. Kre ndra na Nyiɛkpↄↄ yila mu ni tun."
42004044	A wra nyaari mna ketaan kre kpali pe fninyinyi yire nu mu tro.
42005001	Ki ble ka Yesu na sɛ yire Genesarɛt epo kre nyu na, a lenɛɛrɛ na kan mna pan mu wɛ u na, na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee chaa mbe loo.
42005002	A wra kna mna mbroe wↄfɛɛnlɛ plɛ krↄɛ shiin yɛ nya, na pe yi pↄ epo kre nyu na, na krↄɛ yirefɛɛnlɛ tii yi nu mu sɛ na pe asau jee.
42005003	A Yesu na le krↄɛ yire ka nu, na Siimↄn wo yi krↄ kre. A wra kna mna yo u pan na u krↄ kre ŋunↄ mbe ki sɛ lalaa chiɛri. A Yesu na tni krↄ kre nu mna na paara na leele pre nyina.
42005004	Ŋga Yesu na paara leele pre pan mna kↄ kre, a wra kna mna yo Siimↄn pan mbo, "Sɛ na krↄ kre ni lawee ŋga ki juo nu, mbe ŋu na mu wolo pre sɛ e asau yire wa wa, ee mbroe wↄ."
42005005	A Siimↄn na kna mbo, "Ni Tafun, o tnumu tun blee chiin, a o n yaka ta. La, mu nyu kee kre ndra na mbe asau kre wa."
42005006	Ŋga pra asau kre wa lↄↄ kre nu kre, pra mbroe wↄ tataara, a asau kre na chaa knumu.
42005007	A pra pe wolo mblɛ praa wa krↄ shiin wo kre nu pre yeeri, na pe paan ya pe na, a pra pan mna ya pe na, a pra mbroe pre wↄ krↄɛ shiin yire nyini, a krↄɛ yire naa chaa mbe tii tapan.
42005008	Ŋga Siimↄn Pita na kee kre nya ma kre, a wra kna mna kosie kan Yesu yiɛ mbo, "Jande, ni Tafun, sisam pefun wi mi. Kena maa da ni na."
42005009	Mbroe pre pra wↄ kre na wre na mblɛ praa wa wa kre kro pe kawako.
42005010	Pan chↄↄ kra Siimↄn nↄↄlↄ Jemisi na Jↄn, Zebedii biile pre pe kawako. A Yesu na kna mna yo Siimↄn pan mbo, "Maa fiɛ! Mu yire aŋga na shie mu pe leele wↄfun."
42005011	Ŋga pra pan mna krↄɛ yire pↄ lↄↄ nyu na kre, pra pe yirɛ kro ti wa mna taa Yesu kro.
42005012	Ki ble ka Yesu naa wa kakpↄɛ yire ka na, a blↄ wa na pan u pan, na kokoe u knumu kro poŋgo, a wra pan mna to Yesu yiɛ mna u tali mbo, "Ni Tafun, na mu chaa, ti mbe ni saanla."
42005013	A Yesu na kɛ tini mna taa u na, mna kna mbo, "Ni chaa. Kena, saanla!" Titɛɛ kre nu a kokue yire na laa blↄ wre na.
42005014	A wra u jaari mna yo u pan mbo, "Maa shia ki yo ndro pan. La, sɛ muyɛ nyina Judae sↄfu wre pan, mu sra yirɛ nyjɛ Mbose mbra nyina yire wↄ, mbe ki mu dansiɛrɛ li."
42005015	La, fuŋga Yesu mɛɛ na kpali kpↄↄ kuraa mu ya, a lenɛɛrɛ na kan mu pan mbe u kee yire loo, mbe u pe tra.
42005016	La, Yesu naa pe tii na shie fimi lawee ka nu mbe sɛ nyiɛtali.
42005017	Ki ble ka Yesu naa leele nyina, na kre nyjila kre, na Farisiie plɛ na mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ mblɛ pra yiri Galilii na Judee chiɛ yire kro na, na Jerusalɛm na, na pan mna fni wa, a o Tafun Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre jaŋga na pan Yesu nu, a wra yambla tra.
42005018	A bilɛ plɛ na fna wa tio dɛŋglɛ ni, mna pan na kolo chaa mbe le na u ni katoo ŋga nu Yesu na nyi kre nu, mbe u tɛɛ Yesu yiɛ.
42005019	A imi leele pre na nɛɛ kre ndra na, pe n sra kolo ta mbe da na u ni Yesu na. Kra tia pra nduu na yaŋu wre ni katoo ŋga nu Yesu na nyi kre ndra na, mna lahoo ŋga kra Yesu tↄ kre tuu mu vru, mna yaŋu wre tre u dɛŋglɛ ni mna tɛɛ Yesu yiɛ tata.
42005020	Ŋga Yesu na nya na leele pre shↄnlie kpↄↄ kre, a wra kna mna yo yaŋu wre pan, mbo, "Awe, mu sisam kro ki laa mu na."
42005021	A mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre na Farisiie pre na kna na peyɛ wie, mbo, "A ndro ŋmbi wi ŋmba a wra jiɛnlɛ kee yuu ma ŋga hin? Na Nyiɛkpↄↄ bↄkↄ, ndro ŋmbi we jaa sisam ti mbe kɛ hin?"
42005022	Yesu na pe jawala kee nya, mna kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Mni a e na kee nyjɛ jawa e ndra hin?
42005023	Ŋga mbe yo na 'mu sisam kro ki laa mu na' yoo kii foofoo ree, ndee ŋga mbe yo na 'yiri mu nyaari yi' hin?
42005024	La, ŋga ni chaa mbe e chin yi na, Lewo Pↄ wree jaŋga ni tra mna mbe jaa sisam ti mbe kɛ." A wra kna mu yo fna wre pan mbo, "Ni yo mu pan na yiri mu mu dɛŋglɛ wru mu sɛ mu katoo."
42005025	Titɛɛ kre nu a blↄ wre na yiri mna u dɛŋglɛ kru leele pre yiɛ na, mna sɛ katoo, na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kaa mɛɛ.
42005026	Kra leele pre kro pe kawako ni, a fiɛrɛ na pe yii, a praa Nyiɛkpↄↄ kaan mɛɛ na yuu mbo, "Aŋga rɛ, o kawako kee nya."
42005027	Yire kee nyjɛ kↄkro kre, Yesu na yili fimi na mna sɛ lampoo shↄfun wa nya na uu wa mu tni u lampoo shↄ nyuŋgo. Praa u yeeri Levi. A Yesu na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Yiri mu taa ni kro!"
42005028	A Levi na yiri mna u yirɛ kro ti wa mna taa Yesu kro.
42005029	A Levi na sɛ sro pe badaŋga wre titi katoo Yesu pan, a lampoo shↄfɛɛnlɛ tataara na lenɛɛrɛ na sɛ chaa mu li na pe ni.
42005030	A Farisiie pre na pe mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre naa taanri Yesu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na mbo, "Yira ŋgi ki tia e chaa mu li mu gbↄ na lampoo shↄfɛɛnlɛ na sisam pefɛɛnlɛ mblɛ ni ŋga hin?"
42005031	A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan, mbo, "Mblɛ pe n na yaa kre n yambla trafun shian, fↄna mblɛ pe yaa kre.
42005032	Ni n pan mbe paan leele mblɛ pe fraka yeeri, la sisampefɛɛnlɛ pan ni pan, mbe pe pe jawala chinɛ."
42005033	A pra kna mna yo Yesu pan mbo, "Jↄn twanfɛɛnlɛ pre naa blefuni na nyiɛtali nyjila kro nu, a pan chↄↄ Farisiie pre twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pini, la, ŋu twanfɛɛnlɛ mblɛ lii na gboo."
42005034	A Yesu na kna mna pe wie mbo, "Kena ŋga bijↄplↄ wree wa u nↄↄlↄ jaara ŋga, u nↄↄlↄ pre fna mbe blefun ra?
42005035	La, nyjila ka paan mbe pe paan bijↄplↄ wre bali mbe sɛ, yire ble yire nu pie blefun."
42005036	A Yesu na kna mna pe gbun yomini ka mbo, "Ndro n wa mbe dodoŋgi fↄŋgↄ kun mbe ki tɛɛ mbe lɛɛ tↄ, na ki pe ma kre, fↄŋgↄ kre we kla, a lɛɛ kre wa jaa tↄ chiriri mbe nyu.
42005037	A ndro wa n wa mbe sifiŋge fↄŋgↄ le yurↄ hlɛ gbolo lɛɛ nu. Na kre ma, sifiŋge kre we kan mbe gbolo lɛɛ kre wali, mbe simi kre kna mbe wo, mbe gbolo kre kla (fawolo pre naa simi leni yurↄ hlɛ gbolo nu).
42005038	La, sifiŋge fↄŋgↄ fna yurↄ hlɛ gbolo fↄŋgↄ nu.
42005039	A ndro n wa mbe simi ŋga ki lɛ gbↄ mbe yiri kre kro mbra ŋga ki n lɛ chaa, we yo na lɛɛ kre nyu."
42006001	Wuu ble ka nu Yesu naa tro fifiire see ka nu, a u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre naa fifiire yire yɛ mbru na tuŋgo kɛɛ na kaa.
42006002	A Farisiie pre plɛ na kna mu pe wie mbo, "Yira ŋgi ki tia e na kee ŋga ki n fna mbe e pe wuu ble nu, a e na ki pini ŋga hin?"
42006003	A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Nyjila ŋga ni klo na Devid, na u kotↄmblↄ pre ta kre, kee ŋga pra pe kre, e n ki tↄↄnri tun ra?
42006004	Imi na wra sɛ le Nyiɛkpↄↄ suminyuŋgo, mna sɛ paanu ŋga praa teeri Nyiɛkpↄↄ pan kre wru mu ka, mna u kotↄmblↄ pre ŋga haŋa a pra ka, la, na ki mbra taan na lewaa we kre paanu kre ka, fↄna sↄfue pre chiin bↄkↄ."
42006005	A wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Lewo Pↄ wre wi wuuble kre Tafun."
42006006	Judae Wuuble ka na to na, a Yesu na sɛ le fninyuŋgo ka nu mnaa leele nyina. Kre nyjila kre na blↄ waa wa wa, a u kalie kɛ ku.
42006007	A mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre na Farisiie pre naa Yesu le na we yaŋu wre tra, mbe pe yire kre na mbe u ta mbe yii.
42006008	La, Yesu na leele pre jawala chin, a wra kna mna yo kɛ kuo wre pan mbo, "Yiri mu yire mna!" A wra yiri mna yire wa.
42006009	A Yesu na kna mna yo leele pre pan mbo, "Ni chaa mbe e wie kee nunu, kena mbra kolo ŋga mbe o chichie, ndee sisam pe wuuble ra? Ki fna o leele ŋmaa shↄ ree ki fna o pe ŋmaa kla hin?"
42006010	A Yesu na kna mna leele pre kro le mu fni mna kna mu yo yaŋu wre pan mbo, "Mu kɛ kre tini." A wra ki tini, a kɛ kre na ndru mu pe na ki fa yi kama.
42006011	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, krↄ na pe kun kpↄↄ, a pra kna na bↄↄnri na peyɛ ni imi pie Yesu pe.
42006012	Yire ble yire nu Yesu na sɛ nyuɛ yɛ na nyiɛtali haa, wra nyiɛtali hali a nyiŋge na pan mu se.
42006013	Ŋga nyiŋge na se kre, a wra u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre yeeri mna kɛmbↄshiin wↄ pe nu mna pe mɛɛ tɛɛ bitumblↄ.
42006014	Mblɛ wra wↄ kre mɛɛ yi kre, Siimↄn, a wra u ŋga Pita mu ya, na Siimↄn wre chunu Andriu, na Jemisi, na Jↄn, na Filipo, na Batolomio,
42006015	na Matio, na Tↄmasi, Alfio pↄ Jemisi, na Siimↄn ŋmba praa yeeri Zilↄt wre,
42006016	na Jemisi pↄ Judas, na Judas Iskariↄt, ŋmba wra kↄ mna Yesu wↄ mu ŋga kre.
42006017	Ŋga wre na pre na yiri nyua kre na mna tii kre, pra pan mu yire lawee mbrɛrɛ ka nu, wre na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre tataara ni. Lenɛɛrɛ na yiri Judea na Jerusalɛm na, na lↄↄ nyu chiɛ nyjɛ pe yeeri Tiro na Sidon yire na mna pan wa. Pra pan mbe paan u kee yire loo, mbe u pe tra.
42006018	A wra mblɛ ŋumufuɛn naa hau kre tra.
42006019	A lenɛɛrɛ pre kro naa u chaa mbe kɛ taa u na. Ŋgi na, jaŋga naa yilii u nu na pe kro trai.
42006020	A Yesu na kna mu yiɛ kan u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na, mna yo pe pan mbo, "E mblɛ e shian wo yi dwamu. Ŋgi na? Yire wo yi Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre.
42006021	E mblɛ klo ta aŋga wo yi dwamu. Ŋgi na? Yire ee kↄↄ yↄↄ. E mblɛ e nyɛni aŋga wo yi dwamu. Ŋgi na? Yire ee kↄↄ tɛɛ.
42006022	Mi ndra na, e mblɛ pe pra mu e wↄ mu ŋga, mu na e tɛɛlɛ, mu na e yeeri Sutna kre, e wo yi dwamu.
42006023	Na ki pan ma kre, e ti mbe e yiɛ shↄ kpↄↄ. Ŋgi na? E fↄtↄↄrↄ kpↄↄ nyjeeri. Pan chↄↄ, e tolɛɛlɛ na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ pre pe.
42006024	La, yire mblɛ e ta kre, e atɛ! Ŋgi na? E eyɛ li mu kↄ.
42006025	Yire mblɛ e yↄↄ fuŋgaami kre, e atɛ. Ŋgi na? Klo we kↄↄ e gbo. Yire mblɛ e tɛɛ aŋga kre, e atɛ. Ŋgi na? Ee kↄↄ nyɛni kpↄↄ.
42006026	A yire mblɛ leele kro e kee chichie yuu kre, e atɛ! Ŋgi na? Pan chↄↄ, e tolɛɛlɛ pre naa kafinɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ pre pini."
42006027	"La, yire mblɛ e ni kee ndru kre, ni yuu e pan, e e loŋgoolo kori, e na mblɛ pe e pra kre pini chichie.
42006028	E na dwan e na mblɛ pe e suni kre kaan, a mblɛ pe e tɛɛlɛ kre, e na nyiɛtali e na pe kaan.
42006029	A na ndro mu yiɛ kokoo ŋga ja kre, kokoo haŋa kre kna mu tɛɛ u pan. A na ndro mu dodoŋgi fimi wo shↄ kre, u ŋga lam wo mbe u ya.
42006030	A ndro ŋmba we e tali kpan e u ŋga, a na ndro e yira wru jaŋga na kre, yaa ki shↄ u pan.
42006031	Kena nyjɛ e chaa mbe pra pini e na kre, e na yire pini e ŋmbilɛ na.
42006032	Kena na e mblɛ pe e kori kre chiin kori, mɛɛ ŋgi kii wa ki nu hin? Pan sisampefɛɛnlɛ pre pini, mblɛ pe pe kori kre pe kori.
42006033	A na e chichie pini na mblɛ pe e pini chichie kre chiin kaan, mɛɛ ŋgi kii wa ki nu hin? Pan chↄↄ sisampefɛɛnlɛ pre pini.
42006034	A mblɛ na e kaan na ee ta mbe shↄ pe pan kre, na e pre jin, mɛɛ ŋgi ee ta hin? Sisampefɛɛnlɛ pre, peyɛ pe jini, na shio peyɛ pan na chↄↄ.
42006035	Kena e e loŋgoolo kori, e na chichie pini e na jini, la, yaa na kaan na pie tↄ mbe e ŋga. Na e pe ma kre e fↄtↄↄrↄ we kpↄↄ, a ee pe Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre biile. Ŋgi na, u lɛɛ tna na ayɛtefɛɛnlɛ na ndra shelifɛɛnlɛ ni kro.
42006036	Kena e pe foorochinfɛɛnlɛ imi na e lɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre pe foorochinfun kre."
42006037	"Kena yaa na kpra kuun nyaanyaa, mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ waa e kpra kun, a yaa na e ŋmbilɛ gbuun na pimi ni, mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ waa e gbun na pimi ni. E na tii e na kee mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ ti mbe e kɛ.
42006038	E na e ŋmbilɛ kaan, Nyiɛkpↄↄ we e ŋga. We kra yira tɛɛ mbe kra kama mbe e ŋga, mbe ki fɛɛri kama, mbe ki nyaara mbe yi le mbe ki nyi mbe wo. Ŋgi na, Kra yira ŋga ni mu yirɛ kra mbe ŋga kre, kre ni Nyiɛkpↄↄ we kra mbe mu ŋga."
42006039	Yesu na pe gbun yomini ka mbo, "Fuun we ja mbe fuun yii kaan na ree? Na ki pan ma, pe kro shiin wa to wee nunu nu ree?
42006040	Twanfun na wɛ u nyinafun na. La, na u u nyina chiriri we pe na u nyinafun wi.
42006041	A yira ŋgi ki tia kra fiɛn ŋga kii wa mu ŋmbrↄ nyini kre, a mu kre nya, la, kpↄↄ ŋga kii wa ŋu titi nyibie kre, a mu n kre nya hin?
42006042	Ndee ŋgi ki ti mbe mu yo mu ŋmbrↄ pan na awe, ti mbe ni kra fiɛn ŋga wↄ mu nyini, a kpↄↄ ŋga kii wa ŋu titi nyini kre, a mu n kre wↄ tun hin? Yire yiɛnyumufɛɛnlɛ, e kra kpↄɛ nyjɛ yii wa e nyiɛlɛ yire wↄ tun, kre ee nya chiriri, mbe chiin jaa e ŋmbilɛ wee fiɛn fiɛn yire wↄ pe pan."
42006043	"Ŋgi na, tiŋge chiriri na sɛŋgɛ sisaa sɛ, ndee mbe tiŋge sisaa sɛŋgɛ chiriri sɛ.
42006044	Tinge kro ki sɛŋgɛ na pe yire na ki chini. Ŋgi na, ma jaa lombru sɛŋgɛ kun, wufiun tiŋge na.
42006045	Lewo kepele chichie ŋga kii wa u loloŋgo nu kre, kre ki tia wra chichie pini. A lewo sisam kepele ŋga kii wa u loloŋgo nu kre, kre ki tia wra sisam pini. Kena kee ŋga kii wa loloŋgo nu mu ki nyi kre, kre nyu yuu.
42006046	Yira ŋgi ki tia e na ni yeeri Tafun, a la, nyjɛ ni yo e pe kre a yaa yire pe hin?
42006047	Lewo ŋmba we pan ni pan, mbe ni kee yire loo, mbe li yi na kre, mbe e nyina imi we pe,
42006048	pan ufun wre nyi na blↄ ŋmba wra yo we u katoo sin, mna sɛ dnɛ ndra tuu, a kra jio, a wra ki nↄↄ le mu taa dnɛ kre na, ŋga nyiɛ na pan, a lↄɛ na nyi, mna fo mna pan mu le ki nu, ki nsra ja mna ki chan. Ŋgi na, na wra ki sin chichie.
42006049	La, ŋmba u ni kee yire ndru a wa li yi na kre, pan u nyi na blↄ ŋmba wra yo we u nyuŋgo sin, mna ki sin to mu taa tra na, u nsra ki nↄↄ le chiriri. Nyiɛ na pan mna fo mu le ki nu, a kra to. Nyuŋgo kre too na peere."
42007001	Ŋga Yesu na paara leele pre pan mna kↄ kre, wra sɛ Kapɛnↄm na.
42007002	Sojae lafaa lefun wa naa wa chia kre na, a u tnu wa naa yaa mna yire kum kɛ na, blↄ wre naa u tnu wre kee chaa.
42007003	Ŋga wre sojae lopom ŋmba na Yesu kee loo kre, wra Judae loplombo pre plɛ tun u pan na u paan u tnu wa tra u pan.
42007004	A pra pan mna Yesu tali mbo, "Jande, wre blↄ ŋmba fna mbe mu sɛ ya u na.
42007005	Ŋgi na, u wre Judae kori, mu fninyuŋgo sin mu o ŋga."
42007006	A Yesu na kna mna taa pe na a pe kro naa shie. Kra kro chiɛri mbe pe le lopom wre katoo, a lopom wre na u nↄↄlↄ tun Yesu pan mbo, "Ni Tafun, maa muyɛ fna, ni n fna na mu le ni katoo,
42007007	a ni n fna mbe da mu na. Kena yire wa mu paara mu ni tnu wre tra ni pan.
42007008	Mi chↄↄ jaŋga ka jaara ni nyi, a nii wa na sojae ni ni jaara, na ni yo wa pan na u sɛ, we sɛ, a na ni yo wa pan na u pan, we pan, a na ni yo ni tnu pan na pe imi, we ki pe."
42007009	Ŋga Yesu na blↄ wre kee kre loo kre, u kee na u pe kawako, a wra kna mna yo lenɛɛrɛ pre pra taa u kro kre pan mbo, "Kpra na ni yuu e pan, ni n da mu shↄnlie ŋga nyini nya tun, hali Israel leele nu."
42007010	Ŋga sojae lopom wre bitumblↄ pre na ndru mu pan katoo kre, na u tnu wre saanla.
42007011	Kee nyjɛ kↄkro kre, ki nsra mu a Yesu na sɛ chia ka na praa ki yeeri Nein, u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na lenɛɛrɛ na taa u kro.
42007012	Ŋga pra da chia kre jlonwee nyu na kre, na blↄ wa ku praa shie u le haa, blↄ wre chiin u lo na se, a u lo wre na pe lekuchↄ, a lenɛɛrɛ na yili mna taa chlↄ wre kro.
42007013	Ŋga o Tafun wre na chlↄ wre nya kre, u kee na pe u pan fooro ni, a wra kna mna yo u pan mbo, "Maa nyɛni!"
42007014	A Yesu na nyaari mna sɛ kɛ taa daka kre na, a leele mblɛ pra gboo wre tio kre na yire. A wra kna mna yo gboo wre pan mbo, "Nyanyjɛble, ni yo mu pan, Yiri!"
42007015	A gboo wre na yiri mu tni, mnaa paara. A wra u wru mu le u lo kɛɛ.
42007016	Fiɛrɛ na leele pre kro yii. A praa Nyiɛkpↄↄ kaan mɛɛ na yuu mbo, "Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun kpↄↄ yiri o nu, a Nyiɛkpↄↄ pan u leele shↄhaa."
42007017	A kee ŋga wra pe kre na kpali Judae tra kre na tra nyjɛ yira mbra wa yire kro nu poŋgo.
42007018	Ŋga kra pan ma kre, Jↄn twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na sɛ kee nyjɛ Yesu naa piin yire krɛrɛ bↄ u pan.
42007019	A Jↄn na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre shiin wↄ, mna pe tun Yesu pan na pe sɛ u wie, mbo, "Ŋu wi ŋmba u paan kre ree o na fuŋu sri hin?"
42007020	Ŋga pra sɛ kre, a pra sɛ Yesu wie mbo, "Jↄn, ndrajefun wre, u o tun mu pan mbo, 'Ŋu wi ŋmba we pan wre, ree o na fuŋu sri hin?' "
42007021	Kre nyjila kre nu na Yesu yambla nyininyini tra tataara mna ŋumufuɛn wↄ plɛ nu. A wra tia lenɛɛrɛ mblɛ pra fun nyiɛlɛ na, naa nyaa.
42007022	A Yesu na kna mna yo Jↄn twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo, "E sɛ kee nyjɛ e loo mu nya yire yo Jↄn pan na fuunlo nyaa, a mblɛ pe fuuru yiri mu yire, a mblɛ na yiranyiɛrɛ nyi kre saanla, a kpoolo na ndru, a gboolo nyi, a shianfɛɛnlɛ ketaan kre ta na ndru.
42007023	Kena ŋmba u ni shↄnli kre wo yi dwamu."
42007024	Ŋga Jↄn bitumblↄ pre na ndru mna sɛ kre, Yesu na Jↄn kee yo lenɛɛrɛ pre pan mbo, "Ŋga e na yili mna sɛ Jↄn pan fimi lawee yire nu kre, ŋgi e naa jawa na ee sɛ nya hin? Nyaa nyjɛ fuflɛ mↄŋↄi ree?
42007025	Kena yira ŋgi nyini pan e na sɛ wa hin? Ndro ŋmba u dodonyi chichiele le lehaa e na sɛ ee? E le, mblɛ pe dodonyi chichiele leni, mu na peyɛ lii pe tnimu nu kre, ŋunu katoo pe nyi.
42007026	Kena e ni nyina nyjɛ pan e na sɛ wa. Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun wa lehaa e na sɛ ree? Kpra na e ti ni yo e pan, e na ŋmba wra wɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun na nya.
42007027	Ŋgi na, wre Jↄn ŋmba kee pra nyunↄ mu tɛɛ fa kre mbo, 'E le, mbe ni bituŋu tun mbe u yiɛ klu mu pan. Wre we yiɛ klu mbe sɛ kolo gbeele mu pan.'
42007028	E ti ni yo e pan, leweele nu, ndro n wa mu wɛ Jↄn na, a nde ŋmba uu fiɛn Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nu kre wɛ u na."
42007029	Lenɛɛrɛ pre na lampoo shↄfɛɛnlɛ pre na Yesu kee yire loo, na Jↄn pe ndrɛ je, a praa yuu na Nyiɛkpↄↄ pe kprafun.
42007030	La, Farisiie pre na Mbose mbra twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na kee ŋga Nyiɛkpↄↄ naa chaa mbe pe pe pan kre je, a pe nsra tia Jↄn na pe ndrɛ je.
42007031	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Kena leele mblɛ nyini ni kuraa ni mbe aŋga leele mblɛ wru mbe gbun hin? A yira ŋgi sembremu pe wru ŋga hin?
42007032	Pan pe nyi na biile mblɛ pee wa mu tni jafa lawee nu lɛ. Mbe plɛ kna mbe yo plɛ pan mbo, 'O bijam mɛɛ kↄ e pan, a e je; e n yↄ. A o kumu kpali, a e je; e n nyɛni.'
42007033	Jↄn ndrajefun na pan na blefuni, a u nsraa simi ka na ka gboo, a e naa yuu na ŋumufↄↄn wa u nu.
42007034	A Lewo Pↄ wre pan na lii na gboo, a e na yuu na lilio na gbↄgbↄↄ wi, a u nↄↄlↄ lɛ sisam pefɛɛnlɛ na lampoo shↄfɛɛnlɛ.
42007035	La, Nyiɛkpↄↄ kachindɛ, u biile pe ki chini."
42007036	Bawa Farisiie pre wa na u yeeri mbe u sɛ li u katoo. A Yesu na sɛ, mna sɛ tni lihaa wa.
42007037	Chlↄ sisampefun wa naa wa chia kre na, ŋga wra loo titɛɛ kre nu na Yesuu wa na lii Farisiie wo wre katoo kre, wra sɛ na alabasta tlade gbolo ka ni,
42007038	mna sɛ yire Yesu kro, mna kosie kan mna u jeelee yii, mna nyɛni, a u yotunyi na fo mna Yesu jeelee nyiŋge. A chlↄ wre na u ndra nyjuro yii mna u yotunyi yire tlu, mna Yesu jeelee shiun mna tlade kre kna mna wo u jeelee na.
42007039	Ŋga Farisiie wo ŋmba wra sɛ na Yesu ni u katoo kre na kee ŋga nya kre, wra kna na yuu u jawala nu mbo, "Na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun wi blↄ ŋmba yɛŋgɛ kaa we na ndro ŋmba nyini wi chlↄ ŋmba u kɛ taari u na ŋga chin. Ŋgi na, sisam pefun titi wi."
42007040	A Yesu na kna mna yo blↄ wre pan mbo, "Siimↄn, nii wa na kee ka ni mbe yo mu pan." A wra kna mbo, "Nyinafun, ki yo ni pan."
42007041	A wra kna mbo, "Bilɛ shiin plɛ pra swajinfun wa fↄlↄ li, jlewo wre na u fↄlↄ li denari lafɛɛ kunↄ, a shiin wo wre na u fↄlↄ li danarii fuloe shiin na kɛ.
42007042	Ŋga swafun wre na nya na pia jaa yi tↄ kre, wra fↄↄlɛɛ yire ti mna pe kro shiin kɛ. Kena pre leele shiin mblɛ, ŋmbi we na swafun wre kee chaa kpↄↄ hin?"
42007043	A Siimↄn na kna mbo, "Ni jawa na ŋmba fↄlↄ ki kpↄↄ wre wi." A Yesu na kna mbo, "Mu kpra yo."
42007044	A Yesu na kna mna chlↄ wre le, mna yo Siimↄn pan mbo, "Mu chlↄ ŋmba nyaa? Ni pan mu katoo, la, mu n ni jeelee je. La, u yotunyi tɛɛ mu ni jeelee je, mu u ndra nyjuroe tɛɛ mu yi tlu.
42007045	Mu n ni nyu shiun, a mu yire ŋga ni le katoo ŋga nu, chlↄ ŋmba n ni jeelee shiuun ti.
42007046	Mu n ni ndra fa na simi ni, la, chlↄ ŋmba ni jeelee fa na tlade ni.
42007047	Kre ndra na, ti mbe ni yo mbe mu loo, u koroo ŋga u nyina kre nyina na u sisam tataara nyjɛ u pe yire kro, ni yi ti mu u kɛ. Ŋmba pie ti mbe kɛ fiɛn kre, mu chin na u koroo kii fiɛn"
42007048	A Yesu na kna mu yo chlↄ wre pan mbo, "Ni mu sisam ti mu mu kɛ."
42007049	A mblɛ praa wa mu tni tebru na lihaa wa kre na kna na peyɛ wie mbo, "A ndro ŋmbi sembremu wi ŋmba, a wra sisam tii na kee ŋga hin?"
42007050	A Yesu na kna mna yo chlↄ wre pan mbo, "Mu shↄnlie mu shↄ, kena sɛ na wejinyiŋge ni."
42008001	Nyjila chiɛri ka kↄkro kre, Yesu na kila mna tro kakpↄɛ na kabɛɛlɛ yɛ na, na ketaan kre, na Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre kee yuu.
42008002	Wre na bitumblↄ kɛmbↄshiin pre na chiɛlɛ mblɛ nu wra ŋumufuɛn wↄ mna pe tra kre kro pra sɛ. Maria ŋmba praa yeeri Magdalene ŋmba nu wra ŋumufuɛn kↄↄnashiin wↄ kre,
42008003	na Joana, Hɛrodi katoo lefun ŋmba praa yeeri Choza wre chↄ, na Susana, na chiɛlɛ tataara mblɛ praa nyaari pre titi kooloe na, na yaa Yesu na u bitumblↄ na kre.
42008004	Ŋga lenɛɛrɛ mblɛ pra yiri chiɛ yire na, na pan mu fni u lawee kre, a wra pe gbun yomini ka mbo,
42008005	"Blↄ wa wra sɛ u yirɛ bie yɛ wohaa, ŋga wraa yi woni kre yɛ na wo kolo mbɛɛ na, a leele na yi taanla, a hanyiɛlɛ na yi li.
42008006	A yi yɛ na wo tra ŋga nu dnɛ nyi nu, ŋga yira ŋↄↄ mbe yili to, mna ku. Ŋgi na, na yi nsra nyumu ta.
42008007	A yi yɛ na wo wuuro nu, a yire na wuuro yire na chaa mu fin, a wuuro yire na yi fↄ a yira ku.
42008008	A Yirɛ bie yire yɛ na wo tra taan na, mna fin, mna sɛ lafaa lafaa." A Yesu na kna mbo, "Ŋmba uu ndie ni kre u ndie tɛɛ u loo."
42008009	Yesu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na u wie, na yomini kre nↄↄ yi ŋgi hin?
42008010	A wra kna mbo, "Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kee ŋga ki ndra kre, pe yire nyina ke yi, la, leele hamblɛ pre pan rɛ, yomɛɛlɛ nu pie pe nyina ki yi. Pie nyiɛlɛ nyaa mbra le, la pia kee kre nya, pie kee kre loo, la pia ki nↄↄ loo.
42008011	Kena yomini kre nↄↄ yi kre, yirɛ bie yire yi Nyiɛkpↄↄ ketaan kre.
42008012	Nyjɛ yira wo kolo mbɛɛ na kre lɛ mblɛ pe ketaan kre ndru, mbe Sutna pan mbe ki wↄ pe lolonyi nu, mbe pia kee kre shↄ mbe li, mbe pe pe shↄ.
42008013	A nyjɛ yira wo dnɛ lawee kre lɛ mblɛ pe ketaan kre ndru mbe ki shↄ na yɛshↄↄrↄ ni, la, kee kre wa tni pe nu. Na pe kee kre shↄnli maa, na penlee waa pan to, na pe to.
42008014	A yirɛ bie nyjɛ yira sɛ wo wuuro nu kre lɛ mblɛ pe ketaan kre ndru, mbe waŋgra kebɛɛlɛ, na waŋgra yirɛ na ki yɛshↄↄrↄ pan mbe tni pe nu mbe ketaan kre fↄ, mbe kia jaa sɛ.
42008015	A nyjɛ yira sɛ wo tra taan kre nu kre lɛ mblɛ pe ketaan kre ndru na loloŋgo chichie ni, mbe frↄ mbe kee kre jaa sɛ pe nu."
42008016	"Ndro wa kania mu mbe yira tɛɛ mbe ki juule, ndee mbe ki le mpa ndoo. La, kania taayira na pe ki muni na taari, na ndro le katoo mbe u nya ki na.
42008017	Ŋgi na, kre yira n wa a pe ki ndra mbe kia kↄ mbe yili fimi na.
42008018	Kena kee kre e ndru kre, e ki dↄↄta. Ŋgi na, ŋmba uu ka ni mu ki le chichie kre, pie ka ya u pan mbe u ta nɛɛrɛ. A ŋmba uu fiɛn ni a u n ki le chichie kre, chiɛri ŋga ni u nyi kre kuraa pie ki shↄ u kɛɛ."
42008019	Kre nyila kre nu Yesu lo na u chinlɛ na pan na u chaa, a imi leele pre na nɛɛ kre ndra na, pe nsra kolo ta mbe da u na.
42008020	A pra yo u pan mbo, "Mu lo na na mu chinlɛɛ wa mu yire fimi na, na mu chaa mbe nya."
42008021	A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Ni lo na ni chinlɛ lɛ mblɛ pe Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee kre ndru na lii ki na kre."
42008022	Ki ble ka Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na le krↄ nu, a wra yo pe pan mbo, "E ti mbe o kun lↄↄ kro kokoo ŋgaa na."
42008023	Ŋga praa shie kre, Yesu naa ŋunu. A fuflɛ kpↄↄ ka na gbun lↄↄ kre yiɛ na, a nyumu na le krↄ kre nu, a kraa chaa mbe kna.
42008024	A twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na Yesu gbun mu nyi mna yo u pan mbo, "O Tafun, o chaa ku!" A Yesu na yiri mna fuu fuflɛ kre, na nyumu kre na, a yira yire dimm.
42008025	A wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Sena e shↄnlie sɛ hin?" Kee kre na pe pe kawako ni, a fiɛrɛ na pe yii, a pra kna na peyɛ wie mbo, "Ndro ŋmbi nyini wi ŋmba hin, na u fuu fuflɛ na nyumu na mbe yi yire dimm ŋga hin?"
42008026	A pra sɛ le Gerasenie tra nu, kraa wa Galilii mbɛɛ na.
42008027	Ŋga wra le tra kre nu kre, blↄ wa na pan mna u fni, na ŋumufↄↄn wa u nu, kie pe nyjila tataara na wra yoŋgo tↄ, a wa tni katoo, fanyi weele nu wraa sni.
42008028	Ŋga wra Yesu nya kre, a wra gble fↄↄri mu le, mna pan mu to u yiɛ, mna paara gedeŋge mbo, "Yesu, Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri kre pↄ, mu yira ŋgi kii wa ni pan hin? Ni mu tali, maa shia ni kla!"
42008029	Na Yesu klu mu yo ŋumufↄↄn wre pan na u yili blↄ wre nu. Nyjila tataara nu na ŋumufↄↄn wre yiri u nu a pe u kanpan tuŋmble na kre, we tↄↄnrↄ mɛnyi yire kunumu mbe wa, mbe ŋumufↄↄn wre sɛ na u ni fimi lawee nu.
42008030	A Yesu na kna mna u wie mbo, "Mu mɛɛ yi ŋgi hin?" A wra kna mbo, "Ni mɛɛ Ligion." Ŋgi na, na ŋumufuɛn nɛɛ u nu.
42008031	A ŋumufuɛn pre na u tali na waa shia pe ni mbe pe sɛ wee ŋga ki n nyukↄↄrↄ ni kre nu.
42008032	Kre nyjila kre na prakoe plɛɛ wa na kaa nyua ka mbɛɛ na wa, a pra Yesu tali na u ti mbe pe sɛ le prakoe pre nu. A wra pe ŋga kolo.
42008033	A ŋumufuɛn pre na yili blↄ wre nu, mna sɛ le prakoe pre nu, a pra mↄŋↄ poŋgo mna sɛ to tapla kre nu, a kra pe li.
42008034	Ŋga yurɛ pre lefɛɛnlɛ na kee ŋga kra pe kre nya kre, pra fɛ mna sɛ mandiɛ bↄ chiɛ nyjɛ yiraa wa wa yire kro na.
42008035	A leele na yili mna sɛ kee ŋga ki pe kre lehaa. Pra sɛ Yesu lawee mna blↄ ŋmba nu u ŋumufuɛn yire wↄ wre nya, na uu wa mu tni u jaara. Na u yiɛ to kama, a u yoŋgo tↄ, a fiɛrɛ na pe yii.
42008036	Mblɛ pra sɛ u nya kre na leele bↄ mandiɛ, imi na ŋumufuɛnfun wre saanla mu da.
42008037	A leele mblɛ praa wa Gerasenie pre tra nu kre kro naa yuu na Yesu u yili pe pan tra kre nu. Ŋgi na, fiɛrɛ na pe yii kpↄↄ. Kra tia Yesu na le krↄ nu mna ndru u kro.
42008038	Blↄ ŋmba nu ŋumufuɛn yire na yili kre na Yesu tali mbo, "Jande, ti mbe mi na ŋu sɛ."
42008039	A Yesu na kna mna yo u pan mbo, "Ndru mu sɛ mu katoo mu sɛ kee ŋga Nyiɛkpↄↄ pe mu mu ŋga kre bↄ." A blↄ wre na sɛ chia lam, mna sɛ na kee ŋga Yesu pe u na kre kpali na tro.
42008040	Ŋga Yesu na ndru mu kun epo kre kro kre, lenɛɛrɛ na pan mu u fni. Ŋgi na, na pe kro u sri.
42008041	Bawa Judae fninyuŋgo loplombo pre wa, praa u yeeri Jairↄs, na pan mna kosie kan Yesu yiɛ, mna u tali na u ti pe sɛ u katoo.
42008042	Ŋgi na, na u pↄ bichable nunu ŋmba u se we pe yɛlɛ kɛmbↄshiin, na u yaa mu chaa ku. Ŋga Yesu naa shie blↄ wre katoo kre, lenɛɛrɛ pre na wɛ u na, mnaa u frɛ.
42008043	Na nyimi woni chlↄ wa pan mu wɛ yɛlɛ kɛmbↄshiin na, a u tra chiin mu pra.
42008044	A chlↄ wre na yiri mu chaa lenɛɛrɛ pre nu mu taa Yesu kro, mna sɛ kɛ taa u dodoŋgi nyu na, titɛɛ kre nu to, a u nyimi woo kre na kun.
42008045	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Ndro ŋmbi u kɛ taa ni na ŋga hin?" A pe kro na kaala. A Pita na kna mbo, "Ni Tafun, na leele pre nɛɛ mu na, na gbuun mu na kro poŋgo."
42008046	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Ndro kɛ taa ni na. Ŋgi na, ni chin na faŋga ka yili ni nu."
42008047	Chlↄ wre na nya na wa jaa ndra, a wra pan mna kosie kan Yesu yiɛ, na seeri, mna paara lenɛɛrɛ pre kro yiɛ na, mna nyina ŋga ki tia a u kɛ taa u na, na imi na u saanla titɛɛ kre nu.
42008048	A Yesu na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Ni pↄ, mu shↄnlie mu shↄ. Sɛ na wejinyiŋge ni."
42008049	Yesu naa wa mu yire na paara, a blↄ wa na yiri Judae fninyuŋgo lopom wre katoo mna pan mbo, "Mu pↄ wre ku. Kena maa tuwi mbe nyinafun wre hau."
42008050	La, ŋga Yesu na kee kre loo kre, a wra kna mna yo u pan mbo, "Maa fiɛ, shↄnli rɛ, we ŋmaa ta."
42008051	Ŋga Yesu na sɛ le katoo wa kre, u nsra tia ndro na le wa, fↄna wre na Pita, na Jↄn, na Jemisi, na pↄ wre lɛ na u lo chiin.
42008052	Mblɛ praa wa wa kro naa nyɛni na fooro lii, a Yesu na kna mbo, "Yaa nyɛni. Ŋgi na, pↄ wre, u n ku. Sni u sni."
42008053	A pra laa mu to na Yesu tɛɛ, na pre chin na kuu pↄ wre ku.
42008054	A Yesu na sɛ pↄ wre yii kɛ na, mna kna mbo, "Bichable, yiri!"
42008055	A u ŋumu na ndru mu pan u nu, a wra taan mu yiri. A Yesu na yo pe pan na pe u ŋga yaka mbe u ka.
42008056	A kra u sefɛɛnlɛ pre pe kawako, la, Yesu na pe jaari na pia shia kee ŋga ki pe kre yo ndro pan.
42009001	A Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ kɛmbↄshiin pre yeere mna pe ŋga jaŋga na faŋga mbe pra ŋumufuɛn wↄni leele nu, mbra yambla trai.
42009002	Mna pe tun na pe sɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre kee kpali, mbra yambla trai.
42009003	Mna yo pe pan mbo, "Yaa shia sɛ na yaka ni, yaa sɛ na kanyie ni, ndee bↄtↄ ni, ndee mbe paanu wru, ndee mbe swa wru, a yaa shia dodonyi shiin shiin wru.
42009004	A katoo ŋga nu ee le kpan, e tni wa e sɛ su ŋga ble ee yili wa.
42009005	A mna ee le kpan a pe n shia e shↄ kre, na e yilii chia kre na kre, e e jeelee tra pↄ e wo wa, mbe ki dansiɛrɛ li mbe pe taan."
42009006	A twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na yiri mna sɛ kabɛɛlɛ yire na, na ketaan kre kpali, na yambla trai na tro.
42009007	Ŋga Galilii ŋunu Hɛrodi na kee nyjɛ Yesu pe yire loo kre, kra u hau kpↄↄ. Ŋgi na, na leele yuu na Jↄn ndrajefun wre u ndru mu nyi.
42009008	A plɛ naa yuu na Elaija u yiri, a plɛ naa yuu na fa Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ pre wa u nyi.
42009009	A Hɛrodi na kna mbo, "Jↄn rɛ, ndaa u gbo, kena ndro ŋmbi kee ni ndru ŋga hin? Ni u chaa mbe nya".
42009010	Yesu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na ndru mna pan mna kee nyjɛ pe sɛ pe yire krɛrɛ bↄ Yesu pan. A wra pe wru a pe kro na sɛ chia ka na praa ki yeeri Bɛtsaida.
42009011	Ŋga lenɛɛrɛ pre na ki loo kre, pra taa u kro, u nsra pe ni, a wra Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre kee yo pe pan, mna mblɛ praa yaa tra.
42009012	Ŋga yila naa shie mbe sɛ to kre, twanfɛɛnlɛ kɛmbↄshiin pre na pan mu yo Yesu pan mbo, "Leele pre wa kolo mbe pe sɛ seechiɛ nyjɛ yii waa mbɛɛlɛ na mna ŋga na, mbe sɛ sro cha mbe li, mbe snihaa cha. Ŋgi na, yaka n wa mna."
42009013	A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "E pe ŋga yaka mbe pe ka." A pra kna mbo, "Yaka n wa o pan, paanu kunↄ, na mbroe shiin pee wa o pan. Kena fↄŋga oo sɛ sro lↄ mbe leele mblɛ kro ŋga".
42009014	Na bilɛ mblɛ pee wa pe nu we pe kagbeŋkunↄ. A Yesu na kna mu yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo, "E ti pe ble ble peyɛ na, fuloe shiin na kɛ kɛ."
42009015	A pra tia leele pre na ble ble ma.
42009016	A Yesu na paanuu kunↄ yire na mbroe shiin pre bali mna yii kɛɛ, mna yiɛ wa nyjeeri mna dwan mu le yi nu, mna yi pile mna u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre ŋga, na pe leele pre ŋga yiyi imi na pe ble ble kre.
42009017	A leele pre kro na ka mna yↄↄ. A pra pe kampraa yire yoori kakɛɛ kɛmbↄshiin.
42009018	Nyjila ka nu Yesu naa wa na nyiɛtali wre nunu, a u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na pan u lawee, a wra pe wie mbo, "Ndro ŋmbi lenɛɛrɛ pre ni jawa hin?"
42009019	A pra kna mbo, "Plɛ yuu na Jↄn ndrajefun wre wi ŋu, a plɛ na yuu na Elaija wi, a plɛ na yuu na fawolo Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ pre wa wi ŋu."
42009020	A wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "A yire hin? Mni e ni jawa hin?" A Pita na kna mbo, "Ŋu wi Nyiɛkpↄↄ Mizaia wre."
42009021	A wra pe jaari na pia shia ki yo mbe ndro loo.
42009022	Yesu na kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Lewo pↄ wre fna mbe kala nya tataara, mbe Judae loplombo pre, na pe sↄfue loplombo pre, na pe mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre u je, mbe u gbo, a ki ble taarɛ ble na we nyi."
42009023	A Yesu na kna mu yo leele pre kro pan mbo, "Na ndro chaa mbe taa ni kro kre, u fun u uyɛ fɛɛ, mbe u kanyana kumu kaan wru mbe taa ni kro.
42009024	Ŋgi na, ndro ŋmba we na kɛ toni u ŋmaa na kre, kie yili u kɛɛ. A ŋmba we yila ni na mbe u ŋmaa wa mbe fun kre, we ki ta.
42009025	Kena na lewo waŋgra ŋga yirɛ kro ta, mu u ŋmaa wa mu fun, tnu ŋgi we ta hin?
42009026	ŋmba we na nyifɛɛrɛ piin mi na ni ketaan kre yoo na kre, na Lewo Pↄ wre waa pan wre na u Lɛ wre na nyjeeri bitumblↄ chechee pre yɛnyiŋge nu kre, we ufun mɛɛ yeeree nyifɛɛrɛ pe.
42009027	La, ni yuu e pan, kpra na, leele plɛɛ wa mu yire e nu mna a pia kumu chin, mbaa sɛ su ŋga pie Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nya."
42009028	Ŋga wra yire kee nyjɛ yo kre, kie pe ki ble kↄↄnataarɛ, a Yesu, na Pita, na Jↄn, na Jemisi bali mu ya uyɛ na, a pra sɛ nyua na nyiɛtalihaa.
42009029	Ŋga wraa wa wa na nyiɛtali kre, u yiɛ na chinɛ, a u dodonyi na fniŋge prupru u na.
42009030	Titɛɛ kre nu to, bilɛ shiin plɛ, Mbose na Elaija na pan na paara na u ni.
42009031	Pra pan na nyjeeri yɛnyiŋge ni, mna pan mu kumu ŋga Yesu we sɛ ku Jerusalɛm na kre kee yo.
42009032	Kre nyjila kre, na Pita na u wolo pre gbunu, a pra fo mu nyi, mna u yɛnyiŋge kre nya, mna bilɛ shiin pre pra pan mu na paara na u ni pre nya.
42009033	Ŋga bilɛ pre naa shie mbe Yesu ti kre, Pita na kna mu yo Yesu pan mbo, "Ni Tafun, ki nyu na oo wa mna. Kena ti mbe o sugbɛɛ taarɛ sin, ŋu wo nunu, Mbose wo nunu, Elaija wo nunu." Na Pita n chin kee ŋga u yuu.
42009034	Ŋga Pita na kre kee ŋga yo ma kre, titɛɛ kre nu a sugbeŋge na pan mna pe tↄ, a fiɛrɛ na pe yii.
42009035	A mana ka na yili sugbeŋge kre nu mbo, "Ŋmba wi ni Pↄ ŋmba ni wↄ wre. Kena e ndie tɛɛ u pan."
42009036	Ŋga mana kre na yili ma to, Yesu chiin pra nya na u yire wa. Pe nsra nyu kun na, a kee yire pra nya wa kre krɛɛrɛ pe nsra yi ka bↄ ndro pan yire ble yire nu.
42009037	Ŋga ki nyiŋge na se a pra yiri nyua kre na mna tii tra kre, lenɛɛrɛ na sɛ u fni.
42009038	A blↄ wa na gblee badaŋga ka le lenɛɛrɛ pre nu mbo, "Nyinafun, jande, ni pↄ ŋmba le ni pan. Ŋgi na, wre nunu chom wi ni pↄ.
42009039	A ŋumufↄↄn wa u nu, na ki yiri mbe ki u chan, mbe wra gble leni, mbe ti u jire, mbe u nyu na tafↄkↄ kuun. Na ki pan ma ki u hau, a kia laa u na yira.
42009040	Kre ni pan mu mu twanfɛɛnlɛ pre tali mbe pe u tra, a pe n na ki jani."
42009041	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Yire aŋga leele ndikanmbla mblɛ nu shↄnlie n wa, ni tni e jaara, ndee ni kala nya na e ni mbe sɛ su nyjila ŋgi nu hin?" A wra kna mna yo blↄ wre pan mbo, "Pan na mu pↄ wre ni mna."
42009042	Ŋga pↄ wre naa paan to, a ŋumufↄↄn kre na u chan, a wraa jirei. A Yesu na fuu ŋumufↄↄn kre na, a pↄ wre na saanla, a wra u wru mna u lɛ ŋga.
42009043	Jaŋga kpↄↄ ŋga Nyiɛkpↄↄ na nyina kre na leele pre pe kawako. Ŋga leele pre na yire na kawa na Yesu kee nyjɛ u pe yire ni kre, wra kna mna yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo,
42009044	"E ti mbe kee ŋga le e ndie. Pie Lewo Pↄ wre wↄ mbe le leele kɛɛ."
42009045	Kee kre wra yo kre pe nsra ki nↄↄ loo. Pra kee kre ndra pe na, mbe pia ki nↄↄ loo, a praa fiɛ na pie ki nↄↄ wie.
42009046	Kakra ka na le twanfɛɛnlɛ pre lalaa, a praa yuu na pe ŋmbihaa u wɛ pe kro na hin?
42009047	Yesu na pe jawala nya, a wra kna mna pↄ wa yii mna yire u jaara.
42009048	Mna kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Ŋmba we pↄ imi shↄ mi ndra na kre, kena ufun ni shↄ. A ŋmba we ni shↄ kre ŋmba u ni tun wre shↄ. Ŋgi na, ŋmba we uyɛ pe fiɛn e nu kre we pe e kro yɛklo."
42009049	A Jↄn na kna mbo, "Ni Tafun, o blↄ wa nya na u mu mɛɛ tɛɛ na ŋumufↄɛn woni leele nu, a o u jaari, na u n chaa o nu."
42009050	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Yaa u jaari. Ŋgi na, ŋmba u n na paara na e taanla kre, e chin na uu wa e nu."
42009051	Ŋga Yesu ble yire naa paan mbe kↄ, mbe u sɛ nyjeeri kre, wra yiɛ tɛɛ Jerusalɛm na.
42009052	A wra leele tun a pra yiɛklu mna sɛ le Samariae kable ka na, mna lawee gbeele na u sri.
42009053	La, bawa leele pre nsra u shↄ. Ŋga wraa shie Jerusalɛm na kre ndra na.
42009054	Ŋga u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre, Jemisi na Jↄn na leele pre nya ma kre, a pra kna mbo, "O Tafun, mu chaa mbe o kanhun yeeri ki yiri nyjeeri mbe paan pe sro ree?"
42009055	A wra kna mna fuu, mna pe yiɛ kee yo pe pan mbo, "E n chin ŋumu ŋga leele lɛ yire ree? Lewo Pↄ wre n pan leele klahaa, la, pe shↄhaa u pan."
42009056	A pra yili wa mna sɛ chia fↄŋgↄ na.
42009057	Ŋga pra kolo kre yii na shie kre, a blↄ wa na kna mna yo Yesu pan mbo, "Mna mu sɛ kpan, ni chaa mbe taa mu kro."
42009058	A Yesu na kna mna yo u pan mbo, "Ŋmbokuŋmboe wa na wee ni na sni, a hanyiɛlɛ mblɛ pe tro nyjeeri ŋgaa wa na zeere ni na sni, la Lewo Pↄ wre n wa na ndra tɛɛhaa ni."
42009059	A wra kna mna yo lefuŋu pan, mbo, "Taa ni kro." A wra kna mbo, "Ni Tafun, ni ŋga kolo mbe ni sɛ ni lɛ gboo le mbe pan tun."
42009060	A Yesu na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Ti mbe mblɛ pe n ŋmaa ni kre, sɛ na pre titi gboolo leni, la, ŋu rɛ, sɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kee kre kpali."
42009061	A wa na kna mbo, "Ni Tafun, mbe taa mu kro, la ti mbe ni sɛ ni katoofɛɛnlɛ kla mbe pan."
42009062	A Yesu na kna mna yo u pan mbo, "Ndro ŋmba we kɛ le Nyiɛkpↄↄ tnumu nu, mbe ndru kro kre n fna Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nu."
42010001	Yire kee nyjɛ kↄkro kre, o Tafun wre na leele fuloetaarɛ na kɛmbↄshiin wↄ, mna pe mbra shiin shiin mna pe tun na pe yiɛklu mbe sɛ ketaan kre yo chiɛ nyjɛ na wre Yesu chaa mbe sɛ yire na.
42010002	Wra yo pe pan mbo, "Yirɛ kun wee yire nɛɛ, a kunfɛɛnlɛ pree fiɛn, kena e yirɛ yire tafun wre tali mbe u tnumutunfɛɛnlɛ tun mbe pe paan yirɛ yire kun.
42010003	E le, e sɛ, ni e tuni, a pan e nyi na mbaala mblɛ pe shie komboolo nu lɛ.
42010004	Yaa shia sɛ na swa le yirɛ ni, a yaa shia bↄtↄ wru, ndee mbe kpawrɛ shiin shiin wru. A yaa na yire mbra shaari mbra nyjila klai.
42010005	A katoo ŋga nu ee le kpan, e klu e yo na wejinyiŋge ki tni katoo kre nu.
42010006	Kena na wejinyiŋge chafuun waa katoo wa kre, wrefun nu e wejinyiŋge kre we tni, a na ki n pan ma naa, e wejiŋyiŋge kre we ndruu pan e pan.
42010007	A e tni katoo nunu kre nu, e na yira ŋga pie na e kaan kpan shuo e na kaa e na gboo. Ŋgi na tnumutunfun fↄtↄↄrↄ fna na u ni, yaa shia yili katoo ka nu mbe sɛ fↄŋgↄ nu.
42010008	Chia ŋga na ee le, a pe waa e shↄ kre, sro ŋga pie e ŋga kpan e ki li,
42010009	a yambla mblɛ pee wa ki na kpan, e pe tra, e yo pe pan na Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre mbra pe na.
42010010	La, na e le chia na a pe n shia e shↄ kre, e sɛ yire chia kre lete na, e yo pe pan na,
42010011	'Hali e chia ŋga tra nyjɛ yi mbra o jeelee na kuraa kre, o yi pↄ mu wo e na mbe ki dansiɛrɛ li mbe e taan, la, e ja e chin na, Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre mbra mna.'
42010012	Ni yuu e pan, Nyiɛkpↄↄ kpra kun ble kre, pie Sodom leele fooro chin mbe wɛ kre chia kre na."
42010013	"Chorazin, atɛ, Bɛtsaida, atɛ. Ŋgi na, kawako kee nyje yi pe e nu ŋga, na yire yira pe Tiro na Sidon na kre, pia na nyjila kla kuraa, pie na pe jawala chinɛ, mbra fooro li kpↄↄ.
42010014	La, Nyiɛkpↄↄ kpra kun ble kre, pie Tiro na Sidon leele fooro chin mbe we e na.
42010015	A ŋu, Kapɛnↄm, mu jawa na muu tnihaa chichie ni nyjeeri. Ma tni haa chiechie ta. Pie sɛ na mu ni kuulo ndoo.
42010016	Kena ŋmba we e kee loo kre, u ni kee loo. A ŋmba we e je kre ni je. A ŋmba we ni je kre u ŋmba u ni tun wre je."
42010017	Leele fuloetaarɛ na kɛmbↄshiin pre na ndru mna pan na yɛshↄↄrↄ ni, mna kna mbo, "O Tafun, mu mɛɛ kre saara na, hali ŋumufuɛn kuraa peyɛ nyjii mu o ŋga."
42010018	A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Ndaa Sutna nya na u yire nyjeeri mu to tra na nyiɛtwanraa yi.
42010019	E le, ni e ŋga jaŋga mbe e na wↄↄlↄ na naala taanla, a ni Sutna na u jaŋga kro le e kɛɛ, a yaka wa e ta fio.
42010020	La, yaa ti mbe e yiɛshↄ na ŋumufuɛn peyɛ nyjii mu e ŋga, la, e ti mbe e yiɛshↄ na pe e mɛɛ nyunↄ nyjeeri."
42010021	Kre nyjila kre nu, kpra ŋumu wre na tia Yesu yiɛ na shↄ, a wra kna mbo, "Ndoo, nyjeeri na tra Tafun, ni mu kaan mboo, na mu kaalɛɛ nyjɛ ndra kachimblɛ, na hlɛchinfɛɛnlɛ na, mu yi wↄ mu biile fiɛnfiɛn nyina. Yɛŋgɛ yi ndoo, pan mu ki chaa, kre ki tia mu ki pe ma.
42010022	Ni Lɛ wre ni ŋga yirɛ kro. Ndro n u Pↄ wre chin, fↄna Lɛ wre chiin. A ndro n u Lɛ wre chin na Pↄ wre bↄkↄ, na mblɛ Pↄ wre chaa na we lɛ wre wↄ mbe pe nyina kre chiin bↄkↄ."
42010023	A wra kna mna yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo, "Ndro Ŋmba u kee nyjɛ e nya yire nya kre wo yi dwamu.
42010024	Ŋgi na, ni yuu e pan na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ tataara, na ŋulo tataara naa chaa na pie na nyjɛ e nya ŋga nya, la, pe nsra yi nya; a praa chaa mbra nyjɛ e loo nyjɛ loo, la, pe nsra yi ta mu loo."
42010025	Bawa mbra nyinafun wa na yiri mna Yesu pe mbe le mbo, "Nyinafun, mni mbe pe mbe blenyini ŋmaa ta hin?"
42010026	A Yesu na kna mna yo u pan mbo, "Kee yire pe nyunↄ Mbose mbra yire nu mu tɛɛ kre, mni mu yi nↄↄ loo mu da hin?"
42010027	A blↄ wre na kna mbo, "Pe yo ki fna mu mu Tafun Nyiɛkpↄↄ kori na mu loloŋgo kro, na mu ŋmaa kro, na mu jawala kro na mu faŋga kro ni, mbe mu ŋmbrↄ kori, imi na mu muyɛ kori mu da."
42010028	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Mu ki nyu wↄ chichie, na mu yire kee nyjɛ pini mu ŋmaa ta."
42010029	La, blↄ wre naa chaa mbe uyɛ gbeele, kra tia wra Yesu wie mbo, "A ŋmbi wi ni ŋmbrↄ hin?"
42010030	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Blↄ wa wra yiri Jerusalɛm na mnaa shie Jɛriko na, mna sɛ fni kokↄↄnlↄ ni kolo, a pra u yirɛ shↄ u pan kro, mna u frↄ mu chaa u gbo, mna u ti wa sɛ.
42010031	Judae Sↄfu wa na kolo kre yii na shie wre lawee ka nu. Ŋga wra blↄ wre nya kre, wra u klɛ mu tro.
42010032	Pan chↄↄ Levi ndro wa na tro kolo kre na mna blↄ wre nya na mna u klɛ mu tro.
42010033	La, Samaria ndro wa naa kolo kuun, mna pan mu da blↄ wre lawee. U kee na pe u pan fooro ni,
42010034	a wra flo mu da u na, mna simi le u klɛ yire nu, mna yi pↄ kama, mna u wru mu taa u yurↄ ŋmba ni wraa kolo kuun na, mna sɛ na u ni fumblↄ snindoo, mna sɛ u le kama.
42010035	Ŋga nyiŋge na se, a wra yiri mna swa wↄ mna fumblↄ lefun wre ŋga, mna kna mbo, 'Jande, shↄ mna blↄ ŋmba le ni pan, fↄlↄ ŋga mu gbun ki kro kpan, na ni pan mbe ki tↄ!'
42010036	Kena leele taarɛ mblɛ, ŋmbi mu jawa na wra pe blↄ ŋmba kokↄↄnlↄ na frↄ wre ŋmbrↄ hin?"
42010037	A mbra nyinafun wre na kna mbo, "Ŋmba wra u fooro chin wre na wi." A Yesu na kna mbo, "Kena sɛ pe ma."
42010038	Ŋga Yesu na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre na to kolo na shie kre, wra le seechia ka na, bawa chlↄ wa, praa u yeeri Maata, na u wru mu sɛ na u ni u katoo.
42010039	Chlↄ wre chunu wa naa wa praa u yeeri Maria, wra sɛ tni Yesu jaara, na u kee nyjɛ wraa nyina yire ndru.
42010040	Na Maata yiɛ nyina wra sro pini pe pan. Maata krↄ na kun Maria ni, na u pieri mu na wre nunu le wra tnumu kre tuni. A wra sɛ yo Yesu pan mbo, "Ni Tafun, mu n nya na ki n fna na Maria we ti mbe mi nunu tnumu yire kro tuun? Kena yo u pan mbe u paan ya ni na."
42010041	A o Tafun wre na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Maata, Maata! Maa kawa na kee kro ni ma.
42010042	Kala nunu ki shian. A Maria u ŋga ki nyu kain kre chin mu wↄ, a pia jaa ki shↄ u kɛɛ."
42011001	Yesu na sɛ na nyiɛtali lawee ka nu. Ŋga wra kↄ kre, a u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre wa na pan mna yo u pan mbo, "O Tafun, o nyina imi oo na nyiɛtali, imi na Jↄn na u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre nyina kre."
42011002	A wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Na e nyiɛtali kre, e na yuu na, Ndoo, mu mɛɛ chichie ki yili. Mbe mu ŋunumu pan.
42011003	O ŋga o blenyini aliire,
42011004	Mu o sisam ti mu o kɛ. Ŋgi na, o tii na mblɛ pe sisam pini o na kre kee, a maa shia sɛ na o ni nyu chaara kee ka nu."
42011005	A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "E ŋmbihaa we sɛ u nunu pan blee, mbe sɛ yo u pan na, 'Awe, jande, ni jin paanuu taarɛ,
42011006	ni nunu wa le ni pan fuŋgaami ni pan, a ni n yaka ta mbe u ŋga',
42011007	mbe u yire lam mbe yo u pan na, 'Maa ni hau! Ni ni krↄ kan mu kↄ, a ni biile ŋunu. Mba jaa yiri mbe mu ŋga yaka.'
42011008	Na kra kro nↄↄlↄ na, wa na yiri, la, ŋga mu kroo na u tali kre ndra na, we yiri mbe mu ŋga nyjɛ yi mu shian kro."
42011009	"Kre ndra na, ni yuu e pan na, e tali, pie e ŋga, e na le ee nya, e krↄ koori, pie ki nyaa e pan.
42011010	Ŋgi na, ŋmba u tali kre, u taa; a ŋmba le kre, we nya. A ŋmba we krↄ koori kre, pie ki nyaa u pan.
42011011	E mblɛ pan biile nyi kre, e ŋmbihaa pↄ we u tali mbro, mbe u u ŋga wↄↄ hin?
42011012	Ndee na u pↄ u tali ŋgochirɛwɛ mbe u u ŋga naa hin?
42011013	Kena na yire sisam pefɛɛnlɛ mblɛ chin, mu na e biile kaan yirɛ chichiele, ŋgi kie ti mbe e Lɛ ŋmba uu wa nyjeeri wre wa mblɛ pe u tali Kpra Ŋumu wre, mbe wa pe ŋga hin?"
42011014	Ki ble ka Yesu na sɛ na ŋumufↄↄn woni kpo wa nu. Ŋga ŋumufↄↄn wre na yili blↄ wre nu kre, a wra ja mna paara, a kra lenɛɛrɛ pre pe kawako.
42011015	La, pe plɛ na kna na yuu mbo, "Bɛɛlzebul, ŋumufuɛn ŋunu wre u Yesu ŋga jaŋga, a wra ŋumufuɛn woni leele nu."
42011016	A plɛ naa chaa mbe u pe mbe le, mbe u nyjeeri kawako kee pe mbe pe nya.
42011017	La, Yesu na pe jawala nya, mna kna mu yo pe pan mbo, "Na waŋgra ki yɛ yↄↄlɛ, na wii na ki yɛ ni kre, waŋgra kre we to, a na sele ki yɛ yↄ na wii ki yɛ ni, kie ja.
42011018	Kena na Sutna uyɛ yↄↄlɛ, na wii na uyɛ ni kre, mni u ŋunumu kre we pe mbe yire hin?
42011019	Ŋgi na, e yo na Bɛɛlzebul jaŋga ni ni ŋumufuɛn woni leele nu, kena na Bɛɛlzebul jaŋga ni ni ŋumufuɛn woni leele nu kre, kena ŋmbi jaŋga ni e biile pre ŋumufuɛn woni leele nu hin? Pre pie pe e kpra kunfɛɛnlɛ.
42011020	La, na Nyiɛkpↄↄ jaŋga ni ni tɛɛ na ŋumufuɛn pre woni kre, kena e chin na Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre mbra e na.
42011021	Na faŋgafun uyɛ kna, mu ŋunↄ wi yirɛ pↄ na u katoo sri kre, yaka wa jaa u yirɛ ta.
42011022	La, na faŋgafun ŋmba u wɛ u na waa pan, maa wi na u ni maa u ja kre, we u ŋunↄ wi yirɛ nyjɛ na u kaan yire koli, mbe yi yↄↄlɛ mbe leele ŋga.
42011023	Kena ŋmba u n pe ni wo kre, e chin na ni loŋgo wi, a ŋmba u n na yaa ni na mbe o leele ble kre, e chin na leele u nyina."
42011024	"Na ŋumufↄↄn yili lewo nu kre, we sɛ wila fimi lawee nu, mbra lawee chaa mbe tni, na u waa lawee cha mu la, mbe u kna mbe yo uyɛ pan mbo, 'Mbe ndru mbe sɛ ni katoo ŋga nu ni yili mu pan kre nu.'
42011025	Na u waa ndru mu pan, mu nya na pe katoo kre pↄ, mu ki lam yirɛ mbra kama kre,
42011026	mbe u ndru mbe sɛ pan na ŋumu kↄↄnashin mblɛ pe wɛ wre na ni, mbe pe kro paan tni wa, na ki pan ma kre, ndro ŋmba nu pie tni kre sisam we wɛ u jle kre na."
42011027	Ŋga Yesu nyu na to kre, a chlↄ wa na yire lenɛɛrɛ pre nu mna paara kpↄↄ mbo, "Lɛɛ ŋga ki mu se, na nyinimi ŋga mu ŋgↄↄri kre wo yi dwamu."
42011028	A Yesu na kna mbo, "La, mblɛ pe Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee kre ndru na lii ki na kre, pre wo yi dwamu kpↄↄ."
42011029	Ŋga lenɛɛrɛ mblɛ pra fni Yesu jaara kre naa nɛɛi na yaa kre, wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "Aŋga leele mblɛ, sisampefɛɛnlɛ lɛ pe kro, kawako kee pe chaa mbe nya. La, pia ka nya fio, fↄna Jona kee kre chiin bↄkↄ.
42011030	Ŋgi na, imi Jona kee kre na pe kawako ni Nineve leele pan kre, pan chↄↄ Lewo pↄ wre kee we pe kawako ni aŋga leele mblɛ pan.
42011031	Nyiɛkpↄↄ kpra kun ble kre, Sheba ŋuchlↄ wre we yiri mbe paara mbe aŋga leele mblɛ taan. Ŋgi na, wra yiri haalee mna sɛ Sↄlↄmↄn kachindɛ kee kre loo, a e le, ndro ŋmba u wɛ Sↄlↄmↄn naa wa mu yire mna.
42011032	Nyiɛkpↄↄ kpra kun ble kre, Nineve leele we yiri mbe paara mbe aŋga leele mblɛ taan. Ŋgi na, ŋga pra Jona kee yire wraa kpali yire loo kre, pra pe jawala chinɛ, a e le, ŋmba u wɛ Jona naa wa mna."
42011033	"Ndro n wa mbe kania mu mbe ki ndra, ndee mbe yira tɛɛ mbe ki juule, la, we ki taa kania taayira na, mbe mblɛ pie le katoo kre na nyaa ki na.
42011034	Lewo wejiŋge kania yi nyini, na mu nyini pe chasi, mu wejiŋge kro we pe chasi. A na mu nyiɛlɛ n nyu kre, mu wejiŋge kroo wa wↄmu nu.
42011035	Kena e dↄↄ ta, mbe kania ŋga kii wa e nu kre wa fii.
42011036	Kena na kania ŋga kii wa mu nu kre fniŋge a wↄmu n wa ki kokoo ka na kre, kie na nyaa lawee kro nu, imi na pie kania mu mbe tɛɛ, mbe ki kan ndro na mbra nyaa kre."
42011037	Ŋga Yesu na paara a u nyu na to kre, Farisiie wo wa na u yeeri na u sɛ li u katoo, a wra sɛ, a pra tni na lii.
42011038	Kra Farisiie wo wre pe kawako na Yesu n kɛ je pe paala kolo na mna chin na lii.
42011039	A Yesu na kna mna yo u pan mbo, "Yire Farisiie, e e fimi jee, la, jajaara na sisam kee yi e lam nyi.
42011040	Yire jijiele mblɛ, e n chin na Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋmba wra fimi gbeele kre wra lam gbeele na ree?
42011041	Kena e na shianfɛɛnlɛ kee na lam nunu ni, kre yirɛ kro we pe cheche mbe e ŋga.
42011042	La, yire Farisiie, e atɛ! Ŋgi na, yire titi yirɛ fiɛnfiɛn nyjɛ e taa kre, e yi yↄↄlɛ kɛ, mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋga nunu kama, la, Nyiɛkpↄↄ kpra liire na u koroo kre, e yire je, yire kee nyjɛ yi fna mbe e naa pini mbra ya.
42011043	Yire Farisiie, e atɛ! Ŋgi na, na e sɛ fninyinyi nu kre, tnihɛɛ chichiele e chaa, na lete shaaraa chaa.
42011044	E atɛ! Pan e nyi na fanyi nyjɛ leele n na nyaa na yi taanla na tro yi, a nde yirɛ fuɛn bribri yii wa yi nu."
42011045	Bawa pe mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre nunu na kna mna yo Yesu pan mbo, "Nyinafun, na mu yo ma, kena o kro mu paara na taanla kre."
42011046	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Yire mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre, yire atɛ na. Ŋgi na, e tuuro nyjɛ leele wa ja pↄ mu pe tio. A yire titi wa kɛ taa ka na.
42011047	E atɛ! Ŋgi na, Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ mblɛ e tolɛɛlɛ na gbo kre, e pe fanyi sin.
42011048	Kena e chaa mbe nyina na kee nyjɛ e tolɛɛlɛ na pe kre, na yire nyjila na yi chↄↄ pan ee na pe. Ŋgi na, pre na pe gbo, mna pe le, a yire pe fanyi faanri.
42011049	Kre ndra na, kee nyjɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ na yo yi kre mbo, 'Mbe ni kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ na bitumblↄ tun pe pan, pie plɛ gbo, mbe ti plɛ kala nya.'
42011050	Mu yire waŋgra gbeele nyjila mu pan mu su aŋga, ni kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ mblɛ pe gbo kre ndra na, pie aŋga leele mblɛ ndie tini.
42011051	Mu yire Abɛl na, mu pan mu su Zakaria ŋmba pra gbo sra gbunu kre na cheche ndoo kre lalaa kre na, kpra na ni yuu e pan na, pre leele mblɛ ndra na, mbe aŋga leele mblɛ ndie tini.
42011052	Yire mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ, e atɛ! Ŋgi na, e kachindɛ kre kolo tↄ, a yire titi wa sɛ wa, a mblɛ pie sɛ wa kre, a e kolo tↄ pe na."
42011053	Ŋga Yesu na yili lawee kre nu kre, mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre na Farisiie pre plɛ na u wie kaalɛɛ tataara,
42011054	praa u paaraa dↄↄtaa, na aada we kee ka sembremu yo mbe pe u ta mbe yii ki na.
42012001	Ŋga leele pre na pan mna fni, mnaa shie kagbeŋ tataara, na peyɛ taanla kre, Yesu na kna mu yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo, "E eyɛ dↄↄ ta Farisiie pre yiisi yire haa, pe yiɛ nyumu kepelee yire na ni nyi.
42012002	Yaka n wa a pe ki tↄ, a pia kↄↄ ki nyaa, ndee yaka n wa mu ndra, a pia kↄↄ ki wↄ fimi na.
42012003	Kee nyjɛ ee yire ndramwↄmu nu mbe yo kre, na ndram saan pie yi loo. A nyjɛ ee ju mbe yo nyinyi nu kre, pie yire nyuŋgo ndra na mbe yi kpali mbe ndro kro loo."
42012004	"Ni wolo, ni yuu e pan, yaa shia mblɛ pie jaa e gbo, a pia jaa yaka pe e na e kum kↄkrↄ kre fiɛ.
42012005	La mbe e nyina ŋmba ki fna e fiɛ. E Nyiɛkpↄↄ fiɛ, wre we jaa e gbo, a e kumu kↄkro kre, uu wa na jaŋga ni na we sɛ na e ni kanyana lawee. Ki tia ni yuu e pan, e wre chiin fiɛ.
42012006	Pe n na hanyiɛlɛ bɛɛlɛ bɛɛlɛ kunↄ prɛ dambaa? A nde Nyiɛkpↄↄ n pe wa fɛɛ.
42012007	Kena ki ŋgi na hin? Hali e ndrɛ nyjuroe kuraa u yi nyu chin. Kena yaa fiɛ, ee tnu ni mu wɛ hanyiɛlɛ tataara na."
42012008	"Kena ni yuu e pan, ŋmba we yire leele yiɛ na mbe ni mɛɛ chichie yeeri kre, Lewo Pↄ wre we ufun mɛɛ chichie yeeri Nyiɛkpↄↄ nyjeeri bitumblↄ pre yiɛ na.
42012009	La, ŋmba we ni je leele yiɛ na kre, mbe ufun je Nyiɛkpↄↄ nyjeeri bitumblↄ pre yiɛ na.
42012010	A ŋmba we kee ka yo mbe Lewo pↄ wre taan kre, we sisam tinkɛɛ ta, la, ŋmba we jiɛnlɛ kee ka yo mbe Kpra Ŋumu wre taan kre, wa sisam tinkɛɛ ta fio.
42012011	A na pe e yii mu sɛ na e ni fninyinyi nu, ndee mu sɛ na e ni loplombo na jaŋgafɛɛnlɛ yiɛ na kre, yaa shia na kawa na e paaraa ndee ŋga ee yo ni.
42012012	Ŋgi na, Kpra Ŋumu wre we e nyina ŋga ee yo kre nyjila kre nu."
42012013	A lenɛɛrɛ pre wa na kna mna yo Yesu pan mbo, "Nyinafun, jande, yo ni nyjↄ pan mbe u ti mbe o krↄyirɛ nyjɛ o lɛ ku mu ti o pan yire yↄ."
42012014	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Awe, ŋmbi u ni tɛɛ e lalaa kpra kunfun, ndee e krↄyirɛ yↄfun hin?"
42012015	A wra kna mna yo leele pre kro pan mbo, "E eyɛ dↄↄta nyiɛlɛ, jrawari sisaa na. Ŋgi na, ki n pe lewo yirɛ nyjɛ u ta mu tro nu u ŋmaa nyi."
42012016	A Yesu na pe gbun yomini ka mbo, "Swafun wa wra u see tɛɛ, see kre na nyu, a wra yirɛ ta tataara.
42012017	A wra yo uyɛ pan mbo, 'Imi mbe pe kuraa ni n chin. Ni n lawee ta mbe ni sro nyjɛ kro tɛɛ.'
42012018	A wra kna mbo, 'Mbe ni sro tɛɛndoe yire juari, mbe yi sin kpↄɛ, mbe ni sro na ni yirɛ kro tɛɛ yi nu.
42012019	Na ni waa kↄ, mbe ni yo ni yɛ pan na, "Mu ndra nyu, mu yirɛ nyjɛ yi shian ta mu tɛɛ, a yie yɛlɛ tataara li. Kena tni mna wuui, ta lii mna kaa mna gboo mna muyɛ lii." '
42012020	A Nyiɛkpↄↄ na kna mna yo u pan mbo, 'Jijuo, aŋga blee ŋga, pie paan mu ŋmaa shↄ mu kɛɛ. Kena yirɛ nyjɛ mu cha mu tɛɛ nyjɛ ŋmbi wee yi hin?' "
42012021	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Pan lewo ŋmba u krↄyirɛ chaa na teeri uyɛ pan tra mna, a u n wa krↄyira ni nyjeeri kre nyi."
42012022	A Yesu na kna mna yo u twanfɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo, "Kena ni yo e pan na yaa na kawa na sro ŋga ee li mbe ŋmaa ta, ndee yoŋgo ŋga ee tↄ ni.
42012023	Ŋgi na, ŋmaa kee shian mu wɛ sro na, a wejiŋge kee shian mu wɛ yoŋgo na.
42012024	E yiɛ wa e hanyiɛlɛ le, praa sro luu, a pra kun mbe tɛɛ, a pe n sroe tɛɛ ndoe ni, a nde Nyiɛkpↄↄ pe kaan sro. A e kee tnu ni mu wɛ hanyiɛlɛ na.
42012025	A e ŋmbi we jaa kawa na u ble nyjɛ we li ni, mbe jaa ka ya u ŋmaa na hin?
42012026	Kena na yaa jaa kre kee fiɛn ŋga ka pe waa, kena yaa tni mbra kawa na hɛnyi yire ni.
42012027	E yiɛ wa e lↄↄ chiɛtoto le, imi na yi lee, a yira tnumu ka tun, ndee mbe yonyi tin mbe tↄ. La, e ti ni yo e pan, Sↄlↄmↄn na swa ta, nde u n nsra yirɛ ta a ka na nyu mna da na yire toto nyjɛ ka ni.
42012028	Kena na Nyiɛkpↄↄ ja na nyaa nyjɛ yii wa nyaalam tↄni yonyi, yire nyjɛ mu nya aŋga, baŋga na pe yi sro. Kena ŋgi kie ti mbe wa e tↄ hin? E shↄnliee fiɛn kpa.
42012029	Kena yaa na ŋga ee ka, ndee ŋga ee gbↄ chaa, mbra kawa na yi ni.
42012030	Ŋgi ndra na hin? Yire yirɛ nyjɛ ni waŋgra leele kawa. A e Lɛ Nyiɛkpↄↄ wre chin na yi keshiaan wa e na.
42012031	Kena e ti mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre kee e shian, we e ŋga yire yirɛ nyjɛ kro."
42012032	"E n nɛɛ, ande yaa fiɛ, ki tna Nyiɛkpↄↄ pan na we e ŋga u ŋunumu kre.
42012033	E e yirɛ kro prɛ, e shianfɛɛnlɛ ŋga yi swa, e swa ŋga kia jaa kla cha, e krↄ yirɛ nyjɛ yia jaa kla fio haa cha nyjeeri, bawa jio n wa mbe le mbe ju, a dumblↄ n wa wa mbe yi kla.
42012034	Ŋgi na, lawee ŋga nu lewo krↄ yira nyi kre, bawa u jawala nyi."
42012035	"E grere chichie e ti mbe e kania na nyini.
42012036	E pe na leele mblɛ tafun u sɛ bijam lawee nu, a pra u sri lɛ, na waa pan maa krↄ gbun to, mbe pe krↄ nyaa u pan.
42012037	Kena na pe tafun wre waa pan kre, mblɛ we paan da na pe u sri kre wo yi dwamu. Kpra na ni yuu e pan na, na ki pan ma kre, pe tafun wre titi we uyɛ kna, mbe ti mbe pe tnitni, mbe u pe ŋga sro mbe pe li.
42012038	Na waa pan ndroo, ndee lafo na kre, u sumifɛɛnlɛ mblɛ we paan da na pe u sri kre, pre wo yi dwamu.
42012039	La, ŋga ni chaa mbe e chin yi na, na katoofun na nyjila ŋga nu jio we pan chin kre, we na tni mbra u shie. Wa na ti mbe u paan u katoo juari mbe le.
42012040	Kena yire titi fna mbe eyɛ kna mbra sri. Ŋgi na, Lewo Pↄ wre we pan nyjila ŋga nu e n na u kra nu."
42012041	A Pita na kna mbo, "Ni Tafun, wre chiin pan mu yomini ŋga gbuun ree, ndee ndro kro pan hin?"
42012042	A o tafun wre na kna mbo, "Kena ŋmbi u pe sumifun kprafun, na kachiŋu hin? Wre wi ŋmba u tafun we tɛɛ u katoo lefun, mbe wra katoo kre le, mbra sumifɛɛnlɛ hamblɛ pre le, mbra pe kaan sro nyjila ŋga ki fna nu.
42012043	Na sumifun wre tafun waa ndru maa pan mu u da na u pini ma kre, wre wo yi dwamu.
42012044	Kpra na ni yuu e pan, u tafun wre we u tɛɛ u yirɛ kro nyu na.
42012045	La, na sumifun wre waa kna maa yo uyɛ pan na, 'Ni Tafun mu titi, maa na u ŋmbilɛ bilɛ na chiɛlɛ sumifɛɛnlɛ pre gbuun, na lii na gboo na bru kre.'
42012046	U tafun wre we le mbe u fo, mbe u ndie tini, mbe sɛ u chaa ndikanafɛɛnlɛ nu.
42012047	Wre sumifun ŋmba u ŋga u tafun yo u pe chin, a u n ki pe kre, pie fwa tɛɛ mbe u ndie tini kpↄↄ.
42012048	La sumifun ŋmba u n chin ŋga u tafun chaa, a u kee pe, a ki fna pe u gbun fwa ni kre, pie u gbun fiɛn. Lewo ŋmba pe kaan yirɛ nɛɛrɛ kre, wre pan pe nɛɛrɛ wie, a na pe mu ŋga nɛɛrɛ mu wɛ chↄↄ, pan pie shↄ mu pan nɛɛrɛ."
42012049	"Kanhun ni ni pan tra na, na kra pe imi na ki nyi kuraa kaa ki tna ni pan.
42012050	Kanyana kpↄↄ wa ni yiɛ mbe ni nya, la, ni niyɛ yii mbe hɛ su na kie tro.
42012051	Yaa na jawa na wejinyiŋge ni ni pan waŋgra nu. Wejinyiŋge ni ma ni pan, la, e ti ni yo mbe e loo, ni pan mbe e lalaa yↄↄlɛ.
42012052	Mu yire aŋga na shie, leele kunↄ we pe yɛ yↄↄlɛ sele nunu nu, mbe pe taarɛ yiri mbe shiin pra, mbe shiin pre yiri mbe taarɛ pre pra.
42012053	Lɛ we yiri mbe pↄ pra, mbe pↄ yiri mbe u lɛ pra. Mbe lo yiri mbe u pↄ chlↄ pra, mbe pↄ chlↄ yiri mbe lo pra. Mbe nafun yiri mbe nafun pra."
42012054	A Yesu na kna mna yo lenɛɛrɛ pre pan mbo, "Na e tloe nya nyjeeri yira shie yila tohaa kre, e ja na yuu na, nyiɛ we pan, a nyiɛ ja na paan yɛŋgɛ.
42012055	A na fuflɛ waa na gbuun na yiri fimihaa na paan kre, e ja na yuu na ndram we wɛɛri, a ki ja na pini ma yɛŋgɛ.
42012056	Yiɛnyumufɛɛnlɛ, e ja na tra, na nyiɛ yiɛ le na kee nyjɛ yie pe chini na yuu, la, yaa jaa aŋga kaalɛɛ nyjɛ yi pini ŋga le mbe nyjɛ yie pan nyina."
42012057	"A ŋgi ki tia yire titi wa jaa ŋga ki fraka chin mbe pe ŋga hin?
42012058	Na mu ŋmbrↄ shie na mu ni kalalifun yiɛ kre, kolo cha mbe ŋu na wre eyɛ lalaa gbeele kolo, mbe u chiin da na mu ni kalalifun wre yiɛ na, mbe kalalifun wre waa shia mu le nyuŋgo lefɛɛnlɛ kɛɛ, mbe pre sɛ mu le nyuŋgo.
42012059	Ni yuu e pan, na ki pan ma kre, ma yili nyuŋgo kre nu fio, fↄna yira ŋga pie shↄ mu pan kre, mu ki tↄ kro tun."
42013001	Nyjila ŋga nu Yesu naa yire kee nyjɛ yuu kre, na leele plɛɛ wa wa, a pra Galilii leele mblɛ Pilato na gbo, nyjila ŋga ni praa sra woni na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kaan kre kee yo Yesu pan.
42013002	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Kena ŋga pra pre leele mblɛ gbo kre kolo ŋga na kre, e jawa na pre leele mblɛ sisam na wɛ Galilii leele hamblɛ na ree?
42013003	Pan ma kra nyi, la, e ti ni yo mbe e loo, na e n e jawala chinɛ mu laa e sisam pee kro kre, pan ee ku na chↄↄ.
42013004	Ndee leele kɛmbↄkↄↄnataarɛ pre Siloam nyuŋgo gedeŋge kre na to mu gbo kre, e jawa na pre lee mblɛ sisam na wɛ Jerusalɛm leele hamblɛ na ree?
42013005	La, e ti ni yo e pan, pan ma kra nyi, hali yire chↄↄ, na e n e jawala chinɛ mu laa e sisam kro kre, pan e kro we ku."
42013006	A Yesu na kna mna yomini ŋga gbun mbo, "Blↄ wa wra u kagbla le mna fig tiŋge ka luu ki lam. Ki ble ka wra yiri mna sɛ na sɛŋgɛ chaa ki na, a u nsra ka nya.
42013007	A wra kna mna yo kagbla lefun wre pan mbo, 'Le, yɛlɛ nununu taarɛ wo yi ŋga, na ni pan na sɛŋgɛ chaa fig tiŋge ŋga na, mba ka ta, kena ki kun mu wa, maa ti mbe kra tra kre klai finfin.'
42013008	A kagbla kre lefun wre na kna mbo, 'Ni Tafun, ki ti ala mu ya, mbe ni tra gbun mbe le ki nↄↄ na, mbe tuwe le ki nu.
42013009	Na yɛlɛ waa da a kia sɛ, kena ki nyu, a na ki n shia sɛ naa mbe o ki kun mbe wa.' "
42013010	Judae wuuble ka nu Yesu na sɛ na leele nyina fninyinyi yire ka nu.
42013011	Kre nyjila kre na chlↄ waa wa wa, a ŋumufↄↄn wa u nu. Ŋumufↄↄn kre na tia chlↄ wre na yaa, mna kru, kie pe yɛlɛ kɛmbↄkↄↄnataarɛ na wa jaa uyɛ fraka.
42013012	Ŋga Yesu na chlↄ wre nya kre, wra u yeeri mna yo u pan mbo, "Maa, mu yira kre laa mu na."
42013013	A Yesu na kɛ tini mu taa u na. Titɛɛ kre nu, a chlↄ wre na yiri mna fraka, na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kaan mɛɛ.
42013014	La, fninyuŋgo wa lopom wre krↄ na kun na Yesu ni na u yaŋu tra wuuble. A lopom wre na fuu mna paara leele pre pan mbo, "Ble nununu kↄↄnanu ni ki fna o tnumu tun. Kena na mu chaa mbe yambla tra kre, pan yire ble yire ka nu, la, maa shia pan o wuuble nu."
42013015	A Yesu na kna mna yo u pan mbo, "Yire yiɛnyumufɛɛnlɛ, e n na tnumu tuni wuuble kre ra? E n na e nui, na e bubunlↄ saanla nagbɛɛ na shie na pe ni lↄↄ wuuble nu kre ra?
42013016	Wre chlↄ ŋmba Sutna pↄ mu tɛɛ yɛlɛ nununu kɛmbↄkↄↄnataarɛ ŋga, Abraham nana ma kree? Kena ki n fna mbe pe u saan wuuble ra?"
42013017	Ŋga Yesu na yo ma kre nyifɛɛrɛ na u loŋgoolo pre gbo. La, leele hamblɛ pre yiɛ na shↄ kawako kee ŋga Yesu na pe kre na.
42013018	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Mni nyini Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nyi hin? A yira ŋgi sembremu ni mbe ki wru mbe gbun hin?
42013019	Pan ki nyi na mↄstad bie fiɛn ŋga blↄ wa na wru mna sɛ luu u kagbla yi, a kra fin mna lɛ, mna yire tiŋge, a hanyiɛlɛ na zeere le ki klɛ nu."
42013020	A wra ndru mu kna mbo, "Yira ŋgi sembremu kuraa ni mbe tɛɛ mbe Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu ŋga kra hin?
42013021	Pan ki nyi na yiisi ŋga chlↄ we wↄ mbe le paanu mimi taakpↄↄ nyini nu, mbe ki ti mimi kre tin mbe kpↄↄ."
42013022	Yesu na yiɛ tɛɛ Jerusalɛm na. Ŋga wraa shie kre, wra tro kakpↄɛ na kabɛɛlɛ yɛ na, na pe nyina Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee kre na shie Jerusalɛm na.
42013023	A ndro wa na u wie mbo, "Ni Tafun, kena leele chiɛri plɛ ŋmaa pie shↄ ree?" A Yesu na kna mbo,
42013024	"E eyɛ gbeŋmba na ee tro kolo foo kre na. Ŋgi ndra na hin? E ti ni yo mbe e loo, lenɛɛrɛ we na chaa mbe tro ki na, a pia ki ja.
42013025	Na katoofun wre waa yiri maa katoo krↄ tↄ kre, bawa ee pan mbe yire krↄ kro, mbe krↄ koori, mbe kna mbra yuu na, 'O Tafun, jande, krↄ nyaa o pan.' Bawa we kna mbe yo e pan na, 'E laa ni na, ni n e yirihaa chin.'
42013026	Mbe ee kna mbra yuu na, 'Wre na ŋu nsra chaa mu ka mu gbↄↄ, a mnaa leele nyina o chiɛ na kree?'
42013027	La, bawa we kna mbe yo e pan na, 'E ti ni yo e pan, ni n e yirihaa chin. E laa ni na, e sɛ, yire sisampefɛɛnlɛ mblɛ.'
42013028	Na e waa yire krↄ kro, maa Abraham na Isaki na Jekↄb na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ pre nya Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nu kre, bawa ee yire mbra nyɛni mbra ŋgaala chirɛ.
42013029	A leele we yiri lawee kro nu mbe paan fni mbe li Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nu.
42013030	A e le, mblɛ pe kro tↄ kre, plɛ we kna mbe yiɛklu, mbe yiɛkulo pre plɛ kna mbe kro tↄ."
42013031	Kre nyjila kre nu Farisiie plɛ na pan mna yo Yesu pan mbo, "Yili tra ŋga nu mu sɛ lawee fↄŋgↄ nu. Ŋgi na, Ŋunu Hɛrodi mu chaa mbe gbo."
42013032	A Yesu na kna mna yo pe pan mbo, "E sɛ yo leele fanafun wre pan na, 'Ni yo mbe ŋumufuɛn wↄ leele nu, mbe yambla tra aŋga na baŋga, ble taarɛ ble na, kre mbe ni tnumu nyu le.' "
42013033	Fna ki fna mbe ni ni kolo taa mbe kun aŋga na baŋga na ki nyisee. Kia jaa pan na Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofun we ku lawee ka nu fↄna Jerusalɛm na.
42013034	"Jerusalɛm atɛ! Ŋu mu Nyiɛkpↄↄ kee nyanyofɛɛnlɛ mblɛ pe tun mu pan kre yiri na pe kuu, mu leele mblɛ pe tun mu pan waari dnɛ ni. Nyjila tataara nu ni chaa mbe mu biile yii mbe le kuɛn jaara, imi na ŋgolo u biile leni kuɛn jaara kre, a mu je ma ni ŋga kolo.
42013035	Le mu katoo we tni waara, a ti ni yo mbe mu loo, ma ni nya na, fↄna ŋga ble e e na yuu na 'Ŋmba u paan o Tafun Nyiɛkpↄↄ mɛɛ nu kre wo yi dwamu bↄkↄ.' "
42014001	Judae wuuble ka nu Yesu na sɛ Farisiie loplombo pre wa katoo lihaa, blↄ wa kɛnyi na u jeelee na tin tin, a wra pan Yesu pan, a leele pre naa Yesu le poŋgo.
42014003	A Yesu na kna mna Judae mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre na Farisiie pre wie mbo, "Kena o mbra kolo ŋga mbe o yaŋu tra wuuble ree, ndee mni hin?"
42014004	Pe nsra nyu kun, a Yesu na yaŋu wre wru mna u tra mna tia wra sɛ.
42014005	A wra kna mna pe wie mbo, "E ŋmbihaa nuu, ndee bubnↄ we to lↄↄ wuuble, mbe wa sɛ u wↄ titɛɛ kre nu hin?"
42014006	Pe nsra kala ka ta mu yo.
42014007	Ŋga Yesu na yiɛ wa mna leele mblɛ pra fni lihaa wa kre le, mna nya na pe kro sɛ tni tni loplombo tnihɛɛ nu kre, wra yo pe pan mbo,
42014008	"Na ndro e yeeri bijam nu kre, na e sɛ yaa tni lawee chichiele nu, na ki pan na pe ndro ŋmba u wɛ ŋu na yeeri wa kre,
42014009	ŋmba u e kro yeeri wa kre we paan yo mu pan na, 'Yiri mu blↄ ŋmba ŋga jↄↄn,' bawa nyifɛɛrɛ we mu gbo, mbe mu yiri mbe sɛ tni kro.
42014010	Kena na pe mu yeeri lawee kre, sɛ tni lawee waa nu, ŋmba u mu yeeri kre we pan mbe yo mu pan na, 'Awe, yiri mu sɛ tni lawee chichie nu.' Na ki pan ma kre, leele mblɛ nu mu sɛ chaa mbe tni kre we mu kpↄↄ.
42014011	Kena ŋmba we uyɛ kpↄↄ kre, pie u pe fiɛn, a ŋmba we uyɛ pe fiɛn kre, pie u kpↄↄ."
42014012	Yesu na kna mna yo blↄ ŋmba wra u yeeri mna sɛ u katoo kre pan mbo, "Na mu lenɛɛrɛ yeeri fninlihaa kre, maa mu nↄↄlↄ, ndee mu nyjↄↄlↄ na mu chinlɛ, ndee mu sele leele, ndee mbe swafɛɛnlɛ mblɛ pe pe mu tnifɛɛnlɛ chiin yeeri. Ŋgi na, na ki pan ma, pre we ndru mbe mu yeeri ka na, mbe nyjɛ ŋu pe mu pe ŋga kre fↄlↄ tↄ.
42014013	La, na mu leele yeeri fninlihaa kre, shianfɛɛnlɛ na finla, na mblɛ pe fuuru, na fuunlo kro yeeri mu chaa.
42014014	Ŋgi na, ŋga mu pe pre na kre, pia jaa mu fↄlↄ tↄ, la, kprafɛɛnlɛ kunnyiɛ nu kre, mu fↄtↄↄrↄ ta."
42014015	Ŋga leele mblɛ pre na Yesu naa wa mu tni lihaa wa kre na u kee kre loo kre, a pe wa na kna mbo, "Leele mblɛ pie li Nyiɛkpↄↄ ŋunumu kre nu kre wo yi dwamu."
42014016	A Yesu na kna mu yo u pan mbo, "Ki ble ka blↄ wa wra lenɛɛrɛ yeeri mbe pe sɛ li u katoo.
42014017	Ŋga wra sro kre pe mu kↄ kre, wra u sumifun tun na u sɛ leele mblɛ u kɛ wa mu yeeri kre yeeri mbo, 'E pan! Ni sro kre pe mu kↄ.'
42014018	A leele pre kro na kaalɛɛ fↄnyi ta na yuu. Jlewo wre na kna mbo, 'Ni tra ka lↄ, a ki fna ni sɛ ki le. Kena ni mu tali, mba kolo ta.'
42014019	A shiinwo na kna mbo, 'Ni nui kɛ lↄ, a ni shie pe lehaa. Kena jande, mba kolo ta.'
42014020	A taarɛwo na kna mbo, 'Ni chlↄ leŋge. Kena mba kolo ta mbe pan.'
42014021	A blↄ wre sumifun wre na ndru mna pan mu kalɛɛ nyjɛ pe yo yire kro yo u pan. A krↄ na blↄ wre kun, a wra kna mu yo u sumifun wre pan mbo, 'Sɛ lete na nyaanyaa, mu sɛ shianfɛɛnlɛ, na finla, na fuunlo, na mblɛ pe fuuru kro yeeri.'
42014022	A sumifun wre na sɛ mna pan mu yo u tafun wre pan mbo, 'Ni Tafun, ŋga mu yo ni pe kre, ni ki pe, la lawee wa tɛ mbe leele tni.'
42014023	A u tafun wre na kna mu yo sumifun wre pan mbo, 'Sɛ tro mbookrↄe nu, na kooloe na, mblɛ mu nya wa kro pe yeeri mbe pe pan, mbe ni katoo kre nyi.
42014024	Ŋgi na, leele mblɛ ni klu mu yeeri kre, pe wa wa ni sro ŋga ka ta mbe naa.' "
42014025	Lenɛɛrɛ na taa Yesu kro a praa shie, a wra kna mna yo pe pan mbo,
42014026	"Na wa pan mbe taa ni kro, fↄna u ni kori mu wɛ u lɛ, ndee u lo, ndee u chↄ, ndee u biile, ndee u nyjↄↄlↄ na u chinlɛ na u jaala na, mbe u yɛ fɛɛ, wa jaa pe ni twanfun.
42014027	A ŋmba u n u kum kanyana kaan wru mu taa ni kro kre, wa jaa pe ni twanfun.
42014028	Na e wa yo we nyuŋgo sin mbe ki gede kre, we kluu tni mbe ki fↄlↄ gbun mbe le tun, na we swa ta mbe jaa ki sin mbe kↄ rɛ?
42014029	Na kre ma, na u nyuŋgo kre nↄↄ le, a u n shia ja mu ki sin mu kↄ kre, mblɛ pie ki nya kre we u tɛɛ,
42014030	mbra yuu na, 'Blↄ ŋmba yo we u nyuŋgo sin, a u n ja mu ki kↄ.'
42014031	A na ŋunu wa shie sojae kagbeŋ kɛ ni, mbe sɛ wi na ŋunu wa na u sojae kagbeŋ fulo ni kre, we klu mbe tnii jawa na we jaa fni na u loŋgo wre ni ree?
42014032	Na waa nya na wa u ja kre, we leele tun mbe pe sɛ u loŋgo wre fni haalee, mbe pe peyɛ lalaa gbeele.
42014033	Pan ki nyi chↄↄ, ndro wa jaa pe ni twanfun, fↄna u yirɛ nyjɛ yii wa u pan kro kee fɛɛ."
42014034	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Weŋge tna, la, na ki ki tnam wa mu fun kre, yaka wa jaa ti ki tna na fio.
42014035	Kia nyu kuraa mbe jaa yaka pe, a tnu ka wa pe ki nu na, fↄna pie ki kna mbe wo. Kena ŋmba uu wa ndie ni kre, ti mbe u loo."
42015001	Nyjila ka nu lampoo shↄfɛɛnlɛ na sisampefɛɛnlɛ na pan mbe Yesu kee loo.
42015002	A Farisiie pre na Judae mbra nyinafɛɛnlɛ pre naa taanri u na na yuu mbo, "Blↄ ŋmba na sisam pefɛɛnlɛ pe nyaari, hali wra chaa na lii na pe ni."
42015003	A Yesu na kna mna pe wie mbo,
42015004	"E nu, na waa wa mbaala lafaa ni, a nunu chom fun pe nu, ufun wa fuloejirɛ na kɛmbↄkↄↄnajirɛ pre ti pe kahaa wa mbe sɛ nunu wre cha tun ree?
42015005	A na ki pan ma, a waa u nya kre, u yiɛ we shↄ mbe u u bali mbe taa patia na mbe pan na u ni katoo.
42015006	Na waa le katoo, ki yɛshↄↄrↄ we ti u u nↄↄlↄ na u tnifɛɛnlɛ yeeri mbe yo pe pan na, 'Ni yiɛshↄ mu tro. Ni mbↄↄ u fun, a ni u nya. Kena e ti mbe o yiɛshↄ.'
42015007	Na ndro nunu chom u jawala chinɛ mu laa u sisam kro kre, pan chↄↄ, mblɛ pee wa nyjeeri kre yiɛ we shↄ u na mbe wɛ leele fuloejirɛ na kɛmbↄkↄↄnajirɛ mblɛ pe peyɛ jawa na pe fraka, a ki n shian na pie pe jawala chinɛ kre na.
42015008	Ndee e nu, chlↄ ŋmbi we swa finyi nununu kɛ ta, na nunu chom fun u pan, mbe wa kania mu, mbe pↄyira wru mbe katoo kre pↄ, mbe ki cha kama mbe sɛ su na we ki nya hin?
42015009	A na waa ki nya, we u nↄↄlↄ na u tnifɛɛnlɛ yeeri mbe yo pe pan na, 'E ti mbe mi na yire yiɛ shↄ. Ŋgi na, ni swa ki fun a ni ki nya.'
42015010	Pan chↄↄ kie pe, na sisampefun nunu u jawala chinɛ mu laa u sisam kro kre, Nyiɛkpↄↄ bitumblↄ yiɛ shↄ u na."
42015011	A Yesu na kna mbo, "Blↄ wa na u bibilɛ shiin plɛ praa wa.
42015012	A ŋmba wra pe ble wre na kna, mna yo pe lɛ pan mbo, 'Ndoo, jande, o krↄ yirɛyire yↄ mu ni ŋga nyjɛ mbe ta.' A blↄ wre na yirɛ yire yↄ mna u biile pre ŋga.
42015013	Kie pe ble chiɛri yɛ to, a pↄ wre na u yirɛ nyjɛ wra ta yire prɛ, mna swa kre bali, mna kolo kun mna sɛ waŋgra ka nu. Bawa wra sɛ swa kre tɛɛ mna uyɛ li, a kra kↄ mu u ti.
42015014	Ŋga swa kre kro na kↄ u kɛɛ kre, klo badaŋga ka na to kre waŋgra kre nu. A na shian u yii kpↄↄ.
42015015	Bawa wra sɛ uyɛ mbra waŋgra kre ndro wa na, a wre naa u tuni wra shie na u u prakoe kaan sro.
42015016	Klo sisaa na tia sroe yire wraa prakoe pre kaan kre kuraa na pe u pan niŋge ni, a wa ndro ta mbe u u ŋga yaka mbe u ka.
42015017	Ŋga wra u tnimu nya ma kre, a wra kna na yuu uyɛ pan mbo, 'Leele mblɛ pe tnumu tuni ndoo pan kuraa lii na prai sro na, a klo na ni kuu kre.
42015018	Mbe ndru mbe sɛ yo ndoo pan na, "Ndoo, ni sisaa pe mu ŋu na Nyiɛkpↄↄ taan
42015019	Kena ni n fna na mu ni yeeri mu pↄ na. Ni wru mu pe mu sumifɛɛnlɛ pre wa." '
42015020	A wra yiri mnaa shie u lɛ pan. U lɛ wre na u pↄ wre nya haalee na u paan, a u kee na pe u pan fooro ni, a wra fɛ mna sɛ u fa mu yii, mna u nyu shiun.
42015021	A u pↄ wre na kna mbo, 'Ndoo, ni sisaa pe Nyiɛkpↄↄ na, mu sisaa pe mu na, ki tia ni n fna na pie ni yeeri mu pↄ na.'
42015022	A u lɛ wre na kna mna yo u sumifɛɛnlɛ pre pan mbo, 'E sɛ dodoŋgi titnↄŋↄ chichie titi wru e pan e u le; e u le feelee na kpawrɛ.
42015023	Na e kↄ, mbe e sɛ nuu ŋmba nu nyina nyi yii mbe paan u gbo, mbe sro pe mbe o li, mbe oyɛ yiɛ shↄ.
42015024	Ŋgi na, ni pↄ ŋmba, ki pe na kuu u ku mu nyi, wra fun, a ni u nya.' A pra peyɛ yiɛ shↄ kama.
42015025	Kre nyjila kre na blↄ wre pↄ lopom wree wa see. Ŋga wraa paan mna da katoo nyu na kre, wra loo na pe mɛɛ koni na yoo.
42015026	A wra u lɛ sumifɛɛnlɛ pre nunu yeeri mna u wie mbo, 'A ŋgi pe pini mna hin?'
42015027	A wra kna mna yo u pan mbo, 'Mu chunu u le, a mu lɛ nuu yii mu gbo. Ŋgi na, ŋga u u nya ki mu, a yaka n u ta.'
42015028	A krↄ na pↄ lopom wre kun, a wra yo wa le katoo. A u lɛ wre na yiri mna sɛ u tali na u pan katoo.
42015029	A pↄ lopom wre na kna mbo, 'Ni mu sumi yɛlɛ tataara, ni n mu nyu kee je tun. Yira ŋgi mu ni ŋga tun hin? Hali sugbↄ kuraa mu n ni ŋga wa, a mi na ni nↄↄlↄ oyɛ yiɛ shↄ.
42015030	La, ŋga mu pↄ ŋmba u sɛ mu yirɛ kla tiɛrifɛɛnlɛ na kre le aŋga rɛ, a mu sɛ nuu yii mu gbo wre pan.'
42015031	A blↄ wre na kna mbo, 'Ni pↄ, nyjila kro nu ŋuu wa ni jaara, a ni yira kro mu wo yi.
42015032	Kena ki fna mbe o oyɛ yiɛ shↄ. Ŋgi na, mu chunu ŋmba u ku mu ndru mu nyi, wra fun, a o u nya.' "
